Your feet make shallow dimples on her thigh as you jog, still winded, towards the hem of her shorts. Fulda shows no reaction as you get closer, your pace steadily taking you closer to something you can anchor yourself to.

When you're barely more than an arm's length from your goal Fulda corners sharply, knocking you off your feet. You're thrown into the side of her opposite thigh, hanging momentarily before sliding down the steep slope to her leather seat. This landing is not nearly as cushioned as the previous one but you manage to roll as you land, minimizing the damage.

From deep between her thighs you look up at Fulda. She smirks slightly, probably pleased at messing with you without even having to direct any attention your way. You turn and look down her legs, toned behemoths capped by long Converse that rest on the pedal. Absent anything else to do you walk along them, running your hand along a thigh as you go, while Fulda arrives safely at her place. When she finally stops you're nearly halfway to her knee, and you hope she'll be able to find you to get you out.
11212312232112111.title: Always Wear a Seatbelt

choices: She leaves you in her shorts for a while longer
112123122321121111.content:
Fulda looks down at you from the peak of the mountain that she is, and her eyes lock onto your tiny form between her legs. She reaches a hand down and pokes her fingers into the seat before you, blocking your path down her leg. Her fingers begin scraping along the leather towards you, forming a wall whose inexorable advance you can't avoid. Unable to resist, you get scooped up by her fingers as they form a shovel perfectly sized for your body.

You're held between her powerful thigh and fingers as she scrapes them along, trapping you against her. She presses you slightly into her skin, not pushing hard enough to harm you but definitely enough to keep you from getting out. Luckily she digs into her thigh enough that you can't slip between the two surfaces, keeping you from being unintentionally crushed.

Your cell made from fingers steadily moves you up Fulda's thigh for some time, and then begins rotating. She turns you perpendicular, head towards her knees, as she continues pushing you along the silky smooth skin of her upper thigh. Suddenly Fulda unclasps her fingers, and the momentary lack of pressure drops you to rest on the side of her ring finger. Fulda withdraws her fingers quickly enough that you can't be ferried out on them, and you're gripped firmly again, this time by the skin-tight cloth of her shorts.

Fulda swings her monumental legs out of the car, swinging you along in a disorienting loop. As she steps you're able to peek through a miniscule gap down her leg so that you can watch her muscles tense and relax with each stride, her enormous Converse slapping the ground hard enough to make small earthquakes. The ground changes from concrete to linoleum tile, and then again to carpet as Fulda enters and walks through her sorority house.

At the top of the stairs you hear her open another door, then quickly close it behind her. There's a faint click as she turns the lock, then the carpet far below blurs by as she steps to the center of the room. "We're home, bug," she declares, the vibrations from her booming voice shaking you slightly. "Are you ready for some fun, just the two of us?"
112123122321121111.title: The Shorts Bus

1121231223211211112.content:
Gradually you're rotated as Fulda lifts up her leg until you feel yourself oriented sideways again, allowing you to see a glimpse of her stark white walls. Then, much more quickly, Fulda slams her foot down, the torque making your head spin as you're turned back upside down. The downward force exerted by your body after the stomp is enough to break the tension of her shorts, and you're sent rocketing out the bottom.

You slide down her leg, gaining speed with each inch of tanned flesh you pass. When you reach her calf you continue along her muscle's curve, and before you know it you're launched off the side like it's a ski jump. Rapidly you spin through the air, your view constantly shifting between the floor as it gets closer and Fulda, who seems to loom ever larger as you plummet to the carpet.

Before you lose your lunch you impact upon the carpet, slightly sinking into the surprisingly plush fibers. The softness of her carpet, combined with the incredible spin you're in, keep you from being seriously damaged by the landing, and you continue your roll along the carpet until you make impact with a heavy, solid rubber object. You regard the obstacle that stopped you, much longer than it is tall, with a single black horizontal stripe running the length. It dawns on you that this is no coincidence - rather, it's Fulda's shoe.

The enormous shoe lifts up and swivels, centering your prone body directly under the sole. Fulda swings it up and down like she's pumping a pedal, bringing the diamond-patterned rubber close enough for you to touch before swiftly withdrawing again. After several pumps she leaves her foot in the up position, letting it loom over you while she ponders what to do next.
1121231223211211112.title: Stomped Out

11212312232112111121.content:
You gaze up the length of the tremendous shoe looming over you, thankful that it had stopped just short of slamming into you several times. It's so close that beyond it you really can't see much of anything - it forces your eyes to focus on the repeating pattern, and each slight imperfection in the rubber stands out like a jagged scar. Never in your life did you imagine you'd find yourself in awe of a shoe, but here you are.

It's too bad you're focusing so near, or you would have noticed Fulda's frustrated sigh while you stand there paralyzed. As fast as you can blink her titanic shoe swings down again with so much force Fulda couldn't stop it even if she wanted to. You're laid out hard when it slams into your head, and most of your bones crack as they're trapped underneath her shoe. The pressure increases as Fulda lifts up her heel, and with a quick twist your body is broken up and smeared among the carpet fabric. Fulda stomps her foot down a couple times for good measure, totally flattening your crushed remains, before walking off.
11212312232112111121.title: Pitiless

11212312232112111122.content:
As you lay on your back marveling at the titanic shoe filling up the sky, you notice it begin to slowly get bigger as it descends toward you. No longer paralyzed with fear as you were when she was rapidly swinging her foot up and down you force yourself to stand, your legs sinking into the long, soft carpet fibers. Fulda continues lowering her foot as you try to escape from under it, your progress hindered as you have to step over each knee-high thread in your path.

The world around you darkens as the bottom of her shoe encroaches ever closer. Energized by fear you continue your path, certain you can get free if you just keep going. Your head bumps against the rubber of her sole as you step high, and with a battle cry you throw yourself forward, knowing that it's now or never.

Behind you Fulda's shoe lays flat against the ground, just barely missing your feet. The canvas of her humongous shoe wrinkles as she lifts her heel, driving the ball of her foot further into the carpet. A swishing sound permeates your ears as she twists her foot back and forth, grinding her shoe into the carpet.

Though you escaped this squeeze, you know the other shoe has yet to drop. You get back to your feet and continue your trek over Fulda's carpet, doing your best to cope with the rough terrain. Behind you the sound of her shoe grinding into carpet stops, and you feel the minor quake as her heel sets itself back onto the floor.

Fulda allows your trek to continue for some time while you navigate your way across her floor, neither of you sure of any goal you might ultimately have. Suddenly your escape is halted when another shoe sets down in front of you, this one practically vertical except for the toe being pushed roughly into the carpet, so close that you're sure it was specifically targeted. You look up the massive rubber sole, dozens of feet high, to her calf above as it pops out from the strain, and then to her horizontal thigh beyond her crooked knee. For a moment you simply look up at her heel towering above you, waiting for Fulda to make her move.
11212312232112111122.title: On the Run

choices: "I guess I should show you around."
112123122321121111221.content:
You continue gazing up the monolithic shoe before you, watching the heel minutely quiver as Fulda holds it vertical with her mighty legs. Your attention is so focused on the pattern of diamonds, each as wide as you are tall, that you jump with fright when Fulda's voice finally booms, breaking the silence.

"Oh, that's not some little insect scurrying around on my floor, it's just you!" she says, her tone clearly indicating she made no such mistake. "And to think I nearly crushed you without even thinking about it. Boy, would my face have been red!" She lets out a sarcastic laugh and lifts up her shoe, then pulls it back toward her, making sure its entire length passes over your head. When she sets it down she continues, "You should be more careful, or I'll treat you like the pest that you are."

That's as clear a signal as any that Fulda's done playing for now, so you turn around to regard the giantess. She stands with her feet shoulder width apart, the tips of her shoes about six inches away from you. As you look up her leg muscles twitch involuntarily, and you note that her well-worn black short shorts have been molded to her thighs rather than impose their own form. Her arms are crossed under her chest, pushing her well above-average breasts up even more. By the time you reach her face she's glowering down at you, and you get the feeling she's trying very hard to conceal outright disgust.

Fulda begins impatiently tapping her foot, each thud sending a minor tremor through your bones. A rush of wind escapes her mouth as she sighs deeply, then opens her mouth to speak.
112123122321121111221.title: Just Some Fun

choices: "why don't you check out the inside?"
1121231223211211112212.content:
Fulda leans over and extends a hand down to you, her long fingers arrayed like a claw machine as they descend. With great precision she pinches the back of your shirt with her fingertips and picks you up from the carpet, letting you dangle helplessly. She then stands back up, rapidly propelling you into the air, and holds you facing away from her at arm's length.

As you swing back and forth, kicking uselessly in an attempt to steady yourself, you note that Fulda's room is fairly large, and it doesn't just seem that way due to your shrunken size. In front of you is a massive combination desk and drafting table, with a tower of books and a closed laptop atop it. When she rotates, starting you swinging in a whole new direction, you see a large entertainment center, the centerpiece of which is a screen wide enough to span your entire room.

When she turns again you're overlooking a bed, probably a queen-size though it looks more like an aircraft carrier to you. "That's the biggest bed they'd let me put in here," Fulda explains. "Shame, since my feet still hang off the end, but I can't see that making a difference to you. But just so you don't get any funny ideas, if you try to climb in bed without me knowing you're going to end up inside one of those shoes, got it?" She tilts you, allowing you to see a neat row of footwear ranging from an old, beat-up pair of All-Stars similar to what she's wearing now to knee-high boots and formal heels.

Finally, with a few steps of her incredibly long legs she carries you before her closet. Before you can stop swaying she pulls the door open, revealing a line of clothes hanging from a rack. She rotates her hand slightly, directing your view down to some scattered shoes that apparently didn't make the cut for display and... a house. "And this is where you'll be staying when not with me."

"Uh, Fulda?" you shout. "Aren't you a bit old to have a dollhouse in your room?"

She turns you around just so you can see the nonplussed look on her face. "That was part of my senior project, you stupid bug. It has full electricity, plumbing, and even furniture and heating. It's probably better than whatever craphole you lived in before." Pointedly she bats you with a finger and says, "Now..."
1121231223211211112212.title: The Grand Tour

11212312232112111122122.content:
Fulda lowers you to the floor and releases her grasp on the back of your collar, letting you drop an inch to land on the soft carpet. You look from the house, built to your scale if the front door and windows are anything to go by, back to Fulda, who has already stood back up so as to tower over you. As you consider her silhouette she begins tapping her foot, and the steady thud of her shoe on the carpet seems like a timer. "Get in there," she orders, "or I'll find somewhere much less accommodating for you to stay."

Unwilling to risk angering her further you walk up the steps and pull the door open - surprisingly it even has a latching doorknob. Once inside you close the door and have a look around. To your right is a coat rack, complete with a wool overcoat which seems roughly your size. In front of you it opens into a living room, fully equipped with a chair, couch, rug, and even a tiny TV, all scaled down to be usable for an inch-tall person. The TV even looks like it's hooked up.

For a moment you forget your predicament and start walking around the house, marveling at how well it fits you. When you look out a bay window you're suddenly reminded of your situation as the entirety of your view is Fulda's ankle. You follow her leg all the way up as if you're just now seeing her for the first time. "Turn on the lights and head upstairs," she commands, "I have a very important feature to show you."

You flick the switch at the base of the stairs, and to your astonishment the stairway comes awash in artificial light. The stairs creak as you ascend, and at the top you're met with three open doors. To your right you see what must be your new bedroom, and you quickly enter, switching the light on as you do.

Before you can properly survey your bedroom the lights go out and the ceiling is torn away. A spotlight shines down on you, limiting your vision, and Fulda booms, "The roof slides off so that I can check on you any time I want! See, isn't that useful?" Fingertips enter the beam from the flashlight shining down on you, and begin their approach.
11212312232112111122122.title: A New Home

choices: Try to climb into some clothing
112123122321121111221221.content:
The best way out of this is to do something unexpected, you think, and you need to get out of the spotlight. While Fulda's fingers slowly descend you look around the room, spying a window just a short dash to your left. You run over and throw it open, surprised again by the complete functionality in this miniature house, and look down. It's not that far to the floor, you tell yourself, and the carpet should provide enough cushion.

From the window you glance upward and see Fulda's outstretched fingers coming perilously close. You take a deep breath and brace your hands in the window frame, then throw yourself forward. As you fall you tuck your legs in, and you hit the soft carpet in a roll. Immediately the flashlight shifts, keeping you in the center of the spotlight, and you know you're not out of the fire yet.

Briefly you scan the nearby line of shoes, trying to pick out which ones would be the hardest for her to get to. You get back to your feet and run, Fulda keeping pace with you using her flashlight so that you feel like a felon on the run. Curiously she doesn't make any attempt to grab you as you approach the discarded footwear.

The spotlight stays on you as you move, though Fulda continues to merely watch. You reach a temporary haven underneath the arch of a high heeled shoe, and suddenly you hear a click and the circle of light disappears. There's a brief rustling, and Fulda announces, "Sure, I'll play your game bug. I'll leave and turn the light on so that you can find a good place to hide. In five minutes I'll come back and look for you. Hide well." The sound of the door closing echoes briefly, and then the whole closet is flooded with light. Cautiously you emerge and take stock of your options.
112123122321121111221221.title: Choosing the Game

choices: "Better get out of there... if you can."
"Get out of there... while you can."
"What's the matter?  Converse not to your taste?"
1121231223211211112212213.content:
From the closet's floor you look around at the many pairs of shoes haphazardly placed there, everything from a pair of decent, shiny heels to some old blown-out athletic shoes. Then you look up to see enormous banners of cloth hanging, mostly old dresses that she wore once but wants to save "just in case." Just in front of you, of course, is the tiny house you just escaped from, but might be a good option. After some deliberation you make your choice and begin mentally preparing yourself for a climb.

Before you can even take a step the door bursts open and Fulda rushes in, the excited stomping of her feet booming throughout the small room. "I tricked you, idiot!" she declares, placing her hands triumphantly on her waist. You make a break for the shoe line again but Fulda makes her move quickly, slamming her foot down right in your path. Unable to stop you bump into her instep and fall to your back on the carpet.

Fulda leans over so that she can see you laying prone on the ground. "Did you really think I was going to let you get away?" she taunts, dragging her other foot over. You scramble back to your feet and try to run, but a light tap from Fulda's shoe knocks you back down. Your captor giggles as you topple, and her shoe drags closer.

"No, we're not going to play any games you want to," she says as you pull yourself back up into a sitting position. "I'm the big one here, you're just a tiny, weak bug." Her enormous shoe comes closer and you try to scoot away, only to run into the same shoe that stopped you in the first place. "That means I'm in charge, and we're going to do what I want to do, got it?" There's a resounding thump from both sides as her shoes touch, trapping you.

Frantically you look around at the white rubber walls striped with black, and the rolling hills of canvas with huge, toned towers rising out of them. Fulda smiles down at you and coos,
1121231223211211112212213.title: A Clever Ruse

11212312232112111122122131.content:
Urgently you jump back to your feet, hoping to escape whatever trap Fulda has planned for you here. Immediately you turn left and run for the back of her shoes, hoping to find some way to escape there. Though her heels are firmly together you think you just might be able to force your way through! Just when you're even with her monumental ankles you throw yourself into the air, aiming between her shoes.

You land hard on the canvas, and manage to force your arms through the small gap while the rest of your body slams back into the rubber. Frantically you start kicking at the soles' sides, trying to climb up, when you feel yourself being lifted from the ground. With a look back you see the incline getting steeper - Fulda's standing on her toes! While you dangle you try to dig your fingers into a crease or find a handhold, eventually finding yourself almost vertical.

You resolve to patiently wait to be let back down, though your white-knuckled grip weakens with exhaustion each passing second. Your heart jumps as Fulda hops, momentarily disrupting your position. When she lands the force dislodges your fingers, and you find yourself plummeting back down to the carpet. Fortunately the fibers are soft and you're unharmed, but before you can get back up Fulda's set her heels down, trapping you again.

Desperately you turn and run towards her toes, sure you can find some way out through them. As you approach though Fulda begins rapidly lifting and setting her toes back down, the steady, booming rhythm making it apparent what will happen if you try to slide through them.

To your right you spot a crease in the shoe from the incessant pounding, and you run to climb it. Hurriedly you climb her instep and find yourself atop the shoe, standing among the laces on the undulating canvas. You waste no time in making a mad dash for the toe, only to be stopped when a huge tanned fist slams down in front of you. Before you can get away Fulda lifts up her heel, trapping you in this narrow passage. She spreads her fingers, allowing them to advance towards you, while you can do nothing but wait and see what she does.
11212312232112111122122131.title: No Escape

112123122321121111221221311.content:
You try to back up from Fulda's encroaching fingers though you know it's futile, only to back into her woven cotton shoe laces almost immediately. Her fingers pull back just as quickly, but before you can feel any relief she cocks her middle finger behind the tip of her thumb. An auburn ponytail descends before you, and you glance up to see two piercing blue eyes focusing on you.

Though you anticipate an immediate strike you're disappointed, and Fulda leaves you waiting. Instead you find yourself being moved while she rotates her leg, pointing her toe inwards. You find yourself nearly looking dead-on at her opposite ankle when you feel some rustling from the shoe you're on. Quickly you spin, stepping away from the canvas wall, to see her lining up her fingertip with your torso.

"Perfect," she says, and releases her finger. It swings along her shoe until it pulls up, striking you squarely in the stomach and lifting you off your feet. You remain doubled-over on her fingertip until it's fully extended, at which point you fly off at what seems like a hundred miles an hour. Fulda's ankle whizzes by as you gain altitude, and it's not long until you sail over your dollhouse and through the doorway out into Fulda's room. Not far past that gravity reasserts itself, and you rapidly find yourself pulled back down to the carpet, landing on the soft fibers with enough force to keep you rolling another half foot.

You come to a rest lying on your face with stars at the edge of your vision and gasping for breath. With great effort you look up to see Fulda turn around and start slinking her way towards you, carefully putting one foot in one of the other as she approaches. Frantically you try to push yourself up but your arms simply have no strength while you continue gasping for air. Each step Fulda takes rumbles through the floor, giving you a sense of urgency, but still your arms won't work.

Two feet away Fulda slams her shoe down with enough force to cause some minor rattling from the shockwave. Her shoe begins to bend again for her next step, and as she picks up her back leg it swings out wide in an exaggerated motion. You do your best to muster what strength you have to get to your feet and run as the titanic Converse swings inward.
112123122321121111221221311.title: Flicker

choices: Fulda positions her shoe over you
1121231223211211112212213111.content:
Your breath continues coming in uneven and rattling, getting just enough oxygen to your lungs to keep the darkness at the edges of your vision. Fulda's leg continues to follow a lazy arc through the air on its way down, and as a last-ditch effort you flop your body so that your hands are down on the carpet. Shakily you push yourself up, trying to force yourself to your feet as your elbows weakly shake under your own weight.

Fulda's foot slams down next to you, dropping you back to the floor as her stomp shakes your elbows. She quickly takes another step, setting her other foot down on your right so that she can stand astride you again. You try to roll yourself onto your back but your elbow still lacks steadiness, and before you can get more than your shoulder up you collapse again.

Fulda picks up her foot nearest you and points the toe down, then brings it toward you. She sets it down and digs into the carpet, then scoots it forward until the cold rubber touches your arm. With a quick kick she flips you over, and she lets her shoe linger over you a moment before setting it back down.

You remain lying on the ground looking up at Fulda's powerful legs as they converge hundreds of feet above you inside her relatively tiny shorts. She places her hands on her waist and glowers down at you, then says, "Look at you. No fight left in you, too weak to stand up or even roll yourself over. It's like you've lost all will to live. Pathetic." Her toes twitch inside her shoes, causing you to gulp. "You're no fun to play with if you don't have any motivation, and I think I know just how to get yours back."
1121231223211211112212213111.title: Non-Start

11212312232112111122122131112.content:
Before you know it Fulda's doubled over, her sculpted torso hanging over you like an enormous classical cathedral's ceiling. Seamlessly she lowers an arm, her fingers spread out so that her net is cast wide. You try to stand and attempt an escape, but you still haven't gotten your breath fully back and can't get your legs under you in time. Fulda's hand ensnares you, and as she stands back up she wraps her fingers tightly around your body, leaving just your head exposed.

She carries you at chest height, looking over your head balancing atop her massive finger as she leaves her room and heads down the stairs. Occasionally she glances at you as if to remind herself that you're still there, wholly indifferent to the tribulations you're facing in her hand as she squeezes you tightly.

The thuds of her enormous feet on stairs give way to the sounds of her shoes slapping on tile, and you find your ability to breathe restored. It's still not easy with Fulda's hand solidly gripping your chest and constricting your lungs, but at least you no longer feel them burning. You wiggle your body to test her grip and find that you can't even so much as budge your legs. In response Fulda squeezes her hand, making you wince from the sudden pressure.

Your ride slows down, and you can tell from Fulda's face that you're almost at your destination. You brave a look over your shoulder as best you can, and manage to get a peek at where she's taking you.
11212312232112111122122131112.title: Ensnared

112123122321121111221221311122.content:
Without even setting you down Fulda reaches into a cabinet and pulls out a loaf of bread the size of your dormitory, and pulls out two slices of bread with one hand. She sets them down side by side, then reaches into the refrigerator to retrieve other sandwich supplies - meat, cheese and condiments - all while maintaining her grip on you. Her massive hand quickly assembles a pile of meat and cheese on one slice of bread while leaving the other one conspicuously barren.

As soon as she puts the finishing touches on her meat mountain you find yourself being forced downward by Fulda's iron grip. She sets you down in the middle of the empty bread slice and opens her fingers, dropping you onto the field of organic wheat bread below. Before you can get up she pushes her index finger down on your back, pinning you in place. Wide strings of a yellow, sticky substance begin crossing over you, and Fulda withdraws her finger as the morass of mustard encroaches over more of your body.

You try to force your way free but the tangy veins of mustard aren't making it easy, and before you can make any serious progress Fulda picks up your slice of bread and turns it over, then slaps it onto the pile of meat so that you're on your back. While you test how constrictive your new environment is you're lifted up between Fulda's enormous hands so that you and the sandwich you're in are held in front of her face.

She opens her mouth wide just as you confirm that you barely have enough space to wiggle your fingers beneath the bread. Slowly you feel yourself pulled towards her gigantic mouth, and her maw looms larger by the second. You squeeze your eyes shut when you feel her breath on you, and feel a sharp jolt of movement followed by what must be her teeth sinking into her meal, but you don't feel like you're inside her mouth. Cautiously you peek and see her lips wrapped around the sandwich beside you as she bites down on a section. You watch her chew, then she viciously attacks the other side, going through the same pageantry as before.

Fulda makes a show of eating the rest of the sandwich, cutting her teeth mere fractions of an inch from where you're pinned down, cutting an outline around you. After each bite she pulls back so that you can watch her chew and swallow a load of food several times your size while you struggle to move more than just your arms from in between the bread and roast beef.

Her mouth darts past you and nips off one more block of food, the last hanging off the inch-long block she's carved around you. She barely even chews it before swallowing, then finally meets your gaze. Fulda squares the morsel you're in with her mouth, then asks, "Did you manage to find some motivation?" Her gigantic mouth inches forward and her hand repositions itself to catapult you inside while you struggle to get free. "Last chance."
112123122321121111221221311122.title: Tightly Sandwiched In

choices: Just in the nick of time
1121231223211211112212213111221.content:
You push with all your might up against the bread and down against the slabs of meat, but you're not able to get leverage on either side. Desperately you try to wiggle your way out, but as your feet kick they slide along the slick surface of the roast beef, doing nothing but make you bob up and down frantically. As a last ditch effort you try to eat yourself some room out of the crust, but your tiny mouth can only get a few bites before it goes completely dry.

You're close enough to look up Fulda's nostrils when she finally passes her judgment. "Oh well, that's too bad," she says, her voice booming all around you. Her mouth hangs open and you feel an intense push on your feet convey you and the rest of the sandwich into her mouth. The transition from the bright room to inside Fulda's mouth is sudden and stark as the dark, moist environment surrounds you, and when the light fades as she closes her lips you know it's over.

Fulda's tongue slams into the side of your morsel, driving it toward a cheek. Saliva surrounds you and begins seeping into the bread, moistening it and allowing you more freedom of movement. You give one last effort to break free as the sandwich comes to a stop, knowing you only have a matter of moments before Fulda's jaw slams shut.
1121231223211211112212213111221.title: Roast Beef and You

11212312232112111122122131112211.content:
With the changed orientation you think you might be able to get enough grip to kick yourself free this time. Desperately you dig your heels into the beef below you so that they sink in to the soft meat and push with all your might, straining against the soggy bread clinging to you. After a tense moment the bread falls away, allowing you to shoot out from your tomb and into the greater area of Fulda's mouth.

Just after you pop free her jaw closes, crushing what's left of the sandwich and cutting it into two halves. Her teeth smash together and grind on each other, creating a horrendous noise like you never thought you'd hear just as you bump up against a big, soft, slimy tentacle - Fulda's tongue. This would complicate your escape greatly. You had hoped to end up outside her teeth so that you could just walk along her cheek, but as you could still hear the racket of her chewing you realize that it could be worse.

Fulda's tongue circles above you, collecting the mashed up remains of her meal. You run forward along the inside of her gums, brushing off a sopping wet crumb that landed on your shoulder, until you reach the back of her incisors. While her tongue is lifted you crouch down for refuge, and as she tilts her head back you grab onto the back of her gums.

There's a rush of saliva that threatens to take you away with the torrent and a sucking sound as her throat muscles contract, but your grip holds firm. Her tongue comes back to rest, laying loosely on top of you as the soft tip quivers. Light floods into Fulda's mouth as she slightly parts her lips, letting you see the pink interior and mashed sandwich remains, but before you can make your move a torrent of water begins flowing in.

The tip of her tongue spreads, holding you in place while the water rushes in. Every second, like the tick of a metronome, her tongue flicks up, allowing water to gush over you as she swallows. Again you hold on for dear life, clinging to the base of her incisor now as water floods the interior of her mouth and her throat creates a ricked riptide.

Her tongue relaxes and darkness returns as her lips close once more, and you know you have to move soon. Fulda's tongue jabs into the gums next to you, searching for stray food, and you decide to get out before it pins you against her teeth. You spring into action, pushing off the soft matter under her tongue and vaulting between her teeth. You land in a crouch outside her teeth and jump forward, using her gums as a springboard, forcing yourself out of her mouth and back into the day.

As you pass through you grab onto her bottom lip, allowing yourself to swing down and dangle in front of her chin. Air from her nose blasts you as you hang off her lip, swaying back and forth. The light dims considerably as a shadow covers you, and with a glance you see her hand racing towards you. The only question is, for what purpose.
11212312232112111122122131112211.title: It's a Miracle!

112123122321121111221221311122111.content:
You continue dangling helplessly from Fulda's lip while her hand approaches, unsure of what she intends on doing. Her mammoth hand comes to a rest beneath you with her fingers lightly touching her chin, and your grip shudders as she parts her lips again. Then with one quick stroke she swipes her hand upward, pushing on your feet and shoving you back into her waiting mouth.

This time you sail over her teeth and into her expectant tongue, slamming into the soft underside and falling back down to the floor of her mouth. Fulda quickly slams her tongue down and spreads it wide, holding you in that small gap. She continues pressing down, making it hard for you to breathe the humid air of her mouth.

Her tongue pulls back, allowing you some relief until the tip digs back down against her gums and running along the inside. You get caught up by it and she flicks you up and into her cheek before you can grab onto anything. The tongue immediately follows, smashing into your back and pinning you in place. She pumps it victoriously before relaxing it, allowing you to fall right into the center.

You're quickly ferried back to the inside of her teeth and thrown against her palate. She lets you linger there a moment, running you back and forth along the ridges, before the rear drops. With a simple flick you're thrown back to her throat, and a stream of saliva accompanies you on your journey to become enough energy for one of her squats.
112123122321121111221221311122111.title: And You Were So Close

112123122321121111221221311122112.content:
Fulda's index finger and thumb set down on either side of you and rest against her chin, then gently pinch around your chest. She begins to pull while you reflexively hold your tenuous grip on her lip, but she has more strength in one finger than you have in your entire body and she easily pulls you free. As you go a string of saliva runs from her lip to your hand, breaking when you're about a foot away.

"Gross," she says, wiping her mouth with her free hand. She holds you up to inspect you, and you can tell from the revulsion on her face that she doesn't like what she sees. "You're covered in half-chewed food and spit. Why couldn't you have been a good little bug and gone down?" The ire in her eyes shows that she's barely restraining herself from crushing you between her fingers right now.

Instead she gently lowers you down to the table and sets you on a paper towel. When she releases you she rubs her fingers together, trying to get the trace amounts of saliva off her fingers before she wipes them on the same towel you're on. She makes another disgusted noise and looks around the room before turning her attention back to you.

Fulda slams her palms on the table and looms over you, using her enormous bulk and powerful form to make you feel even smaller. Her wall of a chest heaves, and she slightly cocks her head, causing her waterfall pony tail to swish to the other side. "I guess you do want to live after all," she begrudgingly admits. "I'm not sure you're up to the next task though."

"What's that?" you squeak, realizing you have nowhere to run.
112123122321121111221221311122112.title: Salvation!  Kind Of.

choices: "I just need a bit more to be built."
"And now to see how it handles disasters."
1121231223211211112212213111221123.content:
You gape up at Fulda, unable to form anything resembling a coherent response to what she just said. You had expected her to name off some new form of torment she had in mind for you, or continue being obsequious and just snatch you up, not suggest you actually help her. What kind of project could you help her with, anyway? You can't even open a book's cover, and there's no way you can use a pencil.

Apparently Fulda notices how befuddled you are and elaborates. "Your new little house isn't just a one-off thing for me," she begins, "I'm designing an entire city like that. A whole, fully functional, miniature city, designed to be ideal. The only thing left is for someone to evaluate it. Clearly I'm too big to walk around in it, but you... I'm pretty sure it's your scale." She leans in closer, intimidating you further. "How about it, bug boy? How's an entire city to yourself sound?"

Fulda doesn't even wait for you to stammer out an irrelevant answer. Instead she simply lifts a hand off the table and swipes it at you, catching you in the middle of her palm. Her fingers deftly wrap around you, trapping you in a fist, and in an instant she's holding you down at her side. As you come to an abrupt stop you barely manage to avoid passing out from the G-forces acting on you.

The ride inside her fist is far from pleasant. Small pinpoints of light peek through between her fingertips, and the heat from being surrounded by her flesh causes sweat to start pouring out. Constant thuds from her shoes hitting the ground reverberate in your ears, and the see-sawing from her slight hand movements keeps you from ever getting your bearings.

After what seems like hours your interminable movement stops, and you hear a door open. Though you're unable to see you feel yourself being lowered, until finally Fulda's fingers unfurl, forming a ramp down to the ground. You slide down her fingers, coming to a rough landing, but ultimately unscathed. Before you is a house almost identical to the one Fulda has "given" to you, and to either side it's the same story. In the distance beyond them you see what seems to be a series of skyscrapers, and when you crane your head back all the way you see the truly towering Fulda.
1121231223211211112212213111221123.title: A Model Citizen

choices: Strike off in your own direction
Hide in one of the houses
11212312232112111122122131112211231.content:
For a moment you stand still, unsure not only of what you should do, but of what Fulda expects you to do. You timidly look around the model city, standing on your toes to see above Fulda's shoes, wondering what exactly her game is. You're so caught up the only thing that breaks you out of your confused state is a hard bump on your back as Fulda guides her shoe into it, followed by a push as she sends you away.

"What, are you waiting for an engraved invitation?" Fulda asks. "Hurry up and get out there, I don't have all day." You look over your shoulder at her mammoth shoes menacing you and take off down the street. As soon as you've taken a few steps Fulda lifts up her leg and steps over you, her tremendous stride putting her foot down a block away. She's careful not to step on any of the small cars on either side of her foot, as they would easily be smashed under her foot nearly twice their size.

You watch Fulda walk off into the distance, the rumbling from her footsteps getting duller as she progresses through the streets as though she's on a balance beam. It occurs to you that she's not really paying attention to you, and this may be your chance to go off on your own. On the other hand it seems like if you do what she says she's fairly amenable, and may actually be pleasant if you help her out with this. When you glance up you see her standing between two skyscrapers, and realize what you have to do.
11212312232112111122122131112211231.title: Bug in the City

choices: "Why are you standing there?  Get to work!"
'Took you long enough, I'm already done."
"I thought I told you to look around!"
112123122321121111221221311122112311.content:
Not wanting to make a habit of enraging someone a thousand times your size you follow after Fulda towards what you suppose is supposed to be the downtown area. It's going to take you a while to make it there on foot, you realize, but as long as she stands out against the skyline you'll have a marker to head towards. Since this is the first break you've gotten in a while you set a moderate pace, hoping to rest a bit from Fulda's constant threats of crushing or eating you.

When you reach the first intersection you realize that following in her tracks will be exceedingly easy. From one side of the road to the other, and from the last house to the next, stretches an enormous shoe print indented into the road about a quarter inch. You hop down into the footprint at the heel and walk forward, being careful to maintain your footing in the indentation of her tread. Each diamond-shaped pattern pressed into the road presents a new challenge for you to navigate as you cross Fulda's enormous shoe print.

When you reach the end you hoist one leg over the ledge and pull yourself up. You pass through five such footprints, going a bit faster each time as you get used to the uneven surfaces, before you come to a much larger intersection. There's no footprint directly ahead of you, but you look to your left and see the trail continues that way, now with a more natural gait as the street expands to a boulevard. At the same time Fulda bellows "Hurry it up, pipsqueak, I don't have all day!"

You look in the direction of her voice and see her crouched down between two tall buildings, butt resting on her heels as she impatiently glares at you while holding a pair of fine tools in her hands. After a second she turns away and resumes work touching up the facade on the building before her. Heeding her demand you pick up the pace, walking swiftly in a gentle slalom between indentations from her shoes. As you walk you glance side to side through the storefront windows, each seemingly fully stocked with goods - the level of detail so meticulous it's almost like Fulda shrank a whole city and put it in this room.

After some time of weaving between her footprints you come to a long bridge with the ground under it painted blue. Surprisingly it shows no significant wear despite her having just walked across it: Only the slight indentations from her steps that you're used to seeing. As you cross you watch Fulda stand to a crouching position, still intently focused on the facade. While she works she taps her foot lightly, sending rhythmic tremors through the bridge you're walking on.

It takes ten minutes of walking but you finally make it across the bridge, a mere block away from Fulda. You hurry to her, running through her footprints as necessary, until you're standing by the toe of her Converse. When you look up at her you see she's still absorbed by her work, and absent any way to effectively contact her you simply standby. Several more minutes pass while you watch her work, trying not to feel nervous about being this close to her unaware. Finally she puts her hands to her sides, looks down, and notices you're there.
112123122321121111221221311122112311.title: Obedience

choices: Fulda reaches in and grabs you
"Now go back down, we're not done."
1121231223211211112212213111221123111.content:
Fulda sharply taps her foot, the impact sounding like an explosion as the energy dissipates in a shockwave. It staggers you to a knee, and you nearly bash your head against the rubber-tipped toe of her shoe. You grab a ridge and pull yourself to your feet, then look up her monumental legs to see her pointing at something just behind you.

Curious, you turn your head and see a small red tool box stocked with instruments perfect for someone your size. Unfortunately you were never that handy with tools and you wouldn't even know where to begin using them in this miniature city. You begin to tell Fulda as much, but she scoffs and interrupts you, saying, "You think I'd trust someone puny like you with this? I was pointing at the door." To emphasize her point she slides her foot forward and steps on the tool box, smashing it flat with a screech of steel.

Unwilling to isk the same fate you turn away from the enormous Converse and go to the building, the door opening with surprising ease. "Go to the top," Fulda commands, her voice resonating inside the building lobby. Immediately you see an elevator and call it, causing the door to slide open at once. You step inside and press for the top floor, surprised to find each button has its own articulation.

The ride up is quick and complete with a ding when the elevator stops. As soon as you step out, almost as if it were timed, the building shudders as the wall in front of you slides away. Fulda pulls the panel clear and leans it against the building then squares up with it again, your vantage point letting you see the cleavage revealed by her tank top.

Two thuds, accompanied by a trickle of particulate, sound from the ceiling when Fulda slams her hands onto the roof, her breasts pouring into the narrow opening. As soon as it happened she pulls away again, the top of her face filling the view now. Her sky blue eyes stand out against her tan skin in the darkened building, and she says, "Looks like you made it, so I guess it works. You finally caught a break." She continues to look at you impassively. You shuffle your feet, uneasily waiting to find out what's next.
1121231223211211112212213111221123111.title: Going Up

choices: "You can eat, but only if you earn it."
"There's no time, I want to do something before bed."
11212312232112111122122131112211231111.content:
Fulda adjusts herself slightly as she pulls one of her hands off the roof, then holds it level with the floor you're on. She plunges it into the open building, fingers outstretched as her open palm glides closer toward you. With nowhere to run you simply stand there, waiting for her to pluck you up once more.

Her palm stops inches from your body, the wall of soft, wrinkled flesh topped by hard callouses just below her fingers. She readies her fingers to strike, bumping one against the ceiling in the confined corridor, and sends her thumb around your side. In a practiced motion Fulda clamps her thumb and forefinger onto the back of your shirt, then lifts you up by it. With your feet off the floor all your weight is being held up by your shirt pressing into your armpits, a very uncomfortable position as your shirt rides up with her grip.

Swiftly Fulda pulls you out of the building, letting you swing by your shirt as you come to a stop. She stands up to her full height and leaves you just above chest level, dangling above her cleavage while she considers what to do with you now. After a moment she decides, and almost cautiously begins lifting you up to her left shoulder - it seems that, for now, she's at least satisfied.

Your shoes dimple the smooth skin on her broad, tanned shoulders, the warmth from her bare flesh keeping you comfortable. You turn and see Fulda looking at you as she sets you down, then turns away as she withdraws her hand. Across the cotton strap of her tank top you look up at her ear, unadorned except by a small hole in the lobe. Now that you're not immediately worried for your life and have close access to her ear you realize something - you're starving!

"Um, Fulda," you begin when your stomach growls, "I haven't eaten since you shrank me, I don't suppose you could give me some food?" Fulda turns her head, placing her pink glossed lips mere inches from you.

"Are you kidding me?" she asks. "I just gave you a huge sandwich, and you didn't even eat any of it! You've barely done any work anyway, how can you possibly be hungry?" You remain silent, worried you've done something wrong. She sighs, nearly blowing you off your perch as her warm breath buffets you.
11212312232112111122122131112211231111.title: Pulled Out

choices: Thick dressing starts to pour in
"I could go for a quick bite too, actually."
112123122321121111221221311122112311112.content:
You're unsure what Fulda means by that, but when she follows it with a wink you're stricken by a general sense of dread. There's nothing you can do about it now though, and at least it sounds like you'll finally get to eat. She turns her well-chiseled face forward, and you settle in for the ride.

With Fulda's first step you're thrown off balance, your feet shifting within the dimples they've made in her supple skin. While you struggle to regain your balance you look over the crest of her shoulder at the miniature city below, getting a touch of vertigo from feeling hundreds of feet up. You manage to grab the edge of her tank top strap to secure yourself, then ease into a sitting position, letting your legs rest on the gentle slope of Fulda's shoulder.

You sway with the rhythm of Fulda's steps, never loosening your grip on the fibers of her shirt. In order to avoid vertigo you do your best to focus on anything but looking down, shifting your glance between her lips and ear while she indifferently looks down, doing her best not to step on anything. Before you know it she's reached the door, and you lean with her movement as she pulls it open.

Your gentle ride continues as she walks down the long carpeted hallway, and you allow yourself to relax a bit. As soon as Fulda hits the stairs though you're jolted back to high alert, seizing some fibers of her top in a white-knuckled grip when the shocks from her steps hit you. You bounce with each thud of her feet on a step, sliding around on her smooth, bare shoulder.

The jackhammer-like shocks stop, and you're treated to the only moderately uncomfortable shaking accompanied by the crack of her shoes slapping on tile. You recognize the kitchen when Fulda walks into it, and she follows a familiar path to the refrigerator. Her hand grabs a bowl full of green leaves and assorted vegetables, and in a single motion places it on the counter and slams the door shut.

Before you can appreciate the size of the salad Fulda's hand appears in front of you, blocking your view as two fingers pin your arms to your sides. You're lifted from your perch and held above the bowl momentarily before the fingers release you, allowing you to drop into a bed of spinach. "You've got five minutes," she declares, "then you're done."

You assess the salad into which you've been dropped. Leaves of dark green spinach comprise the bulk of it, with carrot shreds longer than your arm interspersed throughout along with some slices of tomato as well as some cherry tomatoes larger than you. Immediately you seize a branch of carrot in both hands and try to shove one end into your mouth, but find it too large - instead you settle for nibbling at the sides, your tiny jaw muscles going into overdrive to even pierce the hard orange surface. So engrossed are you with trying to eat you barely even notice Fulda fidgeting with an item in her hand.
112123122321121111221221311122112311112.title: Salad Days

choices: It pierces you through the chest
1121231223211211112212213111221123111122.content:
You look up and see Fulda cradling a fork in her hand, tines pointed down into your bowl. She moves her arm forward until it's dangling directly above you, so you quickly drop your carrot sliver and run away. Your feet slip along the dark green leaves, making you trip over a stem and fall face first into the bed of spinach.

Before you can get up Fulda stabs downward, her fork piercing the salad just in front of you. When she withdraws her food you're lifted up as well, but luckily slide off the leaf she's snagged and land on your back in the greens again. You watch her cavernous mouth open to receive the fork load of food which easily disappears behind her lips. Loud crunches reach you while she chews, and you force yourself back to your feet to avoid the same fate.

Once back up you begin running again, and Fulda holds her fork over you like a Sword of Damocles. You barely get up to speed before she brings it down again, piercing a cherry tomato in front of you and splashing you with its juices. Quickly you hop back before she pulls it out, and you watch the hill of vegetation be pulled toward her mouth.

Hoping to get some cover you jump into the hole left behind, your fall thankfully cushioned by the soft leaves. You spread some of the spinach in the walls apart and climb into it, crawling through the porous spaces within the salad. The darkness around reassures you that you are, for the moment, unseen.

Within seconds of your clever ruse you feel a nudge on your back as the leaves are shoved away, and you see Fulda above you brushing them away with her fork. She smirks and says, "Nice try," as she blocks the path behind you, leaving you trapped in the small clearing around you. Fulda slightly rears back with the fork then plunges it down, and you close your eyes.
1121231223211211112212213111221123111122.title: Spinach Jungle

1121231223211211112212213111221123111122.content:
There's a loud crunch when Fulda's fork pierces the spinach you're resting on, but there's no piercing pain from any tongs stabbing through your body. You open your eyes and see that the fork rises from the vegetation like a silver obelisk, expertly aimed to have just missed you. With a quick sigh of relief you move to get up and continue playing Fulda's game, but soon realize you can't. Your ankle is trapped under her fork.

Frantically you thrash to get free, but no matter how hard you try there's no getting free. Fulda's fork has slid right down against your leg, and the spinach is packed too tightly for you to wedge out from under it. This doesn't stop you from struggling with all your might, since the stakes are made clear when Fulda lifts the fork, raising you up along with her bite.

Once in the air you turn your head to see Fulda sitting there, glossy lips pursed in expectation. Her hand draws you slowly toward her mouth, the giantess hoping to build tension as you draw ever closer. An enormous pink tongue slides out, wetting her lips in anticipation of your arrival. Throughout all this you never stop trying to get free, but fail to make any headway.

When you're a mere few inches away Fulda parts her lips, revealing to you the gaping maw from which you had so recently escaped. "Fulda, please!" you beg. "I thought we had an understanding!" If she hears your pleas she shows no sign, and you're drawn closer to your doom. Her hot breath blasts you, followed by the chilly breeze of her inhaling. You pass between her lips and into her mouth, and take one last look at the outside world before she closes them.
1121231223211211112212213111221123111122.title: Pinned

1121231223211211112212213111221123111122.content:
While you watch Fulda closes her lips, the light from outside gradually being blocked until there's not as much as a pinprick shining through. She pulls the fork forward, bringing you and your bed of spinach back toward her lips. You're pushed against the inside of her tightened ring of muscle as you slide off her fork, your ankle coming loose with the rest of the spinach.

Before you can act Fulda's tongue slams into you, knocking you back behind her teeth along with the rest of her food. Her teeth slam shut, sealing you inside the impenetrable wall of bone. You're thrown to the roof of her mouth by her tongue, then held in place by her tongue flattening out beneath you. There's a very uncomfortable sensation of your skin being pulled at as she sucks on you, and saliva rushes past you and toward the back of her throat.

Fulda sucks on you for nearly a minute, the sound and feeling driving you insane, before her tongue flicks you to the side. You mix in with the rest of her salad, and end up trapped between two saliva-drenched leaves of spinach. The sound of her molars grinding together when she chews makes no mystery of what's about to happen. The leaves shift again, but no more will you be tormented by her molars: this time you're caught between them, and you burst open.

What used to be you mixes with the rest of the chewed salad and gets pushed to the back of Fulda's throat, where she promptly swallows you.
1121231223211211112212213111221123111122.title: Like a Tomato

1121231223211211112212213111221123113.content:
You dart back from Fulda, her sharp reprimand jolting you out of your quiet reverie while studying her. For a moment you backpedal, considering whether she is only messing with you, or really is changing her mind this rapidly. Her knees bend and torso begins to lean over, and you instinctively turn and run from the giantess descending towards you.

Before you the street is deserted, as one would expect of a model, toy-sized city like this, filled only by non-functional cars and the slight indentations from Fulda's shoes. In mere moments you feel a heavy object slam into your back, followed by a set of very large fingers wrapping around you. You're plunged into darkness as Fulda snatches you up with a swipe, though you know you're being lifted up.

When her fingers peel away she maintains her grip with a pinch on the back of your shirt, allowing you to dangle helplessly in front of her. "I don't want you nipping at my heels," Fulda says, her cold eyes impassive. "I want you to look around. Explore this city. And you need to do what I want. Got it?" She wiggles her fingers, making you swing wildly back and forth, a predicament which makes her pink lips curve upward.

Before you can recover Fulda produces a small plastic bag from her pocket and opens the top. Quickly she lowers you over the opening and relinquishes her grip, letting you drop into the pouch. You struggle to stand on the flimsy plastic surface, and by the time you do she has already sealed the top around her lips. With one hearty blow she inflates the bag, knocking you to your back and covering the walls with a fine mist, then she seals it closed.

The air you're in is warm and humid from Fulda's breath now, and the floor, though more taut, is hardly more supporting. Fulda clasps a hand around the inflated bag and draws it across her body, allowing it to rest on her side a moment, with you sliding along from the movement. Suddenly her hand shoots forward, throwing the bag in the same manner she would a frisbee, making it rotate rapidly. Centripetal force throws you against the wall while you fly above the city, and you try not to throw up from dizziness during your descent.
1121231223211211112212213111221123113.title: Ballooning

11212312232112111122122131112212.content:
Your arms and legs surge, doing their best to throw you free from this bread sarcophagus inside a sorority girl's mouth. Flailing ends up not being much help however, as your limbs simply slide through the soggy bread which immediately closes back up around you. Ultimately your final effort resulted in you becoming even more firmly cocooned inside this meal, and you do your best to brace for what's next.

In actuality nothing could have prepared you for this. Fulda swings her jaw shut, her molars connecting right where your pelvis is and cutting you in half. The pain, short though it is, is incredibly intense, and the severed veins and arteries are temporarily held closed at the point they had been severed. Unfortunately this means you can hear your legs being crunched to powder by Fulda's teeth.

The tip of her tongue prods you, then slips under the tiny remnant half of you is still trapped in. It lifts you up and slams you into the roof of her mouth, then simply holds you there a moment as the rough surface of her palate molds the moist bread you're in. You feel gravity shift as Fulda leans her head back, and with a rush of saliva her tongue tosses you back. Her throat muscles grab you with their airtight hold and convey you down into her stomach for digestion.
11212312232112111122122131112212.title: A Grisly Demise

choices: "Fulda, no, please don't kill me!  Please!"
1121231223211211112212213111222.content:
Fulda's warm breath rolls over you, slightly rustling your hair while she patiently waits for you to put on a show for her. She surreptitiously licks her lips and you kick your plan into action, tearing your arms free from their restraints in the sandwich. Air rushes past you as she inhales while you plant your hands against the crust and push as hard as you can.

At first progress is slow, with tiny amounts of progress for each push. As you push though momentum builds, and when your torso's free you know you're almost out. A huge gust of air hits you when Fulda sighs, coinciding exactly with when your legs finally slip free. With nothing left to hold you in place you plummet down, falling the entire length of Fulda's body.

While falling you watch her push the tiny bit of sandwich you were on into her mouth followed by a satisfied smirk. Before you can dwell on your close call you land on Fulda's hard thigh with your mustard-covered body making such a slapping sound there's no way she didn't hear it. Sure enough she looks down with an expression of surprise, still chewing her food. She quickly dusts off her hands, swallows, and booms, "What's that on my leg? Is that a little crumb?"

Her thumb and forefinger close around you, lifting you out of your small pool of mustard on her smooth thigh. Fulda's face looms ever larger as you get closer, and her excitement grows until she has you dangling just six inches from her face. "Yes, just an itsy-bitsy teensy-tiny crumb, must've fallen out of my mouth. No problem, no one has to know what a mess I made." She looks at you playfully and begins moving you toward her mouth again.

"Cut the crap Fulda!" you shout. "I got out, you know I want to live, you know I'm not a crumb and I'm not even as small as one so just put me down!"

Her expression becomes much more serious. "You could easily be that size you know," she says, continuing to move you toward her mouth. "Besides, I'm not convinced. You just yelled at someone thousands of times your size, that doesn't sound like someone who wants to live to me." A cruel joviality returns to her voice as she adds, "Maybe if you begged me not to I'd reconsider it though."

How do you beg?
1121231223211211112212213111222.title: Alive and... Well?

11212312232112111122122131112221.content:
As you beg Fulda's mouth widens into a smile, her gigantic lips spreading far beyond your reach on either side. However, she continues to hold you right in the middle of her mouth, so you decide to keep begging. "Please don't eat me or crush me!" you plead. "I know I'm so tiny you could smash me with your little finger accidentally, but I want to live my tiny life as long as you'll let me!"

Fulda begins moving you away from her mouth, and you realize she had you just under the tip of her nose this time. "Your voice is funny," she responds, her voice - amplified by proximity and sheer size - rattling your bones. "And I guess if you want to keep living your pathetic life under my thumb I can let you for a bit longer. No promises though."

You sigh with relief as she begins lowering you away from her face, finally reaching a point where it no longer dominates your entire view. She sets you in the palm of her other hand and looks down at you coldly, then prods you with a battering ram finger. "You're still covered in mustard and weird meat juice," she says, "so you'll have to get cleaned up."

Her fingers snap shut over you, pinning you in her hand and covering you in darkness. Your stomach nearly jumps to your mouth as she drops her hand to her side, and the constant swinging as she walks does nothing to ease your nausea. Distant thudding, muffled by all the flesh surrounding you, reaches your ears as she ascends the stairs, and the loud click of a doorknob being turned signifies your arrival.

After just a few seconds more Fulda opens her fingers, exposing you to a white light that burns your eyes. From your vantage point you see a toilet to the side and a shower behind Fulda, and though the view is obscured you'd bet you're being held over a sink. You turn to try to see what you look like in her hand, but her fingers block your view of the mirror. The sound of running water starts, and Fulda begins lowering the hand you're in towards it to clean you in some way.
11212312232112111122122131112221.title: Stay of Execution

112123122321121111221221311122211.content:
Fulda's hand descends with you in it, and the splash of water in the sink's basin grows louder as you come closer. You turn to see a waterfall pouring out of a huge silver faucet, the vast torrent immediately running down the drain after it hits the bottom. You're carried into the porcelain fixture finally, and continue riding the massive palm into the downpour.

The water breaks on Fulda's middle finger first, dissipating harmlessly into rivulets and running down the sides to drip into the sink. As she pushes further and further in though small streams break off and run down her palm, pooling around your feet. The intensity increases the closer you get, until you're about waist-deep in lukewarm water.

Finally Fulda gets you directly under the tap. Directly being hit by water is vastly different from standing in it, and the force from the faucet staggers you to a knee. Fulda holds you under it, letting you be pushed down by the water until you can barely stay on just one knee. She moves you around a little bit, making sure every bit of you gets cleaned, and you realize that you're short of breath. You face down and try to breathe in, but the air is thick with water, and even though you're breathing well enough you feel like you're going to drown.

Just when you think you can't hold out any longer Fulda moves her hand a bit, taking you out of the direct stream. Immediately you take some deep gasps of pure air, free from the constant rushing of water. Fulda quickly moves you back in though, and the feeling as though you're going to drown returns. After the second stint you realize that you're being waterboarded.

Fulda does this to you three more times, no doubt feeling an evil mirth as you're tormented, before withdrawing her hand from the sink. She straightens her hand, allowing the water to dissipate and roll off her hand while you kneel in the middle, sputtering for air. As soon as her hand's clear of the sink she tips her hand over, dumping you roughly onto the counter.

When you can fully open your eyes you see Fulda drying off her hand with a towel. When she's done she tears off a square of toilet paper and hands it to you, and you use it to do your best to dry off. You're able to get your face and hands dry, but your clothes remain sopping wet whenever Fulda takes your makeshift towel and throws it in the trash.

Fulda looks down at you, and you look up at her, no doubt a pitiful sight as you shiver from the cold. Suddenly her hand raises and two fingers wrap around your arms and torso, pinning you in place while she carries you off to what she has planned for the night.
112123122321121111221221311122211.title: Wetwork

1121231223211211112212213111222111.content:
Fulda lifts you up from the counter top and holds you in front of her face, scrutinizing you with her chilling gaze. She turns you over several times, inspecting what's exposed of your tiny body as large drops of water fly out from your hair. Apparently she's satisfied by what she sees, and lowers you down to her side as she walks out of the bathroom.

The ride is short but uncomfortable. With each step Fulda's long arm swings like a great pendulum, covering so much distance you're sure she's exaggerating it. G-forces strain your body as you're thrust back and forth, and your view constantly changes in a great whirl with you unable to focus on any single thing in the distance. Each time you rush past Fulda's thigh you think about how, were she to accidentally bump her hand into it, you'd be dashed to pieces against her skin.

Your ride ends above a large table with what seems to be a small group of tiny buildings and construction materials on it, much like the house Fulda has for you in the closet. She drops you from a great height of two inches onto the table in the middle of the street so that you stumble on landing, then smirks. To your right is a mostly finished building, and on your left there's a pile of wood panels, glue, and an exacto-knife that could cut you in half. Luckily for you Fulda doesn't even seem to consider that, and leaves you alone on the table.

Her huge strides take her to the closet, into which she momentarily disappears. She quickly comes back out holding a simple black dress and lays it on her bed, then bends down to pick up a pair of enormous six inch high heels and sets them aside for later. Briefly she reaches into a drawer to pull out a pair of skin colored nylon stockings which she tosses on top of her dress, then she walks back over to you.

"You're a lucky little bug," she says as she leans on the table, her arms out to either side of you. She leans over you as you crane your neck up at her and continues, "You get to go to a Gamma Tau Sigma party free of charge, brought in by the president herself. I just hope you don't have too much trouble joining in from...
1121231223211211112212213111222111.title: Preparations for Partying

choices: You make it to the party relatively easily
11212312232112111122122131112221111.content:
Before you can even begin running away Fulda takes a swipe at you. It happens so fast you can't even duck under her truck-sized hand as it overwhelms you, her palm knocking you off balance and her fingers snapping shut to trap you inside her hand. Momentum carries her hand forward, and in under a second you're yanked free of the table, though you can't see anything aside from slivers of light on her palm.

In two bounding steps Fulda carries you to where she wants you to be, and you feel a nervous anticipation while you're not being moved. Once you begin ascending it's similar to the trepidation when a roller coaster is going up the first hill, and you know that the ride is going to be less fun. When the ascent stops Fulda turns her hand sideways, and you brace yourself for the worst.

Fulda's fingers lift away and you look to see where you'll be falling. Her other hand has spread out the opening on what appears to be a long nylon sock, and you're being dropped right in the middle. You desperately try to grab onto Fulda's hand and stop yourself from falling, but by the time everything registers you've fallen far past it. Everything takes on a peach colored tinge as you fall into the stocking, and when you look up all you can see is her triumphant face. At the bottom you land where her heel will go and continue rolling down the woven surface until you come to rest in the very bottom.

There's another slight falling sensation as Fulda sets her stockings down on the bed, with the leg you're in hanging off the side. You sway back and forth slightly before it comes to a rest, and you consider any possible way out. There's certainly nothing you have that can cut through these fibers, and the climb out would be mostly vertical and take hours. Realizing you're out of options you resign yourself to just watching Fulda change, despite the difficulty of seeing through the loose, wrinkled fabric that gives everything a skin colored tone and makes everything look foggy.

Despite the difficulty seeing you know when she reaches over you to grab her dress. You do your best to follow her movements, despite the poor visibility and perspective from below her knees. She slides it on easily then zips it up, and reaches back onto the bed. There's a thump as her heels are pushed out, then she sits down on the bed. Gingerly she picks up the stockings you're in and readies herself to slide them on.

You're steadily pulled upward as Fulda pulls the stockings onto her legs, any possible exit you may have had now blocked. Five humongous toes pierce the fabric above you, the largest of which is right on course for you. As they slide ever closer you try to think of the best way to mitigate this. Just as you're about to be overrun by her big toe you realize that if you survive this you'll be sucking on her toe all night and quickly turn over.

Fulda's toe strikes you in the back and you think this may not have been the best decision as your spine curves to her toe's shape. She twitches her toes a couple times, securing the stockings on her foot and shoving you further into the nylon. When she's satisfied the fabric is pulled so tightly around you that you're effectively immobile, cocooned in by nylon and her foot.

Once you're secure Fulda tilts her foot down and begins lowering it into her size 15 heel. The foggy look the stocking gives everything makes this surreal and dream-like, as if the idea of being shrunk down and dropped into a stocking wasn't fantastical enough. When her toe slides into the shoe you're cast into darkness, unable to turn your head even if you could see past her foot. When you come to a rest inside the shoe's toe Fulda twiddles her toes again, wracking your body with agony.

For a while you're simply kept there while Fulda puts on her other stocking and shoe, waiting in the dark for something to happen. Finally she stands up, putting her weight onto her toes, and you wish she had stayed seated. Though it's subtle her toe pushes into your back further, causing pain to shoot through you. You're swung up and down as Fulda gets a feel for the shoes, and each time the sole touches the ground it feels as if you're about to be squeezed apart. Luckily she's satisfied with the fit before then, and you survive to feel her take her first step.
11212312232112111122122131112221111.title: Down the Stocking, Into the Shoe

choices: She heads to the beer pong table
She just wanders for a bit
112123122321121111221221311122211111.content:
"Relatively" being the important word here, since your time inside her shoe passes anything but easily. Every step Fulda takes, though she favors the leg where you're riding, subjects you to dizzying G-forces when her toes swing back down. You do what you can to get into a more comfortable position, but between Fulda's massive foot in your back and the stocking at your front you really have nowhere you can move.

By the time Fulda reaches the stairs the rhythm of her step has become familiar to you. First her toe jams against your back, pressing you slightly forward into the nylon mesh, then she lifts her foot and your stomach feels like it drops. When she lifts her toes your stomach flies the opposite direction, and you get momentary vertigo from the blood rushing out of your head. Her heel sets down, slamming you back onto her toe before she swings her foot down, accompanied by a resonating thump and blood rushing back to your head as well as another jolt of pain in your back. Then it begins again.

The fact that you aren't dashed apart against her toes when she's descending the stairs tells you that she's being careful with you, making sure that her toes never fully set down on a step. You're aware however that just one misstep would be your doom, and if she stubbed her toe you would barely hear the impact before being squished. This particular danger passes however when she reaches the bottom, and a whole new danger presents itself.

When Fulda arrives the party is in full swing, with loud music blasting throughout the area and all of her sorority sisters present, drinks in hand and making idle chat. The bass makes it so you don't get any reprieve from your insides being shaken even between steps, though Fulda's shoe protects your ears from the music's volume. You endure a dozen more steps in quick succession while Fulda goes to get a drink, then glorious stillness when she finds a spot, the only discomfort coming from the music. Knowing her, however, your reprieve will be quite short lived.
112123122321121111221221311122211111.title: Party Time

1121231223211211112212213111222111111.content:
Just as expected you only have a few seconds to catch your breath and recover before Fulda starts moving again. In a way knowing what's coming makes each agonizing step easier to endure, since you know when the worst is over and she's finally moving her other foot. That's not to say that it's any less painful now, just one more thing you've come to endure. Luckily you don't have to deal with it nearly as long this time, and you enter the calm before the storm.

Fulda takes her drink and heads over to where her sisters are dancing with the special guests. She takes extra care that no one steps on her toe, not wanting to end the night for her captive just yet. Looking over the crowd she finds a timid man dancing by himself, exceptionally short and wiry. He looks to be about the size of the twerp who ran into her this morning, maybe a little smaller than he was. The perfect target.

She deliberately bumps into him, planting his face into her abs. He looks up at this mountain of a woman and steps back so that he can see around her breasts. "What's up, small fry?" she asks. You find that despite her shoes muffling everything else around her you're able to hear her perfectly, her body carrying the vibrations of her voice down to you. While the man stammers for an answer Fulda interjects, "Yes, I know, me, I'm fucking tall. Let's dance."

Your head whirls as Fulda spins around, turning to face away from her dance partner. Before you can recover your orientation your back rings out in agony, her toe digging deep into it. The nylon around you pulls tighter, pinning your arms against her toe in a crucifixion position from her leaning forward. This new degree of pain pulses with the bass as Fulda shifts her weight minutely with the beat. As if that weren't enough her toe wiggles up and down, running the length of your body and spreading pain all around while she subtly taps her toe.

Without waiting for an answer Fulda turns around from her new partner and rams her ass against her chest, grinding it against him. She goes back and forth, firmly jostling him with her buttocks but careful not to knock him over. "Well fucking do something!" she shouts over the din of the music. "Grab my ass, jump on for a ride, something!" The man continues to just stand there, bewildered by what's happening.

The pressure intensifies and pain wracks your body as Fulda leans forward even more. As if that weren't enough the activity and heat has a tangible effect, and she begins sweating.
