Beads of warm salty liquid run down her body and get absorbed by her stockings until they're saturated. Already near capacity from the sweat on her legs the droplets begin dripping down and pooling in her shoes. You gasp for breath and nearly choke, the smell and humidity too much for you. It's all you can do to keep that air in your lungs, no matter how foul it is.

Before you reach your breaking point the pressure on you lessens; Fulda is leaning so far forward she's on her hands. That's not to say it's easy, and you expect each thump of the bass to bring yet another staccato pulse of pain with it. Over time the smell gets worse, Fulda's foot odor mingling with the sweat that pervades the air inside her shoe. You limit yourself to short, gasping breaths between beats, trying to brace yourself without gagging.

"Here, I'll make it easy for you!" Fulda shouts, and begins bending her knees. Her squats pay dividends when she gets low enough to line up her butt with her partner's crotch, grinding it back and forth still. "What, do you not find me attractive?" She leans forward and plants her hands on the ground, now pushing with enough force to drive him back. Still he stands there, looking more worried than anything.

All over your body pain builds again, starting much stronger this time. You grit your teeth, taking shallow breaths through your nose as Fulda's toe spreads your shoulder blades and shoves you toward the point of her shoe. The harder she pushes the worse the nylon feels against your skin, and you worry that your body will break before even one thread tears. Just when you think you can't take anymore the pain relents, returning to ambient, but still significant, levels. For a last slap Fulda spins around on her heels again, disorienting you as you're swung with the greatest amount of torque possible.

Fulda groans with impatience at her partner's lack of enthusiasm, and she pushes herself back up to her full height. He takes a step back, allowing Fulda enough room to spin her enormous feet around and confront him. She looks down at him and he sheepishly looks up to make eye contact. "Okay dude, seriously, what's the deal? Are you scared of me? Do I intimidate you or something?"

"Y-yeah, a little bit."

"Do you think it would help if I took my heels off? Make myself not quite so gigantic in comparison?"

"Maybe?" Fulda eyes the man carefully while he looks side to side, hoping to find some way around her and out of this. However, as usual Fulda is in control, and considers that she might not need to tower over him quite so much.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111.title: A Dance for Three

choices: Fulda collects him for the next event.
11212312232112111122122131112221111111.content:
"Let's give it a shot," she declares, and steps out of her heels, enormous even for people at normal height. First she frees her right, then her left, and gently slides them over to the left side. When she steps down from her extra six inches the bottom of her breasts bounce off the top of the man's head, rustling his hair and making him blush. "There. Still intimidated?"

Just when you were worried that you're going to choke on Fulda's foot sweat the tables turn in your favor. Small amounts of light creep into the shoe as Fulda withdraws her foot, taking you along with it. Fresh air cycles in, and you allow yourself a few normal breaths to test it out without being nauseated. Sounds rush from all around to assault your ears, the menacing bass meet with overpowering treble and resonate throughout your now-sensitive ear canal. Not just that but you hear scores of voices, each indistinguishable in the din, but they all seem to be enjoying the party atmosphere.

Fulda sets her foot down on the carpet, and you revel in the relatively cool air. Your eyes take time to adjust to the low light after absolute darkness, but when they do you become awestruck. Around you are dozens of titanesses, each hundreds of times your size, moving about and gyrating on their partners. The ground resonates not only from the music but the impacts of each of their steps, and you realize that one misstep for any of them would immediately spell your doom. Incredulously you're glad to be stuck inside Fulda's stocking: you wouldn't last a second on your own.

You look up and see Fulda, as towering as ever, tinged pink through the fabric of her own clothing. Across from her stands a man much shorter than she is, who looks like he can't decide whether to run and hide or play dead. The look on Fulda's face shows that she is not in any way amused by him, and she seems to be waiting for something.

A clock chimes, the sound ringing throughout the entire house. All of the titanesses including Fulda cheer, and their cheers are quickly joined by screams of fear that raise in pitch; in just a few moments, the screaming has entirely died away, and the cheering intensifies. You had been stunned by the giantesses earlier, but if you hadn't seen this there's no way you'd believe it: the man Fulda had been towering over rapidly dwindled away before her.

Your eyes snap back to the floor before you where you see the same man, no more than an inch tall. He looks up at Fulda, mouth agape, no doubt in shock at what just happened if he can even believe it. A wave of thuds shakes the floor, followed by more cheering from some of the women after they stomp on their shrunken man. Fulda, to her credit, only spreads her feet and places her hands on her hips in a menacing fashion.

"Run!" you shout to him. "She'll crush you, all of them will! Go hide while you can!" The man either does not hear you, or is unable to act on your words and move. He stands transfixed, staring upwards in awe at Fulda, not fully processing what's happened.

"How about now?" she booms down at her new shrinkee. "Are you scared of me? Do I intimidate you? Should I make myself more gigantic in comparison?" She smiles sadistically at him while he only stares up dumbfounded. "Well? Say something!"

The man remains frozen, clearly terrified and confused by this turn of events. Fulda taps her other foot impatiently, the shockwaves resonating through the floor and seemingly draw the man out of his reverie. All at once he throws himself to the ground and starts begging through tears, "Oh my God please don't kill me I don't even know what I did please let me live please!" She remains silent while considering his pleas, the only sound the steady thump from her foot.
11212312232112111122122131112221111111.title: All the Men Get Low

112123122321121111221221311122211111113.content:
"The other girls might get a kick out of watching your sorry display too," Fulda declares, and bends down to pick the man up. You watch her hand descend while she bends down, her target not even trying to move out of the way. Whether he's given himself up to his fate or can't even comprehend what to do you can't tell, but when he disappears inside Fulda's hand his sniveling stops.

Fulda stands back up once she's secured her quarry and starts walking over to a small group of women. Compared to earlier Fulda's long strides are amazing and comfortable. No longer is her big toe threatening to split you in two, and now she gently sets her foot down instead of needing to slam it on the ground. Her stockings, formerly a harsh mesh that you were forced against, now comfortably hold you aloft, stretched tight enough to keep you from sliding down but loose enough you have some motion. Were it not for the persistent sweat, you might actually enjoy it.

Your ride is fairly short, and Fulda stops outside the ring of women, which quickly expands to allow her in. From ground level it's difficult to make out the details of what's happening, or what's gathered this crowd. In front of you is an unremarkable brown leather ottoman, and on either side is a pair of enormous shoes, their owners leaning over the platform above. Whatever is happening, they certainly seem excited about it; screams such as "Get him!" "Stand back up you wuss!" reach you even on the floor, punctuated by the occasional slam of someone's hand on the leather.

The women clear a path for her, and Fulda makes it to a chair overlooking whatever this event is. She kicks her feet up, her long legs stretching well onto the footrest, allowing you to finally see what's going on. There are six women total here, all of them yelling furiously, drinking deep from red Solo cups, or slamming their hands down with a loud pop. You look down and see a small man roll backwards into the divot created by Fulda's feet resting there, pursued by another wielding a sewing needle as a spear. All the women shout in excitement, and you realize that this is an arena for shrunken men.

You're pitched slightly into the air as Fulda lifts up her feet, then you quickly drop back down, bouncing several times before Fulda's feet come to rest. Half the women keep cheering while the others curse in anger, and with a quick glance down you see only one man standing, looking up in shock a half inch from Fulda's heel. He drops his improvised weapon and backs away.

A thin brunette reaches out and claims her fighter while all the other women take a shot. They've made a drinking game out of tiny person blood sport! Once they've all slammed their shot glasses back down and refocused on the sport, the victorious brunette looks to Fulda. "You always bring something fun, you go."

Fulda twitches her toe, wiggling you back and forth. "I actually brought two this semester," she begins, "and I'd like to start out with..."
112123122321121111221221311122211111113.title: The Tournament

choices: Channel some of that repressed rage
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Oh no. After keeping you inside her shoe and grinding her toe into you for past hour, does Fulda really think you're in any condition to stand on your own, let alone fight? Your arms remain pinned against her foot by her stocking, keeping you from struggling to escape your new predicament. Even if you could, you realize that there's nowhere you could go that isn't contained within her nylon.

Fulda lifts up her foot and points her toe downward, facing you toward the floor. The netting around you begins to loosen, losing a little bit of tautness each time she rolls her stocking down a bit more. Soon you drop away from her toe entirely, landing in a loose end dangling from the tip of her foot. Little by little the reservoir gets larger until the whole thing is pulled off her foot, finally freeing you from your prison.

You don't have any time to execute any escape plan; Fulda's watchful eyes land on you the instant she pulls her foot away. Before you can even stand up her fingers have cinched around your waist, lifting you out of the tube and into the air. She briefly inspects you to make sure nothing's broken then, apparently satisfied, places you above the middle of the ottoman.

The tight grip around you releases, and you drop an inch to land softly atop the leather. Fulda withdraws her hand to resheath her leg, and you take a moment to observe your surroundings. On every side you're surrounded by women who would have towered over you normally, but now are positively enormous. One blond points down at you while whispering in her raven haired friend's ear, then they both start giggling, the latter slamming a fist into her own palm. It's clear they will only be satisfied by blood.

A massive tanned hand sets down beside you and quickly withdraws, and you turn to see Fulda looking down at you impassively. While turning your attention back forward you notice she left you a circle of cardboard and a long metal splinter. Apparently these are to be your sword and shield.

The thin brunette lowers her hand in front of you then opens her fingers, dropping her chosen down for another fight. He clutches his sewing needle tightly while looking absolutely terrified at the prospect of another fight, and you pick up your weapons. All the women lean forward, blocking out the light above you and making you feel as though you could just wither away now. After a tense moment the black haired woman to your side leans in, placing her mouth between you and your opponent, and bellows "Fight!"
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: The Chosen One

choices: Fulda puts her dance partner in
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Once the wall of sound and wind abates you and your opponent both take a few moments to steady yourselves and let the ringing in your ears taper off. Reluctantly he levels his needle point toward you so you raise your shield, waiting for him to make the first move. Both of you stand in a temporary stalemate, neither willing to take the risk of being too aggressive off the bat.

Your audience, however, doesn't really care about whatever strategy you would like to employ. A massive hand reaches in from the audience and slams you in the back with a manicured, log-sized finger, pitching you forward toward your opponent. You manage to raise your shield in time to keep yourself from getting impaled, then turn to face him again.

You begin circling around him while he nervously clutches his makeshift spear, likely still shell-shocked by the last fight. With a couple quick jabs you probe his defenses, and find that he only blocks them mechanically and with the minimum amount of effort. Emboldened by his apathy you strike fast, hitting him with a shield bash to knock him off balance and move for a slash.

Before your strike connects you feel a sharp tug on your collar and you're rapidly pulled away, leaving you to swing at empty air above his head. The fingers that grabbed you maintain their hold, making you dangle helplessly above your opponent. He makes a half-hearted jab upward at you, easily deflected by a kick, then the giantess lets go, dropping you back onto the leather.

The giantesses let out an excited cheer, causing a bustling cacophony to assault you while you roll to the side, narrowly avoiding another strike. You reorient yourself for another attack when you notice a new shadow centered around you. With a dive forward you escape a fist slamming down, but the sound of five pale digits balled up slapping on the leather leaves no doubt what would have happened had you remained.

"Come on, get serious!" Fulda yells at you in what you can only guess is an attempt to encourage you. "My reputation's on the line here!" It was unreasonable to hope she wanted you to win out of concern for you life, it seems, but you square up against your opponent anyway. Just as before he seems unwilling to actually fight, and only wants to keep you at bay. Behind him you notice two giantesses, the same pair that had been giggling before the fight, lean in expectantly.

You move quickly, hoping to finish this before they get a chance to interfere. Resolutely you raise your shield and charge in, purposefully catching the needle's tip with your shield, then swiftly deliver a kick to his sternum, knocking him backwards. He catches before getting too far though, anchored by your shield, and you move to finish him off.

Before you can strike the blond reaches in, her fingers placed precisely to form an impenetrable wall. With a flick of her wrist she rams a finger into your chest, flipping you backwards as she raises her hand and dragging your opponent to the ground with you. There's a thundering clap of skin on leather, and two long, pale fingers stretch out on either side of you, your head resting just beneath the webbing between her fingers. She shouts a jubilant "Yes!" and lifts her hand, and you stand back up, albeit with shaking knees.

Directly in front of you is little more than a red smear with thick streaks on the edges in the outline of a human body, and the open palm of the dark-haired giantess as if she intends to grab you. However she only holds it up, and you see the smashed corpse of your former opponent wedged between the underside of her knuckles, his clothing saturated with blood. She waves down at you, shaking his limp head back and forth, then withdraws her hand with a giggle. Quickly she wipes her hand off on her thigh then high-fives her friend, both quite pleased with their killer combo.

"Good job!" Fulda says, her eyes lit up in excitement and upturned in a smile that, for once, has no malicious thought behind it. "I knew you could beat him!" She actually seems happy with you for once! While you stand there stunned at your victory she fills two glasses taller than you with vodka, and all the other giantesses fill one. At her signal they all bring the shots to their mouths and toss them back, Fulda rapidly chaining two of them to spill liquor down her throat.

"Now!" she declares, slamming both glasses onto the ottoman in front of her. "Which one of you has the next loser? Or do I need to put my other one into the ring already?" The giantesses turn to discuss among themselves while the thin brunette and dark haired slapper sit idly, the latter still looking satisfied.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Victory!

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Deliberation among the giantesses continues for over a minute, turning to them making deals between each other before too long about who would get the turn after and exchanging favors. Fulda sighs loudly from exasperation and extends her arm, placing a hand down in front of you. She opens her fingers, dropping the unlucky man she had caught just minutes before, and points at the blond. "You're next, Olga," she declares. "I want to do a clean sweep of that side."

You watch Fulda withdraw her hand to rest it on her chair so that she can majestically preside over the next combat, then turn to face your next opponent. He looks puny, and not just because he's less than an inch tall. Rail-thin with sunken eyes he's almost malnourished, and you wonder whether he had ever left his room before tonight. You had heard him speaking with Fulda earlier, and it didn't seem likely that human interaction or physical activities are on his list of hobbies.

For his part, he is not taking his new stature or situation well at all. In the last ten minutes he had been shrunk and then plopped down in the middle of six beautiful giantesses, all staring at him intently, waiting for him to fight to the death. He stands there awestruck, his eyes jumping every few seconds between Fulda, Olga, and one of the other monumental women, all waiting for him to do something.

After another minute of nothing happening you begin to grow bored, and apparently the women do as well. A rumble sounds from Fulda's throat when she clears it, drawing your attention, then she bellows, "Fight!" You snap your attention back to your opponent, and find that he hasn't even picked up a weapon: in fact he's still gawking at the women surrounding him. Something in his brain must have broken - or maybe it was something in yours.

Expecting an easy victory you advance, but your aggressive move must have snapped him back to reality. Instead of fighting he opts to run, turning tail from you and fleeing for the far edge and leaving you to stand there in disbelief. Fortunately all the women have turned their attention to him, waiting for the perfect moment to pounce and leaving you alone.

His trajectory puts him on path for an Asian giantess who has been eyeing him hungrily the whole time. She reaches for him, extends two fingers, and gingerly plucks him up by the collar. He continues trying to run, his legs kicking at empty air in a feeble attempt to escape while she lifts him up to eye level. Casually she tilts her head back and opens her mouth, and his legs stop pumping. There's a high-pitched squeal as she lowers him into her maw, then he disappears behind her lips.

For a moment she holds her pose, looking serenely at the ceiling while her very confused victim no doubt rages blindly at her tongue. She concentrates, and a lump begins moving down her throat, transporting the man down to her stomach. Once he's through her esophagus she places a hand on her chest and smiles, then she turns to face you. Leaning over quite far she lets her head hover mere inches from you, tilted down so that her coal colored eyes bore into you. Menacingly she opens her mouth and sticks out her tongue, revealing the vast cavern empty except for her teeth, and goes "Ahhhh!"

"Okay that's enough," Fulda declares, and the Asian sits back up in her seat. "It's your turn Olga, show us what you've got." The blond shrugs and reaches into her lap, where she withdraws her own shrunken man. Unceremoniously she drops him in the middle, and you find him to be perfectly nondescript, the perfect sort of person to go missing at a party like this. Olga looks down as the two of you square off, her gray eyes flitting back and forth from hundreds of feet above you.

Your new opponent quickly picks up the left over sewing needle, claiming it as his spear for the upcoming fight. It was too much to hope for a second person to run, but after what happened to the last guy you can hardly blame him. You raise your shield while he levels his spear, both waiting for the command. Finally the Asian speaks up, yelling "Fight!"
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Bye Round

choices: You've faced three opponents, that's it
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Before the word even stops reverberating in your ears your opponent strikes, hoping to knock you off-balance and gain the momentum. It's easy enough to deflect his jab, though, and move in for a slash of your own. He's able to slide out of the way of your counterattack though, and all you've accomplished is changing places.

While you parry your opponent's attacks you watch Olga get increasingly irate that he still hasn't finished you off. She moves to get out of her seat so that she can come intervene but Fulda grabs her wrist, keeping her in place. She sits back down annoyed and yells, "Well fucking gut him already!" Her dark-haired friend takes the hint and reaches forward but in turn Olga stops her, likely not wanting to risk her own champion getting smashed.

That doesn't mean other women are similarly restrained, though. During a strong jab a shadow appears over the combat and you roll forward, just in time to get out of the way of a gigantic hand slamming down. The impact disrupts your movement, knocking you and your opponent prone from the shockwave, and the slapping sound nearly bursts your eardrums. A long slender thumb lies before you, which thankfully does not close in on you. Just as soon as she struck the giantess pulls her hand back, disappointed to have gotten neither of you.

Once back up your opponent moves to seize the initiative with a series of quick jabs to drive you backwards. While you manage to step out of the range every time it does hold your attention, and you don't even think about how close you're getting to the Asian. You block a strong jab then feel a rough tug on your collar, and you're quickly lifted away from the arena.

You're turned around mid-air and see that the same giantess who ate your last opponent has now grabbed you. She looks you over hungrily with her velvety dark eyes, lifting you further away from the ground. All the other giantesses gasp and watch with rapt attention as you're drawn upwards and towards her and she grins in anticipation, but doesn't reveal her row of pearly white teeth just yet.

As with the previous one she holds you above eye level and tilts her head back, then begins slowly lowering you toward her mouth. Her pink lips part, revealing a dark pit lined with teeth and her eager tongue ready to strike when you enter. Hot breath blasts you, getting more intense as you're gradually dropped into her mouth, and you can see strands of saliva on her uvula.

When your feet are just above her lower lip you decide to strike, jabbing your makeshift sword upward and into her fingertip. Your ears are overwhelmed by her yelling "Ow!" but her lips close reflexively and her hand flinches, pitching you forward. Her grip releases and you go tumbling down her chin, helped along your path when she suddenly whips her head forward, her lower lip bumping into your head and throwing you away from her.

You land back on the ottoman to a series of oos and aahs and one very surprised opponent. The crowd is torn between cheering at your return and booing, but before you can relish the accolades you still need to win this fight. At first you have trouble getting your feet under you and your opponent merely watches, the butt of his needle planted on the leather so he can lean on it.

A humongous hand sneaks up behind him, middle finger cocked back by her thumb, and you slow down your movements a bit. The giantess readjusts her hand, picking the perfect trajectory while he continues to watch you smugly. There's a dull thud and her finger shoots forward, slamming him in the back and throwing him forward at extreme velocity. You finally stand and watch him fly through the air, collide with Fulda's chest and fall back down, landing on one of her thighs.

You stand befuddled for a moment in his absence, the only thing remaining of him in the arena the sewing needle, clearly making you the winner. Safe from any other grabbing hands you watch the tiny body try to stand up on Fulda's leg, but see that he's unable to even reach a sitting position. Fulda smirks and lifts up her other leg, does an exaggerated arc with it, and crosses it over her other one, trapping the man between her thighs. Her muscles briefly tense, and you get the feeling that's the last anyone will ever see of him.

Victorious once more you return to the center while the giantesses pour out their drinks, and Olga pours a second one for Fulda. Despite it being incredibly surreal that this is even happening you're glad that you've made it this far, especially when you consider the alternative. Olga and her friend glower down at you along with the brunette, but Fulda is pleased as punch with you, going so far as to even blow you a kiss!

The giantesses pound back their shots and slam the empty glasses onto whatever surface they have available, Fulda again double-fisting due to your success. You look to the two who don't seem incredibly bitter toward you as you await your next opponent, and they in turn look to Fulda to see what's next.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: All Too Easy

choices: Li sends her shrunken man to his doom
Actually Li's choice is pretty good at this
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
While everyone looks to Fulda she looks down at you, the wheels in her head spinning while she considers her next course of action. "One min girls, I need to talk with my champion," she announces, and reaches to grab you. When her outstretched fingers curl above your head you fight the instinct to run, and get swept up into her palm.

The ride is brief and you're quickly brought back into the dim light, a mere few inches from her glossy pink lips. "Okay, you've been doing very well so far," she begins, her voice a husky whisper so that none of the other giantesses can hear but is clearly audible to you. Her breath reeks strongly of alcohol, and you feel light-headed from the blast. "I'm actually a little proud of you, even if the best you've done is not die." She gives a wry grin before continuing.

"It may not seem like it, but there is some strategy that goes into this, and there are some rules. We can intervene at any time, doing whatever we want to one of you, as long as it's not one we sent out. We feel it keeps fights from going on too long or getting boring. Also if you end up clearly defeated and at weapon point but still alive it's up to the closest person to decide what happens." She sees the surprised expression on your face and adds, "We don't like explaining these things before it starts."

Fulda pauses to swallow the built-up saliva before moving on, the liquid audibly sloshing around before a loud gulp. "You've managed to piss off Allison and Olga pretty well by beating them, and even if Brit weren't Olga's best friend she'd probably have it out for you to get back at me for crushing hers when we first got here. Don't turn your back on them, and if you can lead the fight away from their side. Li's probably sore over you poking her, so I'll try to get her next so that you only have to deal with her for one more round. Mariam hasn't done much of anything yet, I'm not even sure she brought one, but at least she helped you last round. So stay close to my left side and watch those three, got it?" You nod, figuring that at the very least Fulda wants to win.

Her hand descends back to the leather plateau, Fulda not even bothering to trap you with her fingers this time. When it sets down you confidently walk down her fingers and onto the ottoman, ready to face your next opponent and glad to no longer be in a miasma of alcohol breath. "Okay Li, let's see what you've got," Fulda challenges the apparently hungry Asian, and you turn towards her in anticipation.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Words of Advice

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Li reaches into her cleavage and momentarily probes around with her finger, then scoops out her shrunken man. She pinches him between her fingers at the shoulders and lowers him into the arena in front of you, seeming much gentler than you'd expect. Instead of relying on the sewing needle like others have before she tosses him a bit of chain from a piece of costume jewelry, and he eagerly snatches it up. No doubt he had seen her eat one man and try to eat you, so he knows not to try to escape.

Mariam sees that you're both more or less ready, and calls for the fight to begin. You heed Fulda's advice and charge forward, shield raised, so that you can get away from the giantesses who want to smash you. Your charge clips your opponent, knocking him off balance and buying you an extra moment to turn around while he recovers.

You decide to play defensively, backing away from him so that you can put more space between yourself and the vengeful women. He whips the chain around in circles while slowly moving forward, his weapon itself about half again long as the two of you are tall. For now he seems to be managing it well, and you're glad you've been able to minimize the threat from getting smashed beneath a palm.

Right when you're about to go on the offensive he decides to strike, swinging his chain at your makeshift sword. You avoid getting it caught and duck below the rest of the chain then move forward in a burst, ramming him with your shield. He staggers backward and you step in, stabbing your metal sliver at his stomach. In the nick of time he sidesteps, leaving you to stab at air, but you're able to return to a ready stance before he can take advantage.

The two of you jockey for position, neither willing to overcommit to what could well be a fatal misstep. In the distance you see Olga and Brit gauging the range, trying to find out how far they would have to lean over in order for their strike to hit you. Your opponent continues to spin his chain whip maniacally, leaving you no good openings, and you keep your shield up while staying in motion.

A five-pointed shadow appears around you, a clear sign that someone has grown bored with the fight. The shadow focuses on you as the hand descends, only to suddenly cease with a loud snap of flesh on flesh. You look up and see that Fulda has wrapped a powerful hand around Li's slender wrist, holding it in place. "No cheating!" Fulda declares, keeping her wrist in a firm grip. Li winces and nods yes, then Fulda releases her hold.

The distraction is enough to give your opponent an opening, and he slings his chain forward, wrapping it around your ankle. With a firm tug he pulls your leg out from under you, knocking you onto your back. He moves in and steps on your wrist, holding your shield arm to the ground while he swings his chain high. With a grunt he brings it down, smacking you in the chest.

Li's eyes light up at your misfortune, especially eager to decide your fate, and her champion swings the chain again, hitting you in the ribs. While you contract from the pain he winds up for another strike, and Li exaggeratedly licks her lips. If he hits you again, it will be difficult to justify letting the fight go on any longer. He begins his downward swing, and you do what you can to break it.

His strike is disrupted by your improvised sword as his chain wraps around it, keeping it from slamming into your body. With another quick yank he pulls it out of your hand, throwing it to the side. Before he can begin his wind-up again you cock back your leg and kick him right in the gut, knocking him backward and away from you. While he's still doubled over you jump back to your feet, ready to get back into the fight.

You throw your shield at him like a frisbee before his chain gets in motion again, hitting him in the forehead. Now without weapons you charge while he's dazed, tackling him with a well-placed shoulder to his sternum and taking him to the ground. Your fists begin their work, each taking turns repeatedly punching his face until it's a bloody mess. Feeling that your work is done you give him one more for good measure, then stand up.

Fulda and Li look at each other, unsure of what to do: Li doesn't want to finish off her own entrant, and Fulda wants it to end before one of the women smashes you. Out of the corner of your eye you see Olga lunge forward and you quickly jump back, trying to get out of the way of her hand. Surprisingly she isn't going for you; instead her fingers snag your opponent's leg.

With relief you watch her drag him across the arena while you gather your weapons back up. Olga leans to one side, lifting up a butt cheek, and sets the defeated man down underneath it, blood almost certainly rendering him blind. She forcefully slams her butt back down, flattening him beneath it. "What? It was a good fight," she explains, and you return to the center.

The post-fight alcohol is distributed, and Fulda leans down once she's finished with it. "Be on your toes now," she whispers, engulfing you with her alcohol-infused breath again. "There's not really a safe zone anymore." She sits back up, resuming her regal pose overlooking the arena, and looks to Mariam. "All right, let's see yours now."
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Still Undefeated

choices: Li tries to finish you off
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Mariam reaches down and plucks her champion up from the floor, sandwiching him between two well-kept fingers. She moves him up to her face, nearly inside her mouth, and whispers something quietly enough that not even you can hear it. Then she moves him away and sets him down beside you in the center of the arena.

He picks up the sewing needle, likely just hoping to keep you at bay until one of the giantesses wins for him. Your final opponent is exceptionally scrawny, and even if he were at full size you doubt that a teenage girl would have trouble overpowering him - not that the same wasn't necessarily true of you too. Much more worrying is the eager gleam in the eyes of all the giantesses, and you can tell that they're barely restraining themselves.

Olga calls for the fight to start this time, and before she even sounds the last letter you explode into action, leaping forward without regard for your opponent. You just make it past him before Olga's hand connects, slamming onto the leather with a great cacophony with the tip of her middle finger just short of you. The rush of wind from her hand hitting blows you forward several inches, and you see Li's arm winding up.

Not even bothering to stand you wait for her arm to come down, hand balled up in a fist. You roll to the side, narrowly avoiding getting smashed by her strike, and quickly get back to your feet. Your opponent stands there, confused and more than a little shocked, still where he was when the fight started. Fulda pensively watches you from behind him, unable to stop the onslaught.

You square up with your opponent who isn't even really paying attention to you and prepare to charge. Before you can start moving an enormous finger slams into your back as Allison pushes you forward. Just when you're able to stop yourself she pokes you again, harder this time and pitching you forward, nearly impaling you on the sewing needle. In preparation for the next strike you raise your shield, only to have it come from the side. Allison's finger whacks you in the shoulder, throwing you sideways and knocking you off your feet.

As soon as you come to a complete stop there's a tug on your back, and Brit lifts you up by your shirt. You dangle helplessly in the air, unable to do anything to free yourself, and she slightly rocks her hand, swinging you back and forth like a pendulum. When you're moving forward she lets go, sending you flying over your opponent to land roughly on the ottoman's surface.

Li sets her hand down beside you while you're laying there trying to gather your strength, index finger cocked back. Perhaps too eagerly she releases it without setting it up, just slightly clipping your shoulder. While it's not enough to shatter your arm it does send you skipping across the leather, bowling your opponent over when your flat trajectory collides with him.

You'd like nothing more than to take a minute to recover, but the self-satisfied look on Olga's face tells you that's not going to happen. She slowly moves her hand toward you, index finger outstretched, directly on course to smash your head with it. Wearily you get back up, saving your head from the impact, and turn to actually get some fighting done. Before you can move though Olga presses her finger down, creating an indentation that draws you back toward her finger.

You bump into the final knuckle of her extended finger and she lifts it away, the sudden return of tautness to the surface pitching you forward. Olga slams her finger back down where she expected you to be, pulling you back in to the simulated gravity well. Instead of lifting it up again she lightly kicks you with it, pushing you forward an inch.

While you run forward trying to escape she walks her fingers alongside you. They're more than three times as long as you are tall and they easily outpace you, even with her moving them slowly. She moves them in front of you, allowing you to periodically get out from under her palm by running between her fingers. She lets out a light giggle, and you get ready to move.

Olga's fingers burst forward, placing you directly underneath her palm. Just when she slams it to the surface you dive forward, barely escaping from underneath her hand as it falls backward. You find yourself between two massive digits when you get back up, and they immediately close together like a pair of scissors, trapping you between them.

The pressure is light at first, just enough to keep you from moving, but it steadily increases. It's not long before her fingers restrict your breathing, and you find yourself not even able to breathe in. Olga continues to press her fingers together while you ineffectually slap at one, trying to get her to let go. In just a few moments you know she'll crush your torso with nothing more than two fingers.

Desperately you reverse your sword's grip and plunge it down, piercing the skin of her middle finger. You ram it down as hard as you can, the tip nearly poking through the other side, and Olga recoils from the sharp pain. You're yanked backward by her hand and thrown tumbling, but the others aren't ready to finish you off, having expected Olga to do it. Gasping for breath, you push yourself back up and charge at your opponent, still standing in the middle dumbfounded.

Before the others can react you charge at him again, hoping to cover enough ground that they'll risk smashing him too. A wall of fingers lands before you, stopping you in your tracks as you slam headlong into it. Allison's thumb closes against your back, trapping you in her hand, and you just now realize you left your sword in Olga's finger. It looks like this is it.

Surprisingly, instead of crushing you under her thumb Allison picks you up, keeping you firmly planted in the center of her palm. With a flick of her wrist she tosses you forward, sending you sailing over your opponent and in a hard roll until you come to a stop. By now you're not even sure where you are or which giantess you're beneath, and it's all you can do to keep moving.

It turns out you're beneath Li, and from her face you figure she worked something out with the others so that she'd be the one to finish you off. Expecting you to be defeated her hand slowly descends toward you, fingers outstretched, hoping to build trepidation before she snatches you up. You get up to a knee and turn yourself toward her thumb, gathering your breath while the shadow darkens around you.

Li's fingers start to close around you right when your adrenaline fully kicks in, and you spring yourself out from beneath her hand. You leap over the tip of a finger on your way out, narrowly escaping the fist closing around you. Thinking quick you grab the chain left by your last opponent, lying not far from where you stop, and get ready to get back into the combat.

Before you can move toward the center Li's hand winds up for a quick swipe at you, and crouch low enough that her palm passes harmlessly above, just close enough to rustle your hair. You run forward, moving with enough speed that her second swipe merely glances you with the very tip of a finger. She groans in frustration, and you know now's the time.

The shadow gets fuzzy around you as Li raises her hand, ready to bring it down and simply smash you to bits. You whip the chain forward, catching you unaware opponent by the ankle, and pull it taut. Around you the shadows grow darker and you yank the chain, jerking your opponent to where you are. You don't stand around waiting for him to stop though: as soon as you pulled him you began to run, diving forward and back toward the middle.

Once more skin slaps against leather, and you hear the faint sound of over two hundred bones cracking simultaneously from the hit. "Fuck, ouch!" Li yells before the sound dies down, and you guess that, adding injury to insult, she stuck herself with your opponent's needle when she smashed him. You grin weakly, and manage to push yourself back up one more time.

"You did it!" Fulda yells excitedly. "I can't believe you survived all that punishment!" The other giantesses mutter among themselves, disappointed that they couldn't kill you even working together. Li pulls the needle out and sucks on her hand where it went in, seething with rage while you're congratulated.

Fulda stands from her chair, towering so far above you atop the ottoman you still have to look up at her knees. She places her hands atop her hips to add to her imposing image and asks, "Anyone else have a shrunken man they want to throw in?" After a beat she continues, "Congratulations, Fulda Stein's shrunken man, you are the champion of this year's tournament! The reward, as it is every tournament, is that you get to keep living - at the mercy of the woman you represented, of course."

You're so tired at this point that you don't even mind that the reward is simply not dying: after so many near-brushes with it during that fight, you know that alone has value. You look up at Fulda silently, only able to spend this time regaining your strength. For the moment you're too exhausted to escape, and hope that, after all this, you've managed to earn some sort of reprieve from her.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Earning the Championship

choices: She sets you on the floor
She has you hold on to her dress
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
The giantesses all pass out their shot glasses one last time and pour their vodka, everyone but Mariam getting one while Fulda gets two. They down their liquor in a single draft, Fulda managing to fit both inside her colossal mouth at once, then slam the glasses down. Fulda stands against the ottoman, pressing herself as close as she can to you, while you crane your neck back at her towering body.

"Hey down there little guy, how 'bout a victory lap?" she asks, her speech getting lazy from intoxication. She sinks to the floor and sits down, stretching her impossibly long legs out. They have to be about as long as a football field, you think, and you notice that she's put her high heels back on. Her ice blue eyes fixate upon you, though the alcohol has made them somewhat glassy.

"I don't think so Fulda," you begin, "I'm really tired from all that and I just want to-"

"Nonshense!" she interrupts, assaulting you with a wall of sound and alcohol breath as she forgets to control the volume of her voice. "The night's shtill young! I wanna dance!" You don't want to succumb to her demands, but you realize there's the very real possibility of her having a titanic tantrum if you don't. She narrows her eyes and adds, "Remember like twenty seconds ago when I said 'at the mercy of...' etshetera?" Fulda's not-so-veiled threat is very clear, and you gulp.

"Sure, Fulda!" you say with feigned enthusiasm, "I'd love to dance!" Nothing you'd like more than to dance with a drunk woman over a thousand times your size.

"I knew you'd agree," Fulda says with an involuntary grin plastered on her face. "Let'sh go!" Despite her impulsive state and excitement doesn't swipe at you with one of her enormous hands. Instead she sets a hand, palm up, on the side of the ottoman and lets you walk onto it. She waits until you get to the middle before standing, placing her other hand around you as a guard wall. Even the ascent is as mild as it can be considering her legs have to extend all the way up very quickly.

Fulda walks very carefully back to the dance floor, almost cradling you like an egg in her hands. "You're gonna have lots o' fun!" she declares, eyes widening to emphasize how much fun you'll have. Her breath still reeks of alcohol so much that your eyes water, but you suppress a cough so as not to tip her over the edge. "More than the lasht guy I danced with, I hope!" She laughs hysterically at this, throwing her head back and stumbling over her heels. You force a small laugh, probably not even worth the effort to compete with her belting peals of laughter.

You arrive at the dance area you had just left a half hour ago, the music still playing but nobody around. "You ready to shee my moves?" Fulda asks, following it up with a wink. You give an enthusiastic thumbs up from her palm, and a huge grin breaks out across her face. "Okay, s'go!"
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Back to the Party

choices: She does, in fact, step on you
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Fulda slowly kneels down until her butt almost touches the floor, bringing you down like a very fast elevator. Then she lowers her hands to the carpet, setting the hand you're on entirely down before removing the enormous wall of fingers blocking your path. You walk off, your feet making small indentations on her palm and fingers as you go.

Once you're safely off Fulda stands back up to her absolutely monumental height, wobbling a bit when her legs fully extend. You stare up at her towering over you, understanding how the poor guy she shrank earlier must have felt, then remind yourself that applies to you, too. She spreads her feet so that she can stand astride you and places her hands on her hips, looking down at you. Despite her best efforts not to, she cracks a smile.

"Before we begin, li'l dude, I have a question. And you gotta be truthful." Fulda does what she can to hide her smile but she can't help herself. "Are you scared of me? Do I intimidate you?" She stifles a laugh while you decide whether you actually should tell the truth.

You have to admit, she's getting nicer, and you might be able to warm up- no. She tried to crush or eat you multiple times today, put you in a death match against a bunch of other shrunken men, not to mention she's the reason you're an inch tall in the first place! "Yes, Fulda!" you yell up at her. "You terrify the ever-loving shit out of me!"

Fulda busts out laughing at your response and takes a good ten seconds to compose herself again. "Good!" she says. "After all, I am..." she raises a foot high in the air and sucks in breath before yelling, "absolutely gigantic in comparison to you!" With that she stomps her foot down, bringing it dead center for your head. You flinch away from the rapidly approaching shoe sole and cover your head, unwilling to look death in the eye.

Her foot slams into the ground with a sound like artillery firing next to your ear, and generates a shockwave that knocks you on your back from a sitting position. You look up horrified at the titaness stretching up as far as your eye can see, who busts out laughing again so hard she has to double over. "Oh my God!" Fulda says between laughs, "You're pathetic! Like I would step on you after that!"

You use the toe of her shoe for support while you stand back up, and she takes several deep breaths to compose herself. Many of the giantesses from around the party have gathered around to witness the imminent spectacle. "Okay so, li'l dude. For real. Let's dance."
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Drawing a Crowd

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Fulda starts slow, shuffling her feet back and forth and moving her hips in time with the music's rhythm. Though the steps she takes are small each time she sets her toes down generates a minor earthquake, and they lift up enough for you to fit beneath them. While she gets warmed up you can do little else but stare up at her in awe and hope you don't stand where her feet want to go.

"I'm the only one dan-cing!" she bellows down at you, then begins to shake her hips a little more. You make a token effort to shuffle your feet back and forth, moving between the tops of two carpet fibers while trying to stay on your feet through the pounding. So far you've been safe from any errant steps, but you still feel safer staring up at her from between her feet.

"I didn't say dance at me, I said with me," Fulda chides, intensifying her movements even more. Her toes constantly grind into the carpet and every few seconds one of her heels slams down with enough force to rattle your teeth. "Do I need to motivate you a little more?" She begins lifting up one foot fully, stomping it down next to you and twisting once, then repeating, each time missing you by less than an inch. You try to match her pace but with the constant stomping it's hard to to focus on anything but getting stepped on.

"Li'l dude, if you don't start dancing with me I'm going to assume you don't find me attractive," Fulda warns, her hips fully gyrating. "You saw what happened to the last guy who wouldn't dance, right?" You shudder at the memory of Li eating that man. You're not sure if that's what she's implying, but even if it's just shrinking you, you'd rather avoid it. "So get on me and dance!"

You watch her foot going up and down, marking the rhythm and counting how long it's down. It's not very long, but with each twist you think you'll have enough time. Two more steps pass and you go for it, hopping on the tip of her shoe and running as far up as you can. The next time she lifts her foot up you're thrown on your face, but you manage to grab hold of the bottom of her high heel's opening. Her foot slams down, twisting you back and forth, but you maintain your grip and gradually pull yourself up.

"Good job!" she shouts down at you. "Now grind on me!"
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Dance with Danger

choices: "Now I want to grind on you!"
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Fulda doesn't calm her movements at all, and you're wildly thrown back and forth by her steps while you desperately try to maintain a hold and figure out what the hell she means. Does she seriously want you to grind against her foot? Her leg would be a very long climb, hazardous with how it's moving right now, and she isn't going to help you get up there.

You wait for her to step down again and weather the shock from the impact, then while she's twisting throw yourself forward. The momentum while she twists works to your advantage, and you manage to grab a handful of her nylon stocking each time. And as she dried off her face, she made a few funny faces to herself, which you were lucky enough to see, and then she simply walked out, and you made a mental note to ask Fulda about it later.


Once Fulda felt that enough time passed, she walked in and hoisted you out of the sink. She dropped a pre-shrunk towel for you, and you used it to dry off quickly before covering yourself, so you weren’t exposed to Fulda. Then she said, in a playful but still possessive tone, “Oh are you embarrassed, shrimpy? Don’t sweat the small stuff!” And then she dropped a set of accurately sized clothes, and she said “What? I can get whatever clothes I need, and you look like you could use some new digs! You don’t need to thank me!” So you put them on, and then she carries you over to her personal lunch table in her room, and she offers you a bit of her Chinese food lunch. You nod at her, and she shrinks down a small chunk so it’s still fairly large for you, so you can get back some energy. As you both silently eat, you think about how Fulda’s been a lot nicer to you now, and you hope that this trend continues.


After you both finish eating, you decide to ask Fulda about the mystery woman, and ask “Hey Fulda, who was that girl in the bathroom earlier?” Then she says, “What? Have a crush?” You look down, embarrassingly, and she says “Oh take it easy! It was a joke!” And she pokes you, which to her was like a simply elbow nudge, but you felt like you were hit by a truck, but you figured that she was trying to be funny. She then explains, “Well, that was Nisha Dwivedi. She’s a Political Science major and a junior. She’s another member of the sorority, and she’s a pretty nice person. We don’t tell her about any of the shrinking stuff that I do, because it’d probably break her heart. She might just be one of the kindest people I know. Want to meet her?” You’re taken aback, because you thought that Fulda would never let you go, and you nod and say “If you wouldn’t mind, that would be awesome! Thank you Fulda!” You want to sound as gracious as you can, but she says, “Now hold on, little guy. I’m not gonna make it easy to you and just introduce you to her. You’re gonna do that.” Now you’re confused, and you ask, “Wait, what do you mean?” Fulda explains, “If I just handed you to Nisha, she’d probably adore you, but I think we should make it a challenge! I’ll place you somewhere near her, probably a shoe or something, and you’ll need to gain her attention. I’ll make sure that you’re highly durable and a reasonable size, say about half an inch, and you’ll do whatever you can to prove to her that you’re not an annoying bug or pebble. I’ll put you in her shoe, so you’ll really need to climb to reach her. Oh, and I’ll give you my number, just in case you don’t think you can do it and you want to call it quits.” She then gives you her phone number, and you text her so she knows which number is yours. And then she adds, “Oh, and she’s has a night class tonight, so you’ll be in for the long haul. And one last thing, she doesn’t actually live at the sorority house. She always liked to be a bit more independent, which I can respect.”


Fulda gave you some time to process all of this, and after a few minutes, Fulda says, “Oh, if you don’t want to do all of this, you can always stick with me. I’m sure you’d love to spend more time with your generous and gorgeous goddess, right?” And with that fairly pompous statement, Fulda let out a booming laugh. You think for a bit, and you really feel completely smitten by Nisha’s perfect appearance, and you’re also enticed by how much nicer she seems to be. You know that Nisha’d treat you better than Fulda ever would, even if she has been a lot kinder lately. But it would be a massive challenge, and it might be smarter to just stay with Fulda, and hope that you impress her enough so she’ll let you go at some point, or maybe actually become her boyfriend or something. And if you make the attempt, and chicken out later, you’re sure that Fulda would go back to treating you sadistically and cruelly. And eventually, you come to a decision. What do you choose to do?
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Class Time with Fulda(‘s Toes)

choices: Nisha was going to her lengthier afternoon class
Nisha was going to the gym for an afternoon workout
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
You realize that you need to take your life in your own hands, and not depend and hope on Fulda being as nice as she’s been. You say to Fulda, “I’d like to meet Nisha! I’m ready for the challenge!” Fulda merely giggles, saying “Wow! You’ve made a big change from the wimp I saw in class the other day. You’ve still got a long way to go before you completely earn my respect, but you’re on the right track. Now let me set this all up for you. Good luck buddy!” She then waves her free hand over your body, and you feel yourself grow a little bit, until you’re about ½ of an inch. Fulda says, “Alright! Now you’ll be as durable as you’ll need to be. I could probably even sit on you right now, and you’d be no worse for wear!” Fulda laughs again, and you just try and focus on the positives, and not her constant teasing. Fulda then started to walk over to where Nisha was sitting down, and you could see that she was wearing a pair of short green shorts and a black T-shirt, and she was looking closely at her laptop. There was also a pair of brown moccasins on the floor next to her light brown bare feet, and she was had them raised slightly on the balls of her feet, showing off her smooth soles.


So Fulda sits down next to Nisha, while hiding you in her closed fist, and starts to chat with her. Nisha starts the conversation, saying “Oh hi Fulda! How are you? You look great today!” Fulda replies, “I’m doing alright; just getting through a few boring classes. How have you been?” They chat for a few more minutes, where you struggle to hear the rest, because Fulda has decided to start squeezing you like a stress ball. At some point, Nisha says “Are you thirsty Fulda? I was about to grab myself a bottle of water.” Fulda say, happily, “That would be great! Thanks!” Nisha walks over to the kitchen, while being barefoot, and once she was out of sight, Fulda prepared you for your journey to gain Nisha’s attention. She kneels down over Nisha’s moccasins, and drops you into the left one, and she whispers to you, “Good luck in there! And if you decide to chicken out, you know who to text!” And then she gave you a playful wink, and sat back into her seat.


You take a look around, and realize that the slightly fluffy walls towered over you a few times over, and the ground was both sticky and highly fluffy. And the smell was very strong, and it was even worse than Fulda’s boot was, probably because she at least had the sense to wear socks. But for some reason, you didn’t think of that as a negative, and you think that it was either because Fulda had already predisposed you to like feet more than you did before or because of how smitten you already were with Nisha. And as you marveled at the interior of her moccasin, you heard the tell-tale earthquakes of her walking, and you eventually saw her sit down in her seat. She crossed her legs, at her ankles, and her soles hovered above the moccasin you were inside of, and her massive feet covered almost half of the shoe. You could see that she had incredibly long and slender toes, as well as fairly largely sized soles. You look back up at the information listed on the shoe, and you notice a big 13 printed on the tag, which told you that Nisha had large feet, but they were still smaller than Fulda’s were. Although that wasn’t a huge shocker, since she was one of the biggest people you’ve ever seen, both before and after she started to toy with your size.


After a few more minutes of Fulda and Nisha chatting, which you can no longer hear at all, Fulda gets up and walks away. Up above, she says to Nisha, “Oh dear. I’m sorry, but I need to head out. Later! And don’t forget your sorority duties!” Fulda smiles at her, and Nisha knew that as kind as that smile looked, that was much closer to an order than a reminder. As much as Nisha liked the sorority, she wasn’t the biggest fan of how totalitarian Fulda could be. And as she thought about these things, while looking over her class notes, she absent-mindedly rubbed her toes and soles together, which gave you an unexpected but, not unwanted, personal show. You decide to take this moment to wade through the sticky and fluffy ground towards the toe section, because you were well aware that your increased durability did not include immunity to pain. And once you make it there, the smell only intensified, although at this point, you were aware of how these things worked, so it wasn’t as much of a surprise for you. You do see a bunch of massive craters that you assume are the imprints made by Nisha’s long and massive toes, and you try to fit yourself into the imprint made by her 2nd toe. You figure that avoiding her big toe would be smart, but you sort of want to see what it’s like to grinded under Nisha without even realizing you’re there or even exist. But then you hear, and see, Nisha’s feet shift around and from her sudden movements, you had a feeling that she was about to leave to go somewhere else.


As you brace yourself, you hear that you received a new text, so you check it and find out that it was from Fulda. You take a look, and she wrote “Good luck!  You know who to call if you give up! ;)” You feel like she’s taunting you, and it inspires you to try even harder to gain Nisha’s attention at some point. You see Nisha grip the back of her moccasin with her left foot’s toes, casually dragging it a bit closer to her seat, which causes you to tumble onto your back, and the fluffy and sticky pieces of fabric actually prevent you from moving very well. You hope that you picked a good spot, because you’ll be stuck there for awhile at least. Once the moccasin stops moving, you see her left foot angled down and hovering right over the shoe, which blocked out a majority of the light available. And once you heard the snapping noise of Nisha closing her laptop, you saw her left foot reenter the moccasin. First, she slammed the ball of her foot onto the shoe, which would have knocked you into the air if the ground around you was less sticky and grabby. Then she raised her toes as she pushed her foot further in, dragging her toes on the ‘roof’ of the moccasin. And then, finally, her foot made it all the way into the moccasin, and her massive and slightly dirty 2nd toe plummeted down into the imprint that you chose to hide away in. And as her toe started to rub back and forth into you, you wonder if she noticed your presence, but your hopes of a quick and easy discovery were dashed when she said “Oh dear! Is there a pebble in my shoe? That’s lame! Oh well, it’s not bothering me that much. And it actually feels kinda good!” She starts to rub a bit more forcefully while giggling, covering you in her unique foot sweat and junk.


And then she stands up, flattening you slightly more than before, and then she starts to walk out of the sorority house. Since it was fairly warm at this point, Nisha’s feet were beginning to sweat a lot more, which was in turn covering you in even more of it as well. But you didn’t mind all that much, and you wonder just how much your tastes and interests have changed since you’ve been forced to live this tiny life. But then Nisha got a text, and she stopped to check it out, and while she did that, she messed with her toes absentmindedly. She started to knead her toes into the moccasin, completely smothering you in her massive and sweaty toe flesh. Nisha really liked how that pebble felt under her toe, and it seemed to be an effective stress reliever for her, and she knew that it would be a nice distracter for while she needed to focus today. And then Nisha started to walk again, and as her foot would rise in the air, you felt like your body was being forced into her light brown toe flesh. And when her foot would slam back down, you are totally engulfed and crammed into the sweaty flesh. And even though Nisha knew exactly where she was heading next, you were out of the loop, so you just wonder where you’ll both be going. And where was Nisha going next?
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Seeking the Goddess, Nisha

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
A very annoyed Fulda is moving the napkin down towards you now, spread wide enough that it's almost guaranteed to capture you. However you don't plan on going down without a fight and push yourself up so that you're standing, then take off running down her leg. Unfortunately the milk that splashed out makes her smooth thigh very slick and you slip, falling forward and landing on your face in a puddle of milk.

Prone again, you are an easy target for Fulda's extermination. White cloth falls around and engulfs you, sealing your fate as Fulda's fingers press it down against her leg. She presses one finger against you and pushes down, immediately crushing everything below your waist into a red mush that gets quickly absorbed by the napkin. You scream, but your agony is short. Fulda snaps the two ends of the napkin together, smashing her fingers into your head and ruined legs almost simultaneously. An instant later she pinches your body together, smashing you immediately.

Fortunately for Fulda the napkin is enough to absorb all the blood that pours out of your body, leaving her fingers pristine. She dabs at her thigh to wipe up the milk and a couple tiny drops of blood that fell out then tosses it in the trash, just as she would any other bug.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Like a Bug

choices: Fulda comes back before Li can do anything else
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Fulda places her hands on the table and pushes herself back, the scraping from the chair against the tile piercing your ears. "None of you thought to bring the coffee over here?" she asks as she stands up. She's answered by a collective shrug, so with a sigh she turns around and walks over to the counter, her humongous butt shaking each time her bare feet slap against the tile.

After she's a few steps away the clang of metal against ceramic draws your attention away from Fulda's rear and you turn around. An enormous cereal spoon rests against the side of Fulda's bowl, held up by a hand out of your view. Your ears grate again while the spoon pushes the bowl aside, ceramic scraping against the wooden table as it moves. When it's moved far enough to the side for you to see who it is your heart sinks. Holding the spoon, with her dark eyes locked onto you, is Li.

Before you can move she lunges forward, slamming the spoon down into the table behind you. Li flicks the spoon forward, catching you in the basin and picking you up off your feet so that you're launched toward her. You land hard and keep rolling, and Li sits back down in her chair with a grin. Desperately you cry out for help, but no one seems to notice or care.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Power Play

choices: You dream of Fulda at prom
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
You're standing in front of an open locker at the end of a school day, eager to go home and relax for a couple hours before you have to go to your after school job. You set your books down on the bottom of the locker, arranging them to be most convenient for you on Monday. Quickly you rack your brain to remember whether you have any homework you need to get done before then.

The door slams shut in your face, and you follow the arm pressing against it to find a white tank top pulled tight over a pair of large breasts. You look up, craning your neck way back, and see Fulda looking down at you with a grin across her face. "Hi, small fry!" she says with a bubbly voice. In response you try to run but she seizes you by the front of your shirt, stopping you in your tracks.

She slams you against the locker with a single motion from her toned arm, then presses you into the metal until your back is flat against it. Fulda steps around until she's in front of you, pressing her body into yours as much as she can. Under normal circumstances you would be glad to have your face full of breasts, but this is far from ordinary. "I heard you've been talking shit about me."

"What? N-no, I-" Your muffled response is cut short by her slamming her hand against the locker, the great metal thud causing you to yelp. You feel her stand up on her toes, probably trying to appear even more intimidating.

"Don't you dare lie to me!" she yells, her voice getting a bit louder throughout the sentence.. "I've heard everything you've been saying to your little idiot friends. If you fess up I might be lenient and leave you with what you have."

"Fulda, I really have no idea wh-" This time you're interrupted by your own involuntary groans of pain from Fulda leaning heavily against you, pushing you even harder into the locker. She's big, you think, but she really doesn't look this heavy.

"Maybe I should jog your memory then," she says, sliding a hand behind your head. Her hand is large enough to pin both your ears against your skull. Fulda pulls you into her, driving your nose into her bare midriff while your cranium buoys her breasts. "My boyfriend left me because he felt too intimidated by me, I'm only cheer captain and on the honor roll because people are so afraid of me and - this is particularly rich, coming from a pipsqueak you - that I'm freakishly tall. That about cover it?"

Your nose slides into her belly button, causing you to whimper. "F-Fulda, w-what are you doing to me?" you finally manage to stammer, your lips struggling against the fabric of her shorts.

"Nothing you don't deserve," Fulda replies, stepping forward to place her Converse on top of your shoes. She jabs her knees forward, bashing them against the locker and forcing your arms out of the way. Pain shoots up from your sides as when squeezes her knees together, jamming them into your ribs. You cry out from the pressure, and she laughs in response as your eyes meet the waist of her shorts.

"You know, I actually liked you until today." Her hand is large enough to cradle the back of your head in her palm, which she uses to jam your face into her crotch. "You were always funny, helped me if I needed it, and didn't seem too scared of me. You treated me like a person." Your back strains as your body is pulled in two separate directions, and you try to get your feet out from under hers. "I actually thought, now that I'm single we might... but no, you're just like all the others."

Fulda moves her shoes from on top of yours, relieving the feeling that you're about to be torn in two at the waist. At the same time she lets go of your head, letting you drop to the floor. Immediately you try to run between her legs and get as far away from her as you can, but a quick slap to the back of your head sends you tumbling down. You slide across the floor until you crash into the other wall of lockers and Fulda quickly pursues, standing between you and the rest of the hallway again.

You look up at her from the floor, astonished by how large she appears from this perspective. "Get up," she commands, crossing her arms under her chest. Reluctantly you get to your feet, and your jaw drops when you stand. Your eye level has dropped below her shorts, and her entire leg is now longer than you. "That's how I know you're lying, shrimp. If you hadn't been talking behind my back you wouldn't have tried to run away."

"Fulda I'm telling you, I didn't-" A knee the size of your face slams into your nose, knocking your head back into the metal door behind you. Your head bounces off the locker right back into her knee, where she holds you in place. Gradually you feel your feet lift off the ground while she holds you there.

"Well I was thinking about letting you go," she says, "let you see how you deal with everyone being 'freakishly tall' like me compared to your tiny ass. Maybe even forgive you after you learn your lesson when your girlfriend dumps you for being freakishly small. She would be quite gigantic to you now." Your feet have entirely left the floor and you feel the strain in your neck from it having to hold your whole body up while she pins your head with her knee. "But you keep lying to me, and I don't think you're going to learn your lesson."

Fulda sets her foot back down, letting you fall back to the floor. From down at her knees you look up at her towering over you, a smug grin on her face. Strangely no one has walked by the whole time this has been going on - if someone saw this happening they'd try to stop it, wouldn't they? You open your mouth to shout for help but she swiftly kicks the locker beside your head, and the thud from her huge shoe so close makes you flinch away.

Your gaze continues to drift down her shins, and you resolve to do whatever it takes to stop this. "Okay, I said those things!" you shout up to her. "I know they were mean and I shouldn't have said them, I just got caught up in the moment, you know?" Fulda grins down at you and you force a smile back up to her, expecting the shrinking to stop at any moment.

Much to your chagrin you continue sinking towards the floor, Fulda becoming larger and more powerful to you each second. "You think I'm not used to hearing that by now?" she asks. "I've been hearing it all my life. You get used to it when you hit five feet in first grade. I'm more upset that you turned against me so easily. Your friends may not be around to lead you into it again, but I just can't trust you anymore."

You gulp and back away from her, immediately running into the metal wall behind you. The top of your head slips past her ankle, and you yell up, "What did you do to my friends?"

Fulda laughs in response, chilling you to the bone. "I wouldn't worry about them right now, you're in enough trouble as it is." She begins tapping her foot, the pounding thuds driving their way into your skull. With each thud she grows significantly until the rubber around the base of her Converse is taller than you.

"I'm sorry it has to be this way," she says, lifting up her shoe, "but you're too much of a little shit." The underside of her sole is covered with what looks like dried blood, turning the usually brown rubber dark red. You try to run but it feels like you're stuck in syrup, effectively keeping you in place. Fulda brings her shoe down directly atop you, crushing you immediately and ending the dream.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Bullied

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
You find yourself sitting in the front row of a lecture hall, blue book on your desk, pencils out and waiting for the exams to be distributed. Seeing this class on your finals schedule had been quite a shock, since you were only put into it during enrollment as a temporary thing and you were sure you had dropped it. At no point in the semester had you attended a lecture for this course, got any of the books, or even knew what the course material was. Still, they made it very clear that if you don't at least sit the final you'll end up in a serious meeting with the dean.

The stack of exams and bubble sheets makes its way to you and you take what you need before passing it on. This is going to be worse than you expected: the answer sheet is three times as wide as normal, and the letters go all the way out to L. Who would even design something like this, and more importantly, what professor or teacher's assistant has enough time to come up with all those answers? You sigh loudly. Getting a quarter of the multiple choice answers correct is a pipe dream now, too.

When the observer tells the room to begin you crack the seal on the exam, and find that you're more screwed than you could have imagined. The exam isn't in English, or really any language at all - it seems to use a random mish-mash of characters from every language you've seen. You look around, sure that there must be some mistake, but everyone else is furiously scribbling away. Oddly enough, this is the first time you notice that everyone else in this exam is a woman.

Not wanting to look stupid you pick up a pencil and begin bubbling in answers. It doesn't matter what they are, you tell yourself, they're going to be wrong anyway, so you go straight down one of the columns in hopes of randomly hitting something. As you go down the column you find yourself adjusting the grip on your pencil between every two or three bubbles. Not only is this whole test bogus, but even the pencils you brought are shoddy? What a day.

After the first ten answers you realize there's something amiss. Your answer sheet no longer fits on the desk, and the pencil no longer fits in your grip. You look to either side, and see that while sitting you barely come up to the shoulders of the women on either side. Panicking you raise your hand. "Um, something's wrong," you say. "I need some help." No answer.

Unable to comprehend the exam, or what is happening at all, you return to merely filling in the bubbles. Your pencil becomes harder to hold, and more of your sheet slips off the side of the desk, but you do your best to persevere. By the time you're unable to hold your pencil in anything but a monkey grip and only a few bubbles fit on your desk at a time your nose becomes irritated, and you turn your head to sneeze. Upon opening your eyes again you notice that you're roughly level with their butts, and you're looking up at the bottoms of their desks.

Heavy, thudding footsteps approach from behind, and you look up from the exam. One of the observers is walking down the aisle, a woman with dark brown hair held to the back of her head by a clip and glasses. When she gets close you raise your hand again and say, "Excuse me, I really need some help. Something's happening and I don't know what it is." You turn to get her attention and find yourself eye to knee with her. Quickly you crane your neck back to look up at her, but she continues walking past, showing no signs that she even registered you were making noise.

With nothing else to do you go back to the exam, filling in each bubble as meticulously as you can. In very short order you have to hold your pencil in both hands, and the sides of your answer sheet are touching the floor. "Someone help!" you shout, finding yourself looking up at everyone's knees. "I keep getting smaller!"

Finally your answer sheet slides off your desk entirely, floating into the aisle, and you are entirely unable to lift anything you brought. You spend several minutes working with the graphite tip in the pencil before you manage to chip it off, still large enough that you have to palm it. Desperately you grab the edge of your answer sheet and try to drag it back to your desk, but you can't get a firm enough hold on it. The test observer is coming back down this aisle so you double your efforts, but for nothing.
