You jump out of the way of her shoe coming down on your skull just in time, leaving a massive shoe print on your sheet. "Hey, I'm down here!" you yell up from her ankle. "Please!" Nothing.

Desperate to finish you run into the aisle and start filling in answers there. With each answer you fill in the sheet grows a bit wider until you could mistake it for being the floor on its own, and the answers take longer to fill in. The student next to you has begun tapping her foot, shaking the floor each time her toes hit, which doesn't make filling in these huge bubbles any easier.

Halfway through the test you're about the size of one of the bubbles, and it's starting to take several minutes to fill them in. Loud thuds come down the aisle toward you, and you turn to see someone who must be five hundred feet tall barreling in your direction. She moves quickly, her shoes sending out shock waves with every footfall, and you dive back out of the aisle. You narrowly avoid getting crushed while she's on the way to turn her test in. How is she already done, anyway? This test is impossible.

You get back to work, doing your best to fill in the answers before time runs out. There are still over two hundred to go, however, and you're standing in the middle of an enormous D. Before you can reflect on that too much your attention is drawn by a great racket as your neighbor slightly moves her desk while standing. In awe you look up at her ankle, then follow her leg up for what must be thousands of feet. "Hey, down here! Look down here! Please, someone! Anyone!" She doesn't hear you either, and it's not certain she could.

Every time you try to fill in another answer someone else walks up the aisle, making you jump back to your desk. Even were it not for them the observer has begun circling around your desk non-stop, looking down at you as you try to desperately complete an answer. The constant quakes from her steps make it impossible to actually do anything with your hands, and her omnipresent gaze is unnerving. Whenever someone walks past you do your best to scream for help, but no one ever acknowledges your pleas.

At last the time limit for the test is up, and everyone else has left the room save the one unobservant observer. She reaches down to grab the answer sheet and test so you start jumping up and down, waving your arms, yelling bloody murder, anything to get her to notice you. However she simply grabs the sheet you're standing on and picks it up, dumping you off the page and onto the ground. You land painlessly, and while she carries your unfinished answer sheet and empty essay book away you get back into your desk.

To your surprise she comes back to you, shaking her head ruefully. She squats and reaches a hand down for your desk, carefully picking it up between the thumb and forefinger of her hand the size of a baseball field. "So you do know I'm here!" you shout up at her enormous blue eyes, magnified even further by her glasses. "Why won't you help me?" The observer continues to pay you no mind while she lifts you off the floor, treating it like a totally normal tiny desk.

Below you a normal sized desk appears, and the observer silently lowers you back down onto it. "Get me out of here!" you shout desperately. "This shouldn't be happening!" Your pleas continue to fall on deaf ears as your desk is set down atop this new desk. She stands and turns away, leaving you alone in the room, but that doesn't stop you from crying out for help.

As soon as the door closes someone throws it open again, accompanied by violent shock waves from footsteps. You look to the door and gasp. In walks the familiar 6'7" bronzed, jacked, auburn-haired titaness Fulda wearing her white tank top, black short shorts and Converse. Each step she takes seems like it should shake the room apart, and she sets a course directly for your seat.

Fulda slides into the desk and sets her exam materials to the side, conspicuously missing you entirely. You turn and look up at her, larger than some mountains from the chest up. She sets her elbow on the desk and rests her chin on her palm, shaking you so hard you fall out of your seat. Incensed you stand and start yelling at her, confident that she can't hear you either.

"Hey, this seat's already taken! I'm sitting here, go find your own, I still need to finish my exam!" To your surprise Fulda tilts her head slightly to look down at you, her eyes as large in the sky as the sun is.

"Why, you're rather bossy for a dust mite," she says with a laugh. Strangely her voice sounds like it did before you shrank, not like she's several miles tall. You gulp, and she continues. "You're much too small to be giving me orders. Maybe I should remind you of your place!" Fulda raises a hand with her fingers out, palm down, ready to swat you.

"No, that's okay, you don't have to!" you plead, but she proceeds winding up her arm while cackling. "Please, I just want some help!" Fulda's hand stops rising, and she goes silent for a moment.

"No matter what, where, or when, you will always be an insignificant little speck to me, got it?" You nod your head, and she grins. "Good. Then she brings her hand down, swatting you into the desk as hard as she can. Her hand strikes you with the force of a multi-megaton bomb and everything goes black, the only sensation reaching you her persistent cackle.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Should've Studied

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
You wake with a start, still nestled against Fulda's cheek. With a groan you look around the room, bleary-eyed from a hangover and curse the bright morning sunlight pouring in through the windows. A thin strand of red hair lays over you, the only sign that Fulda has moved at all throughout the night. For now she is still sleeping soundly, the covers moving gently up and down as she breathes in and out.

The door creaks on its hinges, and you turn to see who is entering. It opens slowly, only a crack at a time, as if someone is trying to sneak into Fulda's room without waking her. With trepidation you watch, the opening getting a little larger each second, your head pounding from last night and the bright inescapable lights.

A head of straight black hair tousled by a restless night peeks through the door and a drop of adrenaline hits your system, flooding out the lethargy from your hangover. Li tiptoes in, wearing a plain white pajama top and fleece pink bottoms, her socked feet silent as she steps across the carpet. Once she's wholly in the room she looks around and immediately spots you on Fulda's face, and her lips spread into a cruel grin.

Li approaches the bed, taking large, exaggerated steps so that she can better control her footfalls. Even as sensitive as you are in your current state you can't hear or feel her approaching, and you know that there is no chance of her intrusion rousing Fulda. You slap Fulda's cheek and shout, "Hey, wake up!" while Li stealthily moves closer, your hand barely making an impact on her skin.

Very soon Li looms over you, the grin still plastered on her face and her eyes brimming with more energy than you would expect for the time of day. You push against Fulda again, hoping you can shock her awake, but in response all she does is let out a low moan and push her head into the pillow. You're jostled but stay in place, still in plain view for the giantess above.

Li's hand begins coming toward you, fingers poised to snatch you up, and you begin to frantically beat on the enormous cheek. "Fulda, help, wake up!" you shout as Li's fingers encroach closer. "Please, save me!" The soft skin you're on bobs up and down as you push on it, and Fulda lets out another grunt at your efforts. You look up and see the fingers mere inches away, and as a last ditch you look directly at the opening into her ear canal and yell "Fulda!"
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: The Next Day

choices: Fulda sets her down on the pillow
Fulda throws her out into the room
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Li's fingers are almost in position to pluck you off Fulda's cheek when a hand suddenly shoots out from under the covers, firmly wrapping around her wrist and stopping any further advance of her hand. Her fingers spread open and begin wildly flailing to try and grab you while Fulda's eyes open wide. She turns her head sharply to regard the interloper, throwing you down onto the pillow, and grimaces.

"What the fuck do you think you're doing?" Fulda asks, pain visible on Li's face from her iron grip. Li stammers for an answer and Fulda tightens her hold, making the Asian cry out from the shock. You stand up and press yourself against the cartilage of Fulda's ear, keeping your distance from Li's flailing fingers. It might just be a trick of the light, but it looks like her fingers are slowly getting further away.

Li seems to have noticed it too and moves her other hand in to help, trying to pry Fulda's fingers off of her wrist. Fulda however maintains a solid grip, and Li's efforts to break her hold are in vain. In desperation she places her foot on Fulda's knuckles and presses as hard as she can, but finds herself unable to even make Fulda budge. Her foot does provide a nice visual aid though, and you watch it steadily get smaller the longer Fulda maintains her hold.

"Hey, let me go!" Li pleads, her other foot slamming into the bed frame when she's no longer tall enough to maintain contact with the floor. Fulda simply chuckles in response, and before long you can see her other foot as well when it rises above the mattress. The smaller she gets the more ferociously Li tries to free herself, but none of her efforts are the least bit successful.

It's not much longer before Li disappears from your view, having shrunk entirely into Fulda's hand. Fulda loosens her grip to avoid immediately crushing the former giantess, and you can her sobbing coming from inside the enormous hand. "What's wrong?" Fulda coos, her booming voice temporarily drowning out the sobs. "Did your little break in not go as planned?"

"I'm so small," Li manages to choke out between sobs. Fulda laughs and her fingers twitch, and you wait to see what happens next.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Protection

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
"Yeah, I did make you pretty tiny," Fulda says, mocking the girl in the palm of her hand. "Hey, I know someone else who's just as small as you! You should meet him, instead of trying to eat him for once." With that Fulda closes her fingers back around Li, the latter letting out a little yelp as the fist closes in, then moves her hand down to the pillow beside you. The soft surface dimples under her weight and you take a step back.

Fulda's fingers swing open, revealing the visibly distressed woman inside and allowing her to slide the rest of the way down onto the pillow. Despite her height being drastically reduced Li is still over a head taller than you, and could be very dangerous. For the moment however she does not do anything, instead only standing where Fulda had set her down, tears running down her cheeks.

A cacophony of rustling erupts as Fulda turns her head, her thick hair rubbing against the pillow. Her nose looms just behind you, and one watchful blue eye is level and open behind you. Upon seeing this Li covers her face with her hands, unwilling to look at how much larger Fulda is than her now.

You take a step toward her, your foot crinkling the pillowcase slightly when it sets down. Momentarily Li peeks over her fingertips to look at you then quickly covers her eyes back up. Laughter rumbles from behind you, and Fulda says, "What, are you scared of her? Look how small she is! She's puny!" You turn back and see Fulda grinning, clearly enjoying seeing Li in this predicament.

Li begins crying harder at this and lets out a sorrowful wail, which only makes Fulda smile more. You turn back toward her and take another step forward, knowing that you can't ignore her much longer.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Little Li

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Determined to provide some comfort to Li now that she's been shrunk you walk across the pillow until you're standing directly in front of her. She continues crying, keeping her face hidden behind her hands, so you take one more step forward and wrap your arms around her until you've fully wrapped her in a hug. Almost involuntarily she drops her hands from her face and places them around your shoulders, allowing her chin to rest atop your head. With your face on her collar bone you can feel her body being wracked with sobs.

"Don't cry," you tell her, running a hand up and down her back. "You're small, but you're not small alone, and I'll do what I can to help you." Li seems taken aback by this, and even stops crying for a bit.

"W-what?" she asks, lifting her chin off of you. "You want to help me?"

"Yeah, I do," you reply. "When Fulda shrank me no one knew but her, and she wasn't the most comforting person. I know you're scared, and you're going to need some human contact aside from Fulda's threats."

"But why are you being so nice to me?" Li asks, blinking rapidly to stop more tears. "I tried to eat you twice last night, and I thought about swatting you before Fulda could pick you up. I was up all night thinking about how great it would be when I finally got my revenge. If she hadn't stopped me you'd be in my stomach right now! What gives?"

"You can't do any of that anymore, though," you begin, "and I don't want to alarm you, but everyone else can, to either of us. It's different now. And I think you'll be different too."

"I loved being tall though," Li replies, then drops her chin back onto your head as she trails off.

"And I liked not being an inch tall," you say, "but here we are." You tell her your name, then crane your neck back to look up at her, and to your surprise she's looking back down at you. Your eyes meet, and she wipes the last few tears out of her dark, velvety eyes.

"Well aren't you two just cute as a button!" Fulda bellows, absolutely ruining the moment. You and Li clutch each other tighter, and Fulda continues, "And you're the size of one, too!" Fulda sits up and swings her magnificently long legs over the side, creating a deep impression in the mattress that you and Li fall into. You roll down the slope on her smooth sheets until ramming into Fulda's panties-covered buttock at full force. Li looks mortified while Fulda laughs, then looks down at the two of you. "I'll even take you somewhere for your first date!"
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Friends?

choices: Hold on.  Li looks a LOT taller now.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Fulda's sharp blue eyes are eclipsed by her titanic hand descending toward you, her fingers outstretched to pick up the handful of tiny people against her butt. When you can see every line on her palm in deep detail however she stops and delicately uses her thumb and forefinger to pluck Li up by the collar of her shirt. The shrunken woman lets out a shriek as she's lifted, her socked feet kicking wildly in the air to no avail. With her other hand Fulda gives Li a quick bat with her index finger, sending her swinging back and forth like a pendulum while she emits a high-pitched shriek.

Fulda looks down at you with a jovial grin on her face, delighting in the torment she's inflicting on her shrunken sorority sister. She engulfs your tiny body with her free hand then pinches the collar of your shirt as well, dragging you along the sheets before lifting you into the air. You refuse to give her the satisfaction of a futile struggle though, opting instead to hang limply while she raises you up beside Li.

The fiery-haired giantess holds you beside Li with her hands level once she stops swinging, demonstrating how much longer her lithe body is than yours even in this state. To her credit Li has stopped crying now, her face frozen in shock instead now that she has seen Fulda from a new angle. Fulda shakes her back and forth, eliciting a new wave of screams that are quickly drowned out by her laughter.

The two of you get lifted further into the air when Fulda stands up from her bed, sending Li back into silence with a few hysterical squeaks escaping from her throat. Fulda takes a step toward her closet, bouncing you in her grip as you hang helplessly, and your eyes are caught by her breasts bouncing under her chemise. "It's a little soon for you two to be shacking up," she booms, her voice seeming louder than it had previously. Is she shrinking you even more, or does she get more powerful the more people she shrinks? "I think you'll have a lot in common though!" Her grin does little to reassure you, and Li clutches her ears under the sonic assault.

In only a few steps she crosses the room to her closet and throws the door open, and with one more step she is inside. Below you is the house she gave you, still in disarray from when you tried to hide from her earlier. Fulda quickly squats down, causing your stomach to leap and your legs to kick into the air, then holds you and Li against each other. She lets go of her grip, setting Li down gently and letting you drop the extra distance so that you fall into her when you land.

As quickly as she squatted Fulda stands again, her imposing height dwarfing your house. Light from her bedroom silhouettes her, making her appear like an invincible titan while Li stares up at Fulda with her mouth agape. After posing for a moment Fulda bellows, "Li, you have so many cute outfits, it won't do to let you move in with your new little boyfriend in only your jammies! I'll go get you some clothes, okay?" Li answers her with silence, so Fulda proceeds, "I'll be right back! And don't try to eat him while I'm gone!" She turns and walks for the bedroom door, her heavy footfalls making earthquakes.

When Fulda is out of view you put your hand on Li's back, trying to comfort her, though she remains nearly catatonic. "Don't feel too bad. You're still a lot taller than me, right?" She doesn't respond to your attempt at levity, so you continue. "I mean, if it helps I can consider you a giantess." Slowly Li turns her head and looks down at you, her mouth curling into a weak grin, but before she can say anything the house shudders again with a series of heavy footsteps.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Moving In Together

choices: "Maybe you just need something to eat."
"Why aren't you acting like a couple?"
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
The tremors grow in intensity as the footsteps get closer until you and Li have to lean against each other to stay standing. A shadow falls over you, and the two of you look up to see Fulda's enormous form blocking the light once more. Despite her being back lit you can see the smug grin on her face while she looks down at you, huddling against each other for safety against her raw power.

Fulda extends a fist, holding it over the space where the roof should be on the house. Her clasped fingers swing open and a small bundle drops out of her palm, dropping into the house with all the grace of a rock. The bundle slams into the faux wood floor at the foot of the bed, causing you both to wince from the crash. Cautiously Li leaves your side to investigate it while you are left covering your ears.

Fortunately Fulda does not drop anything else and Li makes it over to the package without any complication. She pulls back the outer layer to find a plaid skirt underneath, and within that is a pair of white Keds with balled up black socks inside of them. It does not take much to deduce that the white cloth around them is her linen shirt. Both of you flinch when Fulda booms, "I went ahead and shrank your clothes from last night. You looked absolutely adorable in that outfit, and I think your new friend didn't mind it either." She chuckles, then adds, "Go ahead, put them on! Or were you going to stay in your pajamas all day?"

Li folds the bundle back up and looks to you. "Could I get some privacy?" she asks. "I mean, we just met, and..." She trails off, but you can hear the hint of shame in her voice. In response you simply nod and move for the stairway beside you, sure that she'll let you know when she's done.

An enormous fist slams into the stairs before you even hit the first step, the impact knocking you and Li off your feet. "And just where do you think you're going?" she bellows, turning her fist into a wall in front of you. "Trying to hide from me downstairs, is that it?"

"No, I just-" you begin to explain, but Fulda cuts you off.

"Don't you think she's attractive?" she continues. "Pretty, lean, leggy, and plenty tall - to you that is; what's not to like? Oh wait - are you gay?"

You sigh. "No, I just think it's disrespec-"

"I'm going to make you a deal," Fulda interrupts again. "Either you're going to watch her change, or I'm going to smash her into paste while you watch. Sound good?" You gulp and realize that sparing Li's modesty is pointless if she gets murdered over it, and turn from the stairs toward her. You give her a helpless look, and she understands.

Li tears off her oversized shirt, revealing her flat belly and black bra underneath, then drops it on the ground beside her. With one more motion she drops her fleece pants that covered her toned legs and black panties, then kicks them away to land at your feet. As quickly as she can she throws her new shirt on and buttons it up, then pulls up her skirt and zips it. She pulls the black socks up to her knees as swiftly as she can without tearing them, then slips on her shoes and ties them in a blur. You admit that she looks like the stereotypical Japanese school girl fantasy, and realize that she chose this outfit for a reason.

"That's it?" Fulda's rumbling voice complains. "No show? Not even a striptease for your tiny boyfriend? Nothing for me, either?" You keep practically gawking at Li, while she looks up at Fulda, annoyance plain on her face.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Tiny Schoolgirl

choices: Li lets you in on what's happening
Li encourages you in your flattery
"I appreciate it, but could you please stop?"
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Though thundering footfalls threaten to tear the house asunder you have a much more pressing issue on your mind. Li, who was previously only a head taller than you, now has her chest level with your eyes. "Um, Li?" you call out, drastically changing your tone. "I don't suppose Fulda's changed her mind and is letting you grow back so soon, has she?"

The comparatively less tiny woman looks down at you, a mysterious look on her face when her gaze falls on your smaller form. She had definitely noticed even before you said anything, "I would severely doubt it," she replies, "which only means one thing: you're getting smaller still." Something about the finality and confidence Li said that with, leaving no wiggle room for alternate explanations, makes you uneasy.

"But why?" you ask, though your question gets drowned out by the boom of Fulda's bare foot no more than three inches away from the house. Another deafening footstep follows, and you realize that you have been cast into her shadow once again. Li may be a little larger now, but it is nothing compared to the titaness currently looming over you. The house does not even come halfway up her shapely calves, and her bare legs are like monumental towers all the way up to her yellow lace panties. She peeks over the sizable mound of her breasts under her white chemise at you and squats down, pushing her knee out to where the ceiling should be.

"I don't know what you losers are talking about," Fulda bellows while she lowers her hand into the middle of the room, "but I also don't care." She opens her hand, pushing your new bed and nightstand along the wall, and deposits a small bundle of clothing in the middle of the floor. "I'll be back in a few minutes, and when I do I expect you to be dressed like an adorable schoolgirl, got it?" With that Fulda stands and leaves, allowing light to fill the house the house once again. Li continues watching her, mouth open in shock, until she turns the corner.

Fulda's footsteps recede and become less domineering, and you turn to Li. She pulls off her large shirt and quickly slips on the white shirt dropped in by Fulda, and you remark, "Don't worry, I don't think she'll hurt you. You're her friend, after all." Li ignores you and continues changing, pulling the skirt up her legs and tightening her socks. "And it's not like anything can really hurt a giantess like you." She pauses at that remark in the middle of tying a shoe. You can't tell, but her grin makes you think she isn't annoyed at least. However you do feel a bit lightheaded, and everything looks like it might be a little... off.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Dwindling in the Dollhouse

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Before your shout even finishes Li's fingers clamp around you, covering your mouth with her fingertip so that you can make no more noise. She holds you firmly between her digits and lifts you off of Fulda's cheek while you flail with your arms and legs to futilely try to escape. Sadistically she squeezes her fingers together, breaking your two bottom ribs, and you scream soundlessly into your fleshy gag.

Your ascent is slow so that Li can maintain absolute silence, allowing pain to radiate from your broken bones the whole time. You struggle and manage to free enough of your mouth so that you can breathe, but the pressure on your abdomen keeps you from inhaling more than brief gasps. Struggling becomes too painful and exhausting to try anymore, and you resign yourself to what is about to happen.

Agony shoots through your body when Li changes her grip, allowing you to finally see past her fingers. Before you is a massive, dark iris, about half your size, with a pupil only a few shades darker inside it. She blinks, her eyelashes tickling you as they run down then up your body, then you're slowly lifted away from the enormous eye.

Li tilts her head back to follow your ascent until she has you centered over her mouth. The tip of her tongue slides out and flirtatiously runs along her top lip, moistening it with her saliva. She opens her mouth, revealing the gaping, tooth-lined cavern before you, and winks. Without saying a word she opens her fingers, dropping you from her grip and down into the waiting maw.

You fly between her lips easily, having been directly centered above them, and miss her teeth as well. The instant you enter her lips snap shut, plunging you into darkness for your last moments, and you begin sliding down the length of her tongue. Li bucks it at the last moment and throws you up against her palate before you continue your way down, coming to rest on her gullet. Before you can even move the muscle opens, dropping you into her esophagus to be ferried down into her stomach.

You are unceremoniously dropped into the pool of her stomach acid, causing your skin to burn upon contact. Weakly you swim toward a wall and begin pushing, unable to see if your efforts are even dimpling her stomach. Li feels your struggle and grins before turning to leave the room, allowing Fulda to continue sleeping while you slowly get broken down in her digestive system.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Early Snack

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
As if drawn by the sound of the glass hitting the counter top two other women come stand next to Fulda, each with their own glass and shrunken man in hand. To her right you recognize Mariam, the blond who had recently helped get you out of a jam, and on the other side is an unfamiliar but powerfully built brunette with a very wide mouth. She looks at both of them and slaps her hand on the counter, indicating for them to set down what they're holding.

They set their glasses down rim to rim with Fulda's, then drop their men in front of them. Slowly they get up from their rough landings and look around, their minds most likely agog to see the world at this scale. Both of them appear terrified and confused, and were it not for the open counter top with nothing to hide behind they would probably try to escape. You do your best to remain calm, trying to present a good example for the two newcomers.

"Mariam, where did you already get another?" Fulda asks, looking down at the blond. "Your last one got smashed, like, ten minutes ago."

"Oh, uh, I got it from Helen," she replies, closing her emerald eyes while she thinks. "She had a cage full of them, so I offered her five bucks for one. I hope that's okay!" Apparently your life has a monetary value now, and it's no more than five dollars.

"No, it's fine," Fulda says, hefting the gigantic bottle with her right hand. She tips it spout down, allowing the clear liquor to rush out into their shot glasses, filling each one in turn. The smell from the alcohol burns your nostrils, and you can tell that it's vodka, probably fairly high-quality too. Fulda slide's each woman's shot glass back to its owner, the grinding of glass against the tile cutting into your ears.

Fulda takes a second to address you and the other shrunken men on the counter. "Don't move. I'm serious." She then picks up her glass and waits for the other two to follow her lead. You don't move a muscle, standing perfectly straight while they go about their ritual. Though you're not sure what will happen if you do, you decide not to risk it.

Once the other two have lifted their glasses they pound them back onto the tile, making a piercing crash that echoes throughout the kitchen. In one swift movement they raise the alcohol to their lips and tip the shots back, causing enough liquid for you to swim in to rush into their mouths. In an instant Fulda has finished hers, and she turns her glass upside down so that she can hold it above your head.

She brings it down atop you, trapping you inside the upturned glass. The resulting cacophony overwhelms your ears, and your vision swims with stars from the concussive force of the impact. Inside the glass the scent of alcohol overwhelms you, causing your eyes to water and your nose to run. Not that there's much to see anyway. Due to the frosted walls of the shot glass the only thing you'd be able to see are the fuzzy outlines of the giantesses, and possibly some of the residual alcohol.

While you're still reeling the glass begins to move, pushing you along with it. You're moved along the counter top in a broad curve, the loud click each time the glass passes over a space between the tiles echoing within the glass. Suddenly the direction reverses, throwing you up against the opposite wall until you drop back down to the tile. Your glass passes over the trail left by the others, making you sure the others are going through the same thing. Briefly your glass stops, only to resume moving mere moments later, forcing you along the ground, practically dragged along by the shot glass.

Finally the glass stops for good, throwing you against the opposite wall one last time, though your body still feels like it's moving. When you land you remain on the floor, thankful for even a momentary break that you know won't last. Your suspicions are confirmed when a finger sets down heavily on the base of the glass, making the glass click against the tile. The hand tilts the glass back, lifting the rim slightly off the ground before tearing your roof away entirely. You look up from your prone position to see which giantess it is who revealed you - and likely gets to keep you.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Shell Game

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Several times you jump as high as you can, arms outstretched hoping to grasp a loose strand of Fulda's dress at your apex. Each time you hop up though you come short, her towering heels more than enough to put her butt out of your reach. Undeterred you persist in trying to grab on, your desire to be twerked far outweighing your fear of what will happen if you don't.

The ceiling above you quivers, making Fulda's butt cheeks jiggle from the slight movement. You stop jumping and decide to wait further instructions from her, sure that she must have changed her mind now. Fulda's butt shakes again and one of her arms shoots up into the air, followed by her letting out a short, surprised scream. A tremendous scraping sound assaults your ears, and your head snaps toward the cacophony to see her heel shooting out from under her.

Before you can react she falls, dropping her butt down atop you. The instant it makes contact you're pulverized beneath a buttock, your tiny body smashed into a puddle beneath her gigantic ass. Fulda bursts out laughing at your accidental demise before standing, and the other giantesses crowd around to snap pictures of your remarkably small stain on her posterior.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: The Butt Falls

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
"Fulda, it's the last party of the year. You remember what that means, right?" Allison asks from across the ottoman.

"Oh, right," Fulda says with a nervous smile. "Sorry little guy, but you have to fight the next smallest person here now. All the pledges this year were well over the height requirement, so it's Olga again. Wave hi Olga!" The blond looks over from pulling the metal splinter out of her hand to peer down at you and smiles, then gives a quick wave. Oof, talk about an unlucky coincidence.

Fulda plucks you up from the footrest, cradling you between two of her fingers. All you want at this point is a place to lie down and rest, or just be left alone for a few minutes so you can get some energy back, and now they want you to fight a giantess. The ground whizzes by under you as Fulda carries you several feet to your new arena, accompanied by the other spectators.

The fiery-haired titaness gently sets you down atop the carpet and the others fan out, forming a square arena with their feet. Beside you a sewing needle pierces the carpet and you quickly take it in hand, feeling that you'll need it no matter how futile your efforts. "Again, I'm really sorry about this," Fulda says. "You should've come to our Spring Break party!"

Olga takes a step forward from the other giantesses and smiles, her pearly white teeth gleaming. She takes exaggerated, stomping strides, each footfall shaking the ground beneath you. Her white canvas shoes complement her black hose and skirt, and her tight red long-sleeved shirt nicely shows off her figure even under a black vest. "Where are you, oh mighty champion?" she asks, whipping her blond ponytail back and forth as she feigns searching for you. Gray eyes lock onto you and she adds, "Oh, there you are!" She spreads her feet shoulder-width apart and sets her hands on her hips, a smile still gleaming.

"Okay, you just need to hit her hard enough to make her wince," Fulda explains, and you cradle your improvised spear. "No one else can intervene as long as you stay in the arena. The fight ends when either you're dead, or Olga flinches from pain." Wow, these stakes are uneven. "Good luck down there! And... fight!"
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: One More Round

choices: This is just a cunning ruse
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
With the fight started you cautiously advance towards Olga, ready to bolt out of the way should she make a move. For her part she simply watches you approach, amused by the slight trouble you have traversing the carpet. She opens her mouth and her voice booms "Fee fi fo fum-"

"Ugh, she's doing it again."

"I smell the blood of a champion. A victory for him's a must, or else I'll grind him into dust." When she finishes her taunting Olga steps toward you, closing the gap much more quickly than you would on your own. Her steps are clumsy you notice, with much more force slammed into the floor than necessary with each. It could merely be another of her intimidation tactics, but you hope it's the alcohol starting to have an effect.

A third stride brings Olga within striking range and you stop moving forward, electing instead to raise your sewing needle upward. She suddenly changes her gait's pace, quickly bringing her foot forward while barely off the ground and moving it directly towards you. Reflexively you jump out of the way and barely avoid being stepped on, though you lean against her shoe to keep from falling down.

White canvas in front, you look behind you to plan your escape. Before you can push off your present barrier Olga begins sliding her foot forward, dragging the toe of her shoe along the top of the carpet. You watch it bounce off the floor during its approach, and while it's still moving slowly prepare your evasion. She pitches her shoe up and slams it forward, while at the same time you run along the front of the shoe blocking you. Your plan works, and she ends up only stepping on her own shoe.

Now on the opposite side you feel the tables have turned. You plunge your needle into the white canvas, expecting to hear her yelp in pain, but instead you face no resistance once you're past the material. Damn, you hit the very tip of her shoe and ended up doing nothing at all! Desperately you step against the side of her shoe and try to yank your needle out.

Your stab may not have harmed Olga, but she did notice it. From above you hear "Bye bye!" and you put all your strength into one last pull. The needle slides out right when she lifts her foot so it can dart a half-inch over and crush you. Fortunately the inertia sends you backpedaling and you soundly avoid her stomp.

Unexpectedly Olga stumbles sideways, her long legs working against her for once. She staggers uncontrollably toward the side of the ring, looking like she'll bowl over Mariam. Just before she hits Mariam roughly shoves her away, tossing her backward. Olga falls over her heels and splays out on the floor, sending strong tremors through it.

Once you weather the shaking you focus on Olga, and realize you'll not get a better opportunity to win this. Her bare hand landed half a foot away, and she's rather slow getting up from her spill. With one charge you can come out the victor.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Attack on Titaness

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
You charge the fallen giantess while she's prone, sure you can break her skin with the needle and truly be the champion this time. Her thumb close you raise the spear and prepare to drive it down with all your might. When the tip is just above her knuckle you close your eyes and stab it down, throwing what little you have left into this.

No yelp follows, no tug from her flinching, not even the feeling of your spear breaking skin. Instead you drive the sewing needle deep into the carpet, piercing a fiber straight in the middle and penetrating down to the bottom layer. Olga sets her hand back down beside her and begins pushing herself up, laughing at how easily you fell for her trick.

Frantically you pull at the needle to get it free, sliding your hands into the eye for a better grip. No matter how hard you tug it doesn't budge from its spot, driven too deeply down for someone with your meager strength to remove on their own. A thud rumbles behind you as Olga steps forward, then one comes in front from her other foot, trapping you under her while she stands astride you.

If you lose the spear you have no chance, so you have no choice but to keep pulling at it. Olga makes the same assessment and bends down slowly, her hand carefully sneaking toward you. She pinches you between her thumb and forefinger and lifts you from the ground, pulling your needle out with it! Before you can celebrate she holds it in place with her other hand and slightly pulls you upward, forcing you to break your grip.

Olga continues the slow rate of your ascent, relishing her complete domination over you. Not only is she much stronger than you, she had outwitted you too. When you pass her waist she lifts you even slower, allowing you to observe her well-toned and developed body. Far above you see jubilation in her eyes.

Finally she comes to a stop with you just above her chest, allowing her to look down at you. "Well, what do we have here?" she says, her voice making your ears ring. "Some tiny foolish man who thought he could slay a titaness? Your arrogance has earned you naught but death, hero, and I'm glad to give it to you."

"What a nerd."

"At least she's getting into the role."

Olga ignores the peanut gallery and focuses on you, her lips set in concentration. "But how should I finish you off, hm?"
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Trickery!

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Olga begins lifting you higher yet until you're level with her face, where she holds you still for the moment. She pushes her red lips together, drawing your attention to her mouth, then puckers them outward toward you. One of her gigantic gray eyes winks downward at you, and you get a sense of where this is going.

Her other hand approaches from the side, fingers outstretched, and threatens to engulf you entirely. You try to flinch away instinctively but there's no way you can escape Olga's grip, and even if you could where would you go? Instead of wrapping around you her fingers delicately grab the collar of your shirt and she releases her grip around your chest, batting you playfully with her finger before lowering it.

While you swing back and forth like a pendulum Olga lifts you further into the air, holding you above her head. As you look down at the vast field of blond hair she tilts her head back until it's nearly horizontal. She parts her lips and opens her mouth wide, revealing her pearly whites again, but with much more malicious intent this time.

Your swinging slows down as you dangle helplessly above her open mouth, able to do little more than dread what's coming. Her tongue extends to moisten her lips, giving you a silent promise of your fate. Once you stop swinging entirely Olga's fingers let go, and you rapidly drop toward her maw.

To your surprise you don't fall straight into her mouth. Just when your legs pass her lips she closes them around you, stopping your descent at your armpits. A powerful tentacle slams into your legs, knocking them up, then hits the again on the return. Olga's tongue slowly circles you until it comes to a rest behind your lower half.

You press on her lips to try to extract yourself but Olga tightens them in response, forming a seal around you. Suction pulls you downward and you do your best to stay out of her mouth, but it's a losing battle. After only a few seconds your arms slide between her lips and you're sucked into her maw, where you slam against the hard ridges on the roof of her mouth. Her tongue tenses and tosses you onto her gullet, and a river of saliva ushers you down her esophagus.

Olga's throat muscles force you down to her stomach, dropping you into a dank chamber full of stagnant air. You land with a splash in a pool of hydrochloric acid, burning the skin all over your body. It's over now, you tell yourself. There's no escape. The air inside Olga's stomach is thin and musty, and if you don't drown first you'll suffocate before you pass her duodenum. Finally you can get some rest before Olga digests you.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: The Taste of Victory

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Olga lifts her other hand up to you, index finger extended. She rests it atop your head then runs it down the length of your body, tapping your feet, then runs it back up, the whole process giving you chills. A low rumble emits from her throat as she laughs sinisterly, then she curls her finger to her thumb. "Let's say we end this fight the same way we started, hm?"

Before you can blink Olga's finger shoots forward again, slamming into your chest the same time she opens her grip. The impact sends you flying across the arena, the ceiling and faces blurs as you speed past them. As soon as you realize what's happening you crash into something, spared now only because of how ample and soft it is. Fulda's breasts have, for now, saved your life.

The skin pushes back when your forward momentum stops, and you're forced back into the open air. You fall rapidly toward the ground with a slight arc away from her, dropping you onto the carpet. Soft fibers give under your impact, cushioning your landing and keeping you intact - again, for the time being. A booming footfall lets you know Olga is coming, and you scramble to your feet.

Loud thuds inform you of Olga's pace, her feet inexorably moving forward. As she approaches you turn to desperate measures, spinning around to face Fulda. Her enormous feet, given a light sheen by her stockings, stand immovable before you, the only thing that can shield you from Olga. You can feel her eyes on you, and decide to try it anyway.

You run to the side of Fulda's feet, hoping to get past her toes before Olga gets within stomping distance. Fulda slides her foot to block your path and lifts her heel slightly, digging her big toe into the carpet before you. You're unable to stop yourself, and with a swift twitch Fulda's toe bursts from the carpet, striking your legs and lifting you into the air.

Your short arc carries you back into Olga's path, and you land much nearer to her. One of her canvas shoes sets down beside you, followed by the second on the other side. For a moment Olga stands astride you, looking down in silent mockery and relishing her victory. As you look up at her stockings in despair, unable to look her in the face, you tell yourself that mistakenly believing Fulda would save you didn't cost you anything: you were dead the moment you stepped in the ring.

Without a word Olga lifts up her right foot, holding her thigh level while she aims her step. Slowly at first she brings it toward you, allowing tension to build, or maybe expecting you to run. Suddenly her leg shoots downward and her foot connects, smashing you into a carpet stain instantly. For good measure she raises her heel and grinds the ball of her foot into you, pulverizing your flattened remains. Then she walks off to get another drink.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: A Smashing Success

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Olga rotates her hand and forearm, bringing her palm up to let your feet rest in the center. When your toes touch down she releases the fingers pinched around you, allowing you to drop and land on her soft flesh. Her fingers remain curled behind you and she keeps her gaze upon you, her intentions inscrutable behind her face.

You look around for anything that could inspire hope. Before you, grinning placidly, is Olga, the beautiful titaness who quite literally has you in the palm of her hand. If you tried to climb on this living mountain you don't expect you'd make it very far; she is, after all, in total control. Around you, if you could make it to the floor, are five other women, each larger than Olga, who would crush you with glee if she didn't.

The platform you're on lifts you much closer to Olga's face, holding you less than an inch from her eye. An enormous gray iris fills your vision, and you can do nothing but stand in awe. She blinks, causing her eyelashes to tickle any exposed skin, and you flinch away. In response she giggles, making the platform you're on rapidly shake, then lowers you slightly.

She stops you at her chin, allowing you to take in the majesty of her masterfully chiseled features. "Oh, you little hero," she says, placing a finger from her unoccupied hand in front of you. She deliberately circles it around you while she continues, "We didn't have to fight, you know. Us titanesses and you tiny men can live in peace together. We all know you admire our beauty, strength, and intelligence."

Playfully she pokes you with her finger, then sets it back down before you. "That must be why you come to us, season after season, already small to be made smaller so that you can better bask in our majesty. Why, then, do you always scream, and try to fight back or escape?" She pokes you again, harder this time and pushing you backward. "None of us want to step on you, smash you flat, eat you, or grind you into the carpet. If you want, you can be the first to repent and live peacefully at our feet."

You open your mouth to reply but Olga's voice booms forth, scrambling the words before they come out. "Ha! Gotcha!" She strikes you with her finger again, much harder, sending you stumbling backwards onto her fingers. They immediately snap shut, throwing you against her palm. Her fingers squeeze you tightly, and your bones crack under the pressure. Olga squeezes her hand and your body collapses, crushed in her grip.

She regards your remains, little more than a small pool of blood in her palm, and smiles. That live in peace speech was really something, she tells herself, then she wipes her hand off on her shirt. Smashing tiny people always made her parched.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: A Crushing Victory

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
While you stand there silently, basking in some measure of adoration from Fulda while she towers over you, a momentary calm comes over you. The other giantesses have stopped their grumbling and accepted that, through all their interference, you managed to survive through the end of the tournament. Now all you have to do is wait for Fulda to pick you up and take you away from the makeshift arena.

A low growl rumbles from your right, and Li shoots up from where she's seated. "You little shit!" she yells down at you, flecks of spittle landing around you. "I'll fucking kill you!" She raises a hand high above her head and begins swinging it downward, the center of her palm aimed dead center at you. It's moving too fast for you to get out of the way in time, and you brace for this last blow to finish you off.

There's a tremendous slapping sound, but to your surprise you aren't flattened by her hand. You look up and see that Fulda has grabbed hold of her wrist, again stopping her from killing you. "Let it go, Li," she says, tightening her grip. "He won fair and square, now quit trying to kill him and go back to the party."

Li struggles to get her wrist free, but Fulda holds fast. "No way, that little fucker stabbed me twice!" she bellows in protest. "None of them has ever managed to hurt one of us, I need to put it in its place!" She starts to swing her other arm but Fulda shoves her, pushing her away from the ottoman.

"Then you shouldn't have tried to kill him when he had a weapon," she explains through gritted teeth. "He got away from Olga too, but do you see her clamoring to crush him after the fact?" You briefly turn your head away from the spectacle and watch Olga down a shot, then look back to the struggle. "Now do yourself a favor and walk away."

Li's face turns red and she shouts, "No, fuck him and fuck you too!" She raises a foot and swings it wildly in your direction, but Fulda firmly tugs back on her, pulling her even further away and lifting her off the ground. For a moment she sputters incoherently while thrashing to get free of Fulda's grip, set on finishing you off. Fulda narrows her eyes, clearly fed up with Li.

While you watch the spectacle you can't help but be struck by how much Fulda towers even over another giantess. Li, no doubt thousands of times your size, looks absolutely pathetic being held up by her, the tips of her feet only dangling down to Fulda's knees. You watch entranced while Li fruitlessly struggles to get out of Fulda's trip, her kicks bouncing off her thighs as if they were made of stone.

Wait, that doesn't seem right. You focus on the big picture again, and see that Fulda looks even more enormous holding Li, at least twice her size. Unbelievable - Fulda is shrinking her! Li's incoherent screaming gradually gets more high-pitched and directed at her, and you expect that even people her size can't understand a word she's saying.

Li continues to dwindle into Fulda's grasp while the other giantesses merely watch, either out of bemusement or shock at what's happening. When she's about a foot tall she changers her tune and begins yelling more legibly, pleading for Fulda to stop. Unsurprisingly she doesn't, and the Asian woman continues to shrink until she disappears into Fulda's hand.

Fulda spreads her fingers, revealing Li standing in the middle of her palm, only about an inch tall. She looks between you and her shrunken sorority sister, considering what to do with the woman in her hand. Li falls down to her knees, no doubt begging Fulda to give back her size, but from what you can see her voice falls on deaf ears.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Final Strike

choices: You manage to last long enough
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
"If you really want to kill him so much, you'll have to do it on equal terms," Fulda tells Li, still trembling with rage in her hand. "From the start of the fight you have three minutes to knock him out or kill him. If you win, you get your size back. If you lose, well..." She looks at the now faint stain from the tournament's first loser before continuing. "You know what happens."

Fulda lowers Li down to the ottoman and sets her hand down in front of you, allowing her to step off from the platform-sized palm. Now able to look at all of her you see that she fully went for the schoolgirl aesthetic: white Keds with black knee-high socks and a plaid, pleated skirt with a white button-up shirt, the top two buttons left undone, and her straight black hair in a bob. You doubt it was difficult for her to entice a victim earlier tonight.

Once Fulda pulls her hand away and takes her seat again Li walks toward the center until she's practically on top of you, and you find yourself craning your neck back to look her in the eyes. She may have been shrunk but she's still at least a head taller than you, the most significant fraction of an inch height difference you've ever seen. Knowing that she's going to outrange and outpace you, you wish you hadn't left your sword in Olga's finger.

Li smiles down at you, though her face is still red from shouting her lungs out, and the alcohol probably hasn't helped. "I have a black belt in three different martial arts, swim competitively, and have more than a few tricks up my sleeve. Looks like the only thing you've ever competed in is Halo." She scoffs and continues staring you down. "Good luck."

"Get ready!" Fulda declares, and Li takes a step back. Your sensibilities about hitting women have to take a back seat now. This is for your survival, and it's abundantly clear that if left unopposed Li will run roughshod over you in a matter of seconds. She drops down into a fighting stance and you raise your hands to your face. "Fight!"
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Another Challenger

choices: "Okay, but I'm growing him with you."
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
The instant Fulda says the word Li goes on the offensive, kicking you in the chest as hard as she can. You're knocked stumbling backwards, and before you can even steady yourself she bolts forward, swinging her opened hands inward to meet on both sides of your head. Your vision blurs from the simultaneous temple strikes and your knees give out, dropping you at once to the floor.

You don't feel capable of doing anything but curling up into a ball, which Li takes full advantage of. She rears back and kicks you in the kidney with the tip of her shoe, shocking you out of your reflexive defense and opening you up. Now that you're exposed she kicks you again, this time in the ribs, making you squirm from the shock of pain.

There's a slight reprieve as Li decides not to beat you bloody in the first thirty seconds, electing instead to walk around to your feet. She extends a hand down to you and says, "Come on, get up. This is boring." Simply glad to not be kicked for a bit you take her offer, her long fingers easily wrapping around your hand, and she pulls you to your feet.

A feeling of deja vu overcomes you when you get back up and slam face first into Li's stomach, reminding you of that morning. You try to step back in surprise but she keeps her grip strong, holding you tight against her. She strikes you in the gut with her knee and simultaneously lifts your arm up, keeping you from bending over. Her knee slams into you again and your heels lift off the ground, pulled upward by her iron hold. One last knee to the gut and your feet leave the ground entirely, dangling several inches above hers.

Li plants her other hand on your back and spins, throwing you as hard as she can. You fly through the air and come down hard, bouncing when you land and rolling several more feet. Through the pain you force yourself to stand, not willing to give up just yet. Calmly Li walks toward you, not seeing to be in any sort of hurry.

You sense her overconfidence and charge at her, thinking you can tie her up and run down the clock some more. As you approach it becomes apparent how bad of an idea this is. At present you stand just short of her waist, and her confidence is well-founded. Still, you've already committed, and you leap at her, hoping your blitz might be able to take her by surprise.

It doesn't. Once you commit to a pounce she simply extends a hand, planting it on your head and stopping your forward movement. She shoves back and your legs swing forward, your body turning in the air with your head as a pivot. Before you know what's happening your back's on the ground, with dull pressure on your chest from Li planting her shoe atop you.

"My, you're small," she says, firmly holding you down. She lifts the front of her shoe and sets it back down, and you feel it expand. "And look, you're getting smaller." Again she taps her foot, and more of you slides under her shoe. "Oops," she teases. Another tap and you watch her stretch higher, growing even more powerful than you. "I just keep doing it." Between every word she briefly pauses and taps you. Li allows a dramatic pause to let the reality of your situation set in, then taps her foot again. "I wonder just how small you can get." Again she taps with every word, with extra emphasis on "small."

In the space of a few seconds Li took away what must have been over half of what little height you had left, her shoe now covering half your body. Surprisingly her shoe doesn't feel any heavier, just larger, and you surmise she must not be pressing down. Her shoe lifts up and sets down atop you again, growing a bit more dramatically this time. If this goes on much longer, you realize, you'll fit entirely under her shoe.

Your thoughts are disrupted by yet another tap, the force ringing throughout your body. It doesn't matter that she isn't pressing down, these are starting to hurt just from repetition. Another tap and you get smaller again, with just barely more than your head and feet sticking out from under her shoe. If she wanted to crush you, you realize she could simply press down now and flatten most of you. Her persistent tapping means she must have another plan.

Another tap, and yet more of your height slips away. You can't believe this is happening - first Fulda shrinks you to an inch, then she shrinks Li too, and now she's shrinking you even more! As if to reinforce your thoughts the toe of her shoe slams into most of the length of your body again, reducing you even more. Li's tormenting question resonates - just how small CAN you get?

Her foot lifts up and then sets back down again, making you just a little bit smaller. You push up with your hands, trying to free yourself from under her foot, but even without any weight pushing down it's too much for you to move. Li giggles at your attempt and lightly taps you again, causing your eyes to slide beneath the tip of her shoe. If you don't move soon she very well may shrink you down to nothing.

You make another effort to push her foot off, putting all of the force you can manage behind it, but you can barely even budge it. Li must have felt your minute effort and responds in kind, increasing the tempo of her imaginary song. One tap, two, and your entire body fits underneath her shoe with room to spare. Another and you reduce even more, on a fast track to nothing. One more tap and you dwindle more. There really doesn't seem to be a limit.

Li taps you again, and you resolve that it will be the last. Her hold on you has become loose, and you roll sideways to get out from under her foot pressing down. You escape just before she presses it down again, your rapidly reducing body no longer there to hold it up. Quickly you get back up, your body numb from being tapped so much, and put up your dukes.

She bursts out laughing, and you understand why at once. You don't even reach halfway up to her knees. On either side her black socks stretch upward like columns before giving way to flesh, which then leads into a skirt large enough to be a tent. Li continues laughing down at you, taking on a malicious tone, as you still stand ready for a fight.

You may not even be a foot tall compared to her, but you don't have to take this. With a yell you run at her ankle, leaping up to grab on to her sock. Unfortunately she counters you with a quick flick of her foot, knocking you back down. Fortunately she doesn't place you back under her shoe. Instead she reaches down and grabs you by the chest with one hand, her fingers sliding around your limbs.

Effortlessly she lifts you up and holds you in front of her face so that she can look you over like an action figure. Her smooth features and soft eyes make her exceedingly beautiful, especially at this scale - a shame that she's so cruel. She giggles again and raises her other hand, setting it against the one you're in, index finger poised for many rapid hits.

"Go ahead then," you say, admitting defeat. "Make me small so that you can eat me. Just get it over with."

Li lets out a splitting cackle, and begins tapping away. "No, I don't want to eat you anymore," she explains through a dozen quick pokes from her finger. Her grip adjusts around you as you shrink into her hand, with her grabbing you around the legs. "See, you're mine now, and you're much stronger than my last loser." A dozen more taps assault you, and Li resorts to holding you between two fingers. "I can have a lot more fun with you." A smile spreads across her face, becoming wider than you are with another barrage of taps.

She holds you in front of her mouth, letting you linger for a moment. Teasingly she licks her lips and moves you toward them, then abruptly stops. Her fingers around you release, dropping you to slide down the length of her body. Surprisingly you land lightly enough on the leather to be intact, but that's the best that can be said.

Li is now even larger to you than she was before, her body stretching for what seems like miles. You look past her head and see something even more daunting. An enormous icy blue eye on a scale you can scarcely comprehend fills the sky, a pupil large enough to fit a house in the middle. The leather under you depresses and you look to find the source, followed by your heart sinking.

Half a mile away is a thumb larger than any building you've ever seen, each minute whorl in the fingerprint or irregularity in skin pattern plainly visible. You follow the thumb to a colossal hand and then up an arm, miles long to the crook in the elbow, and longer yet to the shoulder. A torrential downpour of red hair bursts over a dress strap. It's a person, so large you can barely recognize them, and more than that it's Fulda. And you thought she was big before.

A deep rumble overtakes you, followed by a warm breeze. Li bends down to pick you up, still shocked by how enormous every single thing is compared to you now, making you an easy target. She slides a shoe off and carries you over the top, then drops you in. You land on the insole with a soft bounce, the walls of your new shelter several times your height. It finally sinks in: you're less than an inch to an inch. Not even a third of a millimeter.

The rumble, it occurs, was Fulda announcing one minute left. Li's toes appear above the shoe and start sliding in, and you run the length of the insole, just staying ahead of them. She moves them fast enough to keep the pressure on, but not enough to crush you. When you reach the toe they ram up against you, holding you in place. You hadn't even been out of Fulda's shoes for 30 minutes.

"Okay, he's stuck in my shoe," Li shouts up to Fulda, "he's defeated. Will you make me big again? Please?" A deep thunder rolls over you, possibly laughter, followed by another series of rumbles. It's not until whatever Fulda said starts to take effect that your brain can really piece together what her answer was.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Back into a Shoe

choices: Get on top of her foot
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
A familiar feeling hits you when Li starts walking, the rhythm of motion from inside someone's shoe still fresh in your memory. On the plus side she isn't wearing high heels, so her toe isn't threatening to shatter your back every time she sets her foot down. You resign yourself to this uncomfortable an humiliating situation, reassured that not only will you probably make it out alive, Li has to be small too.

You're thrown against the front of the shoe and away from her toes, for once held in place by gravity than being wedged against a foot. The space is still fairly cramped though, and you press yourself against the shoe's inside, trying to get some distance away from the enormous toes. It's only a matter of time before she hops down from whatever she's dangling her legs from anyway, and you want to be prepared for it.

As you watch the toes grow larger, expanding before your very eyes. You expect to be crushed by them momentarily but to your surprise they don't come any closer; if anything, the space between you and them is getting larger, too. Li's toes continue to grow, along with the rest of her you expect, pushing the boundaries of what you could have ever imagined.

Just when you think they will never stop growing they finally stabilize, and you remember the quaint time a mere few seconds ago that you thought they were enormous. Li's big toe alone absolutely dwarfs you, to the point where you could spend all day climbing it before you reached the top. Her socks grew with her as well, and what was previously a fine black weave now looks like a rough net, with threads wider than you and spaces large enough you could easily climb through.

At some point during her growth Li's feet touched back on the ground, setting you down on the insole. The pattern, barely visible to the naked eye previously, now forms tall walls around you that you'll have to scale if you want to get anywhere. You're glad that at least her toe isn't directly over you, allowing you to appreciate that you at least have some room to move around.

Your appreciation for this only lasts until Li takes her first step. Her foot lifts off the ground with enough intensity to knock you off your feet and press you down into the padded insole. The sensation only lasts a moment, then you're thrown into the air, flying well clear of the pattern atop the insole and drifting toward her toes. When she brings her foot down the top of her shoe hits you in the back, throwing you back down to the floor. Vibrations shake you when she sets her foot back down on the ground and the thunder from her footfall bounces around inside your chamber, echoing for a short time. Thankfully you didn't end up under her toe, but you may be small enough that even getting incidentally crushed is a low risk.

The shaking subsides and you remind yourself that was just one step.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Roomy in This Shoe

choices: Fulda puts you on her shoulder
Fulda places you on her lip
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Li groans and the pressure on your back relents as she pulls her foot back out, allowing you to drop onto the insole. She upturns her shoe, tilting it forty five degrees and sending you rolling down the whole length until you're stopped by her heel. The look on her face does not appear pleased, and she sets her hand across the hole. With one motion she turns it upside down, spilling you into her palm, then she pulls the shoe away and closes her fingers around you.

You're no stranger to being carried in a hand by now, but it seems as though Li is even less careful with you than Fulda was. She holds her fist loosely, allowing you to bounce around within her palm, and the constant turmoil scatters your concentration. Mercifully the ride is short and Li releases her grip on you, leaving you laying in the center of her hand.

"I thought you would be mine," she says, her face dangerously close. Past her head you can see that the sky is still filled with one of Fulda's blue eyes, the light slightly distorted by a magnifying glass. "If I didn't think she'd smash me for it I'd eat you right now." She licks her lips and winks, then starts moving you away from her. "I might be seeing you later... if you're lucky."

Li sets her palm against the highest part of the fingertip on Fulda's middle finger, then turns her hand sideways. You slide down and land softly atop the ridge of one of her whorls amid a landscape of trenches about five feet deep colored peach hundreds of feet in all directions. Cautiously Li backs away and Fulda flicks her finger inward, catapulting you onto her palm.

Even if you wanted to stand up right now, you couldn't. Fulda is simultaneously lifting her hand and standing back up, with the reactive forces from this pushing down and practically pinning you in the middle of her palm. Around you the world whirs by, but now instead of being disoriented by this it feels more like looking out the window of an airplane.

Your platform rushes upward toward Fulda's face, and as you get closer you realize you hadn't considered how different she would appear now. Previously her face was the size of a billboard model's and just as striking, and you could take it all in at once. Now it's over a mile tall, and her lips alone would be a trek to walk over. Your eyes shift between her facial features, and it takes a moment to fully understand that this is what faces look like for you now.

Fulda's eyes dart back and forth, scanning the surface of her palm for you. When they light upon you they widen and her lips curl upward into a smile, revealing an indomitable white wall behind them. A low rumble hits you while her lips move, and you're buffeted by a hot breeze. "There you are!" she exclaims, presumably in a whisper.

Your ears have by now mostly adjusted to the immense size difference between you and everyone else. Though their voices mostly sound like booming thunder and the vibrations shake your bones you are at least able to understand what they're saying. "I was worried I'd lost you," Fulda continues. "Mmm. You're the smallest I've ever seen. I'll have to thank Li for doing this."

As if on cue a waterfall of black hair rises past Fulda's palm, the red-haired giantess keeping her word. Li finishes growing back to her original height and looks down, scanning Fulda's palm. "Where is he?" she asks impatiently. A peach-colored building sets down beside you, curved outward in such a - oh, it's her fingertip. "Oh my God he's so tiny!" she says, her voice crackling with excitement. Fulda pulls her finger away and both titanesses lock eyes on you while you remain frozen, aware that running won't help you anymore.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Planet Fulda

choices: They begin to drunkenly make out
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Though you thought Fulda was moving her finger away she was in truth just repositioning it, moving it several thousand feet away from you. The two pairs of humongous eyes silently watch you, their pupils in the dim room large enough to devour you if they could slip you past the cornea. Finally Li speaks, her booming voice nearly blowing out your eardrums. "I'm glad you like it. I'm going to go get another one, seeya sky-high!" With that she turns, her straight black hair whirling up and knocking you over from the minute amount of wind produced by it.

With her gone Fulda moves her finger back in, the whorls of her fingerprint creating a looping pattern in the sky above you. Gently she lowers it down and taps you with it, wedging you in between two of the deep, fleshy trenches on the bottom of her fingertip. Your vision dims as the blood rushes out of your head while she raises her hand. Fulda's face goes from monumental to terrifyingly huge as you race towards it, each individual feature larger than any building you had ever seen before. Now the pores of her skin, flawless even at your previous size, could house you quite comfortably.

Fulda's finger heads for her mouth, and you accept that at least you are not going to have to live at this size for much longer. Instead of sticking you inside however she diverts you toward her bottom lip, the broad, soft pink surface ample enough to accommodate a village for you. She taps her finger on her lip and the sticky gloss seizes you, holding you fast to the sensitive skin. Her lips spread in a grin, revealing the white wall of teeth above you and pulling the skin under you tight. Before her smile settles it feels like your limbs are going to be torn off as the skin stretches in each direction, and you remain in agony until her smile fades.

When her lips return to normal you are able to turn yourself over on her soft lip, though you quickly get caught in her lip gloss again. Much to your surprise when everything is at a distance the world is not absolutely terrifying, and for a brief moment you actually feel tall! You look down and see Olga's sea of blond hair far below you, giving the impression that for once you tower over her. The illusion does not last long.

Vibrations rip through your body, her lip moves so that the stretching and contracting skin pulls you in every which direction, and a blaring sonic assault hits your body as Fulda speaks, a mere few words exhausting you. "Nothing, my tiny man's dead," comes Olga's booming reply, downright pleasant compared to Fulda's voice now.

Another short sentence from Fulda wracks your body followed by a massive wall of plastic setting down atop you, pushing you down into Fulda's full lip. Quite unpleasantly you're tipped backward before getting pitched forward again while Fulda takes a sip of her drink. Before you chafe under it too long Fulda pulls it away again and you're able to see Olga looking up at you - or rather, past you into Fulda's eyes. "Yeah, sure!" Whatever is about to come Olga certainly looks enthusiastic about it.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Stronger Than Gravity

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Blood rushes back yo your head with such intensity you nearly pass out as Fulda leans down, bringing her face toward Olga's. One of Fulda's gargantuan hands is already resting beneath her chin, angling her face up to hers. Olga's face rapidly grows larger as you are forced toward it, swiftly becoming a rugged plain in your view. To think, just moments ago if you forgot your situation you would have thought her short.

Olga's red lips fill your view until you are directly held in front of one, her crimson lipstick filling each deep crevice before you completely. Fulda presses her lips against Olga's, shoving you into the soft flesh of her lip and pushing you into her own. The entire front of your body is immediately painted by her lipstick, sealing you more fully onto Fulda's lip while also bonding you to hers.

The temperature between their lips quickly becomes unbearable and you are unable to draw breath from the pressure of Olga's lips pressing against your whole body. Loud smacks hammer your ears as their lips separate and come back together, and you're able to get brief glimpses of their faces, eyes closed, each time they momentarily pull apart. Every time they do you feel as if you're about to be pulled off onto Olga's lip before being snapped back onto Fulda's, your body straining in whole new ways.

You can do nothing against this as your hands are firmly bound by Fulda's lip gloss. Even if they weren't, you realize, you have absolutely no chance of pushing Olga's lip back even a micrometer - it's just too heavy. Olga lets out a moan, the rumble causing your entire body to shake, and finally you feel yourself about to pass out. With your last moment of light-headed thought you try to kiss her as well.

While you may have lost consciousness neither of the city-sized women have lost their vigor. They continue for some time, their kisses growing in intensity, until your body no longer has any air to maintain even autonomic functions and asphyxiates. Fulda carries out one more vigorous assault and Olga responds in kind, pressing you between their lips until your already dead body is crushed between them. Not long after Fulda bites Olga's lip and stands, leaving a tiny speck of you on each of their mouths.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Smothered by Love

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Before you can even move Li snatches your forearm in her grip and steps in to plant a hand under your armpit, then throws you over her shoulder. You land hard on the leather with a resounding thud and Li quickly changes her grip, snaking an arm in front of your neck. She drops you to your butt and puts you in a choke hold, pulling her forearm inward to tighten her grip.

Though gagging from her hold you do your best to remain calm and find a way out of this situation. She clearly has you outclassed in every way, but you're confident you can make it the rest of the 175 seconds if you're smart. You start throwing elbows backwards, catching her in the ribs but not making her grip even waiver.

Li lifts you off the ground, allowing you to get your feet under you in some measure. You try to leverage the added stability to add some power to your strikes, but your attempts to break her hold continue to be ineffective. If anything her grip has become even more solid, and she seems to be getting stronger as the fight goes on.

Black spots appear on the edges of your vision, and you stomp downward at her toes, driving your heel into them. The sudden pain makes Li release her hold, freeing you from her arms and allowing you to stand on your own two feet. Light-headed from lack of oxygen you turn around to face her, and realize that oxygen deprivation must be seriously affecting your perception. It looks like Li's grown a foot compared to you, the base of her shirt's opening a bit above the top of your head.

Li takes advantage of your temporary stupefaction and coils up her right leg, lining it up for a kick. She sends it forward, striking you in the forehead with the heel of her white Ked and staggering you backwards. Before you fall down she closes in and strikes you in the chest with the heel of her palm, throwing you even further back with her concentrated strike.

The instant you hit the ground Li pounces on you, straddling your stomach and leaning back heavily so you can't get back up.
