You try to push her off but again you're unable to budge her, your hands uselessly cupping the top of her knees. Li brings a hand down in a firm slap, involuntarily turning your face to the side, then brings around again for a backhand, this one even harder.

Manic glee fills Li's face while she proceeds to slap you over and over, each strike feeling just a bit harder, her butt getting just a bit heavier following each hit. There's no doubt about it; each time Li hits you either she grows or you shrink a little, and she's decided to game the system. The slaps continue, making her stronger with each passing second, and you know you have to get out of this.

You start wiggling yourself out from under her, pushing as hard as you can with your feet, but she has a large portion of her substantial weight atop you. Each push barely budges you, and by this point Li's hand is large enough to engulf your head and only getting larger. Her eyes widen when she feels you rub against her, and she pauses momentarily to bite her lip.

With one more firm push you free yourself, sliding out from under her. You kick another time to get your legs clear of her skirt and stand up, ready to finally go on the offensive, but instead of throwing a hit you gasp. Even while she's sitting like this you only come up to her shoulders, if that. Li grins at your shock and hits you before getting up, karate chopping her hands into both sides of your abdomen.

While you're doubled over from pain she stands, and looks down at you while you recover your composure. When you stand all the way back up you see that her sock, pulled tightly the whole length of her calf, is now several inches taller than you. If her reprieve was a calculated psychological play it worked - you can't see a way to subdue her now.

That doesn't mean you won't try though! You run at Li's shin, ready to hold on for the duration of the fight, but get the toe of a large shoe in your gut. While you're doubled over she taps you several times, further increasing her advantage, before she shoves you over. She takes the opportunity while you're prone, bending down to prod you in the stomach. Each hit feels like a baseball bat at full force, and you get no reprieve until her fingertip is hitting the entirety of your chest.

You manage to get up despite the pain, and realize it's over. Li towers over you as much as she did before, the top of her shoe's toe slightly above your head. A low rumble fills the air, calling your attention away from Li momentarily. The distance to the edge looks like miles now, and you can scarcely comprehend how large Fulda must be now compared to you. It's official, you're an inch tall to an inch tall.

The rumble, it turns out, is a human voice, calling out "One minute left!" Li lifts up her shoe and you watch transfixed while she positions it over you. An instant later stomps it down, the ball of her foot crushing you immediately. With your last thought you reflect on how, after all you've been through, this is the most appropriate end. She grinds her shoe into the speck you leave behind, hardly enough to concern even the most observant housekeeper.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Not Even Close to Fair

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Mariam grabs your final opponent off the floor next to her feet, letting him dangle between her fingers while she holds him up to her face. You watch her lips move subtly as she whispers something to him but you're unable to make out even a peep, though you assume it's some kind of instruction. Then she moves him to the center of the arena, sets him down, and quickly withdraws her hand.

He quickly picks up the sewing needle, by far the most popular choice tonight, and levels it toward you. You'd bypassed this improvised spear multiple times tonight, but each of those times you didn't have every other giantess out for your blood. From their eager expressions and tensed muscles you expect they'll be more than able to compensate for your less than impressive opponent.

Olga calls for the fight to start, and sure enough before she can even enunciate the t her hand is already coming down. You disregard your opponent and roll forward, just avoiding her swat, and find yourself in another shadow. Thinking quickly you kick yourself to the side, causing Brit's follow-up to slap against the leather. The two cheer and go to high-five before they realize you're still on your feet.

You square up with your opponent who looks as though he has absolutely no clue what to do. The tip of his spear has drooped to the ground and he seems more like he's waiting for his shift as a guard to end than involved in gladiatorial combat. Hoping to take advantage of their overconfidence you step close, less than a forearm's length away, and get ready to gut him.

During your wind-up fingers seize him from behind, yanking him swiftly backward so that you have nothing but empty space to stab. Simultaneously Olga's finger points down at your head and jabs, causing you to throw yourself out of the way. Her finger presses into the leather a moment too late, disappointing the giantess again.

Before you can get up another hand raises above you. Allison doesn't intend to miss and wastes no time with intimidation, bringing her slap down as hard as she can. You roll along the floor to get out of the way, just barely clearing her fingers but still getting lifted up by the air rushing out. The gust carries you several inches before you come to a complete stop.

Allison smirks when she sees that she missed, not perturbed in the least. In a natural follow-up she slides her hand along the leather ground until it slams into you, pushing you along as it rapidly moves across the ottoman. She abruptly stops and sends you careening the rest of the distance until your rolling comes to a stop. Banged up but having nothing to worry about from your opponent you lie still for a moment before trying to get up.

You raise your head before trying to push yourself into a kneeling position, and see a white button-up shirt the size of a film projector screen in front of you. You audibly gulp before craning your neck back farther to see the straight black hair in a bob and the coal-colored eyes looking down at you. Li grins triumphantly and plucks you up with a waiting hand, snagging you by the collar.

She raises you toward her face at an agonizingly slow pace, hoping to build up the fear in your mind. It works. When you pass her collarbone you start wobbling back and forth. At her chin you begin frantically squirming, trying to get free of her grip. Li's pinch holds tight through all your attempts, and she lets out a low, sadistic laugh.

"Looks like I get my revenge after all," she says, taking a second to exaggeratedly lick her lips. She chuckles and adds, "You won't be needing those where you're going." Li reaches up with her other hand and snags the splinter you had been using as a sword, tearing it so forcefully out of your hand it scrapes your skin, then carelessly tosses it over her shoulder. Then she grabs your cardboard circle of a shield and rips it off your arm, almost dislocating your shoulder with the violent motion, then drops it down to the top of her skirt, over a hundred feet to you.

"How are you going to get free this time?" she asks, raising you above eye level. "My little meal." She tilts her head back and positions you over her mouth. "My little morsel." Her lips part, revealing the gaping cavern you had been face to face with just a few minutes ago. Li's tongue, a humongous pink tentacle, writhes to and fro inside her mouth. "I don't. Think. You can." With each pause she drops you a little lower, bring you to a jerking stop after an inch, and snaps her jaw shut as a finale. The maw curves into a smile as you get closer, Li's teeth peeking out from under her top lip.

You plant a foot on each lip, standing astride her mouth to prolong the inevitable. Li gradually opens her mouth, spreading your legs wider little by little until you feel your feet sliding along her slicked lips. Gravity does the rest of the work, and one failed grab later you plummet into her mouth.

Li's lips promptly seal behind you, plunging you into absolute darkness. You land on her tongue, which promptly slams you against the roof of her mouth. She runs her tongue along your body, slathering you with her saliva, and gently sucks on you as if trying to get a taste. Her tongue's tip presses into your chest while the rest depresses, and she runs you along the ridges of her palate, grinding you into it like a washboard.

Finally Li decides she's done with you, and a simple flick of her tongue tosses you into a stream of saliva heading for her esophagus. The muscle easily relaxes enough to grant you passage and the strong throat muscles force you down into her stomach. With a splash you land in a pool of hydrochloric acid, eyes closed, and quickly kick your way to the surface. You listen for any signs of the man she ate mere minutes before, but hear nothing. No doubt he's dead, and you'll join him very soon.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Li's Revenge

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Li makes a big show of reaching into her shirt and searching around with her hand before triumphantly pulling it back out, tiny man grasped inside. She winds up her arm as though she's going to smash him into the arena, ending the fight before it starts, but pulls short just before splattering him on the leather. He drops from her palm, surprisingly looking no worse for the wear, already wielding a weapon.

Your new opponent holds a short, thin length of a necklace in his hands, furiously spinning it around in a display that you have to admit is pretty neat. It would be a nice change of pace from having to keep your distance from a spear, you tell yourself, and assume a ready stance. The chain-wielding maniac doesn't stop and merely continues whooping while he winds up his weapon. Mariam goes ahead and calls for the fight to begin.

Before you can do anything with Fulda's advice he whips the chain at you, wrapping the links around your ankle. You hop on one leg while trying to get free, which only emboldens him to give it a firm tug. The force makes you do half of a back-flip, landing hard on your butt and splaying your limbs on the landing. He takes the opportunity to bash you with it a couple times, leaving welts on your chest that will surely develop into bruises.

A shadow appears above you and you roll forward, narrowly avoiding a swat from Brit that would have left more than a bruise. There's not even time to get up before Olga's hand follows up by trying to smash you with a karate chop. By the skin of your teeth you roll out of her way, the tip of her ring finger hanging over your chest. You push against her finger to escape from under it and help yourself to your feet, ready to get back into the fight.

The moment Olga's hand clears the path he tosses the chain, this time binding your arms and wrapping it around your chest. You consider the possibility that Li brought a ringer as he pulls the chain tight around you, straining your muscles while you try to escape. He runs around you, pulling you along despite your desires to stay. There's no way someone would shrink a friend of theirs down to an inch so that she could rig something like this, is there?

Your opponent stops and firmly tugs the chain, pulling you toward him. You use the momentum to jump and try to land a dropkick on his chest, hitting nothing but air when he ducks long before you reach him. The chain acts as a leash, stopping you short before you can slide too far away from him. Quickly you get back to your feet and turn around, unaware of just how close you are to Allison's imposing form.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Li Makes You Look Bad

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Running out of options you dash at your opponent, hoping that surprise can compensate for his clearly superior skill. You run into him and rear back your head in preparation for slamming it into his, but again he's able to preempt you. He slams his forehead into your chin before you can bring yours forward, interrupting you attack.

Dazed and unsure of what else to do you begin straining against the chain binding you. You know that you won't be able to break it, but if you can make this fight go on a bit longer he might end up getting a hand across his whole body. In response to your ineffective straining he pulls the chain tighter, digging it into your skin and making you cry out in pain while you maintain a death grip on your weapons.

Suddenly he hops back and drops the chain, making it unwind a little. Unable to believe your fortune you start to wiggle your way out of it, unraveling yourself a little bit at a time. A moment later the reason he broke off so abruptly becomes clear when a gigantic hand slams down, fingers cupped to form a shell above you.

Allison's fingertips are close enough to keep you from stumbling to your knees, and you're able to see small slivers of the world between her fingers. Then her hand snaps shut, pressing you into the center of her palm. With you secured she sharply raises her hand, the sudden acceleration making it feel as if your insides are about to drop out of you. She tightens her grip, rapidly cracking all your bones and crushing you to death inside her hand. After letting your blood run through her fingers she drops your mutilated corpse back onto the ottoman with a satisfied smile.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Claw Game

choices: You've got to get out of here
Might as well accept that you're stuck
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Not knowing what else to do you run at your opponent, hoping you'll be able to knock him over with a bull rush. Before you can make contact he raises a knee and, unable to slow down, you ram yourself into it. You double over in pain as the air is knocked out of you, your weakened legs dropping you to your knees.

The chain around you tightens with another tug from your opponent, the links pressing sharply into your skin through your clothes. Your grip weakens and with another constriction you drop your weapons, and with them your last hope of pulling a victory from the jaws of defeat. A smug look from your opponent tells you that he's realized the same thing, and the links around you edge tighter. There's no way this is some random guy who showed up; you're sure that this is someone Li knows.

A titanic hand descends from above and sets down between you and your opponent, fingertips down. This is it, you tell yourself. All Allison has to do is slam her palm down and snuff you out. To your surprise she points a finger toward your opponent and jabs him in the chest, pushing him away with such force he drops the chain. "Okay buddy, that's enough," Allison says in a husky voice. "You kicked his ass, now back off."

For good measure she pokes him again, sending him into full retreat. You can't help but be amazed at the power of these giantesses: someone who had been throwing you around is utterly helpless against just a single finger. From beneath her index finger you watch him back away, relieved that you'll get to live a bit longer.

Allison grabs the loose end of the chain with two fingers and picks it up, turning you upside down and bringing you with it. The chain digs deeper, threatening to cut into your flesh as she lifts you higher until you're level with her bright blue eyes. She places you gently against the palm of her hand and unwinds the chain, freeing you so that you drop into her open hand.

For thirty seconds all you can do is gasp for breath and feel as though the links are still pressing into your skin. "Hey dude, you gonna be okay?" Allison asks, the breeze from her words soothing your welts. You nod yes, but there's no emotional reaction on her freckled face. "Good. I'd hate for you to be broken before I can do it." Her thin lips press together in what you think is a smile. Maybe you should have just died.

Her hand moves you toward the opening of her low-cut floral patterned shirt, positioning you just above her cleavage. She tips her hand upward and you scramble for something else to grab onto, not even thinking about the futility of such an action. In any case there's nothing to stop you, and you slide head first in between Allison's breasts.

You're stopped part of the way down when you're wedged between her breasts, though you're not sure how far you fell. The fleshy walls press around you as Allison pushes her boobs together, squeezing you between them. You feel more than hear her chuckle then her grip releases, allowing you to be suspended by their natural contact point.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Acquired by Allison

choices: She's able to capture you herself
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Fulda takes a moment to consider the situation, but just before she begins to speak the impetuous Asian giantess puts her hand into the ring. She slams it down in front of you, making you take a step back, then opens her fingers to drop her shrunken man. When her hand withdraws you see him crouching, hand on a small length of chain, poised and ready to go. Caught off guard, Fulda simply goes "Uh, fight?" to begin the round.

Your opponent is more aggressive than your previous one, but now that the punishment for running has been made clear you should have expected that. He swings his chain at your waist, making contact hard enough that it's going to leave a bruise but not getting it to wrap around you. In response you swipe your shield at him, disrupting his follow-up when he has to duck away from it.

On the far side of the arena a skinny, strawberry blond giantess with delicate features stands and leans over you. The shadow she casts makes fighting difficult and you're concerned about what she might do, but you can't risk giving her the attention she deserves. Your opponent swings his chain overhead, winding it up for another strike, and you prepare to move your shield to block it.

Right when he lets it go she brings her hand down between the two of you, forming an impenetrable barrier with her long, slender fingers. His chain bounces harmlessly off her skin and she flashes him a withering look with her vivid green eyes. He backs off, and she turns her attention back to you, along with a look of playful curiosity.

She brings her hand toward you, her fingers flapping back and forth as it goes. You're unable to avoid them as the pale skin gently smacks into you, pushing you back through their sheer size. You try to push back but they're constantly in motion, rendering you unable to even brace yourself for long. Briefly you manage to maintain contact, but you're so much smaller than her she simply continues battering you toward the edge.

After she's brushed you along five or six times she withdraws her hand, revealing your opponent again who has become no less eager to win. He rushes through the previously blocked space the moment it's open, bringing his chain down in a downward throw. You're taken off-guard and it wraps around your arm, binding you to him for the moment. The two of you struggle for control, with you trying to wrest the chain out of his hands.

Meanwhile the giantess remains poised over the arena, continuing to cast you in her shadow. She reaches into her pocket to retrieve a small, hand-held item: her phone. A spotlight illuminates you and your opponent, shining into your eyes as she begins filming. No doubt she's planning something, and for some reason she wants this fight recorded.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: No Rest for the Weary

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
The green-eyed giantess continues to loom over you, the light from her phone's camera disrupting your vision. You find it difficult to concentrate with the sudden illumination, and the ever-present threat from her simply standing over you is impossible to ignore. Your opponent takes advantage of the distraction and yanks hard on the chain, making you drop your makeshift sword.

"Mariam, you're fucking up the fight," Fulda says. "Either do something or sit back down, you'll have to delete the video anyway." The towering silhouette turns to look at Fulda, its long ponytail dropping far enough down to brush against the arena's floor. "Because it's evidence," Fulda elaborates to her, as though talking to a dog.

She moves her hands around and the stoplight goes away, throwing you back into the darkness of her shadow. Your eyes were in the process of adjusting to the harsh light, and its sudden removal throws your vision into disarray again. Fortunately your opponent is similarly afflicted, and during your undeclared truce you manage to unwind your arm from his chain.

All of the bright spots recede from your vision, allowing you to see again, and Fulda clears her throat at Mariam. At the top of your field of vision you see her massive hand begin to descend toward you and you jump backward, hoping to escape her long fingers. Your opponent does the same, but nothing comes down between you.

After her feint Mariam winds her hand back up and redirects it. You've yet to regain your balance after your first dodge and stay in place like a sitting duck, right in the path of her fingers. The tip of her middle finger strikes you right on the head, knocking you down and fracturing your skull, but not immediately killing you. You crumple to the floor in agony, unable to do anything else but cry out in pain.

"Well? Finish him off!" Fulda demands. "He's suffering!" Mariam complies, raising her hand up again. She swings it down atop you once more, her middle finger running three times the length of your body. This time her slap strikes hard against the leather, flattening you under her finger. The pop from her hand hitting drowned out the sound of your bones cracking, and your brief yet debilitating pain is over.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: A Flat-Out Loss

choices: Somehow you manage to hold on
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
The sudden light seems to be disrupting your opponent as much as you, and you decide to capitalize on it while you can. You unwind your arm from the chain, rapidly rotating your arm so that the taut chain grows more lax in his hands. Before he realizes what's happening you've freed all but your wrist, and by then it's too late. His reactive jerk on the chain pulls the loose end to him just as your hand slips out.

"What the hell are you doing?" Fulda asks the giantess filming you. "You know that what we're doing is super fun, but also super illegal, right?" The gigantic silhouette shrugs her shoulders and keeps the light on you while you square up against your opponent once more.

"Don't worry about it," she says, her soft voice given a velvety quality by her size. "I'm not going to film a person dying." Her choice of words hardly reassures you, since in just the past ten minutes you've seen plenty of evidence that they don't consider shrunken men to be people. You'll have to remain conscious of what she's doing throughout the fight, something your opponent is free from by dint of facing away from her.

You start to circle around him, trying to get the light in his eyes and shake her unspoken threat from your mind. Just when you have her at your back she decides to strike, and the tips of her enormous thumb and forefinger clamp around the metal splinter you've been using as a sword. Effortlessly she yanks it out of your hand, pulling you hard to the side. You watch her carelessly toss it over her shoulder and giggle while you stumble out of control.

Before you can recover for that she uses the same digits to grab hold of your shield and pull on it, lifting you off the ground. You struggle to free your arm from it while she drags you upward, only managing to slide your arm out when you're an inch off the ground. With a thud you land in a heap, lacking any of your weapons and easy prey for your opponent.

He sees that you're helpless and begins spinning his chain, building momentum before throwing it at you. You raise your hands and stay moving, ready to get out of the way and try to salvage some dignity from this situation. Fortunately you don't have to; when he throws it another gigantic hand blocks it, and the chain harmlessly bounces off the back of her hand.

Surprisingly the hand belongs to Olga, whose champion you just defeated. "He's dead to rights," she declares, "so I'm claiming him." Before anyone can object her fingers engulf you, closing you inside her fist. Quickly you're picked up from the ottoman, your stomach trying to stay where it was while you rapidly ascend.

Olga holds you in front of her crimson lips while her light gray eyes examine you. "Hey there little guy!" she yells excitedly, the volume of her voice straining your ears. "You're mine now! Easy come easy go, huh?"

You squirm uncomfortably in her grip, but find that it's too tight to even wiggle. "Two wins isn't bad, you did pretty well for someone weaker than my little finger!" She seems positively giddy, probably not a good sign for your survival. "You mostly lost to Mariam anyway, don't sweat it. You're definitely stronger than my last guy."

She moves you over to the side of her face, holding you level with the temples of her glasses and loosens a finger, allowing you to move your arms. "That's why I'm sure you're up for this. If you can hold onto my glasses for the rest of the tournament, you'll get to see more of the party. If not, splat!" Fearfully you reach your arms up and latch on with your hands, gripping the metal for dear life, and she releases her grip. Her attention turns away from you and back to the arena when the next fight starts.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Olga's Ornament

choices: You're the sole miniature for Mariam tonight
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
If some enormous interloper is going to get your fight on film, then you're going to give her something worth filming. You close your eyes to filter out the light and pull your shield in to your chest, then swing it outward to bash your opponent. It connects with a thud on your blinded opponent's chest, and you rear back for another strike. Another dull thud sounds when it hits his chest again and you feel the tension on your arm dissipate as he lets go of the chain.

"Ooh, this one's feisty!" the filming titaness exclaims as she lowers her face to your floor, the light making even you cast a long shadow. You step up the showmanship, rearing back for a thrust which your opponent easily dodges. In response he squats low and puts his arms out, hopefully catching on to your demonstration.

"Mariam, turn it off," Fulda says with an exasperated sigh. "The last thing we need is video of these things getting out." Your opponent connects his hands overhead and brings them down in an exaggerated slam, allowing you to easily sidestep it for the camera. Just then the light goes out, casting the two of you back in the darkness of the giantess's shadow.

"Fiiine," Mariam replies, and slides her phone back into her pocket. Before your eyes can adjust you feel the leather surface dimple from her leaning down on the ottoman, covering the whole arena with her shadow. Fulda lets out another sigh, clearly not pleased with her actions but accepting that it's better than what she had been doing.

You and your opponents' eyes adjust to the darkness and you resume fighting in earnest. Viciously you stab at him, making him dodge to the side, then follow up with a shield bash to knock him off-balance. Mariam's attentive emerald eyes watch you intently, and a satisfied moan escapes from her throat as a low roar.

The sharp thud of something setting down on leather behind you grabs your attention, making you break off what might have been the killing blow. Before you can dodge a powerful gust of warm air rushes into your back, blowing you across the arena. You drop your weapons from the sudden shock and skip across the leather in a low trajectory, propelled by Olga's powerful breath.

You roll the last foot until you come into contact with the bare flesh of an absolutely monumental thigh that stops your skid. Unable to get up you simply push yourself onto your back and look up, your dizzy vision just able to distinguish what's practically a denim miniskirt atop the thigh. Mariam shoots up, her full height making your vision spin even more, and exclaims, "Hey, I got one! Thanks Olga!"

"Hey now, not yet," Fulda says, "he still has a chance at this. It's not over until he's threat-" Your opponent's run comes to a stop with him pointing the tip of your makeshift sword down at you. "Okay, now he's yours." Fulda sighs one last time and sinks into her chair, resting her forehead on her hand.

"Shouldn't you already have one?" the Asian next to her asks. "If you don't you shouldn't be here."

"O-oh. Well, I do," Mariam begins as she plucks you up from her thigh, "I just like this one more. He's got more spirit." She raises you up the considerable length of her body until you're dangling in front of her face. Though you're still too dizzy to see straight, she is more than able to look you over in her grasp.

"You know he can't fight again, don't you?" asks the black-haired woman across from her. "He already lost, he's out, you have to use the one you already have."

"That's fine!" Mariam answers, much too loudly for your tastes. Your vision blurry and your ears ringing all you have to go on now is your sense of feel, and the realization that you're effectively dangling hundreds of feet in the air suspended only by your shirt and Mariam's fingers creeps into your mind. "This one looks like he'll be fun to have around."

"Well, put him away and let's move on," Fulda says, clearly annoyed with the whole situation. "We still have one more round - that is, if you have one to put into the ring."

"Yeah, sure just gimme a sec." You feel yourself being gently lowered while Mariam sits, your rate of descent surprisingly considerate of your size - especially because she doesn't seem to care about the shrunken man she already has. Your blurry vision goes from light to dark when you cross the threshold into her skirt, Mariam's hand guiding you up between her thighs. She sets you down close enough to her crotch that you can feel the heat coming off it then crosses her legs, smushing you between her panties and her thigh. How the rest of your night goes depends on how well her champion does, you figure.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Mariam's Miniature

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
The intense heat radiating from inside Mariam's panties is trapped and intensified by her thigh, making the small pocket where you're trapped unbearably hot. In less than a minute you feel sweat beads forming on your forehead, and the air is so warm it dries out your throat when you inhale. You wipe off some sweat with her panties and her leg involuntarily twitches inward, pushing your whole body against the white cotton wall.

For several minutes you indistinct screaming coming from her and the other giantesses, the sound dispersed as it goes over and around her thigh. Every time Mariam shouts you get shaken up by the waves travelling through her as well, shaking you up and nearly turning you into a vibrator. As the fight goes on you notice she's screaming more and more frequently, kicking the vibration into action, and her panties are soaked beyond where you've been wiping your sweat. She's getting off on this!

Unwilling to be used by her like this you push yourself into her thigh, pressing into her supple skin as much as you can. Very soon after however she clenches her legs together, ramming you up against her panties and holding you against them. You inhale as deeply as you can before you hit, getting a strong smell of her juices before your face is forced up against a wet spot. After that whiff you decide to hold your breath as long as possible, if you can even breathe.

Mercifully Mariam unclenches her legs after only a few seconds, allowing you to get away from her panties. Her thigh continues to spread open, allowing you to see out her skirt, and you turn around to see what has happened. Unfortunately Mariam's skirt follows her legs upward enough to block your view, but judging from the noise you'd guess that Mariam's fighter lost, and he probably lost bad.

A hand passes between her knees and into the skirt, and Mariam probes blindly with her fingers trying to find you. To make it easier you walk up and stand in front of her middle finger, taking a firm nudge to your chest from her. Once she's found you she hooks her index finger around and throws you against her thumb with it, pinning you between her digits.

Slowly Mariam pulls you out, and you're glad to finally be getting back into the fresh air. Your vision has been clear for a few minutes, though it was difficult to tell in the dark, so now you are able to get a better look at her during your ascent. She is incredibly thin though not unhealthily so, the impression aided by how naturally tall she is. Her green eyes are shaded by thin, arched eyebrows, and she has high cheekbones and thin lips. There's something almost elfin about her appearance.

In due time she gets you where she wants to hold you and stops, smiling shyly down at you. "So, um, that was a thing," she says, her rosy cheeks blushing. What does she have to be nervous about? She's literally holding you in her hand! "I hope I didn't make you too uncomfortable in there."

"No, it was, uh, it was fine," you manage to squeak back, averting your eyes from her face. "I had a good time, and you clearly did too." She blushes even more and looks down. What is with her? All the other women you've met here are not only all super-aggressive and uncaring, they're also extremely physically fit. It's like Mariam is the odd woman out here.

Finally she looks back to you and says, "So, um, let's go do something together you... tiny little bug?" Her heart clearly isn't in it. Maybe you've finally caught a break with her.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Just You and Her Amid the Other Giantesses

choices: She wants to set you free
She wants to talk about her feelings
Two other giantesses ruin the moment
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Mariam slowly stands while holding you, causing your stomach to sink from your gut and blood to rush out of your head momentarily. Unlike the other times you've been lifted though you don't feel dizzy, and Mariam may actually be showing the slightest bit of concern for you stuck in her hand. You grin up at her and she taps your head with her free hand, rustling your hair with nothing more than her fingertip.

She begins walking with you, supporting your legs with her other hand to keep from shaking you up too severely. You definitely appreciate the extra support, keeping you from swaying too much with each step or feeling the impact from every footfall. Mariam holds you so steady the only way you know you are moving is the world flying by you at a hundred miles per hour, and luckily no one else pays much attention to you.

Instead of going up the stairs as you expected she goes through the kitchen, sliding past several women grabbing more drinks on her way. The clicking of her heels reverberates against the tile, reminding you that while she is being considerate toward you now that could change at any time. Her finger drops away from your feet, allowing you to swing wildly when she leans into a door, the force from her running into it rattling your bones momentarily.

Once outside the cool night air washes over your face, a welcome reprieve from the blistering hot air of the party. Mariam sits down on the front step, dropping you suddenly and making your stomach leap up to your throat. Upon seeing your discomfort she looks embarrassed and quickly lowers you down to the concrete, gently setting your feet down on the rough surface. She opens her fingers, freeing you from being pinned in her hand, and quickly withdraws it to rest by her side.

Mariam's long legs stretch out on either side of you, seeming as if they're hundreds of feet long from just her knees to her feet. She has clamped her knees together, putting the point of confluence just before you, creating the illusion that her shins stretch toward the horizon. Her shoes shift uncomfortably against the concrete, creating a cacophonous scraping and irregular thudding that makes you focus on the size of her legs alone. You focus on her, peeking out from above her knees, to keep you focused on the situation at hand.

"So uh, small huh?" she finally says after an awkward silence. "And I'm big, I guess." You suppress the urge to be sarcastic, knowing that by merely dragging her foot back she could she could flatten you. Instead you merely look up at her from the ground, waiting for her to say something substantial while you bide your time between her legs.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Taking It Outside

choices: "Guess you're too small to make the first move, huh?"
She just wants to enjoy being outside
Fulda comes out to see what's up
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Mariam takes a moment to idly stretch, spreading her legs apart and lifting her feet off the pavement so that they can subtly shake in the air. She places her hands on the step where she's sitting, fingers hanging over the edge, and arches her back, closing her eyes and raising her head upward. A small, satisfied moan escapes her lips before she snaps back, her feet slamming back to the concrete with a crash.

"What's it like being so small?" she asks, lounging back so that her eyes are barely visible past her knees. "I've always been really tall, so I can't imagine what it's like. Joining the Gammas was the first time I was ever in a room full of people taller than me. We must all be absolutely enormous to you, like you stepped into a magical realm of giants."

"I wouldn't exactly say magical," you reply, looking away from her massive shoes and back toward her, "but yeah, you do." Your eyes follow her leg, starting at her ankle and moving up her slender calf to her knees a hundred feet above you. "Every moment is terrifying, and there's no escape. Just being on a table is enough to be a constant reminder of how small I am, but one of you is always there to make me feel absolutely puny. And there's always the fear of getting crushed." You pause, then bluntly ask, "Have you ever killed a shrunken man?"

She sits up straight and drags her feet back to her, the grinding of her soles against the concrete grating against your ears. When her feet come together she points her toes inward and lifts her heels, leaning forward slightly. After a moment of looming over you she finally says, "Yes, I have. I didn't want to, though!"

"If you didn't want to, then why'd you do it?" You do your best not to get intimidated by her poised over you, as if ready to strike. "And that doesn't even bring up the guy you got killed by Fulda earlier."

"It's part of the initiation!" Mariam says, her voice wavering. "In order to become full members we have to crush a tiny man within a week. By the time they tell you about it, it's too late to back out, and if you don't go through with it... they do it to you. They don't want anyone outside the sorority knowing about it. If I didn't kill him, they would've killed me, and then him anyway."

"And the other?"

"I wanted to save you," she says after a second, her eyelids fluttering rapidly. "Li enjoys killing shrunken men way too much - they all do, really, but I hate how she does it. Watching her drop one of you into her mouth and swallow is horrifying, and her smile afterwards is absolutely depraved. If I hadn't, you'd be in her stomach right now."

You walk towards her cautiously and place a hand against the toe of her shoe. She spreads her knees, allowing her to look down at you by her feet. "I guess I hadn't considered that you saved my life," you say. "Thanks... but I'm not sure I have much of a life left to save anymore. "I give it a week, tops, before you or one of your sisters steps on me or something."

"I don't want to do that though!" she protests, slapping her knees back together with a fleshy pop. "And I'll do what I can to keep them from doing it too, at least to you." The conversation drops, with you looking up at Mariam's shin while leaning against her shoe, and her peering down at you from high above.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: A Sympathetic Ear

choices: You refuse, but she doesn't listen
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Mariam's statement surprises you and you push yourself off of her shoe, only to find her smirking down at you. "Guess you're lucky I'm not too wrapped up in traditions then," she elaborates, extending a hand between her knees toward you. She scrapes her shoe along the concrete ground, placing you right in the middle of her instep. You turn to run away from her and hit the exact middle of her instep's curve.

While you're trying to climb up the side of Mariam's shoe you feel a firm tug on your shirt when her fingers seize your collar. For a moment you kick fruitlessly at the air and try to grab onto her shoe while she lifts you away, carrying you back toward her. You stop your vain kicking by the time she pulls you up to her knees, and since you have nothing left to grab onto you allow your hands to fall to your sides.

When Mariam has you over her skirt she opens up her other hand, then drops you into the middle of her broad palm. Your feet sink into the soft skin between the wrinkles and you're glad to have your feet touching the ground again, even in such a risky position. She withdraws her other hand, leaving you stranded in the middle of her outstretched mitt, an attempt at a seductive grin on her lips as she looks down at you.

Mariam's hand moves you up her chest and toward her face, keeping the pace incredibly slow so that you can remain standing. "No need to be embarrassed," she coos, her voice's intense volume overriding what could have been a seductive tone. "I mean, we already kind of banged, right? This is a few steps back from that." She must be referring to when she used you as a vibrator, quite against your will.

A pair of pink lips loom ever larger above you, getting closer each second as you're lifted by Mariam's hand. Her tongue slides out from her mouth and runs along them, moistening them with saliva in anticipation for your arrival. Instinctively you back away, sure that Mariam is about to drop you into her mouth, but you're stopped when you run into her fingertip. You are helpless as you're lifted the rest of the way until you stand in front of her lips, long purses of pink skin stretching far on both sides from you.

You close your eyes and Mariam puckers her lips, pushing them out far enough to place them across your entire upper body. She pushes you into them with her finger and you feel yourself engulfed by the warm, soft tissue, your head pushed into the tiny hole leading into her mouth. Mariam minutely opens and closes her lips, the closest thing she can think of to making out with someone much smaller than her but feels like you're weakly being gummed to death.

After a few seconds she opens her lips, allowing you to fall back into her palm while she pulls her head back. "So, uh, how about it?" she asks. "Want to be my tiny boyfriend? Or maybe just my little piece on the side?" Mariam looks very satisfied with herself after that dime-store pun, and you wipe some of the saliva off your eyes before answering.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Making Out

choices: Mariam is infuriated by your rejection
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
"I'm sure you think I'm flattered by this," you begin, flinging a long stream of Mariam's saliva off your fingers as you shake your hand, "but I'm not. You aren't as bad as the rest, but you still play a game of killing shrunken people. Sure, I'm safe today, but who can say about a week or two from now?" While you speak you feel like it is an out of body experience, unable to believe you're standing up to her.

Mariam furrows her brow while she thinks of a rebuttal to your rejection. "I'm not sure you understood what I was saying earlier," she finally declares, her voice loud enough that you have to clap your hands over your ears. "See, that was just an initiation thing." Covering your ears really does not diminish her voice's volume. "It's just like carving your own d20, or whatever nerd thing you do. Once it's done, you never have to do it again!"

"I still don't think you get it," you reply once your ears stop ringing. "It's not the why, how or when, you still killed someone. A living, breathing person, and you didn't even do it because you wanted to, you just wanted your friends to approve of you. You got peer pressured into murder, Mariam. How long will it be until they want you to get rid of me?"

"But... I..." Mariam stammers, her voice not drowning out your response for once.

"And if that weren't enough," you start, "I already have a girlfriend, and a protective one at that. I don't think she would appreciate me shacking up with you just because you're thousands of times my size." You do your best to stand tall, but nothing can change the fact that you're trying to stand tall in someone else's palm. Mariam blinks several times, emotion flashing in her green eyes, and you realize this may not have been the best idea.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Turning Mariam Down

choices: She takes you to your girlfriend
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Mariam's eyebrows arch upwards and her face transforms into a visage of rage, and you start to fully comprehend your foolishness just now. You try to back away from the enraged giantess but her fingers quickly shoot upright, blocking your escape with a solid wall. Her eyes narrow down at you while you futilely push yourself back into the barrier of skin blocking you, and you wish you could shrink even more. "Look, Mariam, I-"

"Are you fucking kidding me?" she growls, cutting you off. "I saved your life, you little shit, and all you can think about is your girlfriend? Where has she been all day, huh? Do you think she would've saved you earlier?" The fingers behind you start sloping inward, forcing you to take a knee. "Do you think she can save you now?"

"There's really no need for this," you hurriedly say. You brace your hands against the unstoppable force pressing you down, predictably having no effect on the wall slowly topping down onto you. "Maybe I just need more time, I'm going through a lot of changes right now and I'm not ready for a gigantic girlfriend quite so soon!" Mariam's fingers continue closing in, bowling you over so that you're kneeling low. She is not buying your pleading.

"It's too late, you little pissant. I gave you a chance to be my boyfriend - to be protected, cared for, given some semblance of normalcy in your tiny state - but you turned it down." Her fingers press you down further, your arms giving way under the pressure until you're lying flat, sandwiched between her digits and palm. "You're not getting a second chance." You gulp while a grin spreads across her face.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: A Giantess Spurned

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Instead of pressing you flat Mariam's fingers remain where they are, pinning you against her open palm. "I was going to squish you and be done with it," she begins, "but I just thought of something way more cruel. Since you apparently love your girlfriend so much, you should get to be with her! I'm sure she'll be thrilled to see you, especially when I tell her you spent all night at a sorority party."

"No, you really don't need to," you say. "I changed my mind, I want to be your boyfriend, let's just go up to your room and-" Your words turn to a pained scream when Mariam squeezes you slightly, the weight of her finger nearly splitting your rib cage.

"I said it's too late, twerp," she replies venomously. "You clearly want to be with her more than me, so I'm going to make your wish come true... but I will let her know you tried to dump her just now." You wince at your situation getting even worse while Mariam laughs. "Or were you going to be a two-timing scumbag? Either way, I'm sure she'll be glad to hear it! Now give me her name, address, and a brief description."

You hesitate, knowing that the minute you're in her hands your life is going to become a living hell. Mariam however does not appreciate your silence and squeezes you again, wracking you with agony until you nearly pop under it. After a few seconds you relent, and begin telling her everything she wants to know. You start with the address, then add, "Her name's Alyssa, she has blond hair, gray eyes, and is average height. Look, it's like 2 in the morning, I'm sure she's sleeping right now, can't this wait until later? Maybe you could sleep on it?"

"Nonsense, I don't want to take up any more precious, quality time you could be spending with your girlfriend! And she only lives like two blocks from here, I can walk you over there right now. It's not a big deal for me. Besides," she pauses while she lifts you up so that she can hold you an inch from her eyes, one of her enormous irises dominating your view, "I think you should see just how 'average' your girlfriend's height is now." With that Mariam's fingers overtake you, plunging you into darkness inside her fist and leaving you with a final image of her smirk.

The walk does not take even five minutes, but it feels as though it lasts an hour. Heat from Mariam's hand builds quickly and you begin to sweat, but she is holding you so tightly you can't wipe it from your brow. She swings her hand wildly as she walks, no doubt exaggerating it to make your time more uncomfortable, so that blood is constantly rushing between your head and feet and your stomach never gets to sit still. For the whole ride's duration you are never sure which way is up, and your persistent confusion exacerbates your physical unease.

Finally the walk stops, and you no longer feel your organs thrown about inside your body. "Hey, text me tomorrow," she says, her voice easily reaching you through her hand. "Let me know how it goes. Maybe I'll feel bad and come get you." She rattles off her number and loosens her grip, giving you a few moments to get it programmed into your phone. Your reprieve is brief though, and just when you finish she tightens her grip again and lifts you. Mariam knocks on the door with the hand holding you, three reverberating thuds travelling through her fingers and shaking your organs up again.

For several seconds nothing happens, and you consider that maybe Alyssa went out tonight. What would Mariam do if no one's home, you wonder? Would she leave you in front of the door alone, or would she take you back home with her? Mariam raises her hand and gets ready to knock again when you hear the door unlock and slowly open.

"Hey, you're Alyssa, right?" Mariam asks when the door is open wide enough to see her. You hear your girlfriend's tired acknowledgment, followed by her wondering what's going on. The fingers wrapped around you lift away, leaving you on the enormous plain of her palm for a second until she plucks you up with her other hand, pinching you by the shirt collar and lifting you up. She moves you over to dangle in front of Alyssa's face, and her tired, half-closed gray eyes widen when she sees you.

"This is your boyfriend," Mariam explains cheerily, and Alyssa's mouth goes wide. "He spent all night at a Gamma Tau Sigma sorority party, where he drank too much and got shrank down to an inch tall. Not sure what he was doing there if he has a girlfriend though, especially one as pretty as you. Anyway, just think you should know he climbed up my skirt at one point, and I'm not sure if he was trying to dump you or cheat on you but he definitely asked to be my boyfriend and wanted to go up to my room."

Mariam's introduction and story is met by a long silence from Alyssa while she stands there trying to process what she is hearing. "I'm sorry, this is a lot to take in at once," she explains. "First you show him to me like this, then you tell me all the crazy shit he's been up to tonight?" Mariam nods. "And this inch-tall thing, is it reversible?"

"Nope!"

"Good." Wait, she thinks it's good?! Even more to your surprise a smile starts to spread across Alyssa's face while she looks at you, suddenly with quite a predatory gaze. Briefly she looks from you up to Mariam and opens her mouth to speak.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Going Home

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Alyssa places her hands together and cups them under your dangling body, forming a safe landing area for you. Mariam releases her grip on your collar, letting you plummet into Alyssa's waiting hands. You land with bent knees on the side of her palm, immediately falling against her soft skin and rolling down toward the middle. After a rough tumble you come to rest where her hands meet under Alyssa's withering gaze.

"Thanks for bringing him to me," Alyssa tells Mariam as she goes back into the apartment. "And for telling me... all that." Without waiting for a reply she closes the door behind her, then uses her pinkie finger to turn the latch on the deadbolt. A single lamp casts dark shadows over her face while she looks down at you with a glimmer in her eyes. "And thank you for getting shrunk like this!"

You can scarcely believe your ears. Not only does she not seem to care about all that other stuff, but she seems overjoyed that you fit in the palm of her hand now. "Hold up a sec," you say, wanting to address this before anything else. "Why are you acting like it's a good thing that I'm an inch tall now?"

"Because it is!" she replies, her voice assaulting you with her excitement. "You've always been tiny in your soul, and I thought you were way too tall. Hell, you might still be a smidge big." How can she even joke about that when she is literally looking down at you in her hand? "But now that you're, like, ankle-height? The outer you reflects the inner you, Tiny!"

You sputter trying to find a reply. This is not at all the reaction you expected. "Aren't you even a little bit upset?" you finally ask, her beaming face continuing to perplex you.

"You would know about little bits!" she exclaims, almost involuntarily, and laughs at her own joke. Alyssa takes a second to compose herself before giving a more serious answer. "Tiny, I just got woken up in the dead of night by a giant tart presenting me with my shrunken boyfriend and telling me that he was out all night partying and trying to climb in their pants, I'm a bit in shock. Right now I need to get back to sleep and mull this over, and you should too. We can talk about this in the morning, okay?" You nod, fully aware that you're in no position to call the shots.

"I don't want to be too much of a pest-"

"But you are the size of one!"

"-but where am I going to sleep?"

Alyssa looks up in contemplation and pulls a hand away, nearly dropping you to the floor as half the surface slides out from under you. While you scramble to get into the center of her remaining hand she taps a finger on her chin to exaggerate her thought process. Suddenly she snaps back down to looking at you, eyes and mouth wide, and declares "I know!"
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Back with Alyssa

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
"Look, I know it sounds bad," Alyssa beings to explain, "but it's really just the best way of going about it. You're small enough that I could easily crush you in my sleep, and I'd rather not do that. I'll get you something to cover up with, and you can find somewhere in the open to lie down and crash. In the morning when I'm ready to talk about this I'll come get you... and if it turns out I'm mad I'll just step on you." She cracks a wry grin, but you don't share her appreciation for that joke.

Alyssa steps into the middle of the room, keeping her hand cupped to cradle you in her palm. She lowers you down towards the carpet, and when you pass her waist you realize she hasn't been wearing pants this whole time, just a shirt several sizes too large for her. When her hand reaches the floor she tips it sideways, causing you to slide out of her palm and land on the floor. Inertia forces you to your knees, and Alyssa withdraws her hand to stand up.

Mariam was right earlier: you are definitely re-evaluating the meaning of average height now. Alyssa towers over you like a spire, her shapely legs two pillars that look to be chiseled out of marble hundreds of feet high. She steps over you, her bare foot easily clearing your head, causing you to feel some trepidation about her bringing it down on you right then. Her foot lands with a soft thud, but her weight alone is sufficient to generate a light vibration through the floor and make your teeth chatter.

There's a loud crash when Alyssa dumps out a bag and dice scatter all over the table, with one boulder-sized polyhedron falling to the ground. She turns around and comes back toward you, each step generating small quakes that get more intense as they get closer. When she reaches you she tosses the dice bag down next to you and places her bare feet on either side of you, then rests her hands on her hips. Briefly she looks down at you sternly, doing her best to make you nervous, and you worry that she might be too enthusiastic about this.

Finally she breaks the silence, saying, "That should work as a sleeping bag or something, just try to get comfortable. Sleep tight, I'll see you in the morning! ...hopefully." With that she leaves, stepping over you again as if to demonstrate that she can. She continues down the hall, the vibrations from her footfalls getting less intense until they stop reaching you entirely. Before going into her room she turns off the lamp, plunging you into darkness, then closes the door behind her.

The dice bag is more the size of a tent than a sleeping bag, and the rough felt is heavy and coarse to your skin. Still it's better than nothing, and you slide yourself into the pouch until it comes up to your chin. You lay your head down on a fluffy carpet fiber and close your eyes, hoping that when you wake up you'll discover this whole day has just been a horrible nightmare.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Carpet Bedding

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Though you sleep as peacefully as you can considering the situation, you get woken up in a much more abrupt manner. You open your eyes when you feel a massive presence over you and the air's temperature raise several degrees to find an enormous outstretched palm over you. Before you can get out a pair of log-sized fingers seize the top of the bag and yank it up, dropping you into the sack's cloth depths.

In the pitch black you can only feel yourself being lifted, your stomach pressed against your spine as you get dragged upward. The ascent is brief, followed by violent shaking as the pouch is roughly handled. Narrow beams of light stream in when fingers poke their way through the top of the cinched bag, revealing the texture on the black felt walls surrounding you.

"I wonder what's in this bag?" Alyssa asks loudly while her fingers fumble with the opening. She always did like putting on a big show, you remember, and this is clearly no different. Her fingers throw the bag open, revealing a pair of light gray eyes peering into the bag, widened in faux shock. Alyssa lets out a fake gasp and declares, "Why, it's my tiny boyfriend! Small enough to get lost in my dice bag!"

Almost carelessly she upturns the bag, dumping you out into her waiting palm. You land face-first in the middle of her hand and blink rapidly, trying to get your eyes to adjust to the light. "The very same tiny boyfriend who disappeared all day yesterday until some spindly strumpet woke me up with him! Lucky for him her story didn't quite add up or he'd be a stain on the carpet right now. So, Tiny, what did happen yesterday?"

Before you begin you take a deep breath knowing that this is going to sound outlandish, but she can hardly dispute you getting shrunk down - she is, after all, holding you in her hand right now. You launch into an explanation of how you bumped into Fulda on the way to class, causing her to shrink and then kidnap you. Alyssa appears to be getting bored with your step by step, so you skip ahead to being stuffed into her shoe and the party.

"So wait, why didn't you text me during this?" she asks.

"Most of the time I could barely move," you tell her, "and if she caught me texting for help I'd probably be a smear on her sole right now." Alyssa nods and you continue, telling her about the mortal combat tournament you were forced to participate in. When you get to the part about Mariam claiming you, you place special emphasis on her shoving you up her skirt and pressing you into her underwear with her legs.

"So you didn't crawl up in there on your own?"

"Hell no. Frankly it made me feel violated, like when she started kissing me and trying to make me her boyfriend. I told her I already have a girlfriend, she got really upset, and that's how I ended up back here."

"You tell a pretty good story, Tiny," she says when you're finished. "I'm not sure if I believe you though. You have a pretty strong incentive to lie right now. I mean, I could just clap my hands together and smash you at any time, that's gotta be scary, huh?"

"Alyssa, I-" you start, but she cuts you off. She's made up her mind.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Waking Up

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
Out of the gate this guy is much more aggressive than you expected, jabbing his sewing needle straight for your abdomen. You manage to hop backwards out of his weapon's reach, but he's able to recover and get back in a ready stance much sooner than you foresaw. Another swift jab, this time for your chest, gets dodged, but before you can move to counter he has again already covered the ground you gave up.

Your retreat continues, though you do what you can to reverse your fortunes. Each time you bat at the tip of his needle with your own weapon it barely even budges, and he's able to keep it pointed at your chest. You look behind you to see if any of those women want to spice up the fight and get you out of the predicament, but they seem content enough to just watch. To the right you see the dark-headed giantess start to reach out, but Olga stops her.

After a few minutes of backing up you run out of space to fall back, your heels hanging off the leather plateau. To your right Olga looks down, watching with glee as your situation gets more hopeless, and on your left you can see Fulda getting annoyed, clearly wanting to intervene and at least make the fight interesting. All of the giantesses peek in, waiting for the final blow to be delivered.

His needle darts forward once more, and you decide to do something about it this time. You deflect the point with your shield and crouch down, letting inertia bring him closer. Your hand grabs him by the collar and in one motion you turn your whole body, throwing him over your shoulder. He goes over the edge, but just before he falls he manages to latch on to your wrist, pulling you over with him. Unavoidably you fall over the edge, dragged down by your opponent.

You land next to him on the soft carpet, unharmed but not in a great situation and with all of your weapons scattered. Luckily neither of you wants to continue the fight: you don't particularly feel compelled to fight for the honor of women who have shrunk and enslaved you, and the two of you silently agree to make a break for it. You push yourself up and start looking for ways out.

Before you even get standing you feel two pairs of eyes on you and Fulda's voice rings out, shouting "Disqualified!" You hear the ominous thud of her foot on the floor behind you, and past your former opponent you see two large white canvas shoes trod out from behind the ottoman when Olga stands, her black stockings like impossibly tall onyx pillars. If ever, now's the time to break for it.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Escape Attempt

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
The shout causes you to bring your hands up to your ears in a vain effort to protect them, a mistake that your opponent doesn't make. He knew what was coming, and moves to attack you while you're still reeling from it. While you still have your hands to your face he strikes you with the base of his sewing needle, knocking you backward.

Once you're able to steady yourself you get ready to counterattack, but your opponent keeps the momentum going. He plants the tip of his spear into the ottoman and jumps, kicking for your chest. You manage to raise your shield in time but still take the brunt of the force, getting pushed back some more.

A fist slams down right where you had been standing, making you glad you at least hadn't been smashed. "Dammit!" bursts out from behind you. "I almost had him!" You look up and follow the arm stretching above you and see the black-haired giantess, her mouth curled in anger. Surprisingly she doesn't make a grab for you, and simply withdraws her hand.

As soon as the path opens up your opponent charges through, hoping to take you off guard. You manage to duck under his stab and bash him in the stomach, driving him away and opening up an opportunity to strike. With a dash you close the gap and stab your makeshift sword forward, confident that you'll catch him in the gut.

Even though you're right on target, it's not to be. During your wind-up the blond grabs your opponent, and lifts him up when you start your attack, making you strike at empty air. She carries him above your head, well out of your reach, and sets him down on the other side. You turn around when he passes over you, grumbling about the interference.

Before you can rejoin the fight something slams into your back, throwing you forward. You scream in pain, the blond's flick striking you right where Fulda's toe had been pushing between your shoulder blades and bringing the pain back. Your trajectory takes you right into your opponent, throwing you into him and knocking you both down, though you continue on your path for several inches.

"Get back in there!" Fulda yells across the ottoman. "You're embarrassing me!" You try to get back to your feet, but all that time spent in her shoe has made your muscles tight and sore. Your opponent however has already gotten back up and is moving toward you, sewing needle pointed at you. Beside you the excitement from the giantesses is palpable, and you feel that it's only a matter of time before they strike now.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: The Road to Defeat

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
No matter how hard you try you can't seem to push yourself off the ground. Your muscles are simply too tired, and you barely have enough energy to keep fighting. While your arms shake from the effort your opponent strolls up, eye black from where you got thrown into him but otherwise unharmed. He raises his sewing needle spear and prepares to plunge it into your back.

With one last effort you reach your arm around with your small metal splinter, hooking it around his ankle. You pull back before he strikes, sweeping his leg and knocking him to the ground. Adrenaline surges through your body, and with one last burst of energy you manage to get back up to your feet. Before he can get up you poise to strike him, knowing it's now or never.

Two fingers close around you, pinning your shield arm to your side and holding your sword arm in place. The hand drags you backward, throwing you as roughly as it can. You land hard on your back, dropping your weapons from the force of impact. Looking up, your eyes widen.

One of the dark-haired giantess's gigantic hands stretches out above you, fingers splayed outward. A devilish grin spreads across her face and you try to at least get your elbows under you, but to no avail. Time slows down, and you can hear the air being forced out of the path of her hand as it rushes downward. Before you can scream she slaps you, instantly turning all your bones to powder and turning you into a stain. To be sure she rubs her hand back and forth, crushing you between her palm and the ottoman.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Crushed by Defeat

choices: You make it through the rest of the tournament at least
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
The looming threat of getting smashed energizes you, and you manage to get yourself standing up again. However you can't even brace yourself for a strike before your opponent slams the base of his sewing needle into the side of your head, dazing you. Your vision blurs and you hear the sound of something very large moving through the air. Your opponent's rough outline moves away, and you stagger forward in pursuit.

A tumultuous slapping sound comes from behind you when a gigantic hand slams down, and the air rushing out knocks your feet out from under you. Your opponent steps forward, spear raised and ready to bring it down. Weakly you raise your shield and manage to block the blow, but with one swift motion he tears it out of your hand. He eyes your other hand and kicks your fingers, making you lose your grip, and prepares to strike again.

"Hold it!" a booming voice above you shouts. The black-haired giantess lays a hand across you, finger cocked back ready to flick your opponent away. "This one's mine now. Just back away." He complies, moving far away from you. The giantess smiles and pinches you between her fingers, then helps you to your feet.

You immediately fall back down to your knees, unable to stand on your own right now. She eagerly helps you, grabbing your collar with her thumb and forefinger and picking you up off the ottoman. Her hand carries you up to her face, where she holds you in front of one of her monumental turquoise eyes.

"Hey there little guy!" she says, brimming with energy. "I'm Brittany! And you look tired." In truth you are; too tired to respond, in fact, as if she would even listen. "You should go somewhere you can take a load off."

Brittany lowers you away from her face and down her body, past her breasts. She begins moving you to the side of her slender frame, sending you around the back. You can see where this is going. Her hand pulls back the waistband of her pink shorts, opening a hole just large enough for you. When you're over the opening she drops you in, then lets it snap shut.

Her panties close around you, sealing you against her bare butt cheek. The fabric is very rough and tight, and each small twitch of her butt rubs you against it. You feel each small movement she makes, every involuntary twitch of her buttock as her panties push you against it. With some effort you manage to turn yourself around so that you're facing her butt, arms spread wide in a weird sort of hug. For the moment you resolve to keep hugging Brittany's ass, lacking the energy to even attempt an escape.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Panties Prisoner

1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.content:
There's no way you're going to let yourself be used for the entertainment of these women, and you refuse to participate in their brutal games. That's what you tell yourself when you throw down your weapons and take off running from your shell-shocked opponent, picking an edge as far away from known dangers as possible. Your ears haven't stopped ringing, and you suspect they never will, but you don't let that stop your determination to escape.

Your course puts you directly on course for a blond who eagerly watches your progress along the brown leather. You pay none of the women or your opponent any mind, instead focusing solely on the ledge that you're approaching. If you reach that, you think, you'll be able to hop down onto the floor, and hide under something. Maybe you'll be able to escape amid the chaos. Whatever the case, you'll be doing it on your own terms.

The blond reaches her arm forward and spreads her hand, holding it in place. A few seconds later she brings it down, slamming you with as much force as she can muster with her palm. You're flattened immediately, reduced to little more than a smear which she wipes from her palm on the edge. You had hoped you could get further than this.
1121231223211211112212213111222111111132.title: Flight

1121231223211211112212213111222111112.content:
The motions of Fulda walking may have become familiar to you by now, but that doesn't make them any easier to endure. Each step she takes presses her big toe into your back again, spreading your shoulder blades and driving you into her stocking before the pressure relents, only to begin anew. Fortunately this trek is much shorter than the previous one, and you soon return to merely being uncomfortable.

From inside her shoe you gather that she's talking to someone, but their voice is unable to penetrate the leather all around you. However, possibly because you're on her body still, you have no problem hearing Fulda perfectly. "I hope you two are ready to get crushed," she says. "Helen and I are kind of pros at this." There's a pause while the other person speaks. "Yes of course ladies first. The home team starts regardless."

For about fifteen amazing seconds you're completely unmolested, either by vibrations or the agony caused by her toe, the stillness broken only by a celebratory whoop. Then you feel it again, the pain of Fulda starting to take a step only much slower. Little by little her toe presses against you, spreading you much more painfully than before. The nylon forms around your face, and the threads creak from the gradually increasing strain. Suddenly she jolts forward, jabbing her toe into your spine and wracking your body with agony. As suddenly as it spiked it relents entirely, and she returns to her neutral standing position with you on the tip of her toe.

"That's both, roll them back!" she shouts, followed soon by another quick jab by her toe. "My elbow was not over the line, are you calling me a cheater?" A few seconds of silence ensue, broken by, "Look, it's at eye level for you, so you shouldn't have any trouble paying attention to it. Now are you going to keep whining, or can we shoot again?"

There's another brief period of blissful stillness, until you realize your back is beginning to get moist. These shoes don't breathe well, you realize, and all the bodies around, the alcohol, and the game's tension are all starting to take their toll, causing Fulda to begin lightly sweating. What would normally be an imperceptible dampness turns the inside of her shoe into a sweltering jungle, and you find it difficult to breathe from the humidity. Not that you'd want to breathe too deeply; the sweat is causing her foot to reek so bad you can taste it when you inhale.

As if that weren't bad enough the pressure begins to steadily increase again, her sweaty toe roughly shoving you against her stocking. You grit your teeth and try to breathe only in small gasps when you can get any breath at all, the humidity, pain, and constriction all coming together to practically suffocate you. Again there's a quick spike, sending a jab of pain to the tips of your limbs, then it relents again. For another minute, you can almost relax.

"It's not fair, huh?" Fulda asks her anonymous partner. "And why's that?" You're not sure how much time passes during this answer while you endure the sweltering air inside her shoe, but Fulda lightly grinds her toe against you while it goes on like she's tapping her toe impatiently. "So it's not fair because I'm tall? Is that it?" A second passes, and you hear her slam her hands on the table. "I'm not sure what the fuck you want me to do about it! These aren't idiotic platform shoes, do you really think it'll make a difference if I've got a foot and a half on you rather than two?" Yes! She might take her shoes off! You would still be trapped, but at least your situation would improve somewhat.
1121231223211211112212213111222111112.title: Under the Table

choices: Fulda claims the two men for herself
Fulda gathers the pair for the next event
Fulda calls two sisters over to claim them
11212312232112111122122131112221111122.content:
A few seconds go by, and Fulda's toe jabs you in the back impatiently while she listens to the stranger answer. "Ugh, fine, if it'll get you to stop bitching so we can get on with the game I'll take them off. It's still our turn though." Finally, something today is going your way! You're not sure if this could be called a lucky break, but it's the first time your situation has gotten better since Fulda shrank you in that lecture.

Gingerly you're pulled backward while Fulda removes her foot from the shoe, the air already getting easier to breathe before you're even withdrawn. Fulda's foot escapes the high heel entirely, bringing you with it as the stocking still clings tightly around her whole leg. You wouldn't call this comfortable since you still have her toe wedged into your spine, but compared to her weight leaning down on you it's paradise.

Your eyes sting with the sudden exposure to light, even the small amount reaching you under the table. You blink your eyes several times to get them to adjust, and you have to consciously remind yourself that Fulda's stockings are giving everything a peach hue. The fine mesh stitching doesn't help your vision either, but for now you're just glad you can see anything at all.

Six feet away, a distance that seems to stretch forever, you see two pairs of nice but comfortable shoes at the bottom of slacks, presumably the people Fulda has been playing against. You look to your right, straining through the discomfort of moving at all, and look past Fulda's humongous toes to see a pair of enormous white hi-top Converse and pale, freshly shaven legs.

Fulda sets her foot down beside the gigantic high heels, your feet not quite resting on the carpet as you're firmly suspended by the nylon. Sound comes rushing to you, the blaring music hitting you in full force after your recent sensory deprivation along with several dozen voices all speaking at once. It nearly overwhelms you until you're able to pick out the crisp sound of a ping pong ball bouncing across a table, and you have something familiar to center yourself.

From your vantage point just above the floor you have very little to look at. Turning your head is a serious pain, and the lighting is just enough to allow you some awareness. You can't even look up at Fulda, since her toe won't let you crane your head back that far. Plastic slams against plastic and the Converse beside you jump for joy, thumping harder than the bass and shaking you up and down in your cocoon.

"Three in a row!" she shouts in jubilation. "See if you can do it too Fulda!" Your captor doesn't respond, and simply leans back. Her movements are much less torturous to you now, and while her toe certainly doesn't feel good it no longer feels like you're on the verge of being pressed flat between it and her stocking. Fulda's foot shifts forward slightly, but you hear no impact.
