"Direct hit!" Fulda declares, hopping up. You hop with her too, and you fear for your life as the ground rushes back up to you, then away again, several times. The crashes from her titanic feet slamming into the ground assail your ears, and you worry that the impacts alone will break you apart even without her landing on you.

A deafening chime sounds, and Fulda stops jumping. The air is filled with the cacophony of dozens of cheering voices, followed shortly after by confused, high-pitched screams intermingled with the cheers. You can't move your arms to cover your ears, but you reflexively close your eyes and wince backwards, ramming your face into one of the whorls on Fulda's toe. When you open your eyes again, something seems amiss.

At the other end of the table there no longer rest two pairs of giant dress shoes - in fact there's no sign of anyone there at all. Suspicious, you look closer and see two men, each about an inch tall, standing beside the table looking very scared and confused. A series of thuds sound out, followed by another round of cheers from the women. Fulda's toe digs into you once more and you're pitched upward as she takes a step around the table and forward. The night is not about to get better at all.
11212312232112111122122131112221111122.title: Fresh Air

112123122321121111221221311122211111222.content:
Fulda's steps aren't nearly as uncomfortable to you now that she's taken off her heels, but they're still far from pleasant. Every time her foot pitches back upward you're thrown back to have your body spread out along the front of her toe again, her stocking pushing you against her flesh. When her foot comes crashing back down you wiggle inside your tight pocket while your bones rattle from the impact, sliding down a bit each time. You're concerned that if this goes on too long you'll wind up under her toe.

She turns the corner and stops at the end of the table, standing with her feet spread so that she stands astride of the shrunken pair. "What do you think now?" she asks, her voice like thunder from on high. "Is it still not fair that I'm so tall? Maybe you're just jealous of me?" The two men stand frozen looking up at her, their mouths open in shock. You doubt they can possibly answer her, this must seem like a dream to them.

"Run away! Hide!" you yell from inside the stocking. "Don't let her catch you, she's a monster, they all are! She'll-" You're cut off by Fulda rolling her toe forward, pushing your face into the carpet and muffling your voice. While it seems like she can hear you the two make no indication that they did. Instead the last you saw they were still gaping up at Fulda, stunned by the sight of a gigantic woman.

Being between Fulda's big toe and the carpet is an extremely precarious position, and you worry that she's going to squish you at any moment. You wince with each minute increase in pressure, sure that this is going to be the one that finally does it. Even when it steadies out you're concerned, aware that it would take naught but a wobble for her to overcompensate and grind you into the carpet.

The pressure relents and Fulda pulls her toe back, allowing you to breathe freely again. When you can see again you see no sign of the pair Fulda had been intimidating, not even red stains on the carpet. You look up and see her hand open, palm upward, staring intently into it. Presumably she picked them up and is menacing them in her own way. At any moment you expect her to toss them into her mouth, but for now she only stares at them while they likely cower.

Fulda's foot kicks back into the air and you're moving again, now with two more passengers. She leaves the room and heads into a hallway with a wooden floor, her footfalls generating loud, resonating thuds in addition to the shaking you had been subjected to already. You're subjected to this until she sets foot onto a worn navy blue rug which her feet slightly sink into with each step.

She walks around a long, wooden table to the end against a wall and kneels down, then lowers her hand to the rug. Fulda tilts her hand, dumping the passengers out of her palm to land softly on the ground. While they get oriented Fulda looks at you struggling inside her stocking and says, "What, did you think you were going to get out of this?"

Fulda sits down and lifts her leg, her butt making a loud thump when it sets down. You watch down the length of her leg while she slowly and deliberately rolls her stocking down her thigh and over her knee. She pulls her knee to her chest and continues, rolling it the length of her well developed calf until it reaches her ankle. Once there she grabs the toe beside you and pulls, carefully dragging it off her leg and creating an expanding sack of nylon for you to sink toward the floor in.

When her whole leg is free of the stocking Fulda opens it up, peering down at you with one eye open. She inserts her hand into the opening, pressing her arm deeper until her hand reaches the heel and you're nearly within reach of her fingers. Instead of grabbing you Fulda turns her arm upward suddenly, dropping you from the still moist toe into her open palm. Fulda's fist snaps shut around you, and she quickly pulls you out.

It's not long before her hand opens again, dropping you roughly onto the carpet along with the others. The crowd of shrunken men has expanded to about a dozen and every so often a giantess comes to drop off another, their thunderous footfalls precipitating the arrival of a new unfortunate soul. Apparently unconcerned with the crowd Fulda puts her stocking back on, rolling it up the same way she rolled it down.

When she's done Fulda decides that the wait has gone on long enough and stands, sliding her feet back into her heels. By now the crowd has grown to just over twenty, including yourself, with the giantesses coming and going as they please. One man had been wailing particularly loudly until a giantess in knee-high socks came and picked him up. Shortly after he disappeared from view there was a loud clap, and the crowd calmed down after that.

A high heel stomping against hard wood pierces the calm, shaking the floor and drawing everyone's attention. Fulda assumes her favorite pose standing astride the crowd and looks down, smiling. "Hello down there, tiny guests!" she bellows with excitement. "You're probably wondering why we've brought you into our dining room. No, we're not going to eat you - yet." She laughs, but no one else does.

"You're going to race for our amusement," she explains. "We've laid out an obstacle course covering three rooms. Do not leave the course, or you will die. We've positioned guides to help you along the course, so just follow them. The woman who brought you here will watch your progress, and collect you at the end if you live." She pauses a second after that. "And, go!" At the word go she stomps her foot again, signalling for everyone to start the race.
112123122321121111221221311122211111222.title: Joining the Team

1121231223211211112212213111222111112221.content:
The rest of the crowd runs under the table once they've recovered from the shockwave resulting from Fulda's stomp, but you stay where you are. There's no way you're going to play any more of her games, and from the sound of it this whole thing is a death trap anyway. She may have taken your life away from you, but she's not going to take your dignity.

Fulda lingers behind while the rest of the giantesses disperse, looking down at you standing your ground. "Better get moving, little guy," she says, trying to encourage you to move. "If you don't start soon you're never going to finish." You look up at her blankly, unwilling to give her the satisfaction of caving to her demands.

"Come on, get moving!" Fulda implores, raising her heel off the ground. She moves her foot forward and prods you in the chest, forcing you back and towards the table. Once she withdraws her foot you stay where you are and continue looking up at her. Fulda's eyebrows furrow in frustration, and she starts tapping her foot impatiently. "You have until the count of three."

"One!" She continues looking down at you, expecting her intimidation to work. "Two!" She draws the word out, lifting up her foot the whole time. When her knee is as far up as she can get it she stops, and waits another second before continuing. "Three!" As soon as she calls it out she brings her foot down, toes positioned directly over you.

The sole of Fulda's high heel smashes into you with the force of a meteorite, shattering your skull at the moment of impact. Before that can affect you her foot pounds the rest of you into the ground, liquefying your body. She walks away to watch the race, leaving you a stain on the rug.
1121231223211211112212213111222111112221.title: Participation is Mandatory

choices: There are a few unfortunate setbacks
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.content:
At the sound of the starter stomp you and the score of other men start running across the rug and under the dining room table. On both sides giantesses sit in chairs, idly tapping or kicking their feet while waiting for the runners to exit on the other side. Every type of footwear is on display here, from elegant ballet flats and high heels to leather boots and Converse, each the size of a cargo trailer.

One contestant decides he doesn't want to participate in the obstacle course and veers off to the side, running for some type of freedom. As soon as he gets back into the light a feminine voice loudly shouts, "Get back to the course you little twerp!" He continues along his route, and a second later a light brown boot lifts up from the ground. It comes back down hard on the person trying to get away, crushing him immediately, with the sound of the stomp drowning out the cracking of his bones. You gulp and continue forward, having seen what happens to men who do not want to participate.

Under the table the rug is very soft, practically like new, and your legs sink in between the fibers as you go. At the very least you can see that the other runners are all having more trouble with it than you, since they didn't have any time to get acclimated to carpet running beforehand. Though you doubt you're the fastest person in this group you steadily pull ahead until you're several inches ahead of the next closest person.

At the end of the table you pass under a chair, its occupant wearing a pair of suede six inch heels with stockings - Fulda. Surprisingly you had not heard her walking over here, probably due to your amount of focus and the muffling from the carpet. She sits with one leg crossed over the other, her raised foot gently kicking back and forth while she slides her heel in and out of the shoe. You pass under her foot and run past the one on the ground, soon getting out from under the chair and back into the light.

Once out from under Fulda's chair you have only a few more inches of carpet left until you're onto the hard wood floor. Though the going is faster here, further increasing your lead, you have to be careful not to twist your ankle in the wood grain or pockmarks. With careful stepping you manage to avoid all of the hazards, and quickly reach the threshold to the next room and the first obstacle: a woman lying sideways across the door frame.
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.title: And They're Off!

choices: You can never see everything coming
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.content:
You look the giant woman lying in your path up and down, trying to decide the best way to get over the hump. Climbing over her bare legs would be risky, and you know from earlier that smooth legs present some very unique challenges to get up. Similarly going straight up her back would be the longest climb, unacceptable in what seems to be a race, even if you would get to bounce off her breasts on the way down. The obvious answer, of course, is to climb her butt.

Hurriedly you position yourself at the base of her buttock and raise your arms, grabbing onto the fabric of her skirt. You hop and pull yourself upwards, beginning your climb along her rear. Several of the giantesses watching giggle when you mount up and begin pressing yourself into the fabric while you shore up your grip, rubbing yourself against her buttock.

Your climb is not as swift as you would like, the curved surface providing several challenges you hadn't anticipated when you started up her butt. Every advance makes it a little bit easier though, until you find yourself able to stand in the small crevice created by the tightness of her skirt between her cheeks. While you prepare for the next half of your climb you see a couple other contestants sliding down her legs, and one even passing you on his way up her back. So much for your lead.

The second half proceeds much as the first had, with it becoming easier as the climb progresses until you're able to stand unassisted, this time on her hip. Not wanting to waste any time you turn around and crouch, grabbing onto her skirt again while your legs hang off the side. You climb down her crotch as swiftly as you can, not wanting to linger too long, and drop down the last couple of inches to the tiled floor on the other side. Out of the corner of your eye you can see the giantess you just climbed over, a dimpled brunette, smiling quite broadly as she appears to be laughing at all the tiny men climbing over her.

You look around from your landing to see where to go next, not wanting to deviate from the course and end up getting crushed. A positively enormous blond in all white must have noticed your hesitation and stomps her hi-top Converse at you, then yells, "The course is that way, pipsqueak!" When you recover from the shock of her stomp you look to where she's pointing and see a woman sitting against the counter looking bored. Several other racers area already running up her legs or climbing her ankle.

Not wanting to fall too far behind you run across the tile toward her, heading for her ankle. Before you can begin your climb you hear a rumbling from behind you, and you turn to look over your shoulder. The giantess you had just climbed is rolling over. You watch as someone who had just got on her side is knocked over, still clinging to her skirt. She finishes turning the other direction, crushing him and anyone who was still in the process of climbing. Then you turn back forward, and prepare yourself for the second obstacle.
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.title: Up and Over

choices: You were never any good at jumping...
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.content:
In a moment you've passed the sitting giantess's towering ballet flat, a simple red shoe with a white bow on the toe, and reached her ankle. One of the contestants, no doubt trying to rush his way through the course, is trying to futilely jump and grab on to her Achilles' tendon, his grip slipping off each time. You decide instead to wedge your fingers between her shoe and foot and climb up the side, allowing you to sort of walk up the shoe's leather exterior.

When you have gotten past her ankle you swing over onto her foot and unwedge your hand, allowing yourself to slide down her foot until you rest atop her ankle. You look over the side and see the same man still jumping up trying in vain to grab onto her smooth, taut skin, oblivious to your example. Realizing that he's just more competition in this race you try to put it out of your mind and run up her shin, your feet finding sure footing on her skin.

Upon cresting her knee you're buffeted by a strong breeze from her hand doing a near pass, her fingers slapping against the tile repeatedly. While running up her thigh towards her flame orange dress you glance back and see the poor, clueless soul from her ankle running towards her outstretched hand. You want to shout to him that it is an obvious trap, but you have no idea how the giantess would view intervention on your part. Ultimately, you have to look out for yourself.

In no time you pass from skin to polyester, your rate sped by previous experience with walking on thighs. Soon after you reach the top of her leg and look up, the flat climb up her stomach capped by her large, rounded breasts. You grab on to her dress and hop up, beginning the ascent of her abdomen. The flat surface and well-made fabric make your climb easy, and in no time you have neared the top, and prepare yourself for the inverse climb up her breasts.

You take your time on her breast, and not just because you happen to enjoy the area. This part of the climb is particularly hazardous, as discovered by one less careful person who lost his grip, falling down to land on her thigh. Her ample bosom takes several minutes to climb, only your hands able to help propel you forward until you start going up the front.

Your fingers slide into the low-cut neck of her dress and you kick against her breast, helping you get up to the top. The giantess's pale skin is a stark contrast to her bright orange dress, and her crimson lipstick outlines the pearly whites of her beaming smile. Her blue eyes shine with glee while she chases someone who made the climb ahead of you around with her finger, toying with him as she lightly bats him around. Finally she shoves him, pushing him into her cleavage where he disappears down her dress, and she begins laughing.

Wanting to avoid the same fate you sprint up her breast, cresting the hill in only a couple seconds as your feet dimple her immaculate skin. When you near her clavicle she brings an open hand up to her chest, the clueless person from her ankle standing in her palm. He starts running to the side, looking like he's about to jump off her hand onto her chest, but before he can make the leap she closes her fingers in a fist. Briefly you hear the rapid fire snapping of his bones, followed by her moan of pleasure.

The short climb up to her collar bone poses no challenge, and from there you walk up the bone until you're standing on her shoulder. Two white strings hang down from the counter top, easily visible against her fire truck red hair, and you seize one in your hand. You shimmy up the rope, using her ear for support when necessary, and plant your hands on the counter soon enough. Ahead of you is a wide open space with a section cut out, replaced with a tub of punch that has a metal rod suspended over it, strings hanging off.
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.title: Next Leg of the Race

1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.content:
The long, red-tiled counter top stretches before you, two feet of open space before the next obstacle in your path. There are only a few contestants ahead of you still and who knows how many more obstacles so you take it slow for now, jogging along the hard surface. Someone blazes past you, running all-out as far as you can tell, as he runs along the grout between tiles, but you simply stay the course.

A shadow falls over you while you pass in front of a rack of wine glasses, half of the glasses that could be used to trap you removed. You turn your head to see who is casting the shadow and have to crane your neck way up the black satin dress to see Fulda's tanned face looking down at you. Out of habit you begin to slow your pace until she calls out, "No, keep going! If you don't win you're going to wish you had fallen down Jackie's dress!" That's all the motivation you need, and you hurry to get back up to speed.

As you get closer to the tub full of red punch you see a couple people floating on the top, struggling to do anything more than stay buoyant in the sticky liquid. The surface is a few inches from the top, rendering escape impossible, leaving the people who have fallen in trapped. They call out for help, but you know by now that none of these women will lift them out, and helping them would be your own demise. At least, that's how you and everyone else justifies it.

The person who whizzed by you earlier goes up for his jump, throwing his arms as high as they can go at the string. He misses by half an inch and lands in the punch with a resounding plop. As soon as he resurfaces an Asian wearing a spot-on schoolgirl outfit walks up, red plastic cup in hand, and dips it into the punch. When she withdraws her cup there is no longer any sign of him inside the basin. She lifts the cup to her lips and takes a long drink, and you think you can hear a scream from inside that is suddenly cut short.

Now it's your turn to jump, and you know it has to count. You coil your legs to build energy and explode upward, raising your arms toward the lower tip of the string. Your fingers wrap around the white thread and you hold on tight, pulling it to your chest as much as you can. The string swings you over the punch and you let go, the arc taking you the rest of the way. Words can't express how relieved you feel when your feet land on the tile, safely out of the refreshments.

Before you is a great white box pulled up to the counter's corner with a wad of towels shoved under it, blocking a path under the microwave. You turn to your left and see a row of five red-seated stools set in front of the next length of counter, only one of them occupied. Now it looks like they're going to make you hop over a row of stools, all of which could be used at any time.
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.title: Over the Drink

choices: It's just a matter of timing
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.content:
With a running start you leap off the counter and onto the stool, landing just short of the single metal button in the center. To soften the landing you roll on impact, hitting the cold metal semicircle which has for some reason been left without upholstery. You slide along the button until you run into the leather on the other side, and it occurs that probably the only people who ever notice this bare metal disc are shrunken men.

Before you can get up someone else lands where you had, only much more gracefully. They don't even miss a beat before getting back up to a full run, hopping over to the next seat, this one occupied by a titanic ass encased in hot pink short shorts. He lands on the edge and pushes against the giantess to stop himself without being bounced off the edge by her butt. Then he runs along the stool's rim, using the pressure on the seat from the giant butt to ensure he doesn't fall off. When he disappears from view behind her buttock you make your move.

In preparation you take two steps back then run forward, leaping into the air at the last possible moment. You land by the tip of your toe and quickly bring your feet together, momentum causing you to run headlong into the enormous buttock in front of you. Luckily you stay on your feet and don't get bounced off the side, and take a moment to regain your footing. Slowly you ease your way around the giantess, running your hands along her butt for peace of mind while you do your best not to look down. Her weight works in your favor and you have a sort of rim of the bowl to walk along, and you reach the other side safely.

Again you take a couple preparatory steps back before launching yourself onto the next seat, pushing off the butt to help your distance. The spring from her posterior helps you immensely and you land on the other side with plenty of room to spare. You continue running across the stool seat, your feet dimpling the red leather with each step and pinging when they hit the metal button in the middle. Ahead of you is the expert jumper, nearly in the middle, and you feel as though you're about to catch up to him when you see something out of the corner of your eye: someone walking toward the row of seats.

A pair of extremely long, slender legs topped by an equally extremely short denim skirt approaches the stool, and a hand reaches under the seat's rim. "Look out!" you yell to the man ahead of you, but your warning comes too late. She pulls out the stool, toppling him to the ground, and steps around the side. Oblivious to his presence she sits, crushing him into a smear under her weight. Now there's another giantess in your path, and to make matters worse you'll never make the jump to the seat.

With no other option you decide to try something absolutely crazy. At the edge of the stool you leap off, aiming for the peach-colored kneecap in front of you before she gets situated. You splay your arms and legs out in flight and land perfectly, your body curving along her knee when you land. Quickly you scramble to get back up and moving again, running up her thigh.

She lifts her hand and holds it up beside her face, palm down. You've been felt, you think, and now she's going to swat like a bug. You stop and look up, wanting to at least face your destruction, and to your surprise she smiles and gives you a little wave by twiddling her fingers down at you. Relieved that you're not dead you wave back up with a weak grin and continue up her thigh until you pass the hem of her skirt.

While you run along the denim you steady yourself when the world you're standing on starts turning. The giantess you're on rotates the seat to face the final stool and raises her leg, setting it down in the middle of the stool. Suspecting a trap but knowing you'll never make the jump otherwise you run back down her leg, sprinting as hard as you can before she changes her mind. When you pass her knee she bends her leg, raising her shin and sending you sliding down the slope. Past her ankle you slide up her foot, nearly running into the studded red band buckled across the toe of her black flat until you slide back down, falling off her foot.

The giantess withdraws her foot, swinging back around to ferry the next contestant if he had the patience to wait. You waste no time in heading for the string dangling from the next counter top, grabbing on and starting your climb yet again. She watches you with curious emerald eyes, apparently fascinated by you as if she had never seen a tiny person before. By now you're getting tired and the climb is tougher than the previous one, but you still crest the top, unwilling to show weakness to her. As you clamber to the top she grins, then looks away.

In contrast to the open counter top from earlier, this one looks like one big hors d'vores plate, with a smattering of finger foods all about. The competition is thinning out now as well as slowing down, and you see several people darting between food they're using as cover. You are in no way eager to enter this field, but short of having that sitting giantess carry you to the end you don't think you have any other choice, and you would definitely not outlive that.
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.title: Seat Hopping

1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.content:
The longer you rest the more fatigue will set in, and you can't come this far just to surrender and become food. You dash out among the little bites of food, pressing your back against a tiny (to a normal person) sandwich with a toothpick running through it. Some moisture from the turkey drips off onto your shirt, and you quickly run to the next sandwich for cover.

As soon as you conceal yourself with the food someone else comes barreling past, darting between the finger foods like a madman. He runs like you've never seen anyone run before, moving with energy he must have been saving up until now. The shrunken man runs through the food like a slalom, cutting close between the bite-sized bits in hopes of avoiding detection.

A shadow falls over your section of the counter top, and you peek around your sandwich to see what the deal is. A colossal, powerfully-built brunette in a green dress has walked up to the food trays looking for something to eat. Her eyes immediately fall upon the desperate man blazing a trail, her gaze following his erratic path. She holds a hand above him, fingers shaped like a claw ready to snatch him up. After a second more she explodes into actions, her fingers ensnaring the man easily. You turn away, but you can hear his screams until he gets dropped into her wide mouth.

The shadow disappears and you make your move, darting over to the next triangle sandwich. You plan your moves carefully, peeking around the food before moving to make sure there are no giantesses looking in your direction. Soon enough you escape the sandwich tray and make it to the shrimp. As you take cover behind the seafood you reflect on how you had been called shrimp all throughout school; you never thought that they would compare favorably in size to you.

Before you can move past the rack of shrimp another long shadow is cast over the tray, and you immediately duck out of sight. Curiosity gets the better of you though and you take a peek, your eyes just barely going past the food. Two giantesses lean against the counter: One, the Asian you saw grabbing a drink earlier, and the other is a slightly shorter blond with glasses in a red shirt. Each of them reaches down and pulls a shrimp off the rack, then pops it into their mouth.

"Hey, you have that organic chemistry final on Tuesday, right?" the blond asks once she swallows. The Asian nods, still chewing her food, and the other reaches to pick up another bite, this one just off to your left. They don't seem to be paying attention to you but you decide to stay in cover rather than risk drawing their attention. "I aced it pretty handily with the same professor, if you want I still have my notes." She shoves the second shrimp into her mouth and reaches for another.

The Asian's fingers settle on the shrimp to your right, taking it away from your cover. "I'm doing pretty well in it," she says, "but I'll check out your notes all the same. When can I come by?" She pops this one in her mouth and begins chewing, her jaw moving rhythmically up and down as she grinds her food.

"Oh, just stop by my room anytime," the blond says, reaching down again. "I don't really get out a lot these days, no time you know?" She picks up another bite-sized bit, this one right in front of you. They've blown your cover, leaving you exposed, and they immediately turn to face you. You've definitely been spotted, and you start running. "You want this one?"

"No, by all means he's yours," the Asian says. "As a thanks for letting me use your notes." She pops the shrimp in her mouth and walks away, leaving the blond to deal with you.

The giantess eagerly watches you as you run through the food, waiting for the time to strike. As you saw earlier there's nowhere to hide once they've seen you, and you can scarcely hope to outrun her. You run for your life, bobbing and weaving in an S-pattern while she watches, a predator's grin on her face. Any time you expect her to strike, and then it will all be over.

You're joined by another shrunken man running, probably spooked by the two, and he runs along to your left. Both of you keep pace with each other due to equal parts exhaustion and desperation, hoping to get out of this with your lives. Suddenly a hand snaps down and fingers clamp around him, towering fingers lifting him off the counter. The blond looks at her catch, watching him squirm futilely in her grip, while you make haste for the edge. "I was going for the other one," she says, then giggles and adds, "but you'll do fine too." You hop over the edge of the last tray just when she drops him into her mouth, and you hope you're safe.

On the edge of the counter is a sign that reads "TINIES GO DOWN HERE" above what looks like the top of a slide. With no better ideas and not wanting to be near the hors d'vores any longer than you have to you dash for the slide, going down feet first. It loops around many times during its four foot descent, allowing you to gain much more velocity than you should. At the bottom you're unceremoniously spit out and go bouncing through the field of cotton balls set up at the exit. You groan and look at what's up next: a hallway bustling with foot traffic.
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.title: Trays, Loco

1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.content:
You push yourself up and struggle to get your feet back under you, though you feel more exhausted than you ever have before in your life. Your shirt is drenched with sweat and a smattering of juices from the sandwich meats and shrimp you took cover behind, as well as some stray condiments. Your arms burn from overuse, and your legs have sharp pains in every muscle you know about, and some that you didn't before. For however long this obstacle course has been going the slide was your first opportunity to take a rest, and you didn't realize how out of breath you were before that. Reluctantly however you press on, sure that this can't continue much longer.

Before you can make it to the threshold the rhythmic clack and boom of high heels on tile draws your attention, growing louder and more intense with each instance. Another shadow falls over you and you begin to feel the shock waves, and you turn to face the giantess that finally caught you. Two final thuds. You see the suede heels and look up a pair of monolithic legs and a black dress until you're looking Fulda in the face yet again. This has been going on so long you had forgotten how much she towers over you.

"Do you understand how truly tiny you are?" she asks, her booming voice reverberating in the corner. Well, that's another way to phrase it. "You just narrowly escaped becoming finger food. Nice job, by the way, sacrificing one of the other runners to spare your life. I like seeing cowardice in my shrunken men." You want to shout up and tell her that's not what happened, but you simply don't have the breath. "Shows that you have what it takes to win, and you're going to win. Now hurry up, you're almost done." With that she turns away, her thundering footsteps growing fainter as she walks away.

You take several deep breaths and gather what's left of your strength as you approach the threshold to the hallway. Slowly you inch through the frame, huddling against the wall for safety. Four or five tiny partial corpses litter the floor, the rest of them stuck to a gigantic shoe, and you can barely see anything coming or going in the dimly-lit hallway. Footsteps constantly thunder along, their impact amplified by the wood floor.

You tentatively step out into the hallway to see if the coast is clear, and immediately you're greeted by a familiar rubber diamond pattern. In a panic you jump back just before the shoe slams down with the crack of thunder, and you look up to see a circled ALL STAR on a white canvas background. If you're going to get through this you'll have to be more careful.

For the next thirty seconds you watch as enormous shoes and boots stomp by, each generating massive amounts of energy that nearly knock you off your feet. There doesn't seem to be a pattern, as though this is simply something they thought would be fun without having to plan anything. Knowing that the casual coming and going of these giantesses can lead to your accidental crushing just drives home even more how minuscule you are.

Finally you decide to just go for it. You peek your head out into the hallway and make sure no one is coming on your side, then dash out into the middle. Footsteps thunder toward you and you dash forward, heading for the opposite doorway. There's a loud pounding to your right, and you turn to see a pair of red ballet flats directly on course for you, much too fast for you to dart in front of. With a spin you turn around, only to see a monumental legs barely covered by a denim skirt with black flats rushing toward you. With a glance out the corner of your eye you see the ballet flats are still coming, leaving you nowhere to go.

The giantess in the black flats sets her heel down before you, and you hear the air rushing out from underneath her foot as it swings down. Desperately you dodge, just barely getting clear before it slams down so hard that your teeth chatter. Immediately after that the red shoe impacts, its thunderous roar overtaking the the first. You look up and see the giantess in black flat's other shoe hanging over you, waiting for the other one to pass. While it dangles there is the longest second of your life until finally she steps forward, clearing the way for you.

Once she's gone you waste no time getting back up to your feet, following her trail into the deep carpet of the room where this party began. To your left you see the outline of a woman standing extremely tall, indication that's the likely route to continue along. You turn and get ready for the next challenge.
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.title: Hallway Hiding

choices: Second place is the first loser
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.content:
Back on carpet you're able to get the small advantage you had at the start back, though you're almost too exhausted for it to matter. There are only two people ahead of you, both practically limping forward while they drag their feet through the soft carpet fibers. It's all you can do to keep from joining them while you fight your way through the terrain, struggling to remain on top.

When you round the corner you see that the colossus standing astride your path to the finish is none other than Fulda. She stands with her feed spread apart, hands on her hips, looking down balefully at the remaining contestants. "Either hurry and finish or get smashed, I don't care which!" she bellows. "The sooner this is done the sooner I can go start drinking!" Her eyes light upon you as you round the corner, and though she doesn't say anything a brief flash on her face indicates she is pleased you made it through the gauntlet. However that doesn't stop her from laughing cruelly at you and the other two struggling to make it to the end.

You pass under Fulda doing her best Colossus of Rhodes impression, too fatigued to even try to look up as you do so. It's likely for the best anyway; since you're the last to pass between her ankles she watches you intently. "Hurry up," she mutters, "I don't keep losers around for long." With a gulp you gasp for another breath and press forward, though your feet sink deeper into the carpet as you no longer have the energy to lift them.

Past Fulda you enter a corridor between a TV and a couch, where all the giantesses who have harassed you throughout the course seem to have gathered. Each of them has their phone out and is holding it up sideways, filming the three of you fighting to make your way through their carpet. Scattered giggling had broken out when you passed Fulda's ankles, as well as commentary: "So small!" "He's tiny!" "They're so weak!" You glance up at the TV screen and see that they're streaming the footage from their phones, and you see just how bad of shape you're in.

No matter how bad you feel, you're quickly reminded that the others are in worse shape. One of them collapses to the ground and can't even roll himself over, and the other can do little more than shuffle his feet toward the finish line. You do what you can to tap into any last reserves of energy, surging forward through the giantess corridor toward the finish line. They even put little black and white checker flags on each side.

Suddenly a shout breaks through the air, overwhelming the titters and taunts from the peanut gallery: "Timber!" You turn your head and see Fulda leaning backward, forcing herself off balance. What energy you have left is about to be sucked dry, but it's the last bit you need. For the next few seconds you do what you can to maintain your pace, hoping to avoid Fulda landing on you.

You're covered in shadow, and you know this is it, you weren't fast enough. An unbearable thud sounds out behind you, accompanied by a quake so strong you're thrown face-first into the carpet and it feels as though your heart skips a beat. A pile of red hair engulfs you, and you expect the next instant to be smashed flat.

Fulda giggles, and you realize that you weren't killed immediately. The hair around you is soft, and isn't pressing down with enough force to crush you - it's not even though to tangle you up. You crawl forward, still unable to stand up under Fulda's head, desperate for this to just be over.
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.title: The Tower Came Crashing Down

choices: come with me for a drink."
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.content:
Fulda's giggling continues while she stands up, and you manage to get yourself to stand enough to continue lumbering forward. All the giantesses that had been sitting down watching you go by suddenly stand up and start jumping up and down, generating a minor earthquake each time they land. Getting through the last twenty feet was already a daunting enough task without the feeling that your organs were about to shake out.

"Did I get any?" Fulda asks, and you lift your head just enough to look at the TV screen. The footage zooms in on her butt, where where's a very fresh red splotch centered around what looks like it used to be a person. Fulda sticks her rear out and shapes her mouth into a circle, then covers it with a hand in feigned shock. Once her false reaction is recorded she starts laughing again and shouts, "That bit always gets one!"

Better him than me, you tell yourself as you continue to force your way through the carpet. You've nearly caught up to the only other person left, who can barely even move his arms and legs to navigate his way along the floor. Just a little bit longer and you'll be there. You're not sure what prize there is at the end of this race, but being out of it is reward enough.

"Hey you little bugs, look up at the screen," says a booming voice from almost directly above. You turn around and nearly jump out of your skin: less than an inch away is the flat sole of a shoe, featureless aside from the number 14 and poised to press down and grind you into the carpet. Thankfully the giantess shows some restraint, and once you're clear from under her shoe you're able to see the TV.

You see yourself and the only other remaining runner slowly making progress through the carpet a few inches at a time. For the first time you're able to see yourself in comparison to other objects, and it's readily apparent that the bow on this woman's shoe is at least twice as large as you are, if not more. The camerawoman follows you, keeping her steps close so that you're always in the frame with her, making it apparent how big she is in comparison. As if her blocking out the lights wasn't enough of an indication.

Mere inches from the finish line you come side by side with the other remaining runner. The screen zooms in on the two of you, trying to get a photo finish of the race, but you don't intend for it to be that close. With your last bit of strength you slam into him, making him fall backwards over the carpet. You pass over the string of dental floss stretched across the finish line and turn around to see how the other guy is doing, only to see the white bow of her shoe moving back and forth while she grinds the ball of her foot into the carpet.

Better him than you.

You immediately collapse, the last man standing at the end of the race. A series of thuds approaches, followed by more low-grade earthquakes as the woman hops up and down. At first you try to ignore them, having grown accustomed to them over what must have been the last several hours, but they persist long enough that you manage to pry your eyes open and lift your head. In your limited vision a single black high heel repeatedly lifts into the air and comes back down, making the ground shake ever more.

A thumb and forefinger settle around your chest and squeeze just enough to hold you, then you're lifted up from the carpet. When next you open your eyes you're being held in front of Fulda's face, and she is positively beaming. "See? I knew you could do it!" she shouts, her voice mostly a wall of sound that rushes over you. "It must have been my pep talks that helped you." Yeah, threats of being murdered are what got you over the last wall.

"And now that you're the champion, let's go spend some time together! I think you should...
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.title: All Obstacles Overcome

choices: She sets you down on the table
She sets you beside her on the floor
Helen places a small table for you in the center
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.content:
"Hey Helen!" Fulda shouts over you, her amplified voice a wall of sound assaulting your ears as it passes over you. You barely have enough energy to narrow your eyes, let alone put in any sort of real protest, at the sudden outburst from her voice. "Let's go back to the table and play another game, mixed teams this time!"

"All right, let me go get another," the blond in all white replies, whom you presume to be Helen. Fulda grins at you, excited for the next game in a way you can't possibly fathom. How are you going to play, anyway? The ball is going to be your size, for crying out loud! However you're still too tired to voice any of this to her, not that you would expect her to care about your concerns anyway.

Luckily the beer pong table is nearby, only a few of Fulda's long strides from the obstacle course's finish line. Though brief the journey is not pleasant for you. With how giddy she is Fulda does not temper her movements at all, and you're thrown back and forth in her fingers so hard you almost get whiplash from the force. Your chest is rammed up against her thumb, causing you to cry out in pain with energy and breath you can scarcely afford to use right now.

Your brief yet bumpy ride stops, and Fulda turns her hand to let you see something else besides her. Below and in front of you is a sprawling platform, with enormous, mostly empty red plastic cups arranged in triangles at each end. You're familiar with how the game works, of course, but you're not sure how useful you'll be for your team.

"I hope you're at least somewhat competent at this," Fulda says, canting her head slightly down toward you. Her blue eyes stand out in stark contrast with her tanned skin, and she continues, "I'm good, but I'm not sure if I can cover for both of us. You've at least played before, right?"

You nod your head in response. "Of course, I'm a senior," you tell her. "I cant think of anyone who hasn't."

"Good, then maybe-" thudding footfalls from behind her cut her off, and Helen walks past her toward the other end of the table. "Oh, looks like she's ready. Better get you into position!"
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.title: The Big Girls' Table

choices: You get caught in the crossfire
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.content:
As the blond walks past the table she sets something about the size of a playing card held up by toothpicks in the middle of it. Fulda leans over the table and holds you forward, carrying you over the cavernous red plastic pits roughly arranged in a triangle in front of her toward the small table. She sets you down and releases you, and you stumble forward against the new table while she withdraws her hand.

The table looks like an exact replica of the one you're standing on, complete with the same arrangement of very tiny cups. Clearly this is not the first time they've done this, and it certainly won't be the last. You pick up the tiny pellet provided to stand in for the ball and look between the two giantesses on either side of the table. Before you can do anything else Helen sets her teammate down in front of you, a bewildered-looking man who must have somehow avoided the race.

An ear-piercing hiss sounds from both sides of the table as they crack open two enormous beer cans, spraying small droplets far enough out to moisten your back. They pour it out to partially fill their cups, then each woman leans over and holds the can just over their teammate's head. You duck away from Fulda's as she tips it up, pouring out a few drops of beer to fill your cups. She and Helen both drastically overfill, causing beer to spill onto and over your tiny table. "Oops, sorry!" Helen says and covers her mouth, her voice almost sweet if not for the booming resonance in it.

You do your best to avoid the growing puddle of beer as you get ready, and your opponent does the same. As soon as the ball leaves your hand Fulda slams her palm down on the table with a bang, knocking you onto your back. "Who told you to start?" she asks. "We're the ones who decide that, you two just follow along." With a groan you get back to your feet and recover the pellet, then wait to be allowed to start.

Fulda and Helen start throwing the balls back and forth, the hollow white spheres soaring above your heads. There's a loud crash when the balls slam into their plastic targets, and Fulda lets out a loud "Woo!" At least your team gets to go first.

You wait for Fulda to begin, not wanting to risk angering her again. Her first throw sails through the air beautifully, landing right on target with a thundering crack, and you take your throw as well which, much to your surprise, lands well on target too. Helen and your opponent grumble and throw back their drinks then return the balls to your side, the hollow skipping of the balls pounding into your ears.

The one the giantesses use bumps into your table on the way back, pushing it forward and coming to a dead stop. You and your opponent work together to get it rolling again, pushing with all your might to get the ping pong ball back towards Fulda. It slowly rolls toward her, your tiny arms barely strong enough to propel it forward. Soon after it's free Fulda snatches it up and gets ready to throw again.

Fulda throws with a much flatter trajectory this time and the ball slams into the front of a cup with a loud bang, sending the ball rebounding towards you. Hurriedly you break off your throw as the light plastic ball bounces toward you, ready to dodge out of the way. It hits your opponent on the shoulder, knocking him down so hard it looks like he might need help getting back up, and begins rolling toward you. The ball gets closer, and Helen and Fulda both lunge for it.
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.title: Down on the Table

choices: Take your opponent and try to escape
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.content:
You put as much distance as you can between yourself and the encroaching ball, going so far as to move to the other side of the table from it. Two enormous hands converge mere inches from where you are standing, their fingers intertwining over the ball as they fight for it. In the melee their hands bump into the table, scooting it over so that it hits you in the side and knocks all the cups over, spilling beer into the already large puddle.

Fulda is just a bit faster than Helen is and manages to wrestle the ball away, yanking it back to her chest with a loud laugh. Helen slams her hand on the table in frustration, the force making you go weak in the knees from how hard it shakes you. Your opponent remains on the ground, still groaning, and from the look of his arm he won't be playing any more.

With a grin Fulda winds up with the recovered ball, preparing to spike it against the table for a trick shot. She releases it in an overhand throw, sending it hurtling toward the miniature table they set up for you to play on. You dive out of the way as it approaches, just clearing the impact area as it slams into the table, breaking the flimsy thing in two and snapping all of the supports. Beer splashes from the puddle when it hits, spraying you from the waist up with alcohol. The far side of the broken table falls on your prone opponent, hitting him in the head. Today really is not his day.

The ball bounces back up and continues its path toward Fulda's target. Helen puts a hand in front of it, easily blocking it and sending it back your way. With another splash the ball lands in the small pool of beer and keeps moving directly toward you. Your eyes widen as it bears down on you, and you can scarcely muster the energy to move out of its path.

Fortunately it bounces one more time, hitting the part of the table that fell on your opponent and then rolling back towards Helen. You feel as though you should help him, but the situation is dangerous enough for you already, and it's not like there is anything you can even do. Helen grabs the white ball and says, "Fulda, look at what you did! You wrecked their table!"

Fulda laughs while Helen prepares her next shot. "Oh, like it's a big deal," she replies. "They're tiny, nothing about them matters!" Helen grins and looses the ball, sending it sailing over your head again.
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.title: Trick Shot

choices: "Yeah.  And you're about to matter a lot less."
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.content:
The white hollow plastic ball sails back and forth overhead, thrown between the giantesses towards the cups on either side. You do your best to stay out of the way, trying not to get bowled over by it the same way your opponent did. For his part he remains lying down where he is under the broken table, hoping that the balls flying and rolling do not hit him again.

Both Helen and Fulda are quite good at the game, no doubt having gotten their share of practice while tormenting shrunken people. You rarely have to dodge any of the boulders rolling past you, and Fulda doesn't even try to spike it into you again. In only a few minutes including ample banter between the two female towers each side is down to only one cup each, and Helen's aim has been getting progressively worse.

Fulda ends up with the ball and sends it in a beautiful arc far above your head at the final remaining cup. It disappears over the lip and is followed shortly after by a faint splash when it lands in the beer without hitting the cup at all. Helen winces and pulls the ball out. "Looks like you win again," she says, placing the damp ball in the center of the table. In her victory, Fulda looks quite smug.

A loud bang draws your attention, and you turn to see Helen's fingers flipping over the broken table. Her fingers wrap around the man who had been hiding beneath it, dragging him along the dark green surface with his dislocated arm hanging loose. She lifts him up above her drink and lets go, dropping him into the beer with a plop. His tiny screams are amplified by the cup as she raises it to her mouth then tips it back, pouring all of its contents down her throat. Helen tips the cup's opening forward, showing that it's clean.

With the game over you cross the table back to Fulda and stand in the gulf between her and the great red cup behind you now. The two of you exchange pensive glances until finally you break the silence. "Did you mean that?" you ask her. "That since we're small we don't matter?" She laughs down at you derisively before answering.
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.title: Fulda the Victor

choices: Fulda and Helen sit down on a couch
Fulda goes to her room with Helen in tow
Fulda takes you to her room alone
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.content:
Fulda's peals of laughter continue booming down at you, making you cover your ears until you stop hearing the muffled thunder through your hands. "You're a champion, the fittest of all the men we shrunk tonight!" she elaborates. "And, while you would be a sorry physical specimen compared to any of us were you full-sized, being better than the rest counts for something."

She swipes a hand at you, easily overwhelming your body with it. Her outstretched fingers snap shut around you, pressing you against her waiting palm, before lifting you up from the table. Momentum brings her hand through the end of its arc, and your stomach lurches to the side when she suddenly stops her arm's movements. The familiar sensation of being slowly lifted up the length of Fulda's body returns.

Before long she is holding you in front of her face again, with only your head sticking out from within her closed hand. Your arms are pinned against your body by her tight grip, but you still struggle in her hand regardless of knowing it's futile, causing her to grin. "Does that mean," you begin, breaking it with a grunt as you fight her overpowering grip, "that I'll live?"

Fulda starts laughing again, large flecks of spittle landing on and around you as she belts out laughs from her cavernous maw. "Not by a long shot!" she replies once she is able to control herself again. "You're still a tiny little pipsqueak, and a mouthy one at that. If you get too far out of line, mess up one of my games, or just I just get bored of you, I have no problem ending you. Like this!" She tightens her fingers around you, pressing your ribs inward from the force. The pressure increases and she narrows her eyes, and asks, "Isn't that right Helen?"

The gigantic blond appears next to Fulda and vigorously nods, tossing her loose hair back and forth as she looms over you. "Oh, absolutely!" she exclaims as stars appear in your vision. "This twerp gets in my way I'll step on him, no questions. I probably wouldn't even know it!" Both titanesses exchange an amused look while you try to struggle inside Fulda's hand, unable to do more than wiggle your head as your bones compress under her fingers.

Mercifully she loosens her grip, relieving the crushing force around you while still holding you firmly. "Lucky for you, I'm not bored yet. Now c'mon, let's go have some more fun." Fulda leaves the edge of the table and takes you back out to the rest of the party.
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.title: Special Treatment

1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.content:
Fulda continues holding you in front of her face while the two walk lockstep toward the throng of other giantesses, both of them staring at you in her fist. She holds you steady, her firm grip keeping your arms dug into your sides. You don't even bother struggling anymore, fully aware that you'll never be able to break free. Besides, the heat from her hand is really starting to get to you.

Her strong hand keeps you from moving around too much, but the ride is far from pleasant. Once you stop struggling Fulda ceases looking amused, and she just made it clear that if she's not amused it's very bad for you. Helen does little to ease your nerves: the whole time the pair is walking she eyes you creepily, as though the only thing that keeps her from striking now is Fulda's hand.

It's not long until Fulda reaches the couch and stops. Fulda takes a second to kick off her heels, dropping you half a foot with a quick surge from the fall, then turns around. Your stomach jumps to your throat when she sits down, her crushing grip unable to keep the g-forces from affecting you. She lands hard, bouncing up and down on the soft cushion, and pulls her statuesque legs up next to her, feet beside her butt.

Fulda loosens her grip to just two fingers and dangles you in front of an eye, swinging you back and forth while her pupil follows you. Her glossy lips spread into a smile while your arms and legs swing wildly at her whims, apparently amused by her idle torment. When you come to a stop she lifts her other hand and bats you with a finger, starting you swinging again like a pendulum.

Abruptly Fulda stops playing with you and looks up, and you follow her gaze. Towering above you is Helen, close enough that you can't even see her face past her tight white T-shirt clinging to her breasts. Helen sits down next to Fulda, her long legs kicking into the air when her butt hits the cushion. In her lap she places a wire insect cage about the size of a breadbox housing ten or so shrunken men. She opens the door and the shrunken men scatter, but since they have nowhere to run Helen is easily able to wrap her fingers around one. Quickly she pulls him out and turns the opening toward Fulda. "Want one?"

Fulda's eyes dart over to the cage and she drops you down to her lap, making your stomach jump again. "Yeah, sure," she replies, "just let me set this one down real quick." You gulp while waiting to see where she puts you.
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.title: Giantess Lounge

choices: Helen shoves you in the cage while Fulda is turned
"Actually, I'll just play with the one I have for a while."
"Don't worry about it, I'll just use this one."
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.content:
Slowly Fulda scoots you along her lap until you are over her ankle, then down the rest of her leg until you're gliding over her foot. She moves you down to around the middle of her incredibly long feet and moves you toward the center, then lowers you until your feet touch down. Once she's satisfied she releases you, and you lean backward to compensate for the slope.

Fulda's feet reek by now, their time stuck in her high heels having done a number on their scent which her nylons have done an excellent job absorbing. You try not to cough while your feet get settled, the damp mesh forming to your feet above her skin. Briefly you wobble but manage to stay standing out of sheer desire to not have your nose directly against her foot.

Between the two giantesses you feel immensely small, their torsos rising up hundreds of feet on either side of you. Helen sits with her legs crossed, cage still on her lap, holding the man she just grabbed in a loose fist atop her white shorts. Her gaze darts between him and you, her blue eyes showing an unhealthy interest in you now. Fulda wiggles her feet, making you teeter again and causing her enormous butt looming over you to jiggle.

The moment her hand is free she moves it to the cage, her hand loitering inside the door a moment. She extends a finger and rotates her wrist, pointing at all of the shrunken men in turn as she tries to decide which to take. Finally she settles on one on the far side and sticks her arm all the way in, slowly advancing at one stuck in the corner. He tries a last-ditch effort to escape but Fulda quickly knocks him over with her fingers, then grabs him by the leg and starts dragging him back out while he claws at the floor, unable to get a grip that can match Fulda's.

Fulda pulls him out of the cage with him screaming and trying to grab on for anything the whole way, then lets him dangle upside down. She carries him so that he can hang above her cleavage, letting him get a good view of the soft, ample landing area should she drop him. However she maintains her grip and lifts a finger, then playfully bats him as she did to you, starting him screaming all over again.

"Bottoms up!" Helen says, and they both throw their heads back and open their mouths while lifting their small captives up. Helen quickly pops hers into her mouth and swallows as though she were starving, while Fulda is more meticulous. She slowly lifts hers up and lets him hang above her mouth, allowing him to see all the way back to her gullet. When it becomes clear his screaming won't stop anytime soon she lets go, dropping him into her waiting mouth and closing her lips behind him. Fulda holds him in her mouth, knocking him around with her tongue for a while, before tossing her head back and swallowing with a tell-tale lump moving down her throat.

"Man, I thought he'd never stop screaming!" Fulda says with a laugh. "Mind if I have another?"

"Sure, just give me a min," Helen answers, tapping on the cage. "I need to get them good and scared." Fulda nods and looks away, checking out what's happening on the other side of the party.
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.title: Between Two Giantesses

1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.content:
You feel a firm tug on the back of your shirt and you're torn off from Fulda's foot, the nylon fibers of her stockings snapping back down when they slide off your shoes. Your legs swing up from acceleration as you're whirled in an arc, Helen's fingers pinched in a vice grip on your shirt collar. After a brief flight she lets go, sending you sailing through the cage door to land hard on the metal floor, bouncing into the center.

When you finally come to a stop you have road rash on your arms and some of your face, and your ribs feel as though you just boxed a sack of doorknobs. A couple of the people inside the cage come to help you up but quickly disperse when Helen slams her hand onto the top, causing all the wires to rattle. You push yourself off the floor, your hands touching a mixture of the cold metal and Helen's skin poking through, and prepare for the onslaught.

Helen puts her hands on either side of the cage and picks it up, her hand covering the open door. Violently she begins shaking it, knocking you and the other people trapped inside to the ground and throwing you into each other. She lifts the cage up to her face and looks in, her eyes shining brighter from the heavy mascara around them, her face dominating the view of everyone inside. As she lowers it back down she subtly licks her lips, looking at what you hope is the person on the floor next to you.

The moment she sets the cage back down her hand shoots in, seemingly on a straight course for you against the back wall now. Luckily she stops short and her fingers grab the chest of the person to your left, dragging him screaming toward the door. He tries to grab on to your ankle but you kick him free, and can only watch as he tries to save himself, his fingers hooking around the cage wires and sliding out as he goes.

"Whenever you're ready," Helen says to Fulda, rattling the cage some more from her voice. The titanic redhead turns to look at the cage and leans forward, reaching her hand in. Before you know it her hand has reached you, palm open wide in your face with her fingers stretched up and ready to strike. At the last moment she turns her wrist, unexpectedly grabbing someone who had let his guard down. Her hand muffles any screams that could be coming from him, and she quickly withdraws him from the enclosure.

The two giantesses nod to each other and tilt their heads back, getting ready to devour their choices. Helen is more deliberate this time, holding hers over the cage so that his pleas for help filter down from her hand looming over the cage. Nevertheless she unceremoniously slides him between her lips, tilting her head down so that you can watch him disappear into her mouth. A second later, she swallows.

Fulda on the other hand is more playful, batting at the snack she's chosen a couple times before even lifting him to her lips. She runs him along the edge a few times, dropping him a bit lower into her mouth with each revolution. When he's waist-deep into her mouth she closes her lips, forming a seal around him. He struggles to push himself out, but with a bit of suction Fulda draws him down up to his armpits. Fruitlessly he continues trying to get out until she sucks again, pulling him into her mouth. A lump moves down her throat soon after.

"Want another one?" Helen asks, beckoning toward the open door.

"I'm pretty full, but I could smash one," Fulda replies.

"That's fine, I have plenty." Helen sets her hand back down atop the cage and raps her fingers on it, the pounding from her fingertips like jackhammers, while she prepares to pick her next snack.
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.title: Into the Cage

choices: She wants to hang on to you for a bit
She thinks smashing one sounds good
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.content:
Once the giantesses agree to another round Helen picks up the cage, knocking everyone down again. You're starting to wonder why you even bother to get back up. She holds it in front of her chest and turns the entrance to face her, causing everyone to roll along the ground, then tilts it so the door is toward her face. Everyone inside the cage either grabs onto the mesh or falls toward the back, landing hard. Fortunately everyone misses you but one unlucky person lands on his head, breaking his neck with a snap.

Helen licks her lips and shoves her arm into the cage, running her fingers along the floor. She moves them back and forth, knocking off anyone who was still clinging to the wires and making a hideous racket. As her fingers advance through the cage she begins humming, and you find yourself unable to look away from the digits gradually approaching you.

You were so focused on Helen's hand, in fact, that you didn't notice all the surviving people huddle into the opposite corner, leaving you alone. Helen singles you out and walks her fingers toward you, stopping about an inch away. She runs a finger up and down your body as you press yourself vainly into the corner, the smell of her nail polish burning your nostrils as it descends from your head.

Once she's done toying with you Helen sets her fingers against the wall beside you, forming a barrier with her fingers. She tips the cage, and you fall into her fingers amid the cries of panic from the others stuck in here with you. Helen quickly curls her fingers to hold you in, then withdraws her hand once more.

When you're out of the cage Helen tosses you into the air and then catches you again, holding you between two of her long, delicate fingers. Gradually she adjusts her grip until she's holding you up by the collar of her shirt then lifts you up, allowing you to dangle in front of her mouth. Helen's thin lips part in a smile, then pucker up before a strong gust of wind buffets you. You swing back and forth, hanging helplessly in her grip, while she smiles at your predicament.
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.title: Helen's Hand

1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.content:
You're unable to resist as Helen begins pulling you closer to her, opening her mouth to reveal two rows of gleaming, perfectly white teeth. Hot breath hits you as you pass between her lips, and once you're past her teeth saliva begins to drip down from her palate onto your head. Her fingers open, dropping you onto her frenulum where you sink in deeply before pulling her fingers back out.

Once her fingers are gone her lips close, casting her mouth into total darkness. You're drenched by saliva built up at the bottom of her mouth, holding you in place at the base of her tongue. Helen slams her tongue down atop you, the great pink beast pinning you down in the soft tissue below. Desperately you thrash about to get free, but while you are more than able to move you can't make any progress: everything around you is simply too malleable.

Her tongue lifts up, giving you some relief, but the tip quickly slides under your body. You slide back along it as she tilts her head, drawing you toward her gullet. Just before you fall off you reach up in a last-ditch attempt to hang from her uvula, but a surprise flick from her tongue tosses you forward onto her throat's opening.

Helen's gullet opens, dragging you into her esophagus. Her strong throat muscles automatically convey you down the pipe and into her stomach, dropping you into a vast pool of hydrochloric acid. Your eyes and skin burn, and you can half-heartedly hear someone thrashing about in the pool. The air is already thin, the other two having breathed most of the oxygen, and you settle in. At least you'll asphyxiate before you're digested.
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.title: Almost a Full Meal

1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.content:
Helen parts her lips, revealing the dark cavern behind them, and begins drawing you toward it while you sway in the air. Before you can pass between her teeth though she pulls you back out, letting you hang in front of her mouth a bit longer. "You know what, that's a good idea!" she eventually says, her voice loud enough to make your ears ring. "I haven't felt one of these crunch under my shoe in a while!"

Swiftly Helen lowers you away from her mouth, dropping you down to her knees so quickly you feel as though you might throw up. Your stay is brief while she sets the cage down on the couch, and once it settles against her thigh she lowers you the rest of the way. She sets you down on the rug next to her enormous white Chuck Taylors and lets you go, pulling her hand back up. The top of her head peeks over the couch cushion, allowing you to keep you in her sight.

The shoe beside you lifts up and Helen holds it over you, revealing the familiar rubber Converse tread pattern. Seeing no other choice you turn and run for the table, but the plush rug is surprisingly different from the carpet you're accustomed to and you become bogged down. Not that it would have mattered anyway: Helen's size 15 shoe easily overtakes you when she stomps it down long before you get out of the open. When it hits you you're instantaneously flattened as all your bones are turned to dust, and you're reduced to a red spot on her shoe and the carpet. At least they'll have to clean you up.

Helen feels your body burst under her shoe, and she grins at the sound of your bones crunching. "Okay, your turn!"
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.title: That's a Smashing Idea!

choices: She hears you, but doesn't care
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.content:
Helen goes first again, lifting her hand off the cage and finally bringing the infernal pounding to an end. She foregoes the pageantry of scaring her captives again and simply reaches in, her pale fingers searching for a victim. Everyone scatters and you press yourself up against the wall, trying to hide in the far corner. Her wrist turns and her fingers point at a corner by the door, where two other people fight for who gets to be in the corner. Quickly she raises her index finger and shoves it down between them, wedging them apart. When they're fully separated she pins the one in the corner with her finger and slides another behind him, trapping him in her grasp.

He's too surprised to shout as Helen pulls him out of the cage, and the person who had been jockeying for position with him doesn't even get up off the floor to help. When he's out Helen moves him to her palm and forms her hand into a fist, leaving nothing but his head poking out. "You're a weak little coward," she says, her voice making the cage shake. "I don't even want to eat you now, you'd probably taste terrible."

Before anyone can get excited about a possible means of escaping Helen tightens her fist around her captive. You watch his face turn red and then purple as the pressure increases until his head rolls forward lifelessly. Helen opens her hand, dropping the crushed corpse onto the cage's roof with a clang and showing the blood covering her palm. Casually she wipes her hand on her thigh, smearing the blood against it, and asks, "Can I get a mulligan on that one?"

"Nah, it's my turn," Fulda answers, setting her fingers at the base of the cage's door. She raps her fingertips on the metal while she looks the crowd over, trying to pick the best target. You remain in the corner, watching her hands to see what she'll do, while everyone does their best to remain still. Even the person who got thrown down doesn't move, instead choosing to curl up into a ball as close to the wall as he can get.

Fulda's fingers cross the threshold, bringing her hand into the cage, and she extends a finger, pointing at each person in turn. She mouths "eenie-meenie-miney-mo" as she goes, every time her finger stops accompanied by a whimper. Her finger slows down as she goes and tension builds among the caged until she points at the person two over from you, saying "You." After a beat she moves to the next with "Are." Once more her finger shifts, pointing directly at you, and she says, "It." Before you can move her hand shoots forward and her finger pries you away from the corner, pressing you into her thumb. In a rush she draws you out, making the cage whiz by.

Swiftly she pulls you toward her until you're directly in front of her, held just above her cleavage. She looks down at you in her fingers, wiggling with your arms and legs to get free despite the pain moving causes them, and considers what to do with you. "Fulda it's me, your champion!" you shout, hoping to sway her. "Please, don't kill me!"
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.title: Back in Fulda's Hand

choices: She plays with you on the floor
She takes the game to her bed
1121231223211211112212213111222111112222.content:
Fulda's fingers tighten around your chest and you feel as though your ribs are about to crack. With the last bit of air in your lungs you shout "Please!" one last time, and find yourself unable to inhale again. Surprisingly her fingers stay where they are. Your bones creak under the pressure and you feel yourself suffocating, but you aren't crushed.

You see her backpack sitting right next to her feet. That's the perfect place to hide and remain unseen by your redhead tormenter next door. You start jogging towards the colossus Helen, not knowing when she's going to leave. You run as fast as your stamina will let you.

You are only about a football field's distance away from Helen's backpack when you hear the click of Helen closing up her mascara pen. She then bends over, and you see your chance of escape propel into the air. You stop in awe as you try to think of another plan, but you see Helen shift her feet and point herself towards the exit. And you're in the way of her path... again.

Anticipating it this time, you step to the side and wait for her shoe to come down right in front of you. You're going to have to hitch onto Helen the hard way.

The white Converse sneaker slams in front of you, and you see her knotted laces bounce as her foot falls. The nearest loose lace is out of your reach. You jump onto the bottom rim of her sneaker, onto the red line between the canvas and rubber. You work fast, as you don't have much time. Everything moves in slow motion as you grab hold of the flat, crossed laces on the bridge of her shoe as you brace for liftoff. Helen takes another step, and you hold on with all your might to the white laces before you touch down again. You take this opportunity to run up the bridge of her shoe and attempt to get to the tongue. It takes a few more of her gigantic steps, but you finally reach the tongue of her high top Converse.

You hide yourself between tongue of her shoe and her leg, hoping not to be seen by Fulda. You hear Helen open the door to her room and head out.
11212312232112111122122212312.title: A New Hope?

112123122321121111222.content:
While you're transfixed Fulda peeks down at you, looking past her thigh, and her cold eyes lock on to you cowering behind her shoe. She gives you a quick wink, but before you can puzzle out what it means something very large and made of rubber bumps you on the head. You stagger backwards and realize that, little by little, her shoe is now dropping down atop you.

Fight or flight takes over in your brain - flight, in this case, since there's no chance you'd be able to stop the inexorable descent of her shoe - and you turn tail to run. Since she's bringing it down so slowly and seems to be enjoying herself immensely you reason you'll be able to escape from underneath her sole, likely just outrunning the length of her foot before she brings it down like before. Each step you take makes you believe this more, and in only a few seconds you estimate you'll be clear enough for her to "just miss" you again.

When you have about ten more yards from your perspective to cover Fulda suddenly raises up her shoe. Expecting her to slam it down dramatically you go faster, practically flying over the carpet fibers instead of sinking into them. A harsh scraping sound assaults your ears, and Fulda's other shoe slides into view, her heel slightly lifted off the ground. She sets it down, forming a wall of rubber and canvas, and allowing her heel above you to descend yet again. You're unable to stop in time and slam directly into her instep, knocking yourself onto your back.
