From your back it's clear her shoe isn't stopping any time soon, and worse it's much closer than you had thought. You roll over to your stomach and push yourself up into a crouch, eyes darting in every direction for an exit. Two doors are visible despite Fulda's shoe blocking most of your field of view, one with light visible under it and one without. Whichever you decide it needs to be fast, since even hunched over you're nearly bumping your head on the bottom of her heel.
112123122321121111222.title: Continued Evasion

1121231223211211112221.content:
Sensing the possibility of escape you dart to the left, hoping to get to what's likely the hallway door as quickly as possible. You have to fight through the upper layer of carpet as you go, bending over as low as you can to keep from getting knocked over by her shoe. Just when you dive forward, coming out from under her heel, Fulda sets her foot entirely on the ground. She grinds her heel once, which would have eviscerated you had you been caught.

Briefly you lean against the rubber lining along the bottom to catch your breath, which must have alerted Fulda that you had escaped. Her balance shifts when she drags the foot she had been using to block you away, making you stumble forward. There's a loud thud when she taps her toe against the carpet, and you start running toward your goal once again.

When you pass the midpoint of her shoe Fulda sets her heel down again, missing you by inches once more. Though her shoe stretches high above you, you try not to be distracted by the looming death to your back. You've already escaped this once, and you're fairly confident you'll be able to do it again. You do your best to maintain a steady pace, not letting the rough terrain bog you down too much, and before long you're past the toe of her other shoe.

The shadow becomes more focused as her shoe gets closer, but soon you're entirely out of it. There's a loud slam from behind you when Fulda slams her shoe down, and the rush of air throws you several inches forward, knocking you onto your chest. While you struggle to get up Fulda grins, thinking she has you now.
1121231223211211112221.title: Another Narrow Escape

11212312232112111122212.content:
With the unintentional boost from Fulda you're somewhat closer to your goal of escape, and you have no intent to squander it. While she smugly considers your situation you push yourself up to a kneel, and then stand up fully, balancing as well as you can on the spongy surface. You break into a run for the door, confident that you'll be able to slip under the crack before your tormentor is any the wiser.

Before you can even make it six inches an enormous shoe soars over you and places itself in your path, generating tremors from when it slams into the ground. In only one step Fulda's casual gait overtakes your furious pace, and you realize that you will never be able to escape while she's in pursuit. She takes a few more steps, her immaculate legs gliding over the floor, then turns to face you. There is no chance she doesn't see you, your clothing and movement providing a clear profile against her white carpet.

Fulda places her hands at the top of her hips and glares down at you with contempt. "Your refusal to stay under my feet amuses me," she begins, "but I can't simply let you escape as part of some game." You stop and wait for her to go on while she menacingly holds her pose. "So I'll make you an offer to end this little chase: I'll close my eyes for ten seconds. If you can reach the door without me stopping you, I'll do something to help you out. If you can't, I get to do whatever I want with you." She smirks, then adds, "Or you can submit right now and I might be lenient."

You consider your options. Ten seconds isn't a lot of time, but you think you'll be able to cover a decent amount of ground and maybe even get into hiding. A straight shot toward the door might work, or maybe a roundabout route under her drafting desk and along the baseboard. She's still watching you, possibly waiting for you to do something. In only a second the "lenient" option will go away, and you'll have to choose some way to evade her grasp.
11212312232112111122212.title: Titaness Blockade

choices: She looks in from the side
112123122321121111222122.content:
Fulda sighs and shuts her eyelids, and now it's up to you to find a path. She begins loudly counting down from ten and you dash to your left, heading for the shadow of her immense drafting desk. The carpet doesn't want to let you pass, its stray fibers grabbing at your feet while you pass over it, but you've had plenty of practice lately and manage to keep your footing.

When she hits five you're at the back-most wheel of her chair, and decide to duck under the leg. Your passage kicks up bits of dust the size of your forearm, and you have to hold your breath to keep from choking as more falls from the arch above you. Your shoe slips on the thin layer of dirt built up and you stumble forward, having to swing your arms wildly to stay upright.

By zero you've made it under the desk, and it's a much more difficult landscape than you expected. Bundles of wires are scattered throughout the area before meeting at a power strip, and the dust and dirt is even more abundant here. An insurmountable pile of books is in the back corner, and to your right near the power strip is a balled-up ankle sock the size of your car.

Fulda begins moving, her thudding steps creating minor earthquakes as she stomps through the room. The desk is probably the second place she'll look, you realize, and all you have between you and the rest of the room is the chair. Her tremendous footfalls grow closer, and you desperately look for some sort of cover.

An enormous Converse slams down behind you, its laces bobbing up and down from the impact, and you go with the closest option. You dive behind the sock and press yourself up against it, careful not to nudge the white cotton too hard. You're just in time too: just after your legs vanish behind the sock her other shoe sets down, and Fulda kneels to inspect the area under the desk.

The sock still carries some of the stench from Fulda's foot, and you suppress a gag. You find that you're shaking in a cold sweat, and you wonder whether enough of the dust you walked through got on you to leave a trail. For the moment you bring your knees to your chest and sit still, hoping that she'll move on.
112123122321121111222122.title: Desk Dugout

1121231223211211112221222.content:
With a quick swipe of her hand Fulda pulls away the sock, exposing you openly to her gaze. Feeling the soft cotton barrier disappear in a swish you turn your head around and see her tanned knee planted on the carpet. You crane your head back until you can see her face, and she grins down at you. "Boo!"

She swipes her other hand at you and you duck, just barely avoiding her hand as it passes close enough to rustle your shirt. Before she can send another hand your way you dash the opposite direction, heading for the power strip. At a sprint you jump, hopping up the wall and swinging yourself around one of the plugs. You look back at her and see her drop the sock, the small white ball bouncing once off the carpet.

Fulda gets down on her hands to pursue you under the desk, so you step backwards off the strip of outlets. You land amid a tangle of cords of various colors and thickness, and lift up the nearest ones so you can crawl under them. There's a rough scraping sound from her shoes dragging across the carpet, and the thuds from her hands on the floor increase in volume as she approaches.

Your titanic pursuer easily closes the distance, placing her hands on either side of the jungle of wires while you low crawl under them. She looks down, easily spotting you through the gaps. "You're so predictable," she says, gingerly placing a hand above you. Carefully she works her fingers through the cords, and your foot avoids being pinned beneath her by mere millimeters. Before you can be glad she missed she shoves her fingers in further, turning them on the floor to chase you.

Unperturbed, Fulda watches you slowly escape her grasp, easing her finger forward to keep the pressure on. "The only place more obvious would have been under my bed." She sets her other hand down above you, with only a thin layer of wires between you and her palm. Quickly she slides a finger into the wires in front of you, blocking your path.

It's only a few seconds before she closes the trap and envelops you with her hands. You look for any escape from this, and know you will have to run through the open again. To your left is her armoire, and to your right, much closer, is the edge of the desk and the wall's baseboard. Whichever you try, Fulda is closing in.
1121231223211211112221222.title: Down to the Wire

11212312232112111122212223.content:
Before Fulda can secure her grasp you make one more desperate bid to retain your freedom. With her fingers mere millimeters away you lift up one of the thin cords to your right, opening the wall of wires just a hair. Then you roll slightly onto your side and dig into the carpet, scraping out a bit more clearance. You push your shoulder into it and slide through the gap, just clearing the wires.

There's a clatter from behind you while Fulda tries to disentangle her fingers from the mess of wires she's wrapped around them, and you make for the wall. Pumping your little legs for all that they're worth you avoid tripping on the thick carpet fibers, and hop over a particularly thick power cord in your path. Fulda growls in frustration, and you hear the mess of wires fall to the ground with a thud.

Now that the giantess is free you know your time is limited, and you can scarcely afford a mistake. There's a loud slam and the ground under you shakes, causing you to stumble but not knocking you down. You risk a glance back and see an enormous manicured fingernail just an inch behind you, as well as a very dissatisfied look on Fulda's face. Quickly you get your stride back, not wanting to fall into the other hand.

A great scraping sound assaults your ears as Fulda crawls forward, her flawless knees and low-top Converse sliding over the carpet. Very close to you is the wide, flat foot of the desk you're under, pushed up to be nearly flush with the wall. The unearthly scraping rings out again, bringing Fulda forward until she's practically on top of you. With a quick glance up you can see the crown of her head, and know she's getting ready for another grab.

You slap your hand onto the rounded edge of the desk's foot and use your momentum to swing yourself along the side's arc, bringing you around quicker. Between the bottom of the desk and the white wall you find a crack just large enough for you to slip into, your head barely lower than the top. Fulda's fingers clang off the metal, causing you to duck away from it while the sound reverberates throughout the surface.

Fulda's finger remains atop you while she tries to pry her way into the crack, but the space is just small enough she can't make any progress. She leans in and narrows her cold eyes down at you, and you proceed sliding along sideways, a fraction of an inch outside her grasp. Her head pulls away, leaving you to focus on your task of getting through the canyon.
11212312232112111122212223.title: Squeezing In

choices: Take some more of your size
112123122321121111222122232.content:
Two loud thuds shake the ground when Fulda firmly plants her feet, rattling the metal desk leg you're taking cover behind. You pay it no mind, doing your best to press forward through the narrow crevice toward your goal. Every few steps you take a shallow breath, not wanting to disturb the thick layer of dust that's built up at the base of the desk, while you keep your focus on the door.

A feminine groan filters down from above and the desk is swiftly yanked away from you, leaving only the circular indentations from its stabilizers in the carpet. With your cover gone the room's glaring light shines on you again, making you fully aware of your now total exposure. You look around for somewhere else you can take cover but see nothing you'll be able to reach in any reasonable amount of time.

Fulda lets go of the desk and stands back up, a human tower in her own room. She quickly sidesteps around the desk's corner and leans against the top, scanning the wall's baseboard for you. You freeze in place hoping that she'll overlook you, but in mere seconds her eyes come to rest upon you. Briefly she smiles, then pushes herself off the desk toward you.

The toe of a massive Converse slams down next to you, followed by another on your other side, each footfall generating a powerful earthquake on its own. Before you can recover she snaps her heels together with a loud pop of hard rubber slamming together, causing you to wince. Fearfully you look between the shoes and try to back away, only to find yourself bumping into the plastic baseboard immediately.

"I win," is all Fulda says, snapping you back to your predicament. She's right: you're trapped between her shoes and the wall, a snare you helped her set up. The desk was so massive you had considered it part of the landscape, not something she would easily be able to tear away. Even running is out of the option, since you'd have to climb over her shoes to get anywhere.

Trepidation fills you as you look up from the impassable canvas and rubber wall hemming you in to the rest of the colossus. Fulda's legs for hundreds of feet of smooth, taut skin up to her black short shorts, upon which she rests her hands. Her white tank top is pulled tight against her chest, reminding you of a billboard that has yet to be claimed. She has a victorious smirk on her face as she looks down at you, a row of white enamel shining behind her pink lips.

"Now," she begins, breaking the silence with one booming syllable. "What should I do with the tiny little loser?"
112123122321121111222122232.title: Nowhere to Hide

1121231223211211112221222321.content:
The Converse to your right lifts up, allowing you to see how close you were to the door's safety. It seems you still have several feet to go; even if Fulda hadn't pulled the desk out, it's hard to imagine you would have made it with Fulda in pursuit. You sigh deeply and turn your attention back to her, ready to accept whatever punishment she has in mind.

You're unable to see much of her past the sole of her shoe looming over you, her heel digging into the fluffy white carpet fibers. The brown rubber is pristine, all of the diamonds in the pattern crisp and a circled 16 still visible by her instep. Fulda holds her foot in place for several seconds, the enormity of her shoe over you making it clear what she plans. You had hoped for something which would let you live, even if it would be humiliating, but there's nothing you can do about it now.

Fulda swings her foot down with enough force to crack the earth, one of the diamonds centered directly over your head. You don't make even the most futile effort to resist and get flattened immediately, the sound of her shoe hitting the floor drowning out that of you being squished. For good measure she lifts her heel and drives your crushed body into the carpet, twisting her foot back and forth once, before going about the rest of her evening.
1121231223211211112221222321.title: Always Avoid Capture

choices: Go for a ride on a shoelace
11212312232112111122213.content:
"I've enjoyed our bit of fun, small fry," Fulda begins, "but you've made it too easy, and now I'm bored so it's time to end our game." Before you can continue trying to get up she moves with astonishing swiftness for someone her size, lifting up her heel to take another fateful step. Rubber squeaks on rubber as she lifts her shoe up, getting ready to bring it into position, and you accept that you've lost.

"Shit!" Fulda shouts, tottering forward off-balance. She tries to recover but she moved much too quickly, confident in her imminent victory over you, and is swiftly falling down. The out of control giantess's body passes over you, and you see her put her arms out to brace her fall. Her toned legs bend, shins rapidly speeding past you on their way to the floor. Fulda's enormous shoe pivots on the toe, swinging down towards you like a building that's been knocked over on a direct course to smash you.

The floor shakes and there's a booming cacophony when Fulda's massive body slams into the ground, propped up on her elbows and forearms. Miraculously you're spared, having wound up directly beneath her ankle. A long, white shoelace hangs from her shoe down to the floor on either side of you, and above you can see each line and contour of her bronzed, shaven skin. Now, while she's stunned, you need to think of how to take advantage of this.
11212312232112111122213.title: Giantess Down!

choices: She spots you and finishes the job
112123122321121111222131.content:
Not wanting to waste any more time you reach out and grab the tip of a shoelace, pulling it into your embrace. You tug on the aglet until you're standing, arms securely wrapped around the dangling shoelace. Hoping to minimize the risk you insert your arms into the weaving so that you won't be thrown free when she starts wagging her foot about.

The bit of string you're hanging from lifts from the ground when Fulda pushes herself up, and the room rotates while she rights her foot. Fulda plants the shoe you're grasping on the ground, allowing you to come to rest upon her laces. She spends a moment brushing herself off and recovering from her fall, cursing herself for being so clumsy in her moment of victory.

Fulda lifts her heel slightly while peering down at the floor, pitching you forward in a roll. She sets it back down, causing you to shudder slightly from the impact. After a quick glance up her towering legs you realize that there's nothing hiding you from her sight except for her own bosom. If you're going to keep this up, you're going to need some concealment.

While Fulda checks her other side you let go of the shoelace, the platform you're standing on stable for the moment. You lift up a portion of the laced section and slide underneath, pushing your back against the rough canvas of her shoe offset by the softness of her worn laces. By the time she sets her opposite heel down you're completely held in place by her laces looking up, with ALL-STAR the size of a road sign at your head.

After confirming you're not on the floor Fulda starts looking over her body for stains that would be you. She pats down her sides, finding nothing, then bends over slightly so that she can see her stomach. Again she finds nothing but her stark white tank top, but while doing so her gaze passes over your hiding spot. You lie as still as you can, hoping that you blend in.
112123122321121111222131.title: Taking Cover

1121231223211211112221312.content:
Fulda spots you and smirks, knowing that you've made your final, fatal error. "Thought you were real clever, didn't you twerp?" she asks. "Didn't think I'd find you on me? Bad news: not only am I bigger and stronger than you, I'm also smarter." She bends down and grabs the top of her laces, brushing your head with knuckles the size of your torso. With a quick yank she pulls them tight, trapping you on top of her shoe.

You try to wiggle free, but it's no use. The worn fiber pins you in place against the unyielding black canvas,, and you can do nothing but watch as Fulda lifts up her other shoe, then moves it over atop the one you're on. She lines it up with her toes, placing a massive rubber sole directly above you. After some small adjustments she has it arranged perfectly, with the center of one of the diamonds right over your head.

With no pomp or ceremony Fulda brings her heel down hard, not wanting to risk another escape. When it slams into you there's an instant where you feel the cold rubber before you're crushed beneath it, your flattened body leaving a small red stain against the black. Fulda unties her shoes and picks out your corpse but decides not to wash off the blood yet, feeling it gives her Converse character.
1121231223211211112221312.title: No Room for Error

choices: You land safely on the gas pedal
11212312232112113.content:
Fulda's hand releases you a couple inches above the surface, allowing you to drop the rest of the way from her palm onto the plastic. You groan from the pain of the sudden fall, but manage to stand up quickly. Looking through the steering wheel you can see little else aside from her massive chest, and if you look above you can see her face, totally disregarding you to look at the road. From the distance at least she looks almost normal-sized compared to you, if you were able to forget where you're standing.

Speaking of, standing may not have been the best decision. The moment Fulda puts the car in reverse inertia knocks you on your back, and when she's done backing out it scoots you forward, abruptly stopping your attempt to stand. Then, instead of easing it forward, she slams her foot down onto the pedal, sending you tumbling towards her. You roll up the console and over, free falling down into her seat. Breath is forced from your lungs when you impact on her kneecap, and you feel two ribs break for sure.

You have no opportunity to move around or even allow gravity to pull you off since Fulda seems to be a very aggressive driver. The near-constant acceleration keeps you pinned on her kneecap, shifted slightly every few seconds when Fulda's foot changes pedals. You're not even sure where she's driving like this, since this wouldn't be possible anywhere on campus that you've seen. With extreme effort you manage to plant your chin against her leg and look up, hoping for some sort of clue, but you can only see up the length of Fulda's body to her face. It doesn't look like she's showing any concern for you or her task, and is almost lackadaisical.

Tires screeching fills the air and you're thrown off her knee when Fulda slams the brakes, bringing the car to a sudden stop. Your tiny body speeds through the air in a line drive to where you're going, rocketed at a very high velocity. In the brief moment that you're airborne you only hope that you'll survive the landing.
11212312232112113.title: A Driving Force

112123122321121132.content:
Your flat trajectory slams you straight onto the top of Fulda's gas pedal, hitting it so hard your tiny body makes a small indentation in the soft rubber. Everything in your body feels like hell from the impact and you're definitely stunned, but by some miracle you don't think anything is broken. For a brief moment you're held up by the pedal, your sudden deceleration temporarily defying gravity.

"Learn how to drive you fucking jackass!" Fulda bellows above, the roar of her voice filling the whole car and ringing your ears. She moves her foot back, depressing the brake pedal and moving it directly over the accelerator. You gulp as your entire field of view is occupied by the rigid rubber sole of her Converse, hoping that gravity takes hold soon.

Her immense Converse races toward you, and you know that, in this case, gravity failed. Fulda's shoe slams into you, smashing you between it and the pedal that acted as your backstop. The cracking of all your bones is drowned out by her transmission roaring from the sudden acceleration, soon diminished when she shifts gears. You, however, make no more sounds, and your stain will remain until she gets her car detailed.
112123122321121132.title: Pedal to the Metal

1121231223212.content:
It takes Fulda much less time than you to recover, and you're still very much in pain and borderline delirious when you hear metal grinding as she hoists up the squat bar again. Once more she dips, pushing you into the spandex already stretched to its limit to cover her powerful thighs and tight butt. You try to push against it, but your hands can barely even budge the material, and even then you'd just be pushed into her ass.

The pressure lessens, and you shout, "Fulda, please stop! I've learned my lesson, I won't-" You're cut off by waves of pain as she squats again, this time going lower than any time before. The skintight material perfectly conforms around you as you're brought closer to your breaking point. She lingers there a bit longer, bouncing up and down, causing you to cry out from the pain.

Once more the force on you is relieved, and you yell, "Fulda! Have mercy, I can't take-" She cuts you off again as you're plunged back down, this time going lower than ever. As her butt pushes further the spandex does its best to conform with you between the two. The pain is already blinding when she starts to shake her rear forwards and back, grinding you into her shorts. Your body reaches its limit and gives up as you're flattened between Fulda's butt and her spandex, your tiny corpse outlined perfectly for anyone who knows where to look.

When Fulda next comes up she's absolutely euphoric: she just literally killed someone with her ass.
1121231223212.title: Twerked to Death

1122.content:
The enormous shoe ceiling above you moves forward, temporarily removing the threat of crushing you. As Fulda's massive leg leaves you behind you try running after it, hoping that the giant woman is merely playing hardball. Unfortunately your feet have difficulty finding traction in the long carpet fibers below you, and you're easily left in the dust.

"Fulda wait, come back!" you plea, but if your cries are heard at all they fall on deaf ears. Amongst the cacophony of feet pounding for the exit your voice is easily lost, if it were audible to begin with. You look up where you had been sitting, sure that if your stuff is still there someone would figure something is wrong after an hour. Fulda must have thought of this though, and had walked off with your backpack and notebook.

It's still morning, and there will be another class here in fifteen minutes, just as full as the one you were in. Instead of taking the risk of being caught in the doorway when everyone barges in you head under your chair to wait for someone to sit nearby.

You don't have to wait long, since one of the early birds in this class likes sitting in the back too. As soon as you settle into your hiding place under the chair a pair of legs, guided by two positively enormous shoes, appear in front of you. From the shadows you have difficulty identifying what kind as they turn around, and the chair above you creaks from them sitting down. This could be a golden opportunity, you think, but is it worth taking?
1122.title: Tiny and Alone

choices: No, you need to climb higher
11221.content:
Not wanting to lose this opportunity you dart forward, your feet pounding into the thin, dense carpet, propelling you toward the shoes. Above you the chair squeaks as the person shifts their body, crossing one ankle over the other. You note details of the legs as you can see them better: freshly shaven, pale, elegant... definitely a woman's legs, at the very least.

You emerge from under the seat and get bathed in the fluorescent lights of the lecture hall once more. With a glance up you see the worn treads of a running shoe, and to your right you see a white ankle sock barely peeking over the top of a gray New Balance larger than some forms of public transit. Sure in your purpose you walk to one of the lime green laces brushing the floor and grab hold.

When you lift the aglet off the carpet and begin climbing the lace swings forward, bringing you into contact with the suede. Thinking quickly you swing your legs up and begin walking up the huge indented N, pulling yourself along the lace with your arms. It's a mercifully short climb, and soon you're standing at the tongue of her shoe.

Curious you look up, wondering if you can identify the titaness from here, but your view is blocked by her other leg resting just above you. You take several steps back, walking down the crossed laces until you're at the bottom, and check the view again. You can't believe it, but you know her! Straight black hair, dark eyes, slightly Asian features, it's-

Your train of thought is derailed when she lifts up the shoe you're on, tossing you against the laces. You grab on tight as it swings back down and bounces off the floor, making your body flop up and down. The incessant pounding continues for over a minute while she idly pounds her heel into the ground, oblivious to how much discomfort it's causing you and your presence as a whole.

When it stops you're able to collect your thoughts again. This is definitely Julie! You had a class with her last semester, and you often pass each other on your way out of this lecture, stopping to talk each time you do. She must have been here early hoping to see you, but never would have expected to see you like this - for that matter, while she is a good deal taller than you normally you never expected to be looking up at her ankle.

Emboldened by a friendly face you run back up the laces, ready to grab on in case her foot kicks up again, until you reach the top. You wedge yourself in between her shoe's tongue and her ankle, then begin frantically striking the smooth skin - slapping, poking, drawing patterns with your finger, anything you think will get her attention. The weight on her leg shifts, and you look up to see her ankle lifting. The important question, though, is does she notice you?
11221.title: A Familiar Face

choices: She gets bored and starts playing with you
You get bored and have to entertain yourself
112212.content:
The ankle blocking your view upwards lifts, and Julie's foot takes a broad arc before she sets it back down on the floor. Her foot raises slightly when she leans down, her pretty face blocking out the overhead lights. Her brown eyes search for the source of her irritation, and quickly lock on to you, still struggling against her leg. You feel a breeze from her gasp, and you brace for the worst.

"There you are!" she whispers, her voice booming despite her efforts to keep quiet. "I was looking all over for you! Here, let me get you out of there." Her face pulls away and her right hand swings in, her fingers wedging under the tongue of her shoe. In no time she has you secured, and gently pulls you out from inside the top of her shoe. Slowly she carries you up to her face level and drops you into her other hand's waiting palm.

It's one thing to play around her ankles, but you hadn't anticipated what she'd look like now. Each of her eyes were now wide enough for you to curl up inside, and you could hop on her nose as if you were riding her face. If you wanted to you could easily curl up on her cheeks and take a nap, and her mouth, spread wide in a smile that seemed inappropriate considering, is longer than a canoe. It's impossible not to be awe-struck by your friend's features at this size, and a little intimidated.

"What happened to you though?" Julie asks, bringing you closer to her mouth. "I remember you being short, but not quite like this." She smirks, showing teeth through her enormous lips, and you try to return it without thinking of how easily you'd fit in there.

Quickly you tell her about your day so far - running into Fulda, shrinking during class, then her leaving you on the floor. "I'm really glad you found me," you say at the end. "I was worried it would be someone less... friendly. But now you can help me get back to my original size!"

Julie gives an exaggerated wince, then answers, "I'd love to help you, and I am definitely going to as soon as I have some idea how. But this is the semester review, and I kind of have to be here for it. Being tiny an extra hour won't kill you, will it?" Before you can answer she adds, "Of course not. So chill on the desk and bask in my radiance for a bit!" She lowers her hand to the desk and tilts her palm, allowing you to step off just as the lights dim. You gaze up at Julie while she stares intently forward, ready to take notes, and wonder how you'll make it through an hour of this, let alone longer.
112212.title: In Julie's Hands Now

choices: She takes you to get help right away
She decides to eat lunch first
She takes you out to the quad
1122121.content:
You do your best to stay out of Julie's way when her hand scribbled a quick note or two, not wanting to wind up pinned or impaled. To be honest you have no clue what this course is or what sort of notes she's taking, and at this scale you can't make out more than two or three letters at a time. There's not even time to read the slides, as you constantly need to stay moving to avoid an accident. Plus, Julie is much more pleasant to look at.

Half an hour of this passes before Julie sets her pencil down, then sets her elbow next to you. She rests her cheek atop her palm and looks down, more interested in you than the lecture. Carefully she sets her hand down on the other side of you, then begins rapping her fingers on the desktop. The pounding becomes irritating fast as you feel a slight jolt every time a fingertip touches down, and a thin strip of white indicates her smile.

She lifts up her hand and you recoil from a grab that never comes. Instead she sets her fingers down just next to you and begins tapping her index finger over and over, bringing it up and down like a jackhammer. After several taps she crosses it over your head and starts tapping there, showing no signs of slowing down. Julie does this several times until you become visibly annoyed by the incessant hammering, and lifts up her finger one more time. In one powerful stroke she brings it down, knocking you to your back and pinning you under her finger.

While you're pinned she leans down, putting her lips just above your head. "I'm sorry," she says, "you're just too cute like this, and the review is more boring than I thought." She lifts her finger off you and continues, "Let's play!" Then she rests her head on her hand again and waits for you to stand up.

As soon as you get your footing she brings her finger down again, allowing you to just step out of the way. Julie giggles and swipes with her finger, making you duck just below as the enormous digit passes where you're standing. She swipes at you several more times, making you dodge until you stumble over and fall onto her middle finger.

You push yourself up just as Julie rests her chin on the desk before you, a mischievous grin on her face. Without saying a word she puckers her lips and blows, the stream of wind catching you in the chest. You're thrown from your feet and carried six inches away, landing on your back and skidding along the paper. Julie's thunderous giggles fill the air, and when you open your eyes her palm is stretched out above you. In a single movement she scoops you up into her hand and lightly closes her fist around you, then lifts you up to her face.

Julie's fingers open allowing you to stand, nearly close enough to grab the tip of her nose. Her other hand is poised to continue poking you, but just then the lights come back up, signalling the end of the lecture and sparing you from further games. "Guess we better get moving then!" she declares, closing her fingers around you again before she gathers her things to leave the lecture hall.
1122121.title: Boy Toy

11221212.content:
You're plunged into darkness inside Julie's fist, the warmth from the inside of her hand quickly building up around you. There's nowhere for the heat to vent and barely any light poking through, just small pinpricks on either side. Still, you realize that inside her hand is the safest place, since you don't fancy a rough ride in her pocket, and you've seen how much stuff inside her purse could slide and crush you.

Julie does her best to control her gait, moving quickly without swinging you too hard, and you find the motions at the very least relaxing. Thick walls of flesh muffle any sounds, and you realize that you're essentially blind, deaf and dumb on this voyage, with a heaping dose of uncomfortably hot on top of that. Still, you trust Julie to be doing the right thing for you.

You're subjected to a series of jerking motions as Julie's hand moves back and forth, making you bounce between her palm and fingers, followed by several minutes of no movement at all. Finally, you think, you've arrived at the first place Julie's gone for help, and soon you might be back to full size, or at least not small enough to fit inside her palm. You eagerly await finding out where she thought to even begin with this.

Her hand opens, letting you gently slide down her palm until you land atop a plastic tray. She pulls her hand away and places it to the side, letting you see the high ceiling and wide open spaces of where she's taken you. Hey, this is the cafeteria!

"Julie!" you shout, startling her while picking up her fork. "I thought you were taking me to get help! What are we doing here?" Julie looks down at you and blushes.

"Well, I really have no idea where to start with this," she begins, "this was all so sudden, and it's not like I can go around asking people 'My friend shrank, what do?' without sounding like a crazy person. Plus I think better with a full stomach, and I'm sure you could use some food, too. Now c'mon, is another half hour tiny really going to kill you?" You grumble indistinctly in response, but realistically you can't make someone several hundred times your size do anything. Julie doesn't wait for a response and starts digging in.
11221212.title: Lunch with Julie

choices: She purposefully scoops you into her spoon
She accidentally scoops you into her spoon
112212123.content:
"Well, I guess not," you admit through a grumble, "but after this I really would like it if you could try to take me somewhere that might be able to help me. Maybe someone in a biology or particle physics lab? I know that it'll be hard to explain, but I'm sure that if you show me to them that'll be all the explanation necessary."

"I promise I'll get you to help," Julie replies, her huge warm eyes engulfing you. "I just... what if they can't help you? What if no one can? What if you're stuck like this and whoever I take you to keeps you for experiments? Wouldn't you rather hang out with me for a bit longer and have a good time, even if you're itty-bitty?"

You open your mouth to reply, but before you can Julie slaps you in the chest with a steamed green bean. "There, eat up," she says, turning back to her food. "You may be small but you still need to eat, right?" She shovels forkfuls of food several times your size into her mouth while you watch, taking small bites off the bean in your arms. By now your clothes have absorbed some moisture from the food, and you find that it's much more difficult to chew when the bean would normally be larger than yourself. Still you make an effort to eat some of it, doing your best not to choke, so that Julie won't be worried.

After a half-dozen bites you're not sure you can take any more, and Julie seems to notice that you're done. She reaches for you and takes it out of your arms, easily wresting it from you since her fingers have ten times the strength as your body, then plucks you up by the collar. Julie carefully lifts you over part of the tray and gently sets you down, then withdraws her hand, and you find yourself standing next to a mountain of mashed potatoes.

"Okay little guy, you try to reach the summit before I start on those potatoes," Julie says before starting on her entree. Before you can protest she finishes "Ready, go!" and begins attacking her food. While she messily shoves heap after heap of food into her mouth you attack the dollop of potatoes, but find yourself unable to make any progress. The potatoes are too mealy and don't provide any support, even for someone who barely weighs an ounce.

Potatoes continue to pile down around you, coming up to your chest after an avalanche. Before you can free yourself Julie has finished her portion, and turns to where you're practically buried under mashed potatoes, spoon in hand. When she doesn't see you at the top she looks around for you somewhere in the mess, ready to dig in with her spoon.
112212123.title: Meal Time

1122121231.content:
Unable to actually climb up the potatoes and thoroughly stuck you stay where you are, not wanting to make your position any worse. Julie leans forward, her face becoming the sky for you momentarily, and begins looking through the sectioned area for you. When her eyes light upon you she smiles, and you remain where you are helplessly, waist-deep in her food.

"Wow, look at you down there!" she whispers, more than loud enough for you to hear. "Couldn't even be bothered to climb, huh?" She scoops out a bite from the potatoes in front of you, holding the spoon above you. "Were you just not strong enough or what?" Before you can answer she pops the spoon into her mouth, depositing twice as much as what's holding you in place onto her tongue.

She swallows her bite before continuing with her ribbing. "If you aren't, that's fine, you were never really all that strong anyway." After a quick pause she sets the spoon down, placing the handle right next to you. "Go ahead, try to pick it up," she challenges. "See if your muscles really are that puny compared to mighty Julie's!" If just to get her to move on you decide to give it a shot, bracing yourself as well as you can and lifting with all your might.

The spoon remains unmoved for a second, then begins to wobble slightly while you lift. To your surprise it even begins to leave the ground! Before it moves noticeably though Julie sets her index finger down on the very tip, rooting it to the ground with a clang. "It was a good effort," she says to try to console you, "but your puny muscles can never compare to my Godzilla-like strength." She picks the spoon back up and declares, "See? I can lift this, completely effortlessly, with just one hand!"

You wonder how long this will go on, still stuck on her tray by a small portion of her lunch. "Fear not though," she continues. "I, the mighty Julie, will protect you from all threats, like a sudden gust of wind or a sink drain!" She giggles and you glower slightly, wishing she would just move on. Julie seems to notice your annoyance and concludes, "Okay, I'll get you out of there and cleaned off." With two careful fingers she grabs your collar and picks you up out of the small mound, easily breaking the potatoes apart before finding a way to clean you.
1122121231.title: Shortcomings

11221212311.content:
Deftly Julie lifts you above her plastic cup, filled within an inch of the brim with water, and dangles you over it. While you consider this immense reservoir her hand quickly shoots down, dunking you into the water with a swift strike. You're shocked by suddenly being dipped into the room temperature water and gasp, the little bit of air in your lungs escaping. Her fingertips remain pinched around your collar, maintaining their iron grip while you soak.

The potatoes stuck to you break off and partially dissolve into the clear water, rendering it cloudy with some debris. For good measure Julie shakes you off, swirling you within her drink to throw off the last small bits of food and get you exceptionally clean. Then, just as spontaneously as she dropped you in, she pulls you back out, simply retracting her fingers until you're no longer submersed.

Water pours off you back into the cup, and you're absolutely soaked from head to toe. "Oh, this won't do either!" Julie laments upon seeing how soaked you are. "Give me a sec, I'll get you dried off." She gives you a quick twist to cast off excess liquid, then lowers you down to an open, flat area of her tray and sets you down.

You lie there in a growing puddle of water until Julie's fingers return, bringing a stark white napkin to lay over you. The coarse paper lands around you like a parachute and you feel Julie's fingers tapping against the plastic searching for you, the thumping getting louder and vibrations getting stronger as she zeroes in. Finally she hits her mark, the soft padding of her fingertip setting down on your feet.

Julie softly taps the napkin over the body, gradually dabbing you dry. The warmth from her fingertip is comforting, especially after that sudden dip, and her delicate manner soothes your nerves like a full body massage. When the napkin over you is saturated she slides it up an inch and starts again, dabbing away moisture until there's nothing left to dab out.

In your delicate state Julie is careful not to press too hard, using just the right amount of force to press the paper onto you. Her numerous finger taps, dozens per section, put you into a relaxed state, and you barely even notice when they stop. For her part when you're fully dry Julie simply rubs you up and down playfully through the napkin.

Suddenly she tears away the napkin and the reality of what was happening sets in. An enormous fingertip the size of your entire torso looms above you, connected to a finger nearly three times your height on a hand as wide as a decently sized yard. Off to the side you see Julie's head practically laying on the table, her dark eyes filled with mirth as she idly rubs away. With one last stroke she ruffles your hair then pulls her hand away, removing the most concerning thing you've seen in some time.

"Um, sorry about that," Julie says with a blush, "but now you're all cleaned up! I guess now that you won't make a mess I can go ahead and take you to get help, huh?" She bashfully tilts her head and waits for you to make a suggestion.
11221212311.title: Taking a Dip

112212123113.content:
"You know, I've been tiny for a couple hours now," you begin. "What could a little bit longer hurt, really?" Julie's eyes go wide like you just told her you came here on a ship from Mars. She leans in close, putting her nose within your arm's reach. Seeing her up this close, where she fills every aspect of your view and you can spot every pore, makes you start to reconsider your decision, but you stay the course.

"I'm sorry, what did you say?" she whispers in disbelief. The breath hissing from her lips hits you while it's still warm, helping you get over the chills from being suddenly dipped in a glass of water.

"If you want to take your time getting me some help, it's okay," you explain. You reach up and push on her nose, the cartilage giving a bit to your hand while her head remains totally unmoved. She narrows her eyes down at you and spends a moment thinking it over.

"I'm not sure I get it," Julie starts. "Do you like being small or something? I mean you were before but... not like this." To demonstrate she pulls her head away and places a fingertip on you so that it covers you from the neck down. Without any pressure you only feel the warmth, and you don't even really feel afraid. "What if you keep, um, shrinking? You might end up, uh, ant-sized, or even smaller!"

For once you're glad you're this small - she can't see you blushing. "I don't mind being small with you! I don't feel like you'll hurt me, and we've been having fun so far, right? If I get really teensy, like 'need a magnifying glass to see me' small, then I'll start worrying, but for now, I don't see the harm."

"Well, I guess," Julie relents, moving her thumb to your side. She pinches them together around your chest and picks you up, then holds you in front of her eyes. "But only because you're so cute. We'll talk about this later, though." She stands up to bus her tray and lowers you down to chest level, hoping to avoid drawing too much attention.

"Hey, wait!" you shout. "Where are you gonna put me?"

Without looking down Julie replies, "In my hand, duh. Safest place!" There's a clatter when she sets down her tray, then a quick spin as she turns around. She grins and gives you a reassuring squeeze, then asks aloud, "Now where should I take you?"
112212123113.title: Choosing Small

choices: One of Julie's friends stopped her
Someone much less pleasant stopped her
1122121231131.content:
There's a brief detour while Julie goes back to grab her bag from the chair, then she heads for the nearest exit. She keeps you fairly stable in front of her chest, her strong grip ensuring that you don't get thrown around or slip out. You wouldn't even have noticed you were going down the stairs were it not for your college's name across her chest bouncing up and down.

With a shove Julie forces the door open, and the two of you emerge into a bright late Spring day. You had forgotten how nice it was outside before you went into that lecture, but you also never expected to see it again. Julie breathes in deep, savoring the fresh air, and you do the same. Her inhalation kicks up some pollen spores, now about the size of golf balls to you, and you realize one benefit of being this small is you won't have to deal with allergies.

Julie looks around to make sure no one's paying attention to her, then asks, "Are you doing okay down there? I'm not holding you too tight or hurting you, am I?"

"No, I'm fine," you say, your eyes still focusing on the bouncing ahead of them. Another benefit of being small, and while it may feel rude to stare it's better than looking down. "Wouldn't it be better to put me on your shoulder though, so that you have a free hand?"

"Sure, I'd have a free hand," she says, continuing straight on her course. "I could use it to reach for you when you fall off after someone bumps into me. Maybe I'd catch you, maybe you'd land in the middle of this very busy sidewalk." Julie widens her eyes in feign horror. "Besides, I'd rather keep you where you are. If you were anywhere else I wouldn't be able to see you!"

You're not sure whether that last statement should be worrying, but you choose not to dwell on it. Instead you nestle yourself in comfortably between her fingers, and find some relaxation between the soft padding of the tips. The gentle swaying and timid shakes from her walking gradually put your mind at ease, and you find that you don't really mind this.

Julie suddenly stops, and the jolt from her halt knocks you out of your relaxed state. You glance up and see that Julie is no longer looking at you; rather, she's looking off to the side and past you.
1122121231131.title: Taking You Home

choices: "I need to work on a paper right now though."
11221212311311.content:
Thankfully the reason Julie has stopped is that she's arrived at her apartment complex's door and needs to enter the code. You're treated to a brief ride while her hand darts back and forth punching in the keys, getting thrown back and forth between her palm and fingers, until the door lets out a loud click. Julie's fingers tighten around you as she pulls the door open, then they lighten again while she waits for the elevator.

The next time you feel the gentle sway of movement is when she exits and heads towards her apartment door. You hear the key roar when it enters the lock followed by the click of the tumblers, and in just one more moment you're inside. Her door slams with a great boom followed by the clatter of her bag on the ground, then the blood rushes away from your head while she lifts her hand up to her face.

Julie opens her fingers, allowing you to see more than then inside of her hand for the first time in what felt like half an hour. Immediately in front of you is her nose, which quickly scrunches up while she narrows her eyes. She poises her other hand to the side, one finger extended, while you stand transfixed by how large every part of her is now.

"Hey cutie!" she booms, poking you with a finger firmly enough to knock you over. "Glad to see you made the trip in one piece!" Julie begins lowering her hand to a counter top below, allowing you to see ever more of her as her face grows increasingly distant. After half a minute of very gentle descent her hand sets down flatly, and you step off her fingers.

Julie places both her palms on the counter so that they flank you on each side and sticks out her butt, allowing her to lean down towards you. When her face is about a foot above you she stops and says, "So, we're alone in my apartment. Is it as magnificent as you always imagined?" You look around, and aside from Julie it looks very similar to your own apartment, save for the shelves of manga and rack of video game consoles.

"Yeah, I dig it," you reply nonchalantly. Honestly you had sometimes wondered what her place is like, and you're glad to find out it's a lot like yours, just cleaner and with different furniture. "Though the most impressive thing about it is you."

"Oh stop," Julie replies, feigning humility. "There'll be plenty of time for that later. We're gonna have so much fun!" She pauses, tilts her head, and takes in a deep breath before continuing.
11221212311311.title: Julie's Place

choices: Tragedy strikes on your trip down
112212123113111.content:
"Don't worry, it'll only be a couple hours," Julie continues apologetically, beaming her infectious smile down toward you. "I'll even let you stay close to me while I work!" Her hand snaps up from her side and hovers mere inches above you, Julie's fingers becoming your ceiling while she leaves it there. She carefully lowers her thumb and forefinger down, pinching you up between them, and picks you up off the counter. Julie quickly lifts you up to her eye, close enough for you to touch it were your arms not pinned down to your side, and asks, "You want to be in the shadow of your mighty, gigantic protector, right?" You play along and nod your head, and Julie moves you so she isn't tickling you wish her eyelashes.

Swiftly Julie takes you to her room, grinning the whole time while she watches you constantly adjusting under her grip. She pauses in the doorway to her bedroom to slip out of her running shoes, then reaches onto a shelf to grab a book thicker than you are tall, all without disturbing you. When she's situated Julie plops down on the bed with an enormous crash and springs squeaking under her weight, and your organs feel as if they're about to spill out of your feet while Julie harmlessly bounces up and down on her mattress.

Julie lowers you until your feet touch down upon the thick patchwork quilt and lets go, freeing her hand to hold the book she's studying. "If you want to go look around, that's okay," Julie suggests, opening the book. You look up at her chin directly above you and she continues, "This probably isn't going to be the most exciting time." Her eyes scan the tower of text, marked through with yellow highlighter every so often. As you're becoming accustomed to, she's probably right.

You get out from under Julie's nose and walk toward her chest. She has her forearms running along the mattress forming a solid barrier, with her body propped up on her elbows. While you walk under her armpit you marvel at how immense everything seems to you now, and you hope Julie remains as protective as she's been letting on. With some effort you could climb up onto her shoulders, and in the distance you can see her socked feet idly pumping back and forth in the air while she reads, both tantalizing targets for your curiosity.
112212123113111.title: Work Before Play

choices: Head back and crest her butt
1122121231131111.content:
While finding a perch on her shoulder is tempting you have never been able to resist a well-toned pair of legs. You move out from beneath her armpit, trying to get your balance on the soft surface of her mattress, and start walking down her side. Her white sheets become looser the further away from her elbows you get, and you find yourself stepping higher to clear the minute wrinkles on her bed.

You stay close to the living terrain while you progress, the chill of her shadow offsetting the warmth radiating from her body. The mattress dips down from her weight when you get close to where the bottom of her ribs rest on it, creating a steep incline. Your foot catches on some loose threading in the sheets and you find yourself stumbling the rest of the way, barely able to keep your balance until you crash into Julie's side. Through her shirt you can feel her firm abs, and she gently rocks back and forth as her legs continue to kick the air.

Once you stabilize yourself you resume walking down the length of her body, leaning against her for additional support. The creases in the sheets from Julie's mass create waist-high obstacles you have to step over, pressing up against her to avoid losing your balance again. Her body slowly raises and lowers with the rhythm of her breathing, apparently showing you no mind while you trek through her shadow.

The living terrain beside you dips sharply as you get closer toward your goal, then quickly rises again to form her round butt. In only a few more minutes of carefully traversing her bed you reach the bottom of her shorts, not much further down her leg than the bottom of her buttocks. Seeing this as your last opportunity to get up you seize what loose material there is on her shorts and hoist yourself up.

After a minute of hard climbing you crest her thigh and stand there triumphant. Behind you her butt slopes upward, and in front of you her bare thighs stretch to her knee, where her shin rises up like a tower. Julie continues idly kicks her legs back and forth, bringing her feet to rest on her pillow with a muffled crash for a brief second before they shoot back into the air.

You take a tentative step forward onto the exposed skin and let out a breath you didn't know you were holding when your foot sinks in without incident. After a few more steps however Julie begins to shudder, and you realize that your cautious strides are tickling her. Julie's shin races toward you, her calf stopping mere inches from your head when her toned muscles are compressed enough that it can not descend any more. If you had been further down you would have been caught in the squeeze. It occurs that this might not be the wisest path, and Julie may be too engrossed in her reading to pay you any mind right now.
1122121231131111.title: Walking Along the Titaness

11221212311311111.content:
Julie leaves her leg up and pulled as far inward as it can go, bringing her calf slightly closer while she stretches her muscles. You take a couple cautious steps forward, your tiny feet making small dimples in her skin as you progress. Standing close, you reach out and push on her calf muscle, and your hands make barely perceptible indentations on her smooth skin. As though she's answering a challenge Julie pulls her leg in further, driving you back up her leg.

Suddenly Julie flings her leg forward, catapulting it away from you as she explosively releases the tension built up in her knee. Julie's foot slams into the pillow with a thud, and you're knocked on your back from the unexpected shock running up her leg. In the corner of your vision you see her black ponytail briefly flip to the side when she peeks over her shoulder at you, then she turns back to her reading with a smile.

Glad that you haven't been forgotten you push yourself back to your feet and look down the leg ahead of you. Without deliberating too long you begin jogging down the middle of Julie's leg, not letting your feet sink too deeply into the supple skin acting as your ground. You quickly reached the well-creased skin on the back of her knee and pass over it, finding easy traction in the wrinkles, to reach the gentle slope of her calf.

Knowing that you're over halfway there fills you with determination, and you embark on the next leg of your journey. You lean forward while you ascend the toned muscle to keep yourself balanced, and the firm surface provides you with a swift journey. Before long you crest the top of her muscle and look down the remaining slope to her foot laid out as though it is eagerly awaiting you. Without hesitating you begin running down the slope, eager to reach your goal at the bottom of Julie's leg.

Your downhill run is very quick, but before you can begin ascending Julie's Achilles tendon something blocks your path. An enormous white wall plops down in front of you and you crash into the cotton surface, stopped cold by the foot within it. A quiet giggle reaches your ears while you are pushed aside so Julie can orient her foot along the length of her leg. The enormous mound of her big toe wiggles up and down inside the sock while she scratches her ankle, and you patiently wait, teetering on the edge.

After what seems like minutes Julie moves her foot away, clearing the path for you once again. Eagerly you clamber up her ankle, using the creases over her tendon for handholds, until you reach her stark white sock. Climbing it like a net you ascend the curvature of her heel until you're standing upright again. Quickly you survey the land before you: Julie's socked foot stretches dozens of feet before you, pressed deeply into the light blue pillow beneath her. Before you can fully take it in however Julie's foot begins to move, and you crouch down to take action.
11221212311311111.title: All the Way Down

choices: Grab onto the sock and pull yourself towards the arch of her foot
Resume mad flailing and screaming, hoping she hears you this time
112212123113111113.content:
The plush field of cotton beneath you begins to stir and you freeze dead in your tracks. Far ahead at the edge of the plateau you see the bundle of toes scrunch together and rise up, followed by your body beginning to feel much heavier. The powerful leg muscles launch the foot up off the pillow for yet another voyage through the heavens, the force of the acceleration bringing you down to your hands and knees. Your feeble arms are just barely strong enough to keep your upper body elevated and prevent your face from being smothered in the soft, damp ground beneath you. Before you even really get a chance to consider whether or not you could survive a fifty-foot drop to a soft round butt (or whether it would be worth it anyways) the ascent comes to a halt, much sooner than you were expecting. With the ability to move freely once again returned to you, you look ahead to see the downwards slope leading to the toes, but are instead greeted by a wall of off-white just a couple of feet before your face.

Craning your neck back, you instead look up the great wall, now noticing that it's bespeckled with pieces of lint and dirt that would likely be imperceptible to a normal-sized person. You also realize that the dark sole of the sock is a bit dirtier than you initially thought, made evident only by the area covering the arch which is a shade lighter than the rest from not touching the floor with as much pressure. Finally your eyes are drawn upwards to the group of toes crowning the monolithic appendage, wriggling gleefully behind their white veil every so often as if to laugh at the tiny being prostrated before them. When you hear actual laughter reverberate around you like thunder, it takes you a moment to realize that you haven't gone completely insane yet before turning around to face the source of it.

Far off in the distance you spy Julie's magnificent face now resting about level with your tiny body, half turned to look at you with mirth in her one visible eye and mouth turned up in a toothy smile as her chin rests on her palm, her fingers idly twirling a pen. The sight before you is breathtaking. You look down at the vast valley below you, down the thick pillar of her leg and follow her thigh over her hilly buttocks and up her shapely back, finding the long ponytail leading up to the peak of her head, just above where her gorgeous face is waiting for you. It makes you think of an enormous monument carved out of a mountain in propitiation to an ancient, benevolent deity. Before you get a chance to contemplate the image of tiny tribesman armed with chisels and hammers rappelling down the side of her immaculate face however, her eyes shut tight and her incandescent smile grows ever larger as she brings it down into her fist, a series of trembles rumbling through her body and knocking you down onto your back. At this, you dig your hands and feet underneath the ropes of the thick sock beneath you, bracing yourself to weather the series of small earthquakes that you're apparently responsible for. The fact that her good-spirited giggling is more violent and dangerous than any actual earthquake you've ever had to sit through makes you well aware that the sight before you is more similar to an actual goddess than a mere rendition of one. It also makes you really hope you get back to your normal size before you get to experience a real earthquake.

After what feels like close to a minute, she raises her head back up to look at you, the last of her laughter trailing off as her eye locks on to your minuscule form. Apparently she found the sight of what appeared to be her tiny friend worshiping her toes to be pretty funny as well. Certainly not what she was expecting at the very least, you're sure.

"I have to let you down so I can go to the bathroom little guy, and I'm pretty sure you don't wanna be laying there when I stand up" she bellowed towards you, the beaming smile on her face never so much as weakening. "I promise you can get back to whatever it is you're trying to do there when I'm done."

Fair enough, you think. As much as you like standing up here on top of her foot, you imagine it wouldn't be quite as pleasant underneath it. You take in a deep breath and cup your hands around your mouth. "Okay!" you shout as loud as you can. "Just lower me down and I'll-"

"I'll only be just a second," she boomed back at you, her tremendous voice effortlessly cutting you off mid-sentence as she turned to set her pen down on the book. "I laughed so hard I'm about to piss my pants."

How ladylike, you think to yourself, a grin spreading across your face. You were slightly irked at being cut off, but you suppose she probably can't hear your tiny voice all the way down here.

Before you have time to do anything else, you feel weightlessness as the foot begins its descent, with the angle shifting ever so slightly on the way down. By the time her toes reach the mattress, it's almost a straight vertical drop. She then presses the pads of her toes down to the mattress and brings her heel down further, and you feel gravity begin to work it's magic once again. You release the ropes on both sides of you and begin to plummet, concentrating on how to land without spraining anything. It wasn't that far down to her soft pillow, but even a five-foot drop could mess up an ankle pretty badly if you don't land right. Granted, that was in a worst-case scenario, but-

BAM!

You shake the stars from your eyes and your vision returns as you wonder what the hell just happened. You knew you still had quite a ways to go before hitting the pillow, and you were also pretty sure pillows aren't usually this hard. You look forward and the first thing you see before you is what appears to be the socked wall of Julie's foot. That must be what just hit you like you owe it money, you reason. The next thing you notice is that pain isn't the only thing you feel in your face. All of the blood is rushing to your head and there's also an extremely uncomfortable amount of pressure around your ankle. Looking up to the source of the pain, you see that you are dangling upside-down from your left leg, your ankle caught in the thick tangled threads of Julie's sock like a rabbit in a snare trap. Instantly your blood turns to ice and dread rises in your chest.

Springing into action, you thrash your leg in an attempt to shake yourself free, though you think that if anything all that did was make matters worse. Moving onto your next plan, you attempt to bring your upper body up primarily with your abdominal muscles to reach the knot and untie it yourself. Then you remember that you don't have any abdominal muscles and curse under your breath, realizing it's a lot harder than it looks even though it already looked pretty damn hard. You begin to panic even more as you start feeling light-headed and try to think of another idea. All you can do is look down at the soft, inviting pillow just out of reach below you while your body twirls slightly as it dangles. You're not sure if it was because of all the extra blood in your head, but it's not long before you come up with your next plan and start rhythmically swinging your body back and forth. Once you start getting high enough, you use the added momentum combined with one last burst of strength and a vigorous roar to reach up and grasp onto your pant leg. You begin pulling yourself up one handhold at a time, ignoring the tremendous pain in the many places on your body.

Just as it seems like you might be able to get yourself free from this predicament before things get ugly, your body is whipped back and forth violently and you're sent smashing into the rough flesh hidden beneath the deceptively soft fabric a few more times before returning to your starting position, albeit with the thread hanging down a bit further than it did before. It seems Julie gave her heel a slight (to her) wiggle, no doubt attempting to make sure you landed safely on the pillow, ironically enough. Overwhelmed with despair and almost completely spent of energy, you have little choice left to you other than to scream Julie's name as loud as you can and pound against the socked behemoth in front of you.

"Ooh, I better hurry!" is your response as the foot rises back up to a vertical position and you feel yourself pressed into the cotton wall again. "Behave yourself while I'm gone" she booms down towards her pillow playfully, though with a sense of urgency apparent in her voice. Just as you're about to get ready for another round of impotent flailing and screaming, you feel the foot go sideways, right before rocketing towards the edge of the bed with enough G-forces to knock even the most experienced of ace pilots out cold. Thankfully it stops shortly after if begins, just before you lose consciousness and/or that green bean you had earlier.

Although it was nothing new at this point, no amount of bracing could prepare you for the impact into her brick wall of a heel. Retaining just enough consciousness to realize you have no time to hang around dazed and contused, you ignore your possible concussion and quickly bring yourself back to your senses, only to be greeted by the sight of the carpeted floor hundreds of feet below you. Spitting out a baseball-sized piece of lint you realized forced its way into your mouth when you tried to scream, you quickly get to work on thinking of a new plan. Surely she must have just felt you slam into her foot with the force of a speeding truck though, right? God knows you did!

As if to answer your question, the feet lowered themselves down to the floor, the toes coming to rest on the carpet as Julie aligned herself and scooted her butt forward. This girl must either have some really thick socks or a really thick head, you think to yourself.

Whatever you do, you better do it quickly!
112212123113111113.title: Rise to Action

11221212311311113.content:
Before continuing onward you take a deep breath and steel yourself, secure in the belief that Julie can feel you walking over her skin. You take a couple steps forward and Julie's leg swings away from you and back down, her foot slamming into the pillow with a suppressed bang. Momentarily you freeze while the impact's shock runs up her leg, shaking you, before the force abates. This looks like as good a sign as any, you think, and press onward towards her foot.

Your progress down her thigh is swift, since your feet create small dimples in her skin to provide extra stability. In only a minute you reach her knee, almost halfway to your goal, and you pause to survey the broad plain between her tendons before trudging up the slight hill of her calf. From what you can tell Julie remains oblivious to your trek, and you appreciate the hands-off approach she has to you crawling around on her.

Right when you step off to the last leg of your journey deep creases suddenly appear across the back of her knee. One of your feet gets trapped between the skin forming one, and no matter how hard you try your shrunken body does not have the strength to get free. Julie's leg rises up like a behemoth, towering over you like a skyscraper. You look up in awe at it as you're nudged backward, kept upright only by your trapped foot, barely able to see her socked foot swinging back and forth past her calf dominating your vision.

Julie begins waving her leg forward and back, pushing you away each time it contacts you. After a few seconds of you watching in dread her leg topples over toward you, and you raise your hands in a futile effort to slow or stop it. Effortlessly the back of Julie's knee folds over you, pinning you into the soft flesh while you struggle to move. When her leg can go no further it stops with a jerk, and the pressure becomes too much to take. Your body gets squished in the area behind Julie's kneecap, the sound of your bones being crushed barely loud enough to escape the fleshy prison around you.

When Julie finally puts her leg back down she feels your blood trickling down the side of her leg. Intrigued at the feeling she looks back, easily spotting the red smear of your corpse against her alabaster skin. "I... I killed him!" she cries, barely holding back tears. "Oh my God I'm so sorry, I didn't mean to!" Her voice quivers, and for a long time she can do nothing but stare at the spot on her leg where she squashed you, knowing that no matter how sorry she is she still killed you.
11221212311311113.title: In the Pits

choices: "Okay, I'll take you somewhere for help."
1122121232.content:
When the potatoes falling off the mound reach your armpits you throw in the towel, admitting you'll never make any progress. You look up and see Julie's head darting back and forth, no doubt trying to find you somewhere not at the top. Her eyes light up with recognition, and you wave your arms as much as you can to make sure she doesn't miss you.

"Look at you down there, cutie!" she says, moving her spoon behind you. "Why, I could just gobble you up!" Your eyes widen and she sweeps the spoon forward, kicking your legs up and knocking you back into the basin. She hurriedly lifts it up to mouth level and holds it in front of her, looking at you trapped under the potatoes.

"Oh yeah," she continues while you struggle to get free, "you definitely look good enough to eat." With what feels like hundreds of pounds lying atop you, any progress you make will be agonizingly slow - rather, not fast enough, and Julie struck just right so that your head and arms are poking out. You're able to watch while she draws you closer to her, doing your damnedest to get free but unable to make any real progress.

When you're about to pass under her nose Julie parts her lips, revealing a row of enormous, square white teeth waiting for you. Then suddenly you're pulled away and Julie bursts out laughing, her head facing down so that in front of you is a wall of straight black hair gathered in a ponytail that's cascading back down. The spoon shakes from Julie's laughter, and you're jostled back and forth while she tries to regain her composure.

"Oh my God you really thought I was going to do it!" she says when she can regain some composure. "You're so credulous! I'm not going to hurt you, little guy, I'm trying to keep you safe. Now let's get you out of there and back on your feet." With one finger she scoops you out from the spoon, separating you from the bite of potatoes she had prepared, and eases you back onto the tray. "Boy, do you look ridiculous covered in-" Before Julie can finish the sentence she's wracked with laughter again, and has to take deep breaths to regain her composure.
1122121232.title: Practical Joke

1122121233.content:
While Julie searches for you somewhere inside the mound of mashed potatoes you try to get free from it, but only succeed in making it worse. It seems like the more you fight to get out the more it tumbles down onto you, burying you under a pile of warm starch. The weight presses down on you and compacts itself, forming a solid layer around you not riddled by fragmentation like it had previously been.

At what might be the worst possible time you feel cold metal behind you and your feet are knocked out from under you, tipping you backwards into a curved surface. There's a thick sheath of potato around you, sealing you into the spoon's reservoir forming a warm, fluffy white tomb. You claw at the roof, hoping to get out and grab Julie's attention before she shoves you in her mouth. Handfuls of potato are thrown to the side while you frantically dig upward until you finally break the surface.

Maybe if you weren't still thoroughly trapped you'd have a chance, but you free yourself too late. Directly above you is Julie's rounded nose, and in front you see her lips parted open just wide enough to allow the spoon entrance. You thrash to escape, but in less than a second you've been carried through her lips into her mouth. Julie closes her lips, cutting off all light, and pulls the spoon out.

When her spoon hits her lips you're dragged off, along with the bite you were carried in with. Saliva separates you from the potatoes, allowing you one last moment of freedom. It's not enough to do anything though. Julie flips her tongue up and saliva rushes through her mouth, driving you back onto her gullet. Without thinking she relaxes her muscles, dropping you down into her esophagus and then to her stomach. It's a one way trip.

Unable to find you, Julie hopes you got the help you were looking for and stayed safe.
1122121233.title: Lunch for Julie

choices: "You're the one who sent me that message, right?"
11221213.content:
Inside Julie's closed fist the temperature quickly rises, your combined body heats coming together to make a sweltering environment. You begin sweating around the same time she does, but with no breeze coming in it only contributes to the oppressive environment. With each second that goes by the air around you gets hotter, drying your throat each time you inhale.

Julie seems to take note of her palm sweating and loosens her fingers, allowing her hand to vent much better than previously. Her arms swing less intensely to compensate, now moving back and forth about as much as a porch swing. You find this much more preferable to before, and once the air around you cools down you're able to breathe normally again, too.

When Julie steps outside you're able to get a much better view of the world around you, the sun providing much more light than the cheap fluorescents indoors. Through the gaps she's opened on either side you see fresh green grass and clean sidewalks below, and to the side you see Julie's thigh every time you rush past it. You do what you can to stay in the middle of her palm, not wanting to risk being broken against any of those surfaces.

Julie steps onto the grass and heads for a tree, the softer ground making for a much smoother ride. When she reaches it she sets down her bag and leans against the trunk, then slides down until she's sitting on the ground. She sets you atop her knee and opens her hand, judging you out onto her leg, and reaches back into her bag. Once she retrieves whatever she was looking for she sets it on the ground beside her and turns back to you.

"Uh, Julie?" you say, looking up at the giantess's face. "Are we meeting someone here who can help me?" Julie responds by plucking you up between her fingers and holding you aloft above her legs.

"Oh relax," she answers sweetly. "You've already been tiny for a bit, what's being tiny for one afternoon going to hurt?" She drops you right where her legs meet, and you land between her thighs.
