You slide down the smooth skin, lifting up your legs when you get to her shorts. Your descent continues until you're stopped just in front of her crotch.

Julie peers over her breasts to spot you, and you look up at her in minor indignation. Her hand quickly picks you back up and returns you back to the top of the slope, ready to drop you again. "I'm worried about accidents," you say. "A lot more stuff can hurt me now, and I'm not sure if my condition's stable yet, I might still-" You're interrupted when Julie lets go again, sending you down the slide of her thighs again. At least it's a fun ride.

"You worry too much!" she says, pinching you between her fingers again. "You may be tiny and weak, but I'm big and strong! I can keep you safe from a bunch of stuff, and you can be good company." Julie carries you back up to her knees, ready to drop you again. She's clearly enjoying herself, and her smile is infectious - you can't help but smile back up at her.

Before Julie can send you down the slide again a silhouette blocks the light from reaching you too, the figure drawing her attention for a moment. You turn your head, barely able to see past her finger, to see who the figure is, right when they speak.
11221213.title: Field Day

112212132.content:
When you're finally able to see past Julie's finger you find yourself looking about half a foot below the figure's knee, a sign that this person is much taller than Julie. Your eyes dart down to a pair of Converse firmly planted on the ground about shoulder width apart, then up to a pair of black shorts rolled up to the top of her powerful thighs. You continue looking up, passing her arms crossed over her ample chest, to a pile of red hair braided in the back. Oh no. Fulda's found you again.

"Excuse me?" Julie asks, scooping you off her knee with a hand. She lowers you down to the ground, her soft palm cushioning your descent, before continuing. "Who are you, and what do you think I stole from you?"

Fulda scoffs. "Who I am doesn't matter, but if you don't give me back that thing in your hand you're going to get to know me very well." Julie looks at her empty hand in confusion, then glances at you in her other hand. Her eyes widen, and her mouth goes wide in shock.

"He's not a thing, he's my friend!" Julie shouts up at Fulda, moving you into her lap. You feel queasy as you're quickly yanked inward, but you feel safer held against Julie's body. Suddenly she stands, causing you to go light-headed and feel as though your stomach drops to your feet. "You're that monster who shrank him, aren't you! And then you left him all alone on the floor! You aren't getting him back, he could have died and you clearly don't care."

Julie takes a step forward until she's only a few inches from Fulda and looks up to meet her eyes. You aren't sure what Julie is trying to accomplish: the top of her head barely even reaches Fulda's clavicle, and while she is in decent shape Fulda is a powerhouse. The two continue their stare down, Julie trying to intimidate Fulda despite being towered over.

"I'm not going to ask again," Fulda says, glowering down at Julie while you peek out from inside Julie's hand. "Give it back, or I'll take it from you."

"If you want him, you'll have to go through me," Julie replies, doing her best to stand up against the behemoth before her. Fulda grins, and your perspective starts to change.
112212132.title: A Dreaded Return

choices: Fulda takes you and steps on Julie
1122121321.content:
The change is gradual at first. Julie's hand tightens around you, gripping you more firmly than she previously had been, making you uncomfortable. In excitement you peek out from between her fingers, hoping that for some reason you're being made larger, but your heart sinks when you see the reality. Even from your perspective against her belly you see she comes up to Fulda's chest at best, and you are able to track your descent past the button at the top of Fulda's shorts. For her part Julie tries to maintain a stoic demeanor, though she must notice she's half a foot shorter than she was a few seconds ago.

You break through Julie's close-fingered grip, making her simply wrap her fingers under your arms, as you continue to descend toward Fulda's knees. Julie's resolve finally fails and she runs, holding you tightly against her chest as she breaks into a sprint. Fulda anticipated her escape attempt and quickly sidesteps into her path, causing your dwindling savior to run harmlessly face-first into her stomach. Julie maintains her grip on you as you're thrown forward into Fulda's thigh, then she starts to back away.

Julie's hand is now too small to hold you on its own when you reach Fulda's knees, and she adjusts so that you're protectively cradled in her arms. "Don't think you can get out of this," Fulda says, taking a powerful step forward. With a cry Julie backs up into the tree, shaking you in her arms. "You're trapped, and now you both are mine."

Holding you gets harder for Julie the smaller she gets until she decides to set you down on the ground. You look up at your friend and see that she still towers over you, with you only reaching halfway up her knee, but know that it won't last much longer. Comparatively she comes up to just about Fulda's ankle, and she's rapidly shrinking.

"Let him go and take me!" Julie pleads when you can come up to her knees. "You didn't even want him before!"

Fulda smirks down, and Julie's waist reaches your eye level. You look up and see tears streaming down your friend's face. "Not a chance!" Fulda booms. "Do you have any idea how much fun I'm going to have with the two of you?"

Julie finally stops shrinking, putting you eye to chin just like you used to be at normal size. "I'm sorry," she says through tears, wrapping you in a tight hug. "I said I would keep you safe, and I didn't." You hug her back, pulling the two of you closer together.

"It's okay," you reassure her, resting your chin on her shoulder. "I know you did your best. Now we're just in this together, and we have to work together if we're going to survive." The two of you continue embracing silently, until the rumble of Fulda clearing her throat draws your attention.

You and Julie huddle close and turn yourselves toward Fulda, her massive Converse thudding loudly as she taps it on the earth. The two of you look up at her while she breaks into malicious laughter, and Julie clings tighter to you. "Wow. You're both pathetic, you know. I hope that was worth it, girl. I hope you felt big and strong... because you're never going to feel big again."
1122121321.title: A Smaller Friend

1122121322.content:
The change is barely perceptible at the start, with you peeping up at the two titanesses having their face down from just above the top of Fulda's shorts. Then, slowly, Julie starts to rise against Fulda, the top of her head becoming level with her chin after a few seconds. You look out and see the top of Fulda's shorts is now several inches below where you are being held.

At first you think Julie is getting larger, possibly as a result of Fulda trying to even the playing field, but Julie's grip is just as loose around you as it was before. Fulda must have noticed what is happening and takes a step forward, bumping her chest against Julie's and forcing her to take a step back. Julie's resolve remains firm however, and soon the two are eye to eye.

"What the fuck are you doing you bitch?" Fulda shouts when the bottom of her breasts are level with the hand you are being held in. Julie's taller than her now! "And how are you doing it? You're too short for this to work!"

"Doesn't feel so good, does it?" Julie asks, almost a full head taller than Fulda by this point. "You shrank my friend, and now I'm shrinking you down to his size. Fair's fair." Incensed, Fulda reaches for you in Julie's hand, but your savior swiftly moves you behind her back, the sudden acceleration throwing you hard into her palm and making your insides lurch. Fulda lunges for you again but Julie simply holds you up beyond her reach, the change of direction throwing your stomach around yet again.

Julie pushes Fulda while she's off-balance, knocking her into the tree, and quickly turns to block her escape. Her grip around you shifts, two fingers pinching you firmly yet safely under your arms, allowing you to look down at Fulda, now level with Julie's chest. "This is bullshit!" she protests, vainly hopping up in an attempt to grab you. "I shrunk him, he's mine, you just picked him up off the floor like a piece of trash!" Fulda diminishes toward Julie's waist, and adds, "The trash that he is!"

"I said I would protect him," Julie replies sternly, looking down at the furious ex-titaness, "and that's just what I'm doing. He's not mine, but it's my duty to keep him safe. Got it?" You look down with bemusement as Fulda shrinks past Julie's waist.

Fulda screams, then shouts, "This is impossible! I shrink people, no one shrinks me! I'd rather die than be small!" She lashes out and punches Julie in the thigh, accomplishing nothing as her first bounces harmlessly off Julie's skin. In retaliation Julie trikes forward with a knee, connecting with Fulda's head and tossing her back into the tree. Julie steps forward again to corral Fulda, and the realization of just how small she is shows on her face when she looks up from Julie's knees.

Fulda's protests continue, her yelling getting more incoherent the smaller she gets. When she reaches Julie's ankles Fulda begins impotently pounding on Julie's running shoes with her hands while Julie smiles. Finally Fulda stops shrinking, and all you can see of her from your vantage point is the small white spot of her tank top contrasted against the ground next to Julie's shoe.

Julie slowly crouches down over Fulda and lowers you down to her chest, allowing a good view of Fulda on the ground. She looks absolutely furious but her screaming has abated for now, realizing that she would go hoarse before too long. With a quick swipe of her free hand Julie scoops Fulda up, clasping her fingers around Fulda's body so that only her head pokes out.

Julie lifts Fulda up until she's directly across from you, holding the two of you as if she's playing with dolls. It's strange for you to see Fulda entirely within someone's hand, but you admit she does deserve it. Fulda struggles fruitlessly inside Julie's hand, even her powerfully-developed muscles unable to budge the fingers of someone so much larger than her.

"Apologize to him." Fulda looks quizzically up at Julie as if she had just told her the sun is blue. "If you hadn't made him tiny I wouldn't have had to do this, you know. So say you're sorry and mean it." She bristles under the demands from the enormous Julie, and looks as though she's about to pop a blood vessel in her eye.
1122121322.title: The Shoe is on the Other Foot Now

112212133.content:
The newcomer's mousy voice, high-pitched even at your reduced size, sounds very familiar, and you peer past Julie's finger to see who it is. Though her face is little more than a silhouette you can make out the tall, skinny figure and her off-beat yet fashionable clothing ensemble. There's no way this is anyone but Lana!

"Yeah, that was me," Julie says, snapping your attention back to the woman still holding you in her hand. "He mentioned working with you on some sort of size changing project a few times, and the last he mentioned it, it sounded like you were almost ready. I figured if anyone would be able to help it's you." She looks down and blushes before finishing. "I'm... honestly surprised you showed up. It must sound crazy." Julie sets you down atop her knee and moves her hand away.

Lana walks up and stands at Julie's feet to bring herself into the light then squats down, putting her face directly above you. You turn around again to look at her pale face, and find yourself the focus of her dark blue eyes. "He always had a penchant for getting into trouble," Lana says, "just never anything quite like this. You came to the right person though, I tested it this morning and it works fine. And now he has a good excuse for missing the test." She rests a hand beneath Julie's knee and cups another one behind you. "May I?" she asks, and Julie nods.

Gently Lana brushes you off Julie's knee and onto her fingers, where you slowly roll down to rest in the middle of her open palm. She looks you over with her humongous eyes while you're stuck in her hand, and she prods you with a finger a couple times, shoving you back and forth. "I just- how did this happen?" she asks. "As far as I know we're the only ones working on something like this."

"He said some giant redhead shrank him during class," Julie explains while Lana stands, the force pinning you in her palm. "We're not sure how she did it, but well, look. He's small. Clearly she did." Julie stands so that she can look at you in Lana's hand, and it's difficult not to feel overwhelmed with two giantesses giving you their undivided attention.

"No matter, I should be able to help him," Lana says, still looking down at you. You look between the two women, and she continues, "Thanks for bringing him to me. We know it can make things smaller, and while it should be able to do the reverse - that is, if he wired it correctly," she gives you a quick wink, "it'll be a flawless test of the system. I'll let you know how it goes." Lana turns to leave, but Julie places a hand on her shoulder to stop her.

"Hold on, I'd like to go with you. I said I'd protect him while he was small, and I intend to see that through. I want to see him get better first hand."

"I'm not sure if he's comf-"

"Yes, she can come," you interrupt, your tiny voice somehow cutting off Lana's. She's the one who got me help, even though she acted like she didn't." Julie stifles a giggle, and you continue. "This is as much hers as it is ours now. She deserves to be there." Lana looks at you pensively, her car-sized lips canting to the side.

"I guess we should get moving then," Lana declares, and curls her fingers around you, holding you firmly in her fist. You make yourself cozy against her palm for the several minutes you'll be walking, and the two women set off to Lana's lab with you in hand.
112212133.title: Lana to the Rescue

1122121331.content:
Once inside the lab Lana opens her hand, having kept you covered for the whole walk in order to avoid suspicion, and you stand up in her palm. The room looks just as you had left it yesterday with one exception: on a table near the front wall there's a small person in a transparent plastic cage who runs to look when you enter the room. It looks like the test fire this morning was an unqualified success, and the size gun looks ready to fire again.

Lana wastes no time in getting down to business, walking over to the subject area and setting you down in the middle of the blue X. She squats down, her bony knees poking out over your spot, and picks up a pencil to mark your height. One inch, just as you thought, significantly below the next lowest mark which presumably belongs to the person from this morning.

Before she can stand you ask, "Lana, who is that person?" You gesture to the caged man on the table, still following Lana as she walks through the room.

"Oh, just some freshman who needed money," Lana answers, lowering a hand down to the floor. She ruffles your hair with a finger and says, "He signed all the releases, and if this works we'll know that he'll be back to normal size on Tuesday! Don't worry about it." Lana stands up and turns away, the light clicking of her heels translated into deep thuds for you.

Lana quickly gets to work on the size gun, recalibrating it to work in a different mode with a different target. She types on her laptop for several minutes and flicks several switches before the optics panel flips out and allows her to start searching for a target. Deftly Lana pinpoints you and the gun rotates down to center you in its beam. "Be sure to stay behind me," she tells Julie. "The last thing we need is you becoming gigantic."

"Yeah, people being gigantic, how terrifying," you mutter to yourself, making sure you're still in the center of the X. You look up at Lana as she silently counts down from 3, waiting for her to fire with nervous anticipation. Will it hurt? What if it doesn't work? What if- before you can finish the thought Lana reaches zero and fires, and a white beam of light engulfs your body.
1122121331.title: Getting to Work

11221213311.content:
A white beam of pure energy overtakes your body, temporarily blinding you as you have nowhere to look but straight at it. You immediately turn away and shield your eyes to prevent permanent damage, but all this does is make you even more aware of how muffled your hearing becomes. Ambient sounds are now totally inaudible for you, and you doubt whether you'd be able to even guess how far away a footfall is - a dangerous prospect for someone your size, at least for the moment.

Growth takes your eyes out of the beam shining directly into them, however bright spots still obscure large parts of your vision, and what isn't blocked is still blurry. The longer the beam is on you the worse your hearing gets, which may end up being a very good sign. With each second the beam is on you the more powerful you feel, as though it's transferring its energy directly into you.

Finally the size gun shuts down on its own, stopping whatever growth was going on. You collapse to your knees with the sudden loss of your energy input, then fall down face first on the floor. A muffled rustling gets through your ears while the two women scramble to get to your side, but you're still too weak to even get your arms under you.

"C'mon shorty, get up," says a muffled voice, unattributable thanks to the interference in your ear canals. "We need to see how big you've gotten!" You're unsure if it's the same person or a different one, though you suppose it doesn't matter as long as you can't even push yourself up. Finally one of them grabs you and hoists you up, allowing you to be measured and find out how tall you are now.
11221213311.title: Small Advances

112212133111.content:
You instantly slump back down when the hand holding you relinquishes its grip, forcing you to rest your hands on your knees while doubled over. An enormous log gets pushed against your chest, shoving you against the wall and forcing you to stand up straight. Your vision begins to clear and you are able to make out the log as being peach colored with a pinkish-white tip on the top. A finger. You're still tiny.

"Not bad, you made it to three inches!" exclaims an otherwise soft voice directly above you. "That's triple what you were when we started!" By now you are able to differentiate between voices, and this one is distinctly Lana's. "Just a few more blasts from this thing and you'll be back to normal." Lana pulls her finger away and stands, drawing your eyes upward. The statuesque scientist still towers over you as an indomitable figure, but now you're about as tall as her shoes are. If you jumped up, you could probably reach her ankle.

"So give them to him," Julie interjects, her velvety words washing over you from above. You turn to face her, unsurprised to find that she also dominates your view still, and see her on her knees. Now, if you wanted, you could clamber up her thigh and curl up in her lap unassisted. "He's still small enough to be stepped on, it's dangerous."

"I... can't," Lana says, turning away with a single thunderous footstep. "I mean I shouldn't. I mean it's not safe." Quakes continue to ripple out from her footfalls as she crosses the floor back to her machine.

Two loud stomps boom out as Julie slams her feet onto the tiles and stands, her proximity driving home how small you still are. "And what does that mean?" she asks, raising her voice. "You must have thought it was safe enough a few minutes ago! Or were you okay with using him as a guinea pig?"

"It's the energy," Lana explains, turning back around with a series of tremendous clicks. "It needs a full day to dissipate before I hit him with it again. If I don't wait he could be converted to pure energy, entirely eradicating him from this world. It's a significant enough risk that I don't feel comfortable doing it right now."

"What's the chance?"

Lana sighs deeply. "Damn near a hundred percent, okay? Look, just calm down, I'll keep him safe overnight and you can come back same time tomorrow to watch him grow some more."

Julie steps back, placing herself between you and Lana. You lean forward and rest your chin on the back of her shoe, still weakened from the growth, and place your head against her ankle. "Who said he's staying with you? I've been the one keeping him safe all this time."

"Uh, this is heavy science here," Lana retorts. "I need him here for observation. Something might go wrong, and in case you forgot this is still an experiment that he contributed heavily to. Just because you pledged to protect him in a misguided aim to emulate some anime doesn't mean your words trump necessity. This is real world stuff."

Julie stiffens at the implied insult. "I think we should ask him who he wants to stay with."

"That's a good idea!" Lana replies, stepping toward Julie until their toes are nearly touching. Lana looms over Julie by half a foot still and she places her hands on her hips, trying to intimidate her. "Who do you want looking out for you now, this childish waif or the distinguished scientist you've been working with for years?"

"I think she means your old study buddy who you have a lot of fun with or this dour sadist who treats peoples' lives as a game!" Julie shoots back.

In unison they ask, "Well?"
112212133111.title: A Couple Inches at a Time

11221213313.content:
The beam temporarily blinds you as it shines directly into your eyes, overriding any other visual stimulus from the room. Its visual effect is accompanied by a series of loud pops in your ears as well, disrupting your ability to hear anything during the gun's firing. All you can do is hope that it has the intended effect, and that you'll soon be able to look Julie in the... chin.

You're covered in the beam's light for longer than you expected - after the first few seconds at the very most you should have grown out of it. The popping dies away though, and you're able to hear what's happening in the room. Immediately you realize that Julie and Lana are yelling at each other. Definitely not a good sign.

"Well why is it doing that?"

"I don't know, it switched modes on its own!"

"Then stop it!"

"I can't, once it starts I'm locked out!"

"Cut the power then!"

"Useless, it has a battery! We just have to let it finish and see how bad it is!"

Soon the light dissipates, and you look at your surroundings with dread. The electrical tape marking you're standing on sprawls across the ground as far as the eye can see, and each strip is thicker than you are tall on its own. Each table is taller than a mountain with an enormous, insurmountable plateau at the top. Above you the ceiling looks as high up as the actual sky, and is just as unreachable to you.

Movement behind the farthest desk catches your eye, and you see Lana physically restrain Julie. A low roar escapes from Lana's mouth and Julie stops struggling, instead changing to sadly nodding her head. They each pick up a magnifying glass and walk around the table, their thunderous footsteps growing in intensity as they approach. Your brain finally pieces together what Lana said: "You can't run up there, the air displaced by your footsteps will blow him away and we'll never find him! Grab a magnifying glass and come with me, and let's see how much is left to save."

Thuds from their footsteps become loud crashes as the two women get closer, and the crashes turn into cracks of thunder when they pass the last table. Each step, initially generating only a faint vibration through the ground, has become a full-on catastrophic earthquake for you before they even reach your marker. You give up trying to stand through it and resign yourself to sitting on the floor until they stop walking.

The pair doesn't stop until they're both standing with their toes at points of the X, forming a right angle with you in the middle. They're both impossibly huge: their legs alone are several miles long, and you're surprised you can even see all of them with the naked eye. Even from two inches - a thousand or so feet by your reckoning - the sole of Lana's shoe looks taller than any building you've ever lived or worked in, and the upward curve on Julie's running shoe may as well be a ski jump now.

They both crouch down to look for you, and the sheer intimidation from not one but two women being this close makes you feel how small you are now. Since you haven't moved they find you quickly, and immediately their rumbling, booming voices start bellowing from their mouths. "I am so, so, SO sorry," Lana says. "If I'd known this could've happened I wouldn't have tried. Don't worry, I'll figure out what went wrong and get you at least where you were as soon as I can!"

"Haven't you done enough already?" Julie shoots back. "I don't think he wants any more of your help, I sure don't! I didn't see how you could possibly make this worse, if I thought this could happen I wouldn't have bothered!"

"Hey, cool it! Accidents happen, it was just a mis-"

"Accident? Look at him!" Julie points toward you with her hand, sending a finger larger than a sequoia tree in your direction. "Oh wait, you can't without a magnifying glass, and barely even then!"

"I don't see you coming up with any ideas!"

"I'll beat you down and take your stupid size gun and make it work this time!"

"Bring it!" The last thing you needed right now, two mountains of women fighting over you, less than a foot from where you're standing. Trying to avoid getting crushed is pointless, so you decide to watch the fight and hope neither of them accidentally crushes you in the melee.
11221213313.title: Teensy-Weensy

choices: She goes back to her room
112212133131.content:
Julie glares at Lana, aware that the challenge has been thrown down and she can't very well back down now. She lunges, hitting Lana in the sternum with a meteoric shoulder strike, and knocks her to the ground with a tremor strong enough to make your teeth chatter. Lana's legs splay out, landing on either side of you so that the impacts act like aftershocks, and Julie sets her feet atop Lana's ankles.

"You may be taller than me," Julie says, her voice a rumble that you've now come to associate with basic human speech, "but I'm in much better shape. Bet I can take a hit better, too." To punctuate her statement Julie slides her leg up along Lana's, sending her knee straight into the scientist's rib cage. She lets out a gasp capable of breaking glass, and Julie sets the knee on her stomach.

Before Lana can recover Julie slides an arm under Lana's armpit from behind, reaching up until she's palming the back of her head. Lana's face contorts into a sea of pain and quickly taps the floor, each of the three hits ringing out like the peals of great bells. "Okay, I give!" Lana manages to say between gasping for breaths, and Julie quickly gets off her, standing up to her full, enormous height.

Lana gets up slowly afterward, taking a brief spell to recover, then walks over to the nearby table, each step making a very audible crash on the floor. She grabs several items and walks back to you, and you see that she's now holding a pair of tweezers and a small plastic bag. When she squats down her shins block out the entire ceiling, allowing you to see nothing from your back but her smooth, pale legs and her silver-tinged shoes.

A pair of gigantic blue eyes peers over her knees, followed by a circular lens. Lana adjusts it up and down, making one of her eyes seem even more enormous as it spreads to fill the lens, until she finds the correct range. She moves in with the tweezers in her other hand, twin metal plates held in parallel that could on their own form walls to your mansion. Gently she pinches them together until they settle around you, running the whole length of your body and then some, and picks you up off the floor.

Carefully Lana lifts you up, holding you above her legs for a moment while she inspects you. Her massive eye twitches back and forth, imperceptible to someone of normal size, while you regard a pupil large as the night sky and just as dark. Apparently satisfied she moves the tweezers over the opening of the plastic bag and releases you, dropping you hundreds of feet to the bottom.

Lana swings the enormous hand holding you toward Julie, whipping the bag up as it rushes through the air and sending you up with it. "Here's your little friend," Lana says. "Real little. I hope you can find a way to help him without me." Julie takes the bag, jostling it as it changes hands, and looks down at you sadly.

"I thought he was your friend, too," Julie says, then turns away. While she walks she holds you up to her eye, a dark abyss that seems to stretch forever in all directions, to make sure you're inside. You bang on the plastic, unsure if you have enough strength to even budge it from the inside. She doesn't turn around and take another swing at Lana, so she must have noticed your speck.

Julie heads for the door and exits the room. "Don't worry," she whispers, her breath an overpowering gale that buffets your bag as it blows by. "I'll do whatever it takes to get you back to some semblance of normal." Keeping your bag dangling from her fingers she walks down the hall to get to work.
112212133131.title: Julie Prevails

112212133133.content:
Julie shoves Lana's chest hard, pushing your lab partner so that she slides a few inches along the slick tile floor. When she stops sliding Lana slams her feet on the ground, generating a booming clap that echoes inside your ears and a quake that could level your house, then leaps at Julie. Lana's shoulder connects with Julie's collar and pushes her over, the sudden serious attack taking her off guard.

The two colossi clash with a speed you never would have attributed to creatures so large. When Julie hits the floor she makes a thud like nothing you've ever heard before, a sound like someone throwing a thousand pound wad of dough at the wall, accompanied by another tremor. Lana tries to mount Julie to push her advantage but Julie quickly swings her legs to the side, her shoes coming down just beyond you. With all the monstrous quakes happening you haven't bothered standing from your prone position, so the only thing you can see is Julie's Achilles' tendon, longer than any bridge and twice as wide.

Her ankle doesn't dominate your view for long. Before Lana can even get settled Julie grabs her by the shoulders and twists with all her weight, throwing Lana off and onto the floor, the shockwave accompanied by a rumbling grunt. Julie's legs roll out from above you and slide several thousand feet across the floor as she moves to straddle Lana, holding her down with all her weight.

Julie's running shoes are replaced by Lana's elegant kitten heels to loom over you, the dusty black soles so large you don't think you could even climb up them. They loom over you for only a brief moment though. Lana lithely pulls her legs up to her chest, sliding them between Julie's thighs, and places them on Julie's stomach. With one fierce push she pushes her off, throwing her up and backwards.

You watch Julie get launched into the air and know that the fight will soon be over for you. Her butt is pushed out by the kick, changing her center of gravity to be much further back and lower than it should be. She falls along the trajectory decided by it, sending her directly on a collision course for you. A butt the size of several city blocks falls toward you and there's nothing you can do but look as it rapidly drops. Julie lands, crushing you the instant her butt sets down when all of her weight is set down atop you, turning you into nothing more than an unnoticeable speck.
112212133133.title: Without a Trace

choices: Go down and explore Julie’s shoes and feet
Try and strike up conversation with Julie
1122122.content:
You get bored and decide to go mess with Julie for a little while. What could possibly go wrong? You also wanted to explore around, now that the initial shock of being shrunk had worn off somewhat.


You noticed that her converses were currently removed, and her green socked feet were resting behind them. She was lazily wiggling her toes and rubbed her feet against each other, as she wrote down notes from the lecture. You could go down there and check things out.


But you could also try and talk with Julie a little bit. Maybe all you needed was a little social interaction for you to pass the hour. But you also didn’t want to distract Julie that much, since it was a key review session.
1122122.title: Entertainment Options

11221221.content:
You decide to climb down Julie’s desk for a bit and look around. You carefully climb down the desk, making sure not to alert Julie to what you were doing. You knew she would never approve of you doing something so reckless and dangerous. But you had no desire to just sit around for an hour as this class went on. You gave one more look up at your giantess savior, who was focused on the presentation at the front of the room, and you began your descent.


Eventually you reach the bottom, and you are treated to an amazing sight. Those green socked feet that you saw from the desk were even larger and imposing from up close. You could clearly hear the scratching and rubbing those toes were doing to each other. Each toe was probably 2 to 3 times your size, and it was terrifying and exhilarating at the same time. She was obviously a bit bored and she was trying to stave off her boredom by playing around with her feet. The way her toes moved and flexed against each other was almost as if her toes were welcoming you into their rubdown.


You started walking closer and closer to the toes, almost entranced by their massive scale. You could also smell a very distinct odor coming from her toes. They were not bad necessarily, but it was still a strong smell either way. If you reached out, could probably touch these cotton covered monsters. Up this close, you felt like you could jump in the middle of this toe madness and play around to your heart’s content, no matter how dangerous it could be. Maybe the smell was affecting your head at this rate.


But before you even considered touching them, they made the decision for you. Julie lurched her feet forward just slightly, but to you, it was enough to cover you whole. The toes you were admiring had pinned you down, and you struggled in vain against them. They started rubbing you, as Julie thought that, in the back of her mind, she felt a pebble under her toes. You were directly under her 2nd toe, and it ran down you entire body, giving you the most up close and personal massage you’ve ever had. There were times where you were totally enveloped by her sock-covered toe flesh.


She tried to grasp it with her slender toes, and you were claimed by these titanic cotton covered monsters. They started squeezing you, as Julie wanted to figure out what got stuck in her toes. She would have never guessed that you would be down there, because it would be a suicidal action to take. The strong smell from earlier felt completely different right now, now that he was completely covered by her green socks. You were also shifted from toe to toe, as Julie thought that whatever was currently stuck to her toes felt good at least. It would be a nice distraction for her right now. She also wondered how you were doing, hoping you weren’t too bored right now. It was hard to see you in the dark room, but Julie thought that you were probably on the other end of her notebook, away from her scribbling hands.


You tried to fight, but the toes did not let go. But your struggling made Julie more aware of the tiny annoyance, and she took steps to alleviate that annoyance. She decided to pull off her socks and shake them out. You could see her titanic hand reach down, and you hoped that she realized your predicament, but you soon realized that you would not be saved. The sock that you were stuck to was removed from her slender foot and was shaken about. You were flung from one dangerous situation to another. The question was, where did you land?
11221221.title: Go down and explore Julie’s shoes and feet

112213.content:
You continue trying your hardest to get her attention as long as you can, and end up passing the point of no return. Julie's ankle passes by, the smooth skin replaced by the heel of her other running shoe above you. Frantically you try to scramble out, but you're wedged too tightly in her shoe, and your hands can't get any grip on her skin.

Julie's heel strikes you in the small of your back, driving down like a wedge and crushing your midsection. She wiggles it back and forth, pushing your legs away from your torso and severing your spine. Rapidly bleeding out, you give up on any hope of getting free, and feel fatigue overcome you.

Before you lose consciousness Julie picks her heel back up and moves it away, letting her Achilles tendon rest over you. She sets it down along the length of your body as presses her legs together, flattening your body between them. Your body bursts, leaving behind a red mush that might give Julie pause later today. Regardless, she'll never consider the idea that she crushed you without even knowing.
112213.title: Squished

11223.content:
You consider jumping on the massive shoe before you for the briefest of moments but a sudden lurch forward from the mile-high leg makes you think twice. Her erratic movements could wipe you out in a millisecond. You needed to alert someone more calm and cool. You decided to walk along and wait for more people. That didn't take long. Soon a cacophony of giants stirred up again as a new class began. You looked to the left and the right of the shoes before you to see the seats on either side now taken as well.

To the left, you see a shiny leather stiletto pump. The nude coloured footwear perfectly matched the skin tone of the foot inside it. Looking up you see the other shoe swinging back and forth in the air, little bumps against the seat coming across as minor quakes to your fragile little body. On the right were a pair of nylon clad legs ending in a pair of black ballerina flats. These shoes were perfectly still, both firmly flat on the floor.

You decide to take a punt on one of these pairs of feet but which one? The riskier but bare-legged stiletto wearer or the much safer looking flat wearer?
11223.title: Go find someone else

1123.content:
The giant shoe remains overhead, eclipsing your view of everything else above you, for several seconds. You pick a spot to stare at incredulously while you wait for Fulda to make a decision when you think you see it come towards you. Another second confirms that it's not just her wavering unsteadily - she's bringing her foot down on you!

You look left and right - the ceiling is Converse sole for dozens of feet on either side. Back and forward are worse, since even before you shrank you'd say she has large feet. With nowhere to run and an inescapable foot lowering down onto you, you begin to feel the squeeze.

In a panic you brace your arms against the shoe's sole, totally ineffectually trying to stop its descent. Despite your valiant effort the titanic shoe forces you down to your knees as Fulda's shoe gets ever-closer to the floor. You try your hardest to keep from losing more ground, but even Atlas couldn't hold this weight, and as you give way again you're forced to your back.

Fulda's shoe is immediately on your chest, pressing down with all of its weight. You keep trying to push it away out of desperate survival instinct, but as your head is held to the ground and your arms can no longer even push, you know it's over. With a scream your body bursts as Fulda crushes you, then grinds your pulp into the carpet.
1123.title: Over Before It Began

113.content:
Everything around you keeps growing ever more massive as you try to put more distance between yourself and Fulda, futile as it may be. All she does in response is laugh, her eyes gaining a fire of mania as you continue to get smaller. As she dominates more of your view you begin to panic, and the sight of her monolith of a shoe, the top half itself dozens of times taller than you, twitching back and forth causes you to panic.

Knowing that the back of the chair will block you, you turn and run for the side in hopes that you'll be able to jump off. It starts hard and only gets worse as the cushion's contours change from low obstacles to hurdles that you have to jump over, slowing the progress of your already miniscule legs considerably. You glance towards Fulda who is by now practically leaning over you and see that you've barely even moved away from her center.

Suddenly a huge, browned tree crashes down in front of you - wait, that's just her finger. Fulda laughs at her complete domination of you, though it sounds more like a long series of low rumbles at your size. "Going somewhere?" she asks, her voice booming. "I really can't let you get away. You're too small, it would be irresponsible for me to let you. Someone could crush you with much less than a finger." For effect she lifts up the finger she has blocking you and lowers it until the whorls of her fingertip are brushing against your hair.

You expect her to pick you up now, but she decides you're too small even for that. Instead she tears out one of the half-filled pages from your notebook and places it on the cushion, then slides it toward you. As the paper rushes in you try to duck, but it's coming in too fast. Before you can so much as squat it slams into your legs, knocking you forward and laying you out, the low friction keeping you rolling until the middle of the page.

In a daze you stand and find yourself in the middle of a capital D you had written with your own hand just minutes before. Fulda curls the page inwards, causing you to slide to a stop in the very middle. "Now that you're here," she begins, "I think you'd be perfect..."
113.title: The Notebook

1132.content:
The walls curl up even more around you as Fulda forms the sheet of paper into a hollow cylinder, trapping you inside. From your dim, round prison you look out at her, only to find her focus turned away from you for once. Her eyes are directed some distance below you, and from the way you're being subtly jerked about it seemed as if she's fiddling with something using her other hand.

After a moment the shaking stops, and Fulda quickly glances into your tube as if confirming you hadn't slipped out. Then the whole thing begins to slant downwards, and you turn towards that end with trepidation. Your limited view is directed at the toe of her shoe, and the view port is slowly moving up her laces. You begin sliding, and though you desperately seek some way to slow yourself down the smooth paper offers none.

The tube rests against the top of the inside of her shoe, and you come spilling out. With a thud you land on her insole, a much softer landing than you expected considering how fast you were falling. Fulda moves the tube away, but before you can feel any sort of relief its position is taken up by two of her fingers gripping the edge of the pit you've been dumped in. Menacingly she looks at you, trapped in her shoe, with a gleeful smile on her face.

She picks up the shoe, doing her best to keep it level so that you don't slide around. Though it takes some balancing you manage to remain standing until stability returns, her shoe safely on the floor. You're relieved when she withdraws her fingers, focusing on the few moments you're at peace while Fulda gets back to her feet, appearing impossibly tall from the inside of her shoe.

Your relief quickly dies when she picks up her foot and slides it into the opening. Fulda's foot, covered in a stark white sock that's clinging tightly around her humongous foot, slides into your view and quickly blocks everything else out. She sets her toe down just beyond you, trapping you under her foot as it inches lower on top of you and giving you nowhere to run. Her foot quickly raises and those fingers appear again, pulling the back canvas of her shoe straight.

You're flung to the ground and sent rolling down into the ball of her foot as she lifts her shoe into the air, tugging on the fabric. Little by little she forces more of her foot in, driving you deeper and making what little space you have even more compact. Very soon she'll have her shoe back on, and it'll be entirely up to luck whether you're under half a million tons or not when she does.
1132.title: Shoe slide

choices: Fulda's Work - She's putting on a uniform
11321.content:
It's hard to call this luck though you find as Fulda's weight finally settles and you under the arch of her foot. Even at your size it's not much space you can tell, though you can't see in the all encompassing darkness. All you have to go by is your sense of touch as you feel the canvas wall of the shoe to one side, the soft insole under you, and the rest? The rest was nothing but warm thick cotton fibers that contained her mammoth foot which flexed and stretched over top of you like a slumbering beast. Not slumbering near long enough though, Fulda has no time to taunt you or even worry if you're alive. She probably in fact does think you're dead as she starts to walk and the real trouble begins.

There's not much space to be sure but you'd probably be better off if there was less still as your fractional sized body bounces with each step as G forces take hold, her foot constantly shifting inside the shoe threatening to toss you under it yet. Your stomach lurches which is the only reason you're not screaming in terror, you needed to secure yourself and the only thing was her sock. You grasp hold the next time her foot slams down, your arms so tiny you can fit them between the fibers in a hug, your arms actually brushing her flesh on the other side. Clinging like a mite, the taste of blood in your mouth as you bite your tongue, somehow you manage to last what seems like hours, and in truth is a mere ten minutes as the shoe encompassing you falls away, or rather the foot slips free. You drop what seems like stories but air resistance saves you the same way it would save an ant dropped from any height, your impact on the floor a mere bounce. And another bounce as two massive socked feet slam down on either side of you. But where were you exactly?
11321.title: Luck is on your side

113212.content:
You settle from the bounce on top of a lacquered, wooden plank, flanked on both sides by impossibly huge socks stretched over equally huge feet. Fulda seems to pay you no mind on the floor, taking a seat on an enormous throne whose base is dozens of feet above your head. She lifts up her feet, setting one down in front of you so that the thick cotton fibers block your view of the room. Beyond it you see the toes of her other foot twitching, her ankles crossed in a relaxed position.

Booming thuds and rumbling alerts you to the arrival of someone else, though you can only see her stocking-encased feet beyond Fulda's socks. The thuds get louder and you can hear a more distinct slap of feet on the hard wood as she gets closer, until she finally stops a few feet away from Fulda. Quickly the new giantess takes a seat next to Fulda and sits in silence for a few moments, allowing you to gather your thoughts.

One thing's for sure: you're not going to say forgotten at their feet waiting to be swept up by a broom for sucked up by a vacuum. While Fulda is much closer, she's responsible for you being here in the first place and seemed quite cruel. The stranger, on the other hand, would take at least a half hour to reach, and they might decide to leave before then. Besides, you know nothing about her, and she might be even more sadistic than Fulda.

The floor creaks before you when Fulda lightly presses her foot against it, and her heel drops down toward you before stopping just above your head. Maybe neither of them is the right choice?
113212.title: Fulda's Friend

choices: Enter her shoe and wait it out
1132122.content:
You’ve decided that it would be best if you tried to go with Fulda’s friend, as opposed to Fulda herself. You saw firsthand just how ruthless and sadistic she could be, and anything could be better than her. And besides, you could always use her friend as a mode of transportation to get you as far away from as was possible from Fulda.


So you walked towards where Fulda’s friend was sitting. You walked for about 15 minutes and you were almost halfway there. As you walked, you could still hear, and feel, Fulda shuffling her massive socked feet about on the wood floor. She would rub her feet across the floor, reaching dangerously close to where you were. Then she started cracking her toes and rubbed her toes against each other, and the sound was overwhelming. You were glad that you were moved away from those monsters, because those giant writhing toes would have ground you to dust.


But eventually, you reach where Fulda’s friend was sitting. She was wearing a pair of bright orange socks and she rested them close to where you currently were. You also saw that there was a small hole in her right sock, right around her 2nd and 3rd toes. They were massive, but not as large as Fulda’s monstrous feet. If you could hazard a guess, she might have had about size 12 feet. It was still pretty intimidating, but you needed to act. They were fairly still, only wiggling subtly. He could see bits of cotton fall around him, probably from her socks. You couldn’t make out anything else about her, because her feet filed your entire world view.


As you watched and thought of a plan, the smell from her feet started to wash over you. It was a very overpowering and oppressive smell. It was so bad that it was starting to give you a headache. At least Fulda didn’t have feet that smelled this strong! It was beginning to feel like you were in another stink filled atmosphere, where the smell surrounded you completely. You thought that these titanic feet could probably give the best biological weapons a run for their money, if they were at his size right now. But you needed to focus.

"Look, I'm bored of this room anyway, let's get out of here." You watch her feel around her skirt for pockets, and her lips pout when she doesn't find any. However her dark blue eyes light up when she thinks of another place, though perhaps not the safest.
122111121213.title: No Dice

1221111212133.content:
A sly smile spreads on Lana's face, and her hand begins to lower you back down the length of her body. When you drop past her neckline you look down and see the colossus in movement. Lana's free hand pulls up the hem of her skirt, revealing the top of her stockings and the bare flesh of her skinny thighs.

The descent continues, and when you're below Lana's waist she slides out a slender finger, lifting up the stocking's opening like a small tent. You pass her wrinkled skirt, each fold in the corduroy sufficient enough to be a balcony, and soon after you pass the hem and onto her exposed leg.

Lana sets you down against her thigh and shifts her hold on you so that you're just being held by a single finger pressing against your chest. You look down past it and see a small opening in the nylon waiting, large enough to fit you in it with space to spare. Without warning Lana pulls her finger away and you slide down her leg, into the opened stocking. The dark fabric catches you like a net and wraps snugly around your body, conforming to your presence easily. Lana gently lets the nylon close around you again, leaving just your head and neck exposed.

There's a slight push on your head as Lana makes sure you're secure, and then the giantess waves down at you. With both hands she seizes the bottom of her skirt and pulls it down over you, covering you in darkness. You're aware of every step she takes, but being midway up her thigh you don't really feel the movement with too much force. Lana is careful to step softly so that you don't fall down any further, and you do your best to enjoy the swaying of her leg pumping while she goes about her way, not stopping until she's reached her destination.
1221111212133.title: Stowed Away

choices: Agree, just a movie wouldn't hurt.
12211113.content:
Against your own perverse urges, you simply cannot continue your interaction with Lana. In your gut you feel embarrassed for Lana as well as yourself for ever even putting yourselves in this situation. Half-heartedly, you timidly reply to Lana. "I don't think I want to climb you anymore, Lana. I'm sorry."

After a brief stint of silence, Lana slightly lifts the brim of her skirt and removes you from her thigh. Gently, she brings you to chest-level. As she beams at you, your face feels hotter and hotter. It is finally her who speaks to you, saying "I think that I was taking that too fast... I mean, I didn't mean what I just said, a second ago, you know what I mean? Sorry, am I saying mean too much? I didn't mean to... fuck..." until you stop her.

"Lana, you don't need to be embarrassed. Look at ourselves, this is a technological innovation that has been completely fucking untouched, and you're telling me that you're upset you got a little excited?" Smiling, she nods at you. You at least think you cheered her up a little.

"I get you, little guy. Thanks, like, for not getting upset with me. I'm kind of a dork, I guess." She laughs. "Listen, keep that between me and you, when we're both famous, we don't have to bring it up."

Nodding in understanding, you reply "Of course."

"Alright... I guess it doesn't have to be awkward anymore then! I think we've done enough 'research' for the day, don't you? Let's take a break, maybe I could sneak you into a movie or something!"

To you, it seems clear Lana still wants to go on a date of sorts. You don't know how to reply, completely.
12211113.title: Hype Track

122113.content:
The choice to you is obvious, and you reach up, take hold of some more nylon in a tight grip, and continue scampering up the inside of her thigh. As before you continue your steady pace, taking as much time as you need to brace yourself before moving up so that you can be sure you won't fall. Now that you're above the knee and no longer have any sort of slope to help you, this is doubly necessary to keep you from plummeting to the ground.

When you're a few inches above where her knees meet she slides her feet together, closing her legs around you. Luckily for you she's thin enough to have a thigh gap, so instead of engulfing you in between her legs you're simply warmed a bit on your back. You proceed upwards, not giving your predicament any more thought, until the majority of light reaching you is suddenly blotted out.

You turn your head and see a waterfall of straight black hair lowering toward the floor, followed by the alabaster skin of Lana's forehead. Lana adjusts herself until she has you level with her deep blue eyes, and you look up to her mouth as she speaks. "What's taking so long, little guy?" she asks. "I know you like climbing, are you just not motivated enough?" It's not hard to see that this is going somewhere you won't enjoy, so you pick up the pace.

In another minute you reach the peak of Lana's pointed nose, and continue up to her narrow, broad mouth. As you come level with it she purses her lips, and you're suddenly buffeted by a gust of warm air as she blows on you. You weren't even close to settled, and the small bits of saliva mixed in with the gust of breath is hard to adjust to. After mere seconds you can feel your grip slipping, and you don't think she's close to being done.
122113.title: Gale-force Winds

choices: Start moving around to get spotted
1221132.content:
Lana continues to blast you with her rapid stream of air, and one by one you lose points of contact with her stockings. Before she's fully expelled her first breath you're already flapping in the breeze, barely holding on by one hand which is rapidly becoming moist. Her breath continues to blow you like a flag, and your white-knuckled grip on a single strand of nylon begins to slip.

Suddenly the gust stops and you fall back against her thigh, relieved to have maintained your hold. Before you can re-secure yourself though there's a huge inrush of air going the opposite way, and Lana purses her huge lips once again. She blasts you with another rush of air, much more formidable this time as if she were trying to blow out a candle, and you feel your fingers slip away.

Propelled by Lana's breath you float through the air at around knee height, then quickly begin tumbling down. You slam into the tile and slide along until you reach the edge, where you're able to put your feet inside the grout to stop yourself. Surprisingly you're undamaged, and you decide to stay on your back for a bit to recover.

Lana has by now stood back up and turned around so that she can begin looking for you. For now she seems hesitant to move around, just scanning the floor with her eyes, but it looks like she's having some difficulty. "Okay little guy come on out," she says, "we have other tests to do and other games to play."
1221132.title: Blown Away

choices: Trip on a small metal object
12211322.content:
If Lana wants to find you after pulling that, you tell yourself, you're going to make her work for it. You begin scooting on your back out of the main walkway, taking refuge against one of the thick lab tables you landed next to. Once you're firmly in its shadow you stand back up and press yourself against the wood, the back of your head resting inside one of the grain's indentations.

Lana seems to become more confident in her surroundings now and takes a tentative step forward, the tip of her shoe touching down just a few inches from where she had lifted it. You watch the titaness take another careful step down the aisle, this one a bit more bold than the last, as she resolves to track you down. With each step she seems more secure in her surroundings, and you remain stiff as a board while she scans the floor.

In just a few more steps Lana resumes her normal, graceful gait, albeit significantly slowed down compared to normal. You freeze as her eyes pan over you, not wanting to give yourself away by even the slightest movement: though you doubt she can see you breathing, the movement might be enough of a hint. Her eyes sweep back over you, leaving you unnoticed as she continues walking by.

Lana's shoe sets down in front of you, the dull silver fabric creased from frequent use. You look up at the spindly giantess, so close and yet oblivious to your presence, and think about what must be going through her head. Is she concerned? Does she think she's lost you, her friend and prize specimen? The shoe in front of you creases again as she steps off, and you watch her go.

Unexpectedly she shoots forward, swinging around the opposite table and slamming her foot into the ground. "Gotcha!" she yells, expecting you to be on that side, but of course you're not. It seems like she's decided to play the game with you and, wanting to be a good sport, you leave cover so that you can be a more exciting quarry. You dash into the aisle, aiming to reach the far side while Lana's still dealing with her disappointment.
12211322.title: Hiding in Plain Sight

choices: She's more thorough on this one
122113221.content:
You push off from the lab desk's leg, giving yourself a minute boost on the next leg of your journey. As you run you follow the grout line where the tiles meet, ready to jump in and cover your head if anything should suddenly threaten you. The pitter-patter of your tiny feet is drowned out by the scraping of a chair leg on along the ground as Lana continues looking for you, confirming that for the moment you're safe from being accidentally crushed.

The chair screeches again when Lana pushes it back in as you arrive safely in your new alcove. You press your back against the enormous wooden pillar to rest and catch your breath, having been warmed up by your sprint. There are two light clicks as Lana steps out from behind the desk she had been searching to stand in the middle of the aisle.

"You're not making this easy, little guy," she chides, standing with her hands on her waist. "But don't get too cocky, because I will find you." Lana bends down, her skinny knees popping on the tile as they connect, leans forward, and places her hands on the tile. Her straight, raven hair sways back and forth as she crawls along the ground, scanning the ground from her vantage point dozens of feet above you.

Lana's massive leg stops beside you, the nylon grid perfectly shaped to her calf. She bends down, nearly touching her head to the ground as she surveys the land under the desk you were just under. While she searches she idly hums to herself, a clear tune which would be unnoticed by someone at a normal size. Briefly she pushes herself forward, straightening her shoes and showing some minor muscle definition while she fully searches the desk's underside.

Dissatisfied with not having found you under there Lana pulls back to a crouching position and turns her head to face you. Her straight hair covers her eyes from your vision, so you're certain for now that you're safe from her dark blue gaze. Slowly she turns her head from the far side towards you and you do your best to remain still. From the outline of her hair you can tell that she's looking directly at you, but the wooden pillar keeps you from her view.

A long, slender arm slams down, the slap of pale skin sounding like a whip's crack. Lana's head pops in shortly after and quickly turns the other way, buying you a few more seconds. You decide to take advantage of this and hop around to the other side, trying to keep the pillar between yourself and her eyes.
122113221.title: Being Sought

1221132211.content:
When you get to the other side of the table leg you lean into it as hard as you can in an effort to reduce your visible profile. You do your best to control your breathing, then look to your right, where you can see Lana's long, slender legs stretched out while she searches for you. One of them twitches and you turn to look the other way, keeping a look out for her head peeking around the corner.

There's no sign of Lana coming around on that side after a couple seconds, so you begin to relax your guard. Having evaded Lana once more you decide to plan your next move, so you look both ways to try and figure out your next sanctuary, only to see that Lana has pulled back from her search entirely and is sitting on her heels. You look up from her knees to see her hands folded over her skirt and continue upwards to see her patiently perched as if waiting for something, and her dark blue eyes are focusing right on you.

"Found you!" she declares when she knows that you know you've been spotted. You consider running away again but dismiss the idea, since Lana's reach far outstretches your speed and you'd probably just end up getting hurt as she tries to catch you again. Instead you push off from the enormous wooden pillar behind you to make it easier for her.

In an instant Lana's hand is all around you, her palm close enough that you can see each individual contour in her alabaster skin while her fingers loop above you. There's a strong tug on your neck as she pinches the back of your shirt, and it tightens around your chest as she lifts you into the air. Your legs dangle high above her skirt when she gets you into position before the tip of her nose while she gives you an amused look.

"You're not very good at games, are you little guy?" she asks as she brushes a strand of hair behind her ear. You shake your head and she continues, "That's okay, I kind of have an advantage. But anyway, right now I think we should...
1221132211.title: Bad At Hiding

1221132213.content:
There's a rumbling calamity as Lana pushes her feet against the floor and slides her titanic body further under the table. You press your back flush against the pillar and hold your breath, trying to avoid giving yourself away to her search. The sound of her clothes rustling fills the air and her legs kick out, but you don't dare peek around the table leg to see what she's doing.

A few moments of silence follow, then the rustling of her sail-sized clothes resumes. There's a series of loud pounding followed by a deep thud as her body sets back down, and you watch out of the corner of your eye as her shoes subtly shift. Several seconds pass while she presumably inspects your side of the table, and you get ready to shuffle back to your last hiding spot when she withdraws.

Lana's open hand slams down mere inches to your left with a horrific slapping sound, and you instinctively duck for cover. When you open your eyes and look back up all you can see is Lana's face, her pointed nose close enough to touch. "Found you," she chides. You weren't nearly blown away by her voice, so she must be speaking quietly so as not to deafen you.

She pulls her head away to rest her chin in her palm, but even still her face looks enormous. "So what're you going to do now, little man?" she asks, idly drawing circles on the floor with her free index finger. "Will you run away from the big bad Lana, or can I pick you up without a fuss?" Your gaze darts between her finger thrice as long as you are tall and her thin lips pursed in an enormous expression of concentration while you try to decide.
1221132213.title: Caught!

choices: Come to your senses and stop
Escape the trap before it closes
12211322131.content:
For a bit you stand there sputtering while your brain tries to work through the situation. While you stand there tottering back and forth and muttering incoherently to yourself Lana feels you've made a decision. She lifts her finger from the floor and points it at you, then spreads the rest of her fingers while she extends her hand over you. As her fingertips pass over your head panic seizes your body and you can no longer stand your ground.

You turn and run just before Lana's fingers close around you, narrowly escaping being pinched up. In just a few steps you're out from under the table and running away as fast as possible, with Lana's tremendous body mere feet to your right, just in range to roll over you if she wanted. When that wall of fabric turns to corduroy you hear a terrific scraping sound, and Lana's thigh starts to shift under her skirt as she swings her bottom leg toward you.

There's no way she'll be able to stop you like this, not at this size. You continue forward as her slender leg approaches, the dark nylon creating a sheen over her skin. Just as you expected you're able to deftly slide under her thigh just above where it meets her knee, emerging unscathed on the other side.

With the threat of Lana's thigh gone, you find yourself in a whole new predicament between her legs. To your right her other shoe remains poised, her leg coiled and ready to shoot out and block you at any time - or strike you, if she's upset. On your left the dragging doesn't stop; Lana simply bends her leg so that her shin can form another wall, and behind you are clear signs of the giantess lifting herself on her elbows to get a better look. If you don't decide soon, she may decide for you again.
12211322131.title: On the Loose

122113221312.content:
Lana continues to rise up before you, and you decide to get as far away as possible before she steadies herself. You turn and run towards the closing exit between her feet as quickly as your tiny legs can carry you, resisting the urge to stop and take a breather. Each step takes you about half an inch closer to escaping Lana's grasp, so you try to focus solely on that.

No matter how fast you move though there's no way you can outrun her closing the trap; your legs are simply too short to traverse half the length of her long, slender legs in time. When her shin fully blocks your path you turn to the right, but Lana's other leg shoots forward like a piston, penning you in. Behind you, Lana begins pushing herself to a sitting position, erecting her torso like a grand monument and causing her to wobble.

Without hesitating you seize the ghost of a chance you have. While Lana subtly shifts her leg lifts off the ground slightly, her thin ankles unable to touch the ground. You make a beeline for that, trying not to lose your nerve as her leg acts as an overpass for you. Just as you dip your head to avoid knocking yourself out on her ankle she finishes sitting up, but by the time she can do anything you've already escaped the trap.

Before you can celebrate Lana has a nasty surprise for you. She pulls her leg hard to the left, and you're able to turn just in time to see her foot racing toward you. Lana's foot slams into you with immense force, the black nylon-clad skin sending you flying as she jerks it to a stop so that you're not pulled under and crushed. You slide to a stop in the shadow of her shin looking up at her, a triumphant smirk on her face as she looks down at you. The victorious giantess moves a hand toward you, and you begin scooting backwards in hopes of continued freedom.
122113221312.title: Breaking Through

choices: Her ankle as she stretches her legs
1221132213123.content:
Lana's hand encroaches closer as you scoot millimeters away each time you move, not even coming close to outpacing her arm. Her fingers open when they're just a few inches from you, her index and middle fingers going to either side. You hear a light thud as they set down on the floor with you between them, and you throw yourself backwards just as her fingers snap shut. When you recover she's extending her middle finger towards you, close enough for you to see in an individual whorl of her fingerprint, but just a mite out of her range.

You continue scooting yourself backwards while Lana leans forward a bit more to extend her reach, grasping for you but falling short each time. After just a few more scoots she can't get any closer, having come as close as she can without toppling forwards off balance. Satisfied that you have at least a few seconds of guaranteed safety you take the time to stand up and continue running away from Lana.

Before you can even get up to speed an object crashes into the tile to your left, staggering you temporarily as shockwaves rumble through the floor. Suddenly you become acutely aware of a large shadow that's fallen over you and look to your left where you see that Lana has slammed something in order to continue the chase.
1221132213123.title: The Chase Continues

choices: Try to get off to the sides
12211322131232.content:
Lana's hand makes a loud slap as it hits the ground, fingers splayed out to support her. Before you can assess your situation there's another tremendous slam as her other hand hits, framing you between the columns of her arms. You turn and see her legs standing tall as well, her skirt nearly reaching the ground to form a corduroy wall as her torso leans over you like a ceiling. When you look straight up you see her face framed by long strands of black hair, expectantly staring at you.

For the moment she doesn't make any moves to recapture you, so you continue moving away from her. There's some rhythmic thudding as she taps her fingers on the floor, but at the very least they remain on the ground. After a minute you're outside of her shadow and risk a glance back; Lana is still simply watching you, not moving a muscle aside from idle twitching.

Soon you're past the table you had been hiding under, and decide to see if you can go down that road. You turn left and continue jogging, only to be stopped when an enormous hand crashes down in front of you! Quickly you turn away from the thumbnail and go forward a bit more, then try turning right. Again, as soon as you start straying from the path a hand blocks your path, this one balled up like a fist. Confused you turn back towards Lana, who's barely suppressing a giggle.

Since she still isn't making a move to grab you, you decide to continue forward. A light scraping interrupts your thoughts, and you look over your shoulder to see Lana's knee sliding forward. Her shadow encompasses you again as she settles in, and her grin continues to make you feel uneasy. For a moment you hesitate, trying to decide what game she's playing now.
12211322131232.title: Herded

122113221312321.content:
Not sure what motives Lana's grin is hiding you continue running away from her, trying to put some distance between yourself and the possibly manic giantess. You know that an escape attempt is vain, since there's no way you'll be able to outpace someone with fingers longer than you are tall, but she seems to be enjoying the game. For that matter you're not having such a bad time either, and find the chase invigorating.

You get out from under her shadow and hop across the gap between two tiles, landing safely and using the momentum to keep you moving forward. Sure enough, not long after you've gotten back into the light there's a loud pop to your left when her hand slaps down, followed by one on the other side. Her knees drag against the floor with a swish from her stockings, and just like that you're back under Lana again.

The case continues with Lana slowly crawling behind your stubby-legged pace, with any deviation from a straight line blocked by one of her enormous hands. When you're between two tables again you wait for her to pull herself up, trapping you once more between her hands and looming over you to try something else. You stop running and turn to face Lana.

Once you've fully turned she lifts up her hands and sits back on her heels, waiting for you to speak. You look up the length of the giant physicist's body until you're looking her in the eyes and say, "Lana, what are you doing? You could've caught me a dozen times now and you haven't, what gives?"

"I haven't trapped you yet, so it doesn't seem fair!" she explains, grinning down at you. "I'm having fun chasing after you, aren't you?"

"It's fun, sure, but there's no sense of danger," you tell her. "Like, I'm tiny, you're huge, it should feel like you could overtake me at any moment, you know? Don't try to actually kill me, obviously, but maybe spice it up some."

Lana grins, putting on the same smile from earlier that was making you uncomfortable. "So it's danger you want, huh? I can make that happen." With that she sets the fingers of one hand against the tile in front of you and swings them forward, slapping you off your feet and into the air. You land and slide another tile's length until you come to a stop beside a far table leg. "That dangerous enough for you?" She begins crawling toward you, much faster than before, her hands slamming down hard enough to make a steady pounding rhythm. "I hope so, because I've got a lot more danger for you!" You realize that encouraging her may not have been the best idea as you decide whether to keep running down the aisle or duck beneath the table.
122113221312321.title: Pursued

1221132213123212.content:
Lana quickly closes the gap, lifting up her knees and dragging her feet along the ground with loud, rumbling thuds each time she sets them down. You get back to your feet, still feeling Lana's swipe in your chest, and turn to continue trying to escape the giantess. Laughter peals from behind you and a hand slaps down in your path, Lana's thumb curved just enough to pass over you. The shock causes you to stumble forward and lean against her thumb, now appearing as a neck-high wall of warm flesh.

Before she can do anything else you push off from the thumb, drastically changing your course to run under the table. Lana quickly brings down her other hand in your path, slapping it against the ground with such force that your teeth chatter. You end up between her index and middle fingers, and find yourself stumbling forward again. When you press on the tip of Lana's middle finger you lean into it and send yourself vaulting over her fingernail, sliding the width of it on your butt. With one foot out you land back on the floor, just far enough forward she can't pin you with her ring finger.

Once down you get back to running at full speed, passing the crest of her ring finger in just a second and entirely safe from her pinkie. Only a few inches away is the table, the support beam of which is a few inches off the ground and should keep her from pursuing you under it. When you pass under the table's edge Lana makes one more grab for you, banging her hand against the wooden beam. She sucks in air from her teeth and pulls her hand back while the wood vibrates from the blow, and you make it inside unmolested.

Instead of chasing you inside Lana crawls between the two tables and pushes herself up to her feet, squatting low. She turns to face you while you head toward the far edge of the table, trying to stay out of the long reach of her arms. Her eyes follow you as you move, and dart in whichever direction you feint while her arched back twitches that way as well. It seems like Lana is patiently waiting for you to choose a side before she pounces so that she won't have to risk bumping her head.
1221132213123212.title: Ducking Away

choices: Lana gives you a closer look at what you're rubbing against.
You slip from Lana's grasp, down deeper into her shirt.
122113221312323.content:
At first you've continued moving away from Lana, eyes averted from her actually menacing grin hanging above your head like a chandelier, but within the microcosm of a half second you find yourself surrounded by towering walls of flesh, with the leg of a table behind you. Before you turn to look at her, you take a second to push at Lana's right hand to coerce her into continuing the game, but she absolutely does not budge. Exhausted and sweating from the massive heat radiating from the hands, you finally look to Lana.

Her expression is flooded with thick mirth. Stifling a giggle, she begins to close her two hands toward you, scraping against the ground and producing a one discordant note. Unable to even blink, you're suddenly encapsulated within a flesh tomb. There's a moment in which you're manipulated by the force upon your body, twisted and wrapped, but it comes to a stop and finally the light floods back into your vision, yet you still sit within Lana's grasp. Her two eyes close for a moment. Soul power.

It's like maybe a second until you notice that you're being pulled toward Lana, to the collar of her shirt, where the fingers of her left hand grasp and tug at it and then there's an opening, an abyss before you, lined with the wiry material of Lana's shirt. Beyond pale skin and two collar bones lies darkness, and the gentle curve of two heaving breasts. You can't absorb your surroundings before you've been tossed into the crevice, laid flat across the soft cloth of a brassiere and then enveloped into the very same darkness you'd observed not a moment beforehand.

As you roll down Lana's bra with the cloth rubbing your skin raw, the ceiling above you closes down and you're stopped near the crest of her breast. Her hand, fatigued in the material of her shirt rubs you against the wall you're pinned to, spinning you dizzy.
122113221312323.title: Going No Place

1221132213123232.content:
Despite your brief safety underneath Lana's hand she loses her grip and you are overwhelmed by gravity.
