You roll along the crevice of her breasts until you come to the center of her bra and are rocketed by your momentum to the wall of her shirt which you then tumble down until you come in harsh contact with her waistband all the way at the bottom.

As you had fallen nausea completely took over your conciousness. Once you've settled your thoughts are crowded with fatigue and the sickness in your stomach. You roll onto your back and yell up at Lana to retrieve you, but she wouldn't be able to hear your moaning regardless. Despite this, she was aware of your descent and her hand comes underneath her shirt and takes you back up to her face level.

She begins to speak to you but it's difficult to hear her past the cloudiness in your ears, blocking out sound. You stare down the cracks between her fingers to the floor until you can make out her voice saying, "--so sorry, I don't know what I was thinking, I hope you're okay, can you hear me?"

In response to her desperation you put your hands below yourself and push your body up into a sitting position. Again you try to speak out and answer her but it's hard to do anything. At least your movement shows that she was heard and you're not dead.

Lana keeps talking, "I shouldn't have done that. Listen, I think we need to conclude the experiment right now, I don't think this is going to work out anymore..."

Your head picks up, that didn't sound good to you. Now was your chance to finally say something.
1221132213123232.title: Hurricane

choices: Find something to do on the desk
12211322131232322.content:
You tell Lana like it is, how you think it should be.

"Lana... Lana, listen to me... you don't have to worry about it," you say groggily, "We can forget about it. I won't let something like that ruin... ruin the experiment. Why would you let yourself just stop the advancement of science?"

Lana looks down to you, and you meet her eyes. "You could be famous, we could be famous."

This makes her smile, she nods and tells you, "You're right, I totally agree with you. I'm sorry that I overreacted. It wasn't a big deal was it?"

Truthfully it was a big deal, but you aren't in the mood to go off about it. Maybe you'll be holding it against her later on, but it seems like after your bout of unconsciousness you'd much rather relax, kill your headache and just feel alright. Lana and you can have a longer conversation about this later.

You and her talk quietly between each other as she recollects herself and moves back to her desk, where she sets you down and tells you to be good. She starts to take notes on aspects she observed about you during your interaction with you, the letters are far too big to make out without making your headache worse. The first letter of the first sentence is an E.

Cross-legged you sit at the edge of her desk and look off the edge. You were getting bored already.
12211322131232322.title: Do What You Want

choices: Get back down, Lana should be done by now
122113221312323221.content:
After a while of sitting in one spot and occasionally shifting, you decide what's best to do is to improvise with the objects around you and make your own fun. After what happened earlier, it might be best to let Lana work and unwind herself. There's an atmosphere of tension as she silently writes, likely still embarrassed. Girls are like that.

From walking around for some duration you make out the landscape of the desk. Toward the far left is Lana herself, and in front of her is her notepad. She's still writing into it. Further in from of her is a laptop, and behind that is a variety of wires connected to it, all tumbling from the top of the desk down to the floor, where you assume they're plugged in. To the right of them is the second half of the desk, the area you've been given. Closest to you is a coffee mug, but feeling it tells you that it's cold, so the coffee in it is either old or not there at all.

Slightly farther from you is a pair of earphones coiled around itself, and past even that is a pencil holder that is fully stocked, next to a pad of post-it notes and a stack of other notebooks. The absolute top right corner of the desk holds a crumpled piece of paper.

If you get the gist, there isn't very much here to work with. You wander toward the earphones and observe them for a moment, running your hand along the wire and feeling the rubber. There's nothing particularly special about it, but the ear pieces themselves are grotesque at your size, along the inside of it runs small deposits of brown ear wax.

Out of curiosity you take a handful of it and feel it in your hands. There isn't time to play with it before you realize how gross and unsanitary the action is, so you shake your hands around wildly until the most of it is off, then scrape the rest off along the rim of the interior of the earbud. You're sure some of it is still stuck between your fingers.

You observe the mug from the distance and see the image printed onto it, a painting of a woman in a sundress standing along the shore of a lake, admiring it.

Whenever you look to the pencil holder, an idea comes to mind. You run toward it and climb along the ascending compartments inside of it until you reach the largest, where you can barely reach the top of a pencil, where the eraser is. You pull yourself up and now have a much larger view.

Nothing around you is interesting, but you can see that there is cold coffee inside of the mug. You aren't sure what to do next.
122113221312323221.title: Slide Through

choices: Be truthful, tell her she hurt you
Don't hurt her feelings now, tell her you didn't feel any pain
1221132213123232211.content:
As an overwhelming sense of boredom as well as curiousity overtakes you, you feel the urge to jump into the coffee mug. Standing to your feet, balancing on the eraser that only one and a half of your feet fit onto, you crouch and take a bounding jump toward the mug. For a moment you soar through the air until you make impact with the coffee, and are sent into the liquid.

You keep your eyes shut as you rise to the surface of the coffee, breaking into the air. When you open your eyes you look to the walls of the mug around you, at least half of the coffee was drank. It's freezing cold.

Looking down to your clothes, they're stained a dark shade of brown now. You take a deep breath and inhale the deep odor of the coffee.

Lana's been staring at you now, watching you. Her mouth is hanging open as she peers down into the mug at you. You both stay in silence as you tread water awkwardly. You nervously laugh.

"What are you doing? You need to get out of there, you're making a mess!"

The mug lifts up from beneath you, Lana is taking you to the kitchen to remove you from it. Still left in silence, you start to wonder exactly what you had been thinking.

Once you've gotten to a sink, Lana picks you out of the mug then empties it into the drain. "I don't know if this will hurt, but I'll be gentle," she says as she dries you with a paper towel. Even though it doesn't hurt, she doesn't feel gentle. Her hands are tight and they move robotically. When she pulls the paper towel from your face, she's giving you a cold look.

"Can't you just wait a while without doing something stupid?," she asks, but you have no time to answer as she returns to her room with you in hand.

"Alright, I need to ask you some questions about how you felt while we were messing around."

"Okay, sorry again," you say but she doesn't seem to react. She gets ready to write and ask questions.
1221132213123232211.title: Boricua Morena

choices: Keep lying, she wouldn't possibly do anything that could risk killing you.
12211322131232322112.content:
"Whenever you fell down my shirt, you passed out. Were you feeling lightheaded, or was it from excruciating pain?"

At the moment, you feel like Lana isn't too happy with you or herself. Maybe she's only asking these questions to reaffirm the bad feelings she's having right now and make herself feel worse. With that in mind, you decide to make it as easy on her as possible and keep her from having some sort of breakdown.

You think for a moment then say, "I was lightheaded, I didn't really feel anything when you were playing with me. I'd say that I'm perfectly fine."

Lana makes a face of curiousity then nods, taking notes on your condition. The further she writes the more she grows a subtle grin across her mouth. Whenever she finishes she says, "Alright then, you didn't feel anything? Let's go under some small tests to see what might have caused that. Lay down for me."

Whenever you've laid down, Lana takes a pen from her pencil holder and puts it next to you. Gently, she adjusts your arm to be out straight, and then she places her finger across your arm."

"Tell me how this feels. If you feel like your arm might break, stop me as soon as possible."

Slowly she applies pressure to your arm. At first it's a minor pain, but eventually it evolves into something otherworldly. Although you don't think that your arm is willing to give out yet, you want to stop her anyway. At the same time, you worry that showing your pain will reveal your earlier testimony as a lie. You spend so long debating your decision that she stops altogether and starts to talk to you.

"Wow, you didn't react at all! I was worried that I would eventually break your arm, but it looks like you're a lot more tolerant to pain now... I think we should take this further and try out some other things to see exactly how far this side effect goes. Who knows what it could extend to?"

Awkwardly, you try to laugh as she smiles at you. That definitely brought her mood up, but now you're a bit worried for your well being. This is probably your last chance to tell the truth before it's too late.
12211322131232322112.title: The Ends

122113221312323221122.content:
If it comes to the worst, you can tell Lana that you feel there is still a risk of you dying. Or maybe you could say that it was a temporary side effect. Who knows, you just don't want to ruin Lana's mood right after seeing her so happy. Without your response, Lana takes it as your way of accepting her plan. She stands up and tells you she's going to go get some tools, but with that you interrupt her.

Pointing at the window, you say, "Don't you think it's getting a little late? Maybe we can do this tomorrow morning, I'm feeling really tired at this point... sorry!"

Lana looks at you weirdly and and laughs, she replies to you, "Yeah, as if. It's not like you just jumped into a cup of coffee. Science is first priority right now! You were the one who volunteered, remember? So wake up!" She laughs again and smiles at you then walks out of the room.

That whole interaction shook you quite a bit. Science is first priority? What about your survival? Or your wellbeing in general? You aren't so sure about this whole thing anymore.

For the entire time you're sitting on the cold desk, you are lost in thought. You stare down at the tile floor and wonder what you've gotten yourself into. This trance is only shattered whenever Lana reenters.

She has a variety of tools in her hands, which she places on the table. Silently, she sorts them out for a while, seemingly by order of least to most dangerous. The two safest tools she moves closest to you, then picks one out to use first.
122113221312323221122.title: Game Set

choices: The test is finished and called a success
1221132213123232211221.content:
Lana removes a match from the matchbox, then starts to explain what the test is for now. "I'll hold you over the match. Of course it'll be more than far enough to keep you from catching on fire. We can try that after you pass some other tests," she smiles, "so we can slowly lower you into it, and if you feel like it's starting to hurt, tell me to stop. Don't worry, even if you don't stop me, I'm not gonna actually set you on fire yet."

That sounds simple enough to you, and you definitely trust Lana to not kill you. Come to think of it, if she gets too close then her own fingers will be burned, so there's a foolproof way you'll survive. Nothing to be worried about, unless Lana actually prioritizes science first, over her own wellbeing as well.

She takes you with one hand and strikes the match against her chair with the other. The match comes closer and closer to you, so close that it feels like you may be blinded by it. But you figure that it's best to get this over with and let Lana have her fun.

The match is put under you, so far that you don't feel any sort of heat coming from it. Lana sees your lack of a reactiom so she raises it higher, and now you feel a minor sense of heat, like a campfire. With that, you still don't react, and instead try to give Lana a look to hint that you're scared for your life.

Somehow, Lana interprets your look as, let's get incredibly close. You're taken so low that it feels like your clothes may begin to singe off, and then after a moment you feel the dampness from coffee comes off of your clothes. This has to be as far as Lana could take you.

It seems like that predicition is true, but Lana still holds you over the flame for a long period of time. She says, "You really don't feel anything at all? That's amazing..."

"Yeah, Lana, I think this test was a rousing success," you say nervously, "But I'm feeling sick from being up here. How about you put me down now?"

She stares at you intently. You aren't sure if that's good or bad.
1221132213123232211221.title: Toaster

12211322131232322112211.content:
The match reaches Lana's fingers and she has to put it out. You give a sigh of relief and start to say something to Lana, but she interrupts with, "Let's try one more trial, just in case."

She lights another match and starts you off as close as you had been earlier. Very slowly she brings the flame closer and closer to you until it's nearly licking your shoes. You look up and Lana with genuine fear in your eyes, but you see in her expression that she is stuck in her own world.

Whenever you touch the flame, you scream out for her to stop, but it's too late. You are set alight in less than a second. Lana yelps and drops you onto the metal desk, and puts out the match. With no water to use in her vicinity, she places her thumb onto you, extingushing the flame immediately.

She shakes and has tears welling in her eyes as she slowly pulls her thumb away. When you're finally in sight, she sees that you were already burned into a husk before she had extinguished you. She immediately begins sobbing loudly, staring at your corpse, frozen in a position of horror.
12211322131232322112211.title: Rushes

choices: Go to sleep and get ready for tomorrow
12211322131232322112212.content:
Just as your heart begins to sink, Lana's eyes soften and she nods and smiles. "This is amazing what we're doing, it's astounding that shrinking you would increase your durability, and even leave you unable to ignite."

As she finishes speaking she begins to put away the matches, but everything else still lies on the table, ready for use. For a moment you see that she's reaching for something else to continue, but she relents. "You're right, we should get some sleep. Tomorrow will be a big night."

That leaves you feeling a lot better, so you agree and she gathers everything up and puts it back up, tools like scalpels, glue, and most threateningly a bottle of bleach. You would be seeing them later.

Once she finishes cleaning you both exit the building, your body in her hands. The travel makes you nauseous but it's manageable after your experience with the matches. All you had to do was get to her place and then you could continue planning.

After a drive you come to where she lives. Getting inside, you both get ready for sleeping, Lana changes but you neglect to take off your clothes to sleep. Eventually you're left alone, Lana laying in her bed and you posted atop her dresser laying on a small cloth.
12211322131232322112212.title: Illygirl

1221132213123232211222.content:
She takes the tweezers into her hands and brings them close to you. The sharpened edges gleam brightly, illuminated by the humming fluorescent light above. Lana asks you to take off your shirt and pants and lay onto your back. You start taking them off.

"Alright, so I'm gonna start off just poking you a little bit, once we get past that we can get into more extreme stuff. If you start to feel pain, tell me immediately! We'll be in big trouble if you're injured."

"Cool, but, uh, maybe we can do this later? Now that you have everything out we'll be ready in the morning and everything, it'll all be good, we can--"

"We're doing it now, lay back."

You do as she asks, swallowing your spit and closing your eyes. There's a brief period of silence before you hear the sound of the tweezers clapping together, then they make contact with your body.

The most painful thing is the cold on your bare skin, it's like a sudden shock down your spine from the freezing sensation. Soon enough, you grow used to it and a new world of pain is introduced to you. What probably seems like gentle prodding to Lana feels like a massive, sharp boulder being lowered onto your stomach. As it comes to settle onto you, Lana brings the tweezers together.

It feels first like only an immense amount of pressure, but the pain begins to register after a few moments. Your entire body is seemingly set alight as your skin is tightened and pulled toward your stomach. It only lasts for a few seconds before Lana stops.

All that is left is an indentation on your tummy. Lana asks, "How would you describe me pinching with the tweezers?"

You aren't defeated yet, you lower your head and respond, "It felt like a lot of pressure, but it didn't hurt at all." You're just digging yourself into a deeper and deeper hole.

Lana's face lights up. She says, "Alright, let's do it limb by limb, then. Remember to tell me if something goes wrong."

The tweezers are brought back to you and she begins by grabbing at your left arm and squeezing a bit. She moves down each limb, and with all of them it feels like a clamp being slowly tightened more and more onto your limb, until it feels as though it could snap.

Whenever she reaches your last limb, the right arm, she squeezes as normal, and you don't respond verbally. Her face is extremely intent, she squeezes more than anything she's done before. There's a small moment where all of the pain stops, and then you feel your arm give in, and your reaction is like an explosive being detonated across your arm. You hold in any reaction so strongly that you soon pass out.

Whenever you come to, Lana is staring down at you, nearly in tears. You look into her eyes and try to push yourself onto your butt with your right arm, but the explosive pain returns. Looking at your arm, you see that it's now a deep shade of purple and red.

"Oh my God, are you still alive? Did I break your arm? I'm so so so so sorry, oh my God..."

You cut her off, saying, "I'm fine... I just feel nauseous now. Give me a second."

Now you're at a loss. You could tell her the truth, and make her feel even worse than before. But it would keep you from being experimented on further. Or you could say that it's all alright and continue. You've nearly reached your breaking point.
1221132213123232211222.title: Steering Board

choices: You make it to her panties
122113221313.content:
Feverishly you look back and forth, unable to see a safe way past the black-clad thighs on either side. Behind you the scraping stops as Lana's foot slides into place, her legs forming a triangular perimeter around you. You watch as she pushes herself up to a sitting position, her torso rising high as she stops lounging.

When she's fully erect Lana towers over you yet again, her head forming the cap on her structure, seemingly hundreds of feet tall to you. She reaches over you and places a hand on her knee, rubbing it gently as she peers down at you. Lana grins and says, "Looks like I win again, little guy." A quick survey of your surroundings shows that she's right.

While you hang your head you spot another possible route - up her skirt! Maybe you won't be able to escape, you think, but you can hold out a little longer. You dash forward, taking the giantess by surprise and run into the dark cave of her skirt. Everything gets dark as the floor transitions to corduroy, and you continue running for the shining beacon of her white panties. If you can latch on to those you may be able to weather any retribution she sends your way for this. All around you feel the titaness stirring, and you're certain your time is running out.
122113221313.title: Do the Unexpected

choices: She may be a bit too serious
1221132213131.content:
As you run your feet sink into the fabric of Lana's skirt, considerably slowing your advance toward her panties. The floor subtly shifts as Lana adjusts herself, knocking you off balance but not quite to your back. While you stumble the floor settles back down, and you prepare yourself for one last sprint towards Lana.

The instant you take a step forward you feel something like a trap snap shut over your back ankle. You can't process what it is before it gives a firm tug, pulling you off your feet and slamming you face first into the inside of her skirt. You're briskly pulled backwards while you claw at the corduroy in a vain attempt to gain traction, but even if you could get a solid grip the force pulling on you is much too strong for you to resist.

Soft corduroy gives way to firm linoleum, and you finally piece together that Lana managed to grab your leg. Luckily she doesn't drag you along the cold floor, opting instead to lift you up in her grip. Though your position is far from comfortable you realize the only way out would be Lana dropping you, and looking down at the one foot drop tells you that's not going to be a good option for you.

Lana slowly lifts you, her dainty fingers tightly pinched over your ankle and lower shin as you ascend. Blood rushes to your head while you remain upside down, and you expectantly look past your foot towards Lana's face. Despite having nothing else to focus on you can't discern any feeling or intent from her deep blue eyes as you're raised past her lips.

Finally she stops, letting you dangle in front of her nose. Lana tilts her wrist, making you lightly swing side to side in a manner very uncomfortable for your leg. Sternly she lifts up her other hand and wags a finger at you in admonition, and her face looks none too pleased. You wait a beat, hoping that she's kidding around to see what she does next.
1221132213131.title: Snagged

choices: Lana drops you in a jar
She tosses you in a fine-mesh cage
12211322131313.content:
Lana's eyebrows arc inward and you're pulled slightly towards her as she inhales sharply. "What the fuck do you think you're doing?" she bellows, no longer controlling her voice to compensate for your size. She continues, her voice only increasing in volume as you cover your ears to protect your hearing. "What, you think just because you're small it's okay for you to go up there? What fucking world did you grow up in?"

She goes quiet and takes a couple deep breaths, seemingly trying to calm herself down before continuing. Lana jerks her hand forward, making you flinch as you race toward her lips, but she stops just before you reach them, letting you bump into her bottom lip as you swing. "You know, I felt bad about shrinking you," she begins again, her voice much quieter now. "I figured we could have some fun, play some games, keep things from getting too boring for you even though you can't really do anything now. But apparently," her voice growls a bit before she brings it back down, "you can't handle it.

Lana pulls you away from her lips then slightly flicks her wrist, swinging you upwards. Temporarily you're freely flying through the air and do a half flip until your back hits against Lana's palm, at which point she closes her fingers around you. She walks with you at about chest level to a table where she's left a variety of open containers. For a moment she pauses, considering what to do, and says, "I guess I can't trust you to be out and about if you're going to be a pervy little shit."
12211322131313.title: Took It Too Far

122113221313133.content:
The pressure on you increases as Lana tightens her grip. Breathing becomes difficult as her fingers constrict around you, and you try your best to take shallow breaths so that your lungs will still have some room to expand. You look up at her face pitifully and find her looking back down at you, her gaze hardened as she focuses on you in her grip.

"Lana, please," you plea between short inhalations. "I won't do it again." Lana either doesn't believe you or doesn't care as her index finger pushes harder onto your diaphragm, making it so your lungs can't expand at all. You struggle, trying to get your arms free so that you can wiggle out, but her grip is so tight you can't manage to budge even a little.

Your two bottom ribs crack then break entirely, sending waves of agony throughout your torso. You try to scream, but with no air all you can do is frantically move your mouth. Lana raises her slender thumb then sets it down atop your head, blocking your sight entirely - not that you could see much of anything with the spots from oxygen deprivation intruding into your vision. With one quick contraction she squeezes her fist, crushing you in an instant.

Lana calmly walks over to a sink and turns on the water, then places her hands under the faucet. The water's swift current rinses your shattered corpse from her palm, dropping it into the sink and then down the drain. She turns the water back off and dries her hands, then leaves the room, confident that she has enough data for her paper already.
122113221313133.title: Results Inconclusive

1221132213132.content:
Startled by your sudden change of movement, Lana unexpectedly slams her two thighs together in reaction. Before you can even move, two insurmountable walls of living flesh slam into you on both sides. In an instant you are sandwiched between this girl's legs and in extreme pain. Ears ringing, you squirm about in a panic.

What feels like twenty minutes is, in reality, a fraction of a second. Kinetic energy is transferred from Lana's legs, now completely still, into your body. Unable to move or completely process your fate, you are reduced to a red smear across this girl's legs, staining her stockings and officially ending her experiment. Permanently.
1221132213132.title: Inglorious

122113223.content:
You begin your dash, hoping to make a distance of what looks like 40 or 50 yards before Lana wises up and starts searching again. At each new tile you hop over the spacing between them so as not to trip, the light contouring of the surface flying by as you sprint. Before you know it you're halfway to the other side, confident that Lana will just be bewildered by your changing position.

Lana, however, isn't going by your game plan. Out of the corner of your eye you see her straighten, and pull her leg back under her. Quickly she turns back in your direction, her eyes scanning the floor again, but a glance upwards lets you know that you're too close to be caught in her gaze. She steps forward, dropping a shadow over you and shaking your confidence.

Lana's heel sets down, the light click of her slightly raised shoes sounding more like a low boom to your ears. Directly above your head the contour-free sole of her shoe swings down, with you right in the middle. With a deafening crack she slams it onto the floor, crushing your body into a red smear when it makes contact.

Above you, Lana hears the tell-tale crunch of your body being squished beneath her shoe. Fearfully she lifts her leg up and looks down at your remains smeared on the bottom of her sole, with a small red stain on the tile. "Oh shit."
122113223.title: Underfoot

12212.content:
You scoff and ask, "Now why should I do that?"

Lana smirks and answers, "Because of this." She lifts up her foot, coiling her leg up as far as it can go, and slams it back to the ground. Her shoe's sole stops just above your head as her heel impacts, making you stumble backwards from the source. You back away, honestly surprised that she's being so aggressive and somewhat in shock. When you clear the impact area she swings her foot down, causing you to unsteadily collide with the toe of her shoe.

"Did I convince you yet?" she asks as she lifts up her foot again. She slides her heel up until it's just in front of you, allowing the rest of her shoe to hang over you menacingly. This time you know she means business, so you turn around and run as fast as you can. As soon as you've cleared her shadow her foot slams down again, causing you to slip to a knee.

You decide to change course and try to get past her other foot. As you cross the floor you can feel Lana's eyes tracking you, just waiting for the moment to pounce and do whatever it is she plans. Just when it looks like you'll pass her shoe she shoots it forward, blocking your path yet again.

In a panic you spin around and run for the other side. You look up and see that Lana's positively beaming as this goes on, as if she's having the time of her life. Quickly you divert course, hoping to run underneath a table just a bit in front of where her foot is. It seems like you might make it, but Lana has other plans. She lifts up her foot and stomps it down in front of you, knocking you off your feet so that you fall against her shoe.

Lana draws her other foot back and kneels, her massive body filling up your view. "That was fun," she says, and pushes up her red framed glasses, "but it didn't last very long." You remain silent, waiting for her to decide what that means for you.
12212.title: A Dangerous Race

122121.content:
"I hope you're not exhausted, because I think that I'm up for continuing our game."

She says this, and instead of taking time to discuss the topic you run. There is a foot in front of another foot, perhaps walking but faster, and then you are at a quick pace. You take the previous session of this game into consideration and look deep into Lana's eyes as you run. You're thinking harder now. Remember, you say to yourself, one foot in front of the other. Do not trip. She's looking straight at you, she's reading your mind. It is like you feel these thoughts you're having being shuffled around clumsily to an intruder.

One foot in front of the other. Finally the glazed expression over her eyes vanishes in an instant and her foot shoots forward to block your path. After all these thoughts you've had you can expect this, fortunately, and you turn to the left without a pause and completely avoid her shoe, running around it entirely. You hear stifled laughter. This girl then pivots, her shiny shoe racing toward you to knock you down (perhaps leading to critical injury, does Lana know what she is doing?) but you feel an undying calculation in your chest and mind, and duck in time to avoid her foot. Now she understands that perhaps this will not be so easy.

You're running off in the opposite direction without looking back. One foot in front of the other. Your hands, clenched into two fists, begin to tingle and feel sore. This enthralls you. One foot in front of the other. Your back is killing you at this point but you do not care. Above you is a massive shadow that looms. You spare a moment to look up and you are seeing the bottom of Lana's shoe. Is This The Death Of You, you think, but of course it isn't. She slams down, harder than any of the previous times, directly before you. The ground shakes and your brain knocks around in your skull.

One foot in front of the other.

Before you can even expect it, the floor comes up to meet you. The wind that was whirring in your ears comes to a stop instantly and is replaced with a loud thud, the sound of your head colliding with the ground. You're bleeding, and your thoughts are incomprehensible. Is your head on straight...

Beneath you are tremors, and then above you is shadow. You make out heavy breathing and whispering, all like: "Are you okay?" "He can't be dead, can he?" and "Oh god, it hasn't even been a month." and you do not understand the words. Your motor functions are temporarily halted, until you finally feel the urge to stand to your feet. Your shift your left arm slightly to help yourself up, but before you know it, this panicked woman has stepped on you to remove the evidence of the man she thought she had killed.

Your body is smeared and ground into millions of red and pink and yellow particles, atoms, molecules, and you are reduced to a stain so thin you can never be recognized. This girl cries later.
122121.title: One foot in front of the other.

choices: Takes you over to her desk
122122.content:
Before you can even push yourself off her shoe you feel a tug on the back of your collar as it's pinched between Lana's thumb and forefinger. Reflexively you try to hold on to her shoe but there is literally no chance - there are no solid places for you to dig your fingers in, and even if there were Lana could tear you away with a simple flick of her wrist. Lana turns you to face her as she lifts you up, letting you see a triumphant grin spread across her gigantic face.

When she has you fully facing her she begins to stand, and places her other hand underneath you, palm open. Gradually she lowers you into her hand, finally letting go of your shirt when your feet are securely on her palm. She raises you up to her chin, keeping you eye level with her lips while she continues smiling and looks down at you.

"Are you all tuckered out already?" she asks, setting two fingers down before you. She starts walking them around on her palm, each finger twice as tall as you. "Little guy can't even play for a few minutes?" Lana "kicks" one of her fingers out, hitting you straight in the chest and knocking you down. Before you can get up she lays the finger down on you, pinning you against her palm.

"What's the matter? Is big, strong Lana too powerful for a little pipsqueak like you?" She grins as she prods you with her finger. "You're really small, I understand if I'm too much for you." Lana giggles as she pokes you again, apparently thinking it's hilarious you're this small because of her. "I mean you were always a tiny little thing, but now..." As she trails off she giggles, poking you two more times, then an expression of inspiration lights across her face.
122122.title: Plucked to the Sky

1221222.content:
Lana withdraws her finger, removing the threat of constant prodding for the moment. You try to push yourself back to your feet, but as you do so Lana cups the hand you're in, leaving the flesh soft and squishy rather than taut and you have trouble getting your feet under you. Out of frustration you roll sideways, sliding down into the center of her palm, and push yourself up.

When you're standing again you look up at Lana smiling down, your vision rimmed by the edges of her cupped hand. As you watch her other hand slides into view, totally eclipsing her face as her fingers pass over until you're centered under her palm. The last bit of light is squelched out as she closes both hands together, cupping them tightly around you.

Before you can even question what's happening you're rapidly lifted into the air, then the floor stops, sending you flying into Lana's top hand. She quickly shoots her hands forward, rolling you against her palm in a disorienting spin as you're moved backwards until you get wedged between her palm and fingers. She reverses direction again with you held in place by light pressure until she suddenly stops again, rocketing you out to sail through the dark cavern and land on what you think is her middle finger.

Now you're too disoriented to know which direction is up as she keeps churning her hands, bouncing you around her palms with wild abandon. So far you've managed to avoid any serious injury thanks to Lana keeping her palms creased and fairly soft, but you're definitely dizzy and getting worse with each second. This must be how a die feels, you think to yourself as you bounce once more off what you think is the "roof" of the cavern.

Your tumbling continues for some time, none of it easy, until Lana decides how to you're going to exit.
1221222.title: Shaken Up

12212223.content:
With finality you slam into Lana's wide-open palm again of what you think is her bottom hand, though you're still too discombobulated to know for sure. Light pours back into her cupped hand as she pulls the top away, momentarily stunning you with the sudden bright burst. Before you can recover you're forced up again, and with no canopy Lana one-hand catapults you into the air.

The G-forces from this acceleration make your stomach drop, and you feel yourself getting light-headed as blood pools into your feet. In a second you rocket past Lana's face, locked in an expression of quizzical wonder as your tiny body flies past it. Below you are all the lab tables and chairs that you had been working at not even an hour earlier, and at the front of the room you see the shrinking device, still pouring off smoke.

You gulp when you look up and see the ceiling looming closer. Lucky for you gravity kicks back in, slowing your ascent as you approach the fiberglass sky. Just before you slam into it, breaking your neck or possibly even splattering over the ceiling, the forces acting on you level out, and you begin to descend once more.

When your descent starts you look down, and sure enough Lana's still waiting there, patiently looking up as she watches your shrunken form sail through the air. She's not just going to let you slam into the floor though; she has something open and ready to catch you.
12212223.title: Airborne

choices: You are coughed up into Lana's hand.
You are swallowed in the midst Lana's coughing fit.
122122233.content:
Swiftly moving through the air, your previous habitat of Lana's two entangled hands are suddenly replaced with a single terrifying sight: her open mouth. Unable to change the angle of your descent, you move closer and closer to this girl's awaiting maw until you, of course, land very carefully onto Lana's tongue.

Unfortunately for you, this means extreme danger. Before she is capable of capturing you within the confines of her mouth, you shoot down to the absolute back of her throat. Painfully, you make hard contact with the interior of her mouth and slide further down, settling atop this girl's fleshy epiglottis. Your moment of rest is interrupted incredibly quickly, as Lana detects your presence within her throat and begins to cough incredibly violently.

The waggling of the soft, wet walls around you is beyond disorienting. As Lana is convulsing, hacking her lungs out, you hold onto grips as tightly as possible with her epiglottis. Consistently you are coated in the airborne spittle coming from Lana's mouth as well as the thick mucus from her esophagus.

Unexpectedly, you finally lose your hold on Lana's epiglottis. In a moment you become completely at the mercy of Lana's unpredictable, periodic coughs.
122122233.title: Cottonmouth

1221222332.content:
Completely unable to react, a massive gust of air from Lana's constant inhaling knocks you about the depths of her throat, deeper into the moist crevice until, after settling for only a moment at the entrance of Lana's esophagus, the floor below you vanishes and you're sucked deep into her body, with one resounding gulp.

Slowly, painfully slowly, you're pulled down the tract of Lana's esophagus. Peristalsis moves at a snail's pace, practically, and the perhaps five seconds in which you're quickly transported into the interior of Lana's stomach feels like ages. The ridged walls probe at and palpate against your body, thick globs of mucus are either inhaled or swallowed, and eventually it seems smarter to simply not breathe at all. Just as you believe you are passing out, your temporary abode is gone, and you plummet into the gastric juices of the human stomach.

This situation is, to you, impossible to comprehend. Wandering about the darkness, nearly void of oxygen to breathe, you repeatedly slip and fall into slimy rifts and wrinkles speckling the walls of Lana's stomach until finally you've given up. Spitting out the miscellania that's wormed into your mouth, you attempt to relax and assess what has happened. Despite your current location, you are relaxed as you realize something incredibly important: Lana is no fool. It could only be a matter of minutes until you are rescued.

Completely out of any air to breathe, you drift off to sleep. You'll probably wake up in a toilet, surrounded by vomit in thirty or forty minutes. A great story for the grandkids.
1221222332.title: Tummyache

choices: She goes to a hair salon
She goes to get a meal
1221223.content:
This female, holding your minuscule body in hand slowly walks over to her own desk that has fourteen or fifteen of sheets of paper, with what written on them but ideas drafted for the occasion presented right now. Her soft grip of hand, calluses colored auburn or orange rubbing at your epidermis, is let loose when she has approached the existing table. With concise speed you are lowered to the table and palm outstretched she releases you and blinks, thin layer of skin scraking across the second and then she smiles and pokes you roughly with her long, thin finger until you tumble down off of her hand. Impact with this table is disorienting and strange, alien really, and when you are standing you feel the blood inside of your skull or brain seethe around to climax and you are once more conscious.

'I composed a list of things that we can do together! And yes, I know that's kind of nerdy and all but just read it, honestly. There's a whole lot of neat things that I thought of.'

Neat things you are wondering, and Lana pulls a paper from a drawer to the left of her (the paper was not already on the desk?) then brings it forth to you in a presenting manner. You cannot hold the paper, you think, you cannot hold this. When you reach out with your left hand she laughs and sets it down to your right. The letters are each written in uniform and clear print with red and sometimes blue ink, more frequently as the list goes down. There are sixteen 'neat things' on the list but several appear uncomfortably unpleasant. Retrieve objects lost beneath the refrigerator? Or travel across a room taking notes on microscopic fauna? No particular option sticks out as pleasant and you begin to grimace. The boring girl Lana frowns and you frown too.

'This list is boring; do you have no soul or something? Maybe we can do something actually interesting?'
'I thought that these were interesting things to do. The list outlines a whole lot of creative research ideas so we can make practical use of your size. That was the intention of this, of course. I do not see what else we could do, unless you are willing to implore upon non-conventional research.'
'What is that supposed to mean?'

Lana looks like those men on television who advertise vehicles with absurdly low pricee. You blink and she stands to a full height and you are still down here on the table. Her hair is framing her face in this strangely alluring way and it is honestly almost too much. She plucks you directly off the table and then puts you on top of her head, within her thin hair that tangles and wraps around itself an infinite number of times and you trip on the rounded surface. Her hands appear above you and suddenly the hair all around begins to strangle you as she controls it, tying it into a formal bun with you as the center.

This girl giggles and fingers the bun a bit until it is well adjusted and then she sneezes cutely.

'I'm going to go out, you can tell me whatever you discover when I'm back home.'
1221223.title: Soporific (or Immersed?)

1222.content: Where does she take you?
1222.title: Take you somewhere else

13.content:
Blearily you check the flyer you had taken with the time and address of the drug trial. This is definitely the right place - a nondescript office in the chemistry building - and you were about five minutes early. Hopefully it would be over quick, just a few measurements, sign a waiver, take whatever it was they were testing, and then you could collect your money and go back to work.

You knock on the open door and step in, then smile at the receptionist. "Uh, hi," you announce yourself. "I'm here for the trial that's supposed to happen today? For something called-" you check the sheet to read it, but the receptionist cuts you off.

"Oh, you're the first one here," she says as she checks a clipboard. "And it looks like you're the only one signed up for this. I'll let her know you're here, she should be out in just a few minutes." You nod and take a seat in one of the chairs by the door, take out your phone, and begin reading the news to pass the time.

After a minute a door beside the desk opens and a woman's voice calls, "Come on back, I'm ready for you." You pocket your phone and stand, then walk over to the woman in the doorway. She's a fair bit taller than you, with flowing blond hair and grey eyes with a very athletic body. The woven pattern of the collar on her hot pink shirt is at about nose level, and her long, slender legs are accentuated by very tight jeans tucked into a pair of knee-high boots.

She holds out her hand to you and you take it, giving her a solid handshake. "Good morning, I'm Olga," she says cheerily. "How're you doing?" She turns around and leads you into the room, a fairly large lab with racks of test tubes and beakers on each table. Briskly she walks to the far corner where she's set her equipment up, and beckons for you to stand against the wall.

"I'm not doing so bad, how 'bout yourself?" you answer as you follow her instructions. As you take your spot on the wall she says that she's doing fine, and tells you to stand up straight. She withdraws a tape measure from her prepared kit and holds one end beside your head, then drops the other end to the floor. Olga tells you to step on it as she pulls it taut.

She jots down your height and weight, then says, "Do you know what sort of drug you'll be testing today?" You shake your head, figuring that she must have gotten your weight somehow, then she explains, "We've been working on a dietary supplement to assist people with losing weight. The way it works is that it latches onto unnecessary fat cells and reduces them without totally eliminating them, though it does make them much easier to burn off. With me so far?" You nod, and she continues. "We've already got human trials well under way, but we need you to see what happens when someone's subjected to an extra large dose. Of course a dose is based on body composition, size, and a variety of other factors, so that's why we had to use someone so small for it." You nod again, and Olga begins spooning a powder into a glass of water.

"The normal dose is one-quarter tablespoon," she elaborates, "so we'll be giving you twenty." She hands you the glass, making sure you have a firm grip on it before releasing it. "For safety we'll need you to stay here a while for observation, that won't be a problem will it?" You shrug and shake your head, and Olga smiles. "Good. Drink up when you're ready."

You tilt your head back and chug the liquid as fast as you can. It's faintly cloudy from all the stuff she added to it, and it tastes incredibly bitter as it gushes out onto your tongue. Still, you want that $200, and it's not like the side effects could be too bad. When you finish it you hand the glass back to her and wince from the taste.

"Okay, if you feel strange, uncomfortable, or have any suden changes, let me know," Olga says as she sets a timer, then leans back to watch you. Several minutes pass as your eyes dart furitively around the room and you try to make small talk with her when she stands up and grabs the tape measure again.

Already you can tell something's wrong. For one thing Olga, who had previously merely been tall, now towered over you as your eyes met her chest. For another she steps on the loose end of the tape measure, holding it down with her boot as she compares the end she's holding with the top of your head. "Four feet, six inches tall after five minutes," she reports matter-of-factly, not even a hint of surprise in her voice.

"What do you mean I'm four-six?" you ask. "I may be short but I'm over five feet, did you measure right?" When you finish talking you find yourself looking up at Olga's chest, and she has to peer over her breasts to respond.

"No, you're just shrinking." Olga must have noticed the surprise on your face since she continues, "We knew there was an outside chance of this happening with such a large dose, it was on the back of the flyer we posted, didn't you read it?"

"I did," you say, looking up from her waist, "I just thought it was a joke! I mean, who would think 'loss of height' could be an actual side-effect? Do you at least know how small I'll get and when it'll wear off?"

Olga squats down to put herself at eye level with you and reads off "Three feet eight inches," the stands back up, putting your eyes right in the middle of her thighs, then she answers your question. "Typically the risk is one to two inches with a normal dose over the course of usage, but you got eighty times that all at once so... really small? As to how long, well, it's supposed to never let the fat cells grow again so that they can be burned off at any time, so I guess you might say it's," she suddenly gets a lot quieter, "permanent."
Your eyes bug out as they reach the top of her boot. "Permanent?" you shout, your voice getting higher-pitched. "And how small is 'really small?'"

Olga towers above you more and more as you continue shrinking. This time she doesn't bend down to get a measurement of your accelerated shrinking and replies, "I can't be sure, just focus on my boots and you should be able to tell from them. Remember that you're in a lab, everything's safe and if you follow my instructions I can make sure nothing goes wrong."

The top buckle on her boot goes racing past your head as you watch her grow ever-larger compared to you. You try to back away from the titaness, but she slides her unoccupied boot behind you, blocking you as you bump up against it. "I really need you to not move for your safety," she instructs.

Several more minutes pass as you watch her constantly grow taller, her boot becoming like a tower on its own. Finally Olga crouches down and says, "Well, let's see where you've ended up for now..."
13.title: Olga, the Medical Miracle Worker

choices: She stops in front of you
133.content:
"Wow, that worked better than expected," Olga says in astonishment. "I expected you to be a foot tall at the very least but you just kept going. You barely even reach the very bottom notch!" You look up the yellow tape measure held up beside you which is now more like a wall as thick as you are tall. Just as she said, even with your head is the very first marking for a tenth of an inch.

Olga leans in, one of her enormous grey eyes replacing the ceiling for you. "Are you all right?" her voice booms, the force nearly deafening you. "Say something if you are." You shout something in response, but Olga simply covers her mouth in embarrassment. "Oh, you're probably too small for me to hear unless I put my ear right on you, so just jump or something." Quickly you comply, reassuring the giantess that you're still conscious.

She lets out a quiet giggle that blasts your eardrums. Her enormous mouth curves upward into a smile and she leans in closer, bringing her tremendous lips just an inch from your head. Olga reveals teeth five times your size when she opens her mouth to say, "You know though, you're a bit too small to be out and about, I'll go get somewhere safe for you." With that she pushes herself off the ground, her enormous boots making the ground rumble as one lands next to you.

The giantess scientist walks away, covering several miles in a few strides, while you remain where you are. She retrieves a pair of items from on top of a desk and rushes back over to you. In her hands she's holding a test tube and some tweezers; apparently this is her idea to keep you safe. With each step of her approach the ground shakes harder, and you watch as her titanic legs bring her closer.
133.title: Barely Measurable

choices: A team of women who want to hunt you
1331.content:
To your right a boot hundreds of times your size slams into the ground, sending out shockwaves that rattle your bones. Before you can recover another titanic booted foot stomps down, the vibrations working together to knock you down. You feel as if you're about to be shaken apart, but luckily Olga is satisfied with her position standing astride you. She looks down at you, a self-satisfied look on her mountain of a face as you try to simply comprehend this colossus of a woman.

For some time she seems content to just tower over you like this, somehow making you feel even smaller, as the smirk never leaves her face. She can clearly see you, and as the stare-off progresses you become concerned that she might harm you, intentionally or otherwise. You begin slowly backing away, making almost no real progress relative to Olga but making yourself feel better at least.

The titaness notices your movement, and crouches down as a response. There's a glint in her huge grey eyes as she brings her slender - to someone her size - hands out towards you, implements at the ready. You stop backing up as the tweezers descend, bringing huge steel platforms onto either side of you. Effortlessly Olga lifts you up with the tweezers and drops you just inside the rim of the test tube, slanted in such a way that you can slide down it without getting hurt.

At the bottom of the test tube you slide back and forth on the rounded bottom, then finally come to rest. Olga lifts the container so that you're level with her eye, distorted by the glassware so that her already enormous eye seems massive as it wraps around you. She gives it a quick shake, bouncing you against the sides as a slight tilt of her wrists violently buffets you. When you settle down again she's having a hearty laugh, which sounds like a long series of explosions rumbling over you and echoing throughout the test tube.

"I should admit that I haven't been completely honest with you," Olga says as she peers down at you from the top of the tube. "Actually I've mostly lied. This wasn't a trial, I knew exactly what would happen - I've been using that to shrink mice for months. It may be permanent because we've never found a shrunken mouse, but it's supposed to be; regardless they usually get loose and crushed shortly after it takes effect, or I just crush 'em for fun. And lastly, you weren't randomly chosen for this. Someone contracted me to shrink you, and specifically you, as much as I could." A buzzer sounds and Olga turns her head away. "That must be them now, get ready to meet..."
1331.title: Tweezed

choices: She bottles you up to take you home
13311.content:
Olga holds your test tube aloft so that you can see your mysterious benefactor approach. The distorted light passing through the glass makes it hard to make out the figure, but as she gets closer the view normalizes and you nervously gulp. That bleach blond hair, light freckling and hazel eyes you'd recognize anywhere: it's Susan, a gym rat you dated for a short while and then abruptly broke it off with. You knew it hadn't ended well, but if she did this she must have taken it harder than you thought.

Susan approaches the test tube and centers you between her eyes, the abnormal view making them seem to wrap around you. She reaches out and aggressively flicks the glass twice, making it resonate with the impact of her fingernail and shaking you. "Is this really him?" she asks, her voice a low rumble. "For all I know you put an ant in there and took my money."

"He's smaller than an ant," Olga corrects, "much smaller. I have a magnifying glass if you'd like a better look, though I'd have to dump him out first. There's also a video of him shrinking like you requested, though I understand you might want to watch that at home." Olga hands her a magnifying glass and says, "Get ready."

Gradually Olga tilts your test tube over Susan's waiting palm, causing you to slide down toward the opening. You land on a vast peach field covered by interwoven furrows and a couple of long ditches, sprawled on your back. Olga pulls the now empty test tube away and it's immediately replaced by a magnifying glass. An enormous hazel eye fills the lens, and after it blinks a couple times she says, "Yep, it's him. Not much smaller than I remember either."

Susan lowers the magnifying glass and leans in, putting her mouth an inch above you. Her lips seem to stretch for hundreds of feet in either direction, dominating your whole sky. She opens her mouth, revealing a set of enormous, perfect teeth ringing her cavernous mouth. "Hi again," she booms, her warm breath covering you as she assaults you with sound. "You may have forgotten about me, but I didn't forget you." Her smile is completely malicious as it threatens to engulf your tiny form.
13311.title: Susan

133113.content:
"I really appreciate the work you've done for me, Miss Sergeyeva," Susan says, turning her hungry eyes away from you for a moment. "There's just one issue I have. Can you make him... oh, I don't know, smaller than this?" She licks her lips down at you, her face the highest expression of mockery. "I mean he's small, but he's still much bigger than I feel he should be. I'll pay you extra."

"Yes, I can definitely do that for you," Olga responds as she turns around. "I thought you might ask this, so I whipped up an extra-concentrated batch of the active ingredient and put it in this dropper. It's not nearly enough to affect a person like you or me aside from maybe tightening your skin a bit, but it's enough to practically drown him. The skin contact alone would drastically reduce his size more, and he's bound to drink some by accident." Olga takes hold of Susan's wrist as she moves the magnifying glass back into position, and begins lowering the dropper towards you. "You can consider this included in the package."

An enormous tube takes its position directly overhead as Olga's fingers guide it, and before you can move she gives it a slight squeeze, discharging its contents. A drop of very harsh-smelling liquid lands on you, engulfing you in its horrible pool. You try to seal your mouth but some still gets in, and by reflex you swallow the mouthful of very bitter compound. Before you can recover it's followed by a second drop, then a third, turning the pool into a moderately-sized pond.

While you try to decide how to deal with this water you get very disoriented. You try swimming towards the nearest shore, but it just seems to get farther and farther away, and while earlier you could touch Susan's palm with the tip of your toes you could now dive down if you wanted; the depth was easily 50 feet and getting deeper.

The two women watch you with utmost satisfaction through their magnifying glasses, adjusting the distance so that they can still keep tabs on you as you shrank. They continue to stretch upwards as your perspective gets smaller, and begin to seem less like gigantic women and more like enormous, immovable spires. When they speak, unless you concentrate their words seemed more like the rumbling of thunder than any human speech.

Susan's hand seems to change, with the gentle low rolls on the heel of her palm rising to become a towering mountain as you dwindled. In the other direction the one finger you could properly see apparently had no end, if that was indeed her finger; it seems wide enough to just be a normal part of the landmass. You try to swim out of your sea consisting of three drops, but your constant shrinking keeps you right in the middle.

There's a mighty crash and you look up to see Susan's eye open - the sound had been her blinking. There's a loud smack as her lips part slightly, and the sound of in-rushing air whips through your ears. Her lips move, accompanied by two low rumbles of thunder when she speaks. You do your best to concentrate and decipher what she says.
133113.title: You're... Too Big?

1331133.content:
There's another loud slapping sound as Susan's eyelids briefly cover the hazel iris filling up your sky, then the titanic face withdraws. You continue treading water in what may as well have been an ocean of this shrinking serum, continuing to somehow get even smaller while you wonder what she meant. Did you misunderstand what she said? After all, her voice is a barely-intelligible rumble at this point.

As quickly as her all-encompassing eye vacated your sky, a humongous rounded shaft with deep contours appears to occupy it once more. You try to swim away, but your still-shrinking body can't even make it a thousandth of a millimeter before Susan's finger strikes you in the back, submerging you in the liquid. Reflexively you scream, forcing the air out of your lungs and allowing more of the vile solution into your mouth.

As you're driven down into Susan's palm your lungs burn for air and you somehow begin shrinking even more rapidly. Without some sort of reference you're not even sure how to relate your size to the woman whose palm you're in - you've certainly never seen the human palm at quite this scale. When her monumental finger drives you into her waiting palm you're immediately squeezed between the two and smashed flat, too small to even leave a red dot on her hand. For good measure Susan grinds you into her skin, eviscerating you just before you reach microscopic proportions.
1331133.title: Squelched

13312.content:
Olga turns around, allowing you to watch three women cross the threshold into your test tube-distorted view. Your giant captor holds up the tube containing you like a prize, and greets the very serious looking trio. She gives it another quick, violent shake, making you bounce against the glass walls again.

"Don't do that too much, you'll hurt him," says the skinny blond woman who just entered, by far the tallest of the three. She pushes her wide-frame glasses up her nose and continues, "It won't be any fun to hunt him down and step on him if his leg's broken." You recognize her as Emma, someone you'd had a literature class with the previous semester, and while you found her attractive even then she towered over you. Apparently you made an impression anyway.

"That's dumb, why would you step on him?" asks the petite Asian woman to her left. Even the refracted light reaching you conveys the borderline maniacal spark in her coal black eyes as she twirls a strand of long black hair around her finger. "I'm not paying for another shrunken man, and this is my one chance to eat someone whole. Just imagine the taste..." she licks her lips, and you just now recognize her as Amy, though you don't remember what from.

"Ugh, that's disgusting," says the third, standing on Emma's right. Her dark brown hair is cut to perfectly frame her face, and her soft brown eyes make her look like the most sympathetic of the three. "Eating him is barbaric and stepping on him is wasteful, if I catch him I'm going to torment him without him dying... for a while at least." So much for her being kind. From her voice alone you know it's Elena, an incredibly athletic girl from one of your history classes.

"And if he gets to me before any of you catch him," Olga offers, "the hunt's over and I get to keep him for whatever I want. Hear that, pipsqueak?" She flicks the glass, causing a pinging thud to resonate throughout the test tube. "I'm home base. If you touch me before they get you, you're safe. But if they get you at any time - today, tomorrow, a month from now - they get to do whatever they want to you. There's no time limit."

Before you can say anything Olga shoves a cork into the test tube's rim, cutting you off from any clear sounds. She then completely palms the vessel within her massive hand, hiding you from the world and shrouding you in darkness. When her fingers uncurl you look around and know that you've been taken to...
13312.title: A Terrible Trio

133121.content:
Olga tears her hand away from your glass prison, and when your eyes readjust to the normal amount of indoor light you immediately recognize your new, enormous surroundings. A row of tables, unoccupied at this time of the day, and the open cafe door beside you are definite hallmarks of the library's basement. This is better news than you could have hoped for; after four years you know this place like the back of your hand, as well as all the regulars.

Your small moment of triumph is interrupted when Olga kneels, setting the base of your test tube on the linoleum floor. With an echoing pop she pulls out the cork, allowing fresh air and ambient sounds to rush down to you. Olga quickly tips the test tube over, setting it on the floor, and lifts the base up. Your tiny body races down the near-frictionless glass until you shoot out the end, landing with a roll. Olga sets a finger down in your path, and you bump into her soft fingertip.

"They know you're somewhere in this building," Olga says, the enormous woman's voice taking on an otherworldly quality from her sheer size. "It's ten floors and the basement so you should have some time. I'll be on the far side of the room for a while finishing up some work, if you hurry your tiny little legs might get you to be before I leave... and before they find you." With that she stands up and steps over you, taking care to almost scrape the top of your head with the heel of her boot as she does, and heads off into the room.

For now you stand where Olga left you, considering the great journey ahead of you at this pitiful size. In the past you could get to the back in a minute, but now you'd be surprised if you could make it in six hours. It occurs that survival is the most important thing, and reaching Olga may not really be in your best interest - if you could get outside, you may never see her and the three other women again.

While you consider your options the floor shakes. You spin around and see a massive cross-trainer slap down to the floor, a smooth and shapely leg rising out of it. Its owner is already taking another step forward, and it looks like you'll be right in her shoe's path.
133121.title: Hide and Sought

1331212.content:
After a a snap decision you run into the main room ahead of you, hoping to outpace the tremendous stride of the unknown woman. You pump your legs as hard as you can, but you know that since your legs are just over a millimeter long the deck is stacked against you. In just a second the lights shining down are blotted out, and the ceiling is replaced by a rapidly descending trainer's sole. You duck down and cover your head, the latter mostly out of reflex.

Rubber slaps against linoleum, a racket that makes your teeth chatter, but much to your surprise you remain uncrushed, safe in a section of tread. As soon as it arrived the enormous shoe departs, taking its unaware owner with it, her brown ponytail swishing back and forth. Having narrowly avoided being smashed, you resolve to proceed quickly and get away from the stairs.

A swift walk of about ten minutes gets you to the metal divider between tile and carpet, and you scale the smooth brass surface like a low hill. Before stepping into the thick, dense carpet fibers you decide to survey the room and decide on your path.

Olga is indeed sitting on the far side of the room, typing away on her laptop and seemingly oblivious to everything around her. Throughout the room are various groups working on joint projects, the nearest of which is clearly three people though you can't see who any of them are. Beside them, sitting in a nice leather chair, is Eva, a petite woman you remember from one of your classes with her nose buried in a book. You know it's only a matter of time until some other careless person comes rambling down the stairs, so you have to decide quickly.
1331212.title: Heading In

13312121.content:
Despite the risk of becoming some experimental plaything for Olga you know that reaching her is the only way to make this nightmare stop, and the last thing you want is for one of those three to find you weeks from now and snuff you out. You carefully step onto the carpet, thin and dense from thousands of people walking over it every day, and find that it's able to support you without sinking in. As long as you're able to stay on top this should let you move much more quickly than you expected.

You walk across the top of the carpet, hopping between each section when you reach the edge of one. Enormous people walk back and forth around you, their thundering steps shaking the ground when they pass, and make you acutely aware that you have no cover. Fortunately they take no notice of you, and are completely oblivious of your presence. If you can stay out of their way you just might make it through this.

An hour into your journey you reach where people normally spread out, greatly enhancing the carpet's health. Unfortunately for you this means it's much softer, allowing you to drop into it slightly and catch your foot on stray fibers. You take to moving on all fours, spreading out your weight and making it so you can't trip between hopping sections. It does slow you down, but much less so than if you were to fall to the bottom of the carpet.

By the end of the second hour you reach a row of desks, each one occupied from the look of a pair of massive shoes beneath each one. Fortunately they don't go all the way to the ground, and if you wanted you could walk beneath all of them to Olga at the end. The carpet would be almost fresh though, and the possibility of a fatal accident would be fairly high. Instead you could walk the path beside them, moving without cover but, hopefully, very quickly.
13312121.title: The Long Haul

choices: She notices you and picks you up
She notices you but doesn't do anything
133121212.content:
Slowly, you eased yourself out into the open aisle. Your heart was pounding wildly inside your chest as you knew this was a reckless plan but you didn't want to loss your only chance at getting back to normal. It's been two hours since Olga left you here, which you had no idea how much longer she'll stay in the library or where Elena and her hunting goons are in the school.

The carpet fibers were thankfully worn down and solid, but you were hyper aware of every tremor and shadow from the giants around you. When the coast was clear, you bolted down the aisle, sticking close to the desks to avoid foot-traffic.

Desks passed by painfully slow, your new height making you realize the sheer distance that you had to cover before you reached Olga. She was still at the end of the row, probably inserting your lab results and her own notes on the shrinking. Anger bubbled in your gut as you thought how that cold-hearted bitch used you as a guinea pig for her experiment and sold you out to the highest bidder before you had even met her. Your thoughts begin to turn violent as your reality and situation seethed in your mind and eroded the values you held onto the last four years.

You always knew that you were different and the sever bullying you suffered in middle-school had confirmed it. The doctors called it "Antisocial Personality Disorder" which is to say that you avoided everyone in high school as they were nothing but annoying pricks. It was only after a loving girlfriend and four-years of happy college that had put you back to semi-normal. But now...Olga ruined that growing normality as you remembered how the world really worked.

'Only the strong and smart rule. The weak and ignorant will merely serve the whims of the mighty.' The joy of your college life and girlfriend were now a dream, so it was time to wake up.

'You should've just left me with Elena', you thought arrogantly, because now your veins were thrumming with the burning desire to deliver judgement. To deliver vengeance.

'I don't know how, but'll find away to exact my revenge. Just you wait Olga Sergeyeva, I'll make you pay for this.'

Pushing yourself to the limit, you sprinted across the carpet. A strange warmth began to infuse your body as you single-mindedly ran towards Olga's rapidly growing form. A female student in high heels got up from the desk in front of you and the aforementioned shoe was coming down right on top of you as she left. You simply kept running as the heel of her shoe narrowly missed you, grazing your head before disappearing behind you. By the time you realized it, you were now at the end of the row, underneath Olga's seat.

One boot swung lazily in the air above you, the gusts of wind from the simple movement threatened to knock you over but you remained firmly standing. The game would end in your victory the moment you touched Olga, but the witch never explained how you would tell her that you made it.

You idly noted the strange heat and the peculiar sensations coming from your body. In fact, you weren't even winded despite all the running you did and covered more distance than when you started.

'The drug must have something to do with this,' You thought passingly then smile. 'Looks like Olga doesn't know everything about the effects of her formula and I don't intend to reveal it.' He turned towards her feet.

'First thing to do is get her attention. I won't be able to get back at her if I'm caught by Elena.'

Approaching her non-moving foot, you shoved your hands and feet into the minute crevices in the leather boot's exterior. You slowly began climbing up the outer side of her boot, the two buckles farther above looking like enormous gates. You dug your fingers in deeper as a tremor rocked you as Olga unconsciously shifted her leg. This grimly reminded you of the difference in size between the two of you.

Heat flowed into your arms and legs as you climbed. When you arrived at an out of reach handhold, you imitated a rock-climber by throwing yourself up towards the handhold.

'What the hell?!?!'

You gasped as you shot up the side of her boot, well pass the handhold you were aiming for and approaching the first of the two buckles. Grabbed the leather as gravity took over finally with you hanging just beneath the silver buckle.

Staring at your hand, you noticed subtle differences that weren't there this morning and looking down at your body, muscles that you don't remember having were seemingly coming out of nowhere. Whatever the drug was doing to you...other than the obvious reduction in height, it was still changing your body.

'She said the dosage she gave me was eight times more than the norm, so what would it do to me at this height? Was there even other human subjects or was I the only fool that she used it on?' Fresh rage boiled in your veins at the thought. 'Think first, don't rush yet. I still need her to escape Elena. Focus on getting her attention first.'

Looking up, you could barely see her face pass her bulging breast that were literal mountains at your height. Olga was focused on her laptop, a violent rhythm of booms coming from her rapidly typing fingers. The laptop would be the best place to draw her attention.

You quickly scaled up the rest of the way up her boot with your new strength till you found yourself standing on her knee. The edge of the table was like a cliff above you, out of reach and unscalable. The you before all of this had happened would be frightened of the distance, but yourself right now wasn't afraid but determined to cross the obstacle in front to achieve your goal.

'Let's see how far I can go.'

More heat was circulating in your legs and arms, a good sign for what you come to understand so far. Taking some distance up Olga's thigh, you dropped into a sprinter's stance and waited. When Olga unconsciously shifted in her seat, raising her leg closer to the edge of the desk, you took off from your position straight towards the edge.

You pumped your legs with all your might as Olga's thigh blurred beneath your feet. Incredible heat pumped through your body as you leapt at the last possible moment, sailing up and over the edge of the desk. You rolled as you slammed into the hard desktop to kill some momentum and avoid breaking any bones. When you came to a stop, you were now in front of Olga's laptop as her fingers thundered over the keyboard behind you.

Jumping up and down, you waved your arms to get Olga's attention while trying to control your strength. Olga's eyes drift away from the monitor for a moment as the enormous grey irises roll over you.

Does she notice you?
133121212.title: No risk, no reward

1331213.content:
You watch the enormous shoe on the ground shift slightly as the unknown co-ed redistributes her weight. Despite your brain screaming at you to get out of the way you can't make your legs bend, and you end up staring in awe at the gigantic woman inexorably coming towards you. From her shoe you gaze up at her defined ankle and lean calf, shaven so closely even you are unable to find flaws with it at this scale.

Before you can get a good look at the rest of her, your view is blocked. The sole of her trainer flashes by, and when her heel strikes the ground it generates the force of a severe earthquake. You're thrown from your feet, and from your back you notice, with a sinking feeling, that there's no tread on this part. Above you and bearing down is just smooth rubber.

The shoe's heel races down as the co-ed finishes her step. There's nothing you can even try to do as it collides with you, pressing you between the rubber and the floor. In an instant you're smashed, utterly obliterated, your remains stuck to the shoe of someone who never even knew you were there.
1331213.title: Bad Time to Panic

1333.content:
Olga's foot comes down two tiles away, striking with such force that you fall down to one knee. The soft brown leather of her boot rises a thousand feet to her knee, but you're transfixed by the mass of hardened leather around her foot and the boot's rubber sole, itself several times taller than you.

You watch as Olga's other leg bends to take another step. She's not stopping or even slowing down in the slightest, and you begin waving your arms and jumping again to get her attention. It doesn't seem to work - her boot's heel strikes the tile before you, shaking you with all new intensity and knocking you to your back. The bottom of her boot spans wide above you, concealing you from the eyes of the mighty titaness above.

There's nothing you can do now. You raise your arms and scream out of reflex, but you know that it does no good. The tread pattern on her boots looms larger, appearing as a labyrinth as each trench molded into it gets closer. Before you know it her boot smashes you flat, turning you into a red spot divided between the floor and her sole.

At most all Olga heard was a tiny squeak, and she writes down your disappearance as an acceptable loss.
1333.title: Imprecise Measurements

14.content:
You enter the studeo right on time for your ballroom dancing class and check the list for your partner today. Looks like today you'll be with Roshan, someone you hadn't been paired with before though you certainly recognized her from previous classes. Considering that last time you were paired with someone who could generously be called rotund, this is a step up.

From across the room you can easily spot Roshan, a dark-haired beauty with sharp features, standing in front of a wall length mirror.
