Her long black hair falls in curls down her dark blue T-shirt, and her white skirt made of light fabric rests just above her knees. Roshan's long, shapely legs come to rest in a pair of jade colored high heels, boosting her up to over half a foot taller than you.

"Oh hey," you begin, "we're paired together today. Not sure how good of a lead I'll be but-" You're cut off when Roshan grabs your wrist and pulls you out onto the floor, her heels clicking with each determined step. When she reaches her chosen spot she turns around, plans your hand in the small of her back, and pulls your other arm out to the side.

"Just do what comes naturally when you're with a girl like me," Roshan says, "I'll handle the rest." You smile up at her, and wait for the assigned signal to begin.

You start off incredibly well, and Roshan is very compliant to your lead. Every step you take she mimics, and she goes along with even the lightest bit of pressure. When you try to spin her she dutifully arcs her back to go under your arm rather than run into it, accomodating you better than several of your partners in the past.

After a few turns around the room however you start to feel off. You get very light-headed, and you have trouble holding your grip. Roshan seems to notice this and not only readjusts your hands, but pulls you tighter as well. It might just be your imagination but she seems somehow... stronger than before.

Your eyes must be deceiving you too, since you're now looking at her collar bone. You look up and find her looking back down at you, with something like hunger in her eyes. Suddenly uncomfortable you look back down, only to find that you're now eye level with her chest. Overtaken by shock you try to back away, but Roshan's firm grip keeps you close to her.

"Just keep going, act like nothing's wrong," she commands. "Keep leading, there's nothing unusual here, you're just getting smaller and smaller until I want you to stop." You reach her stomach and fear fills you as you remember her hungry eyes. In a panic you try to run but Roshan keeps a firm grip on you, slamming you back into her stomach.

"You're not very good at listening," she chides. "Make it up to me by spinning me." You try to turn over her hand twice the size of yours, and to your surprise it works! She has to bend her knees significantly to get under your arm, but she manages it without knocking you over.

When she stands back up you're about waist height to her and still shrinking. She's taking baby steps to do her best to follow you, but eventually she can't even hold your hand anymore, letting them drop to your respective sides. You make one more attempt to get away once you're free of her grasp, but she must have anticipated it: as soon as you turn her leg shoots out and you run face first into her knee.

"You're just making it harder on yourself," she scolds, glaring down at you. "Just pick a leg and hold on, I'll act like you're doing a good job and not shrinking." You wrap your arms around her shin and do your best to hold onto the ever-widening leg you're draped around. Before long you're too small to even connect your hands around her leg, and you know that if you get any smaller you'll go tumbling down to the floor. However, even that won't stop it because Roshan wants you at...
14.title: Roshan, the Foreign Beauty

choices: Submit and hope she's not serious
142.content:
Each step Roshan makes in the dance pattern shrinks you a bit more, and the impact of her heel hitting the ground shakes you a little more violently each time. At the same time, every time she steps her leg gets minutely wider and harder to grip, and you can feel yourself dwindling against her warm, bronze skin. In only a few more measures the only thing keeping you attached to her silky smooth shin is the sheer force with which you're clinging.

Even this can't last forever, and in two more measures you're not even half as wide as her shin bone. Not even your iron determination can compete with physics, and the next time Roshan's heel slams down the vibrations, coupled with your continuing size adjustment, send you plummeting from your perch. You land on top of her foot just as it pitches up again, your perspective making it seem like a great jade yacht that's caught a wave.

You're carried forward as she steps, and when her foot lays back down the momentum, coupled with her heel's incline, sends you rolling down to the studio floor. Roshan drags her toe with her next step, grazing you such that you go sliding across the floor. Her heel sets down again just in front of you, stopping your slide as you bump into it.

You watch from the floor as she continues another turn, her posture and poise held as though she were being led magnificently. Is she doing this to maintain the illusion that you're still dancing with her? Is she actually maintaining an illusion, and everyone else sees a normal-sized you still dancing with her? Could your shrinking itself be an illusion, then? Your pondering is broken when she extends her shapely leg again, setting her heel down before you and slamming the toe down beyond you, trapping you under her arch. No, this at least is very real.

The music stops and the dance is over. Roshan moves her shoe so that she stands astride you looking down. She brushes a curly lock behind her ear with an enormous hand and declares, "Well, my little morsel, you look just about perfect. I've become quite good with this particular magic, don't you agree?" Wait, magic? Morsel?! This doesn't sound good at all! You look at the other pairs around you, and no one seems to have noticed she said anything at all, let alone something that strange. When you look back up you see her bending down, her slender fingers extended to pick you up.
142.title: Down on the Dance Floor

1421.content:
Nothing about her tone or expression suggests she's joking, and you have no intention of becoming this power-tripping girl's next garnish. You watch her hand get closer, primed to close around you, just waiting for the perfect moment. Roshan shoots her hand forward, fingers closing in to put the squeeze on you. Just in time you jump out of the way, leaving her to grab empty air.

Roshan groans and strikes again, this time with a swipe of her enormous hand. In her anger she miscalculates and whiffs, grabbing only the air just above your head. This time she practically growls and raises her hand high, then brings it down on top of you, her manicured fingers forming the bars of a cage. You dive forward just as she closes the trap, narrowly escaping her grasp yet again.

A dim shadow falls over you as Roshan stands, her titanic height blocking out one of the fluorescent lights. You don't turn back to revel in her gigantic majesty, even when you feel the rumble of her foot hitting the floor. Out of the corner of your eye you see her other foot slide forward, primed to swing down and block your path. Acting on instinct you jump just as it swings down, sliding over the very tip of her shoe right when it lands.

By now Roshan must be getting desperate to stop you. There's a grinding sound as the shoe you just slid over pivots, and you break your concentration to look back. With just a glance you know it's her last desperate attempt: her leg is coiled up all the way, and she's ready to stomp indiscriminately.
1421.title: Evasive Maneuvers

choices: She does the deed here and now
14212.content:
You're close enough to frustrating Roshan's designs on you that you can practically taste it. Focusing you look straight ahead at the mirror to give yourself a goal. Curiously you don't see a reflection of yourself running away; you only see a non-shrunken version of yourself apparently making small talk with Roshan in the post-dance reprieve. This must be what everyone else is seeing while you desperately struggle to get away from her.

The reflected illusion distracts you to the point that you don't notice the shadow fall over you until it's too late. Before you know what's happening an enormous tapered column smashes into your path, dazing you. There's no time to stop and you run bodily into Roshan's heel, your arms involuntarily thrown forward as you're knocked to the floor, seeing stars from the impact.

You spend some time on the floor, your eyes unable to focus, making the sky above you a thick brown blur. No matter how hard you try you can't make your arms or legs react, but the sharp pain from their hard impacts on the floor assures you they still work. All you can do is groan and wait for some sort of function to return.

When you're finally able to focus again you see that Roshan has maintained her victorious pose, basking in her triumph over an inch-tall man. You blink twice and her coal colored eyes flash toward you, alerted by the movement. Frightened, you try to force your weakened arms to prop you up, but they can barely even support themselves upright. From above a hand races toward you, two fingers poised to pluck you up.

You're defenseless as Roshan ensnares you, your limp body dangling between her fingertips. Your stomach sinks as she lifts you up, unconcerned for your safety, for her eyes to feast upon you. "I do like chasing down my meals," she taunts, "but you almost broke the illusion. Not that you would've lasted much longer after, but I do wish you'd respect my work." She grins, baring her teeth in a sadistic show. "You understand I can't risk you nearly getting away again."
14212.title: Path Blocked

142121.content:
"Please, just let me go," you stammer. "There's no reason anyone has to know about this."

She chuckles at that. Her lips get larger as she moves them closer. "You're right about that. No one will know anything."

With that she extends her tongue right for you. You desperately try to run away. Not sure where to go, you run straight off her palm. She manages to swoop her mouth right underneath you as you fall inside.

"Still got some of the escape in you, I guess." Each of her words caused agonies as she slams you against her tongue and teeth. Before you can react, a vacuum force launches you downward. You fall into the dark abyss. Never to be seen from again.
142121.title: Snack after the Dance

142123.content:
A sparkle appears in Roshan's eyes, and a low chuckle emanates from her slender neck. "I can see you're going to be more of a hassle than the others. That's good, I like my meals to be on the feisty side." She pauses to smack her lip, a loud popping sound that overwhelms your senses. "But I also don't like them to escape. I didn't want to do this, but you've shown me that I have to."

Roshan's hand pushes you toward her mouth as you dangle loosely in her fingers, still unable to fully move your limbs. Her lips part and you reflexively shout, "No, please!" while you struggle to move your arms. She stops you right where her lips part and holds you there. Hot breath assaults you as she laughs at your plea, but she moves you no closer.

"I'm not going to eat you just yet," she assures you, "not after all the trouble I put into catching you. No, I have something else planned." After she's done talking she lets you linger before her lips, trepidation building as your imagination runs away with you. It's not long until you feel the hold of her fingers around you loosen, and you worry she's about to drop you to the floor. Then you notice that her teeth, already like white-painted wall segments, begin to grow larger. At the same time her mouth grows wider, but not with a growing smile as she maintains her sadistic mask.

Her fingertips gradually rise up to block out the intimidating view, and it finally comes together - she's making you smaller again. Just as you realize this her fingers have loosened enough that you slip through them entirely and land in the palm of her hand. Roshan looks down at you, stranded in the middle of her hand, with her impassive black eyes, and chuckles. "Not even a morsel, you're a crumb," she taunts. Long fingers close over you, sealing you in darkness against her palm while she considers what to do with you.
142123.title: Further Dwindling

14213.content:
There's no way you're letting her stop you, not when you're so close to freedom. You're not sure if she plans to block your path or just incapacitate you with the shockwave from her foot slamming into the ground, but with how much she wants to eat you you'd bet on the latter. All you have to do is be far enough away from the likely impact point and you'll have escaped her, for now at least.

Just a few more seconds, you tell yourself as you push yourself to the limit. From above you hear a low whistling noise that's getting very loud far too quickly for your comfort. Around you a quartet of shadows cast by the overhead lights converge with you at the center. You look up and see nothing but a black platform close enough to your face that you can see factory imperfections in the tread.

An instant later you see nothing at all. In a fraction of a second Roshan's shoe compresses every bit of you into a tiny flat disc, half stuck to the floor and half to her shoe, quick enough that you barely even feel the the explosion of pain as your spinal column collapses. For her part Roshan curses herself - she'll have to pass on dessert again tonight.
14213.title: Oops

143.content:
You are incapable of understanding it, but the feeling in your head, the hammering pain that grows from the past nausea only intensifies as your form reduces progressively faster and faster. You try to yell at Roshan, like asking her exactly what's happening but she doesn't reply, maybe she cannot hear you or worse she's ignoring you. You soon close your eyes and wait for this to end but it's only three or four seconds until your composure returns and your mind clears in one moment. Roshan's still looking down at you and finally she speaks.

"That's a perfect size for you, do you agree? I was hoping you would be microbial, but things will be easier this way." She kneels down, looking left and right to make sure no one can see what is going on. The dim lights of the studio illuminate her darkened features and you can see her sharp nose and shallow orbits, and this strikes you. You recall the booming of her voice from a moment earlier. You recall the vibrations that channeled through your bones and then your mind becomes a reflection of a reflection as you blink once, still staring at Roshan. "Quit looking at me like that, I'm supposed to be the creep here," is what she says to you. Now she's standing and your head spins with the realization of how minute you are.

"Can you hear me? Why did you do this? How did you do this?" you yell up at her. She can hear this time, definitely, and she smiles subtly, clearly not in a way to relax your but to send a chill down your spine. An awareness washes over you, and you feel your clothing on your body and your hair on your scalp, each one protruding from a follicle.

"Leave it to someone as ignorant as you to not notice the men going missing in this studio. I've got to get my ish on little men like you, yeah? I hope you do not mind." Now your head hurts worse. Where did the previous men go? Why would she pick you, of all people? Now your joints are hurting. It's all too weird.

What are you supposed to do now? Are you going to do something about this or let this woman take you with her?
143.title: Unholy Matrimony

1431.content:
Fuck it, you think. I'm out, this shit's off the hook it's over. This girl with a sadistic look in her eyes, you would rather die by your own whim than hers. You try to remember and now you realize, at least seven men have vanished from this class in just a month now, probably all killed off like animals. Worse, how many have done what you've done and just jumped? How many have had this same epiphany and killed themselves thinking they were making a difference? Potentially you're sticking it to an engineered system created by Roshan, or you're just playing into her game.

It's five steps and then the ground vanishes below you, and you're flying through the ground. A million infinities away you see the floor that's slowly coming closer, or you're getting closer. The air whirring around you manipulates your loose, aching body until you turn to your back and cannot even see Roshan's face anymore, everything is a blur.

You're tired now, it's fine to die here. You hit the ground and in one instant your bones are turned into a thin powder by the inertia that flies through your body. Each organ ruptures at once and you never feel a single thing before your awareness has vanished. The world is spinning without you.

She's thinking "How many have done that now? I need to try and catch these guys or something."
1431.title: Magic Hour

choices: I don't like any of these women either
15.content:
Melanie Faustus - 23 years old, 5'8" (173 cm) a girl you've only known for a few months and only through word of mouth, she moved nearby recently and has built up a reputation as a bit of an oddball. Very short dark brown hair that's near black and her eyes match well. She usually looks sickly, more than pallid and so thin it's almost worrying. You hear she's a big music nerd and she's in the choral program to match. Sometimes you wonder what she's really into, since she's so withdrawn and legitimately boring to talk to or be near as you've heard from friends. Majoring in Anthropology.

Lynsey Sterling - 22 years old, 5'9" (175 cm) girl you went to high school with, though she was a year behind you. Despite that you've always looked "up" to her, as it were, and you got the impression that she liked that, and would engineer situations where she could accidentally bump into you and peer down. Not that you would mind if she's sweet on you - with her long chestnut brown hair and radiant turquoise eyes lined by dark, flared eye shadow and slender frame she's quite striking. For quite some time you barely saw her, but now that you have a class in her department's building you've been running into her more often, and you're starting to doubt it was ever accidental. Majoring in Egyptology.

Naomi McLaughlin- 21 years old, 5'3" (160 cm) a shy bookworm with bright orange hair, deep brown eyes, and a very overweight body. You've seen her around at least a couple times, but you haven't talked to her much. She's not too popular with the guys because of her weight, but she's used to it by now. She relished in the freedom that your university offered, which quickly lead to her gaining far more than the "Freshman 15..." The fact that one of her greatest passions involves the culinary arts certainly didn't do any favors to her waistband. Though, she's always looking for new cooking ideas. Should one manage to get close to her, they would find that she's kind, sweet, well-read, and has a bit of a nerdy side. However, since she's so short, she would love to find someone she wouldn't have to look up at. Majoring in Culinary Arts

Alyssa Staid - 23 years old, 5'6" (168 cm) art student with long, light blond hair, bright grey eyes and incredible legs. She has a dark sense of humor and a very punky style, and is very forward with whatever it is she wants. The two of you have been dating off and on for a year though not too seriously, and often take breaks when course work gets too intense. When you're together she loves calling attention to your height, to the point that she makes drawings of he she sees you "through her eyes:" fist fighting an ant, hiding behind a soda can, things like that. Earlier this week she sent you a preview of her senior project - a series of drawings from "your" point of view making her look 500 feet tall, to show off perspective she claims. Recently finals stress has begun to flare up, but she doesn't seem to be backing off. Art Major.
15.title: Secondary

choices: "I could use a gym buddy today!"
"Let's start small with some coffee.  You understand small, right?"
152.content:
As soon as the professor dismisses class from his lecture you stand and sling your messenger bag over your shoulder, then start heading for the door. You do your best to get in the middle of the group of eight exiting the room in hopes of getting out of the building unnoticed so that you can hurry back to your room and study. Even in such a small crowd it's easy for you to hide among the people much taller than you, and you keep your head down to hopefully keep an even lower profile.

While you walk though you naturally become distracted counting the tiles as you pass over them and the group gets strung out. Before you realize it you're alone in the hallway, heading for the exit most convenient to get you back home on autopilot. When you turn a corner there's suddenly a pair of cross-trainers in your path, topped by a pair of shapely legs in yoga pants. Before you can stop you bump into the owner, knocking yourself back slightly while not budging her.

"Hellooo down there!" she excitedly calls out. "Long time no see, shorty!" She giggles as you crane your neck back to look up at her as she joyfully smiles down at you.

"Really?" you ask. "You pulled this same stunt on my way in. My ancient history lecture isn't even an hour long, and I wouldn't call fifty minutes a long time." You try to sidestep past her but she anticipates your move, pivoting to block your path. When you bump into her again you take a step back, only to realize that you're trapped between her and a corner.

"That's not what I mean, doll," she responds, reminding you of when she would call you doll-sized back in high school. "We used to hang out all the time before you went off to college, and now we hardly ever see each other! I miss spending time with my itty-bitty boy." She puckers her lips in a kissy face down at you, then smiles again.

"Lynsey I'm sorry but I really don't have time," you say. "I've got two papers I need to finish by next Saturday, three exams next week alone, and..." you trail off as a realization hits you. When she did that ridiculous kiss face she angled her lips down at you, but when you ran into her not even an hour ago you were eye-to-mouth with her, just like you had been since senior year. Now you're eye-to-Adam's apple. "Are you having a growth spurt? Like, a really sudden and severe one?"

"No..." she begins, her tone unsure. "People pretty much stop growing before 20, even people like me who are gigantic compared to you. Look, it's Friday night, we're both done with classes for the day and we both know you won't actually do any work on that stuff until late Sunday. One night hanging out with an old friend won't kill you."

You sigh. She's right on pretty much all counts, you admit, except for the growing thing: in the time she was talking she had definitely grown two more inches. "Fine, I concede, mighty giantess." She positively beams when you bring up the old nickname you had for her, though it was looking more and more accurate now. "How do you want to start?"

Lynsey's eyes light up and she grabs your wrist. "Come on out to my car, little dude!" she exclaims, having decided you were coming with her long before you agreed.
152.title: Lynsey, Queen of the Nile

1521.content:
As you're dragged out into the parking lot you start coming up with ways to get out of your sudden commitment. "Wait a sec, I don't have any gym clothes," you say. "I can't really go in just a t-shirt and jeans, it'd be odd."

"Not a problem!" she replies, bubbly as ever. "I have a spare set you can use."

"I also don't really go that often anyway," you try, "I'll just slow you down, you should probably go without me."

"Nonsense! You've got a lot of power in that little body of yours, you just need someone like me to motivate you."

By the time you reach her car you're down to your last and most tenuous excuse. "I'm worried that you'll intimidate me too much?" From your tone it's obvious that even you can tell this is bullshit.

Lynsey just laughs and says, "Get in shorty, you're coming with me." You sigh and comply, buckling your seat belt for safety. She hands you a wadded-up bundle which you disentangle as she drives. Inside you find a teal shirt cut to bare midriff, a pair of black baggy shorts and some athletic shoes at least three sizes too big for you. All you can think about is how uncomfortable this is going to be.

The ride over is uneventful while you listen to a punk band you hadn't really heard in a while, and when you stop Lynsey practically jumps out of the car. You're much less enthusiastic, doing your best to drag your feet while you mentally picture how ridiculous you're going to look. However Lynsey's not having it, and she grabs your arm to drag you along again.

Once you get past the check-in counter she lets you go and says, "All right, go get changed, I'll be waiting out here." You head into the locker room and start changing, afraid to look in the mirror as you do so. Surprisingly the clothes mostly fit, though they are a bit long, but the shoes may as well be clown shoes on you. At least the shirt covers your whole chest.

You head back out, oversized shoes flopping with each step, and walk over to Lynsey. She puts her phone back down to her side and says, "You look great! Now come on, let's go to the...
1521.title: Hitting the Gym

15211.content:
This time you decide not to protest, having learned the futility of trying to say no multiple times by now. Instead you just fall in behind Lynsey, admiring the way her yoga pants cling to her butt. Admittedly you never had much interest in going to the gym but it's obvious she does, and it's definitely paid off. You think it may not be such a bad idea to come out with her a bit more often now.

Lynsey leads you to a rack of free weights and hands you one marked 25 in big white numbers. She takes another one for herself and says, "Okay, give it a shot! Try lifting it to your shoulder without moving your upper arm, just bend your elbow." You do your best to follow her instructions, and after a bit of straining manage it once, but no matter how much you try you can't get it halfway up the second time.

"All right, watch me and then I'll have you try it again, this time at a lower weight," Lynsey instructs. She does one exactly how she described, then goes for another. As soon as she gets it up to her shoulder you feel a little lightheaded and somewhat dizzy. Lynsey continues, and by the fourth rep you realize that she seems to be getting bigger each time - not necessarily more in shape, just taller. After she finishes her full ten you barely come up to her chest, making her seem like a small giantess to you.

"Lynsey I don't feel so hot, maybe I should sit this out and just watch," you say while she's shifting the weight to her other hand.

"Oh stop being a baby," she chides as she continues lifting with her left hand, making her grow even larger. "I don't feel like coming here every day either," another rep, and Lynsey enlarges a bit more, "but I know that in the end it's good for me." The nonchalance of how she's speaking while doing this with her off-hand amazes you. Does she even know she's growing right now? You look in the mirror to see how big she's gotten, standing on your toes to peer over the rack and see that you're about eye level with her belly button right now.

Wait, peer over the rack? It occurs that since she's nearly doubled in size by now the weighs should look absolutely tiny in her hand, but from what you can tell it's been growing with her. Now it dawns on you that she hasn't been growing - you've been shrinking! With each rep she does more than you, you've lost an inch. When you turn your head back to her directly she's just finishing up with her left hand, and your eyes are below the top of her taut butt.

"There, that didn't look so hard did it?" she asks teasingly, apparently unaware of your new situation. Including the two from when she blocked your path earlier you'd say that you've lost 21" already, making you a mere 42" - three and a half feet tall. You watch her bend over and momentarily tense up while she lifts a 20 pound weight off the rack for you and turns around. Briefly she looks where you would have been before turning her head further down and spying you by her waist. You look back up at her, feeling more than a little intimidated by your friend, and wait for her to say something.
15211.title: Pumping Down

choices: try something else and see if you like it more."
152112.content:
Lynsey holds out the weight she had picked out for you, and reflexively you reach up to take hold of it. Does she even notice that you're barely half her size now? You wrap both hands around the weight's grip, your small fingers unable to reach all the way around it and get a solid hold. As soon as Lynsey lets go of it the weight immediately slams to the floor, causing you to double over.

You strain as hard as you can to pick it back off the ground, but your little hands have trouble gaining proper leverage. With a final pull you're able to lift it off the ground, but before you can stabilize yourself it falls back to the ground with a thud. No matter how hard you try it might as well be bolted to the ground for all the chance you have of picking it back up.

"I can't even move it!" you declare, looking back up at Lynsey. You notice that she's standing there casually holding more in one hand than you can budge with two. Before giving up you decide to give it a few more futile tugs, and to your horror you find the weight becoming even heavier in your hands as the grip widens. Almost immediately you let go, when you stand you see the damage has been done, and now you only come up to around her mid thigh.

"You're just not using very good form," Lynsey explains as if she didn't see you shrink a foot. "Here, watch me again, and remember that it's all in your head." She launches into another set, and you find yourself unable to look away even if it would help you. With each curl you shrink another inch, the effects feeling more dramatic the smaller you become. Before she's done with her right arm you've shrank below her knee, nearly at the bottom of her spandex pants.

You almost feel mesmerized as she continues, your eyes drawn up her body as she grows ever more massive compared to you. Your monolithic friend's face appears serene as can be while you dwindle down toward nothing, apparently totally unaware of your plight. In only a few reps you've shrank past her pants and continue diminishing along her shin, amazed at how enormous she's getting. By the time she's done you can stand underneath her calf and lean against her ankle at a mere ten inches.

"See, it's easy! Give it another shot," she implores. You look back to the weight on the floor, now up to your shoulders, and immediately know that's a bad idea.

"No way," you say. "That thing's heavy enough to crush me, there's no way I'll be able to lift it!"

Lynsey laughs and replies, "C'mon little guy, I know you're short but you're not that short." Does she really not see you down at her ankle? "Maybe if you stopped huffing helium you'd have better blood flow." She looks down directly at you, your back resting against the top of her shoe. "But if you're really that opposed to more curls we could..."

You duck under the bar and brace your shoulders under it, bracing your legs so you can put as much power as you can into it. The harder you push the more you are able to straighten your legs, until you totally lose contact with the grip. Lynsey's fingers unexpectedly wrap around the grip, causing you to hurriedly jump out of the way. She lifts it, allowing you to see her in full. Her black shoes alone rise high over you, and Lynsey looks even more gigantic now, with her navel large enough for you to curl up in, and you can only gasp.

What gives?" You're unable to respond, even to run away, and simply stand there gaping up at how imposing Lynsey is now.

Finally you manage a small squeak, drawing her attention back down to you. Her hazel eyes scan the padded floor for you while you hop up and down so that you'll be easier to see. "Oh, there you are!" she says, grinning when she spots you. "I didn't expect you to be all the way down there yet!"

You couldn't believe that you've overslept! You needed to get to the library so you could spend the rest of the day studying for that big test tomorrow! Her breasts were now blocking most of Naomi's face, and you could only see her eyes. You called out for her, hoping to get her attention, but it was no use. Eventually, you were at her knees, and her gigantic belly now blocked Naomi's head altogether! It was like an ocean of flab that was partly blocking out the light! You kept getting smaller and smaller, until your shrinking got slower, and eventually stopped. You couldn't quite tell how tall you were right now, but that wasn't your concern right now! Naomi was the only witness to your shrinking, and you weren't even sure if she knew what happened to you! You flinched when the overweight giantess shifted her weight to a crawling position. Her titanic body was casting a huge shadow as she started to recover the last of her papers. Then, her eyes hovered over you, and...

info.brief_description: Pick your major, pick your girl, and pick your doom
info.description:
You're a senior in college, just finishing up the last few weeks of classes before finals. It's a stressful time, but you know you can get through it unless something goes catastrophically wrong. Unfortunately as often does, something unexpected happens - you get shrunk to a very small size!

I invite everyone to contribute who wants to, and bring your own giant women to the story, keeping in mind a few requests:

1) Write good chapters - At least a paragraph of legible English with some details. I'm not expecting a magnum opus, just something that's easy and fun to read while painting a vivid picture. Something should happen in each chapter beyond the very first introduction ones.
1a) Remember that they're characters, not measurements. Each giantess has a personality that doesn't involve her bust size, and you can be more descriptive when describing it than "34DD."

2) No underage giantesses - I'd prefer to see none of the women under 18, and will reject anything with a giantess under 16. I made the setting a college for a reason. I'm open to bending on pretty much any guideline as long as there's reason except for this one. Other than that, playful giantesses encouraged! However I have nothing against gentle, uncaring, or needlessly cruel ones either, just write whatever floats your boat and is consistent with the woman.

3) Most things are okay! - I realize this is a very broad fetish with many secondary or tertiary facets, and would like to respect that. Whatever floats your boat! I just ask that you keep bodily waste out of it.

4) Endings are especially okay! - As long as they're telegraphed in advance, don't be afraid to end a particular line. If you do so though, don't have it leap from a choice of opening a door to getting stepped on, and if writing an ending don't simply go "she swallows you you're dead;" see 1).

5) Have fun! - I know I sure do. Let's come together and make an excellent, detailed story about shrinking around beautiful college girls.

This is optional, but please let me know how I'm doing! Send me reviews, let me know what you like and don't like, and if you have anything you want to see but are too shy to write it yourself, let me know. I'm willing to accommodate most things.
